    • Balance-based event posting has been fixed when the macrotransaction that closes the balance is supplementary (cross-balance case).

  • [CARDS-50233]

    • Incorrect interests waiving has been fixed in case of two Full Payment dates from two previous periods fall withing the one Billing period.

    • Calculation of FEE_BASE=CR_TRANS; has been fixed for different fee directions (debit/credit).

  • [CARDS-50489]

    • Fixed invalid error message generation during Balance Type validation in case when the parent balance type with the tag COUNTER_ONLY has subordinated balance types with 'TURNOVER%' usage. Added error message generation during Balance Type validation in case when parent balance type with the tag COUNTER_ONLY has subordinated balance types with 'BALANCE' usage.

  • [CARDS-50494]

    • "Latest items only" value in the "History Mode" field was removed. A new tag, "SAVE_LATEST" for the Balance Type is supported instead. It can be set automatically on Balance Type validation and it means that history will be saved for the last four items only.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf] [tags description]

  • [CARDS-50498]

    • Fixed calculation of the "MIR_REG_NUMBER" field for the "Statistics Acquiring Business", "Statistics Acquiring Devices", and "Statistics Issuing Business Prepared" NSPK reports.

    • The ability to set a classifier when there is more than one classifier with the same code but in different domains has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-50509]

    • Text labels for report sections have been corrected in the "NSPK Statistics Acquiring Business" report.

  • [CARDS-50549]

    • Fixed calculation of the "MIR_REG_NUMBER" field for the "Statistics Acquiring Business", "Statistics Acquiring Devices", and "Statistics Issuing Business Prepared" NSPK reports.

    • Fixed cell borders in the "NSPK Statistics Issuing Business" report.

    • Name of the menu item "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\Balance Types - Customized" has been restored to "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\Balance Types".

  • [CARDS-50624]

    • FX conversion does not execute for counter balance types.

  • [CARDS-50627]

    • Object Task Scheduler task for client addresses links renewing after client or contract approval now is switched off by default and can be switched on by the global parameter RENEW_ADDRESS_LINK.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50633]

    • Authorisation check in an unknown currency has been optimised.

  • [CARDS-50692]

    • Fixed balance-based classifier processing when CYCLE_N > 1.

  • [CARDS-50773]

    • Restored protection from deleting doc and m_transaction after they have been posted.

  • [CARDS-50792]

    • The "NSPK Statistics Acquiring Business" report has been enhanced: rounding for amount type fields and sorting data by the "Territory Code" field have been added.

  • [CARDS-50794]

    • Menu Item DB Administrator Utilities.Special Contract Utilities.Macrotransactions - Reverse has been updated - now macro-transactions generated by this menu item are marked with REPOST_MTR tag. This tag has local_date of reversed macro-transaciton as value and it allows Datamart to filter out such records during daily ETL process.

  • [CARDS-50967]

    • A check for main/sub account hierarchy links during the posting process has been added. The fatal error "Disturbed main/sub account hierarchy for contract [contract information]" occurs for broken links. To avoid such fatal errors, a validation script should be run once. See the "Upgrade Notes on Impact Changes" section for more details.

  • [CARDS-51006]

    • Fixed balance history creation for subcontracts when HistoryMode=Billing (After closing) is set.

  • [CARDS-51100]

    • Apply Rule tagged data for a classifier action's rules is now checked during processing.

  • [CARDS-51227]

    • Target ConsumerID calculation for decisions has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-51277]

    • Mirroring to Classifier for contract parameters with "Location of Current Vvalue" = Client configuration has been fixed.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51287]

    • FROM_TRANS_DATE behaviour has been restored for the explicit number of days defined in the tag value.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description]

  • [CARDS-51307]

    • Added validation that a Product's tariff domain hierarchy has only one tariff domain for each Tariff Book. I.e. 2 domains may not have the same Tariff Book code.

    Updated Manuals: [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51344]

    • Fixed possible "Accept abnormally failed with internal error instead" during the Contract Parameter set operation via applications in Product Inspector.

  • [CARDS-51394]

    • Fixed recalculation of values in the ON_DATE, ON_DATE_BALANCE fields of the Account table during the Accounting GL renumeration process.

  • [CARDS-51423]

    • Threshold amount calculation for Inherited standing orders with BY_BATCH has been fixed for multicurrency contracts.

  • [CARDS-51494]

    • Excessive processing of unmatched usage limiters in document posting is skipped if this has already been done by the authorization module.

  • [CARDS-51504]

    • A new form, Acnt Saved Limits.srd has been added to show MIN/MAX values for balances with the SAVE_LIMITS tag.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51535]

    • Changing of hardcoded balances for contracts has been optimised.

  • [CARDS-51571]

    • Fixed calculation of the "PS_ISS_INT_PRODUCT_NAME" statistic parameter.

  • [CARDS-51629]

    • The error message "History mode can not be empty" has been modified to the warning message "History mode may be required" when approving a Service Package.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51641]

    • Added the [Saved Limits] link to the "Acnt Balance" form. It allows saved limits to be viewed for balance types without History mode and with the USAGE=BALANCE; parameter in the "Posting Details" field.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51689]

    • MIN_BILLING parameter default behaviour has been changed.

  • [CARDS-51710]

    • The BILLING_DAY contract parameter has now the highest priority for calculating Billing Date for Monthly billing.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51725]

    • To copy a Billing Date from the top contract to Sub-liab contracts when the Billing Date is recalculated for the top contract, the tag value RECALC_BILLING=COPY_TO_LIAB_SUBS; should be used.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51839]

    • Validation for billing interval type in Account Scheme and in Date Scheme has been added.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51981]

    • Problem with setting version attribute and INT_TRF tag for an Accounting Scheme has been corrected in situations when there are no contracts and normalization orders for this scheme.

  • [CARDS-52164]

    • Display of balance amounts after performing the balance prediction procedure has been corrected in WAY4 Web. Cache clearing has been added.

  • [CARDS-52352]

    • BIN record search on contract subtype validation now checks BIN record status. Active records have a higher priority for being selected than records that are inactive or closed. However, active BIN records with "Data Source" = Own have a lower priority than inactive or closed records from other sources.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52662]

    • Reversal transactions have been excluded from the XLS_CB_f250_3.rdf report.

    Updated Manuals: [rf_reporting\250\Form_250.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52766]

    • Validation of setting of classifier value for the contract or client has been enhanced.

  • [CARDS-52815]

    • Fixed lengthy execution of the approve process for related acquiring contracts.

  • [CARDS-52893]

    • New tags MIN_BAL_TYPE_SIGN/MAX_BAL_TYPE_SIGN have been supported for use together with MIN_BAL_TYPE/MAX_BAL_TYPE and LIMIT_AMOUNT tags.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53036]

    • Behaviour of the FIRST_BILLING and MIN_BILLING=C tags has been enhanced.

  • [CARDS-53039]

    • Problem when no changes occurred after using the "Change" button in the "Attached Tariff Domains" form has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-53283]

    • Each ITEM_DUE is now processed separately in Acquiring products configuration. Previously, using a Due Type other then Value Days Due could cause a collapse of several ITEM_DUE with different signs, leading to incorrect information in Merchant Statement reports.

  • [CARDS-53693]

    • Corrected fee amount calculation for authorizations when an additional fee is taken by a limiter.

  • [CARDS-53710]

    • Masked document tags containing sensitive data when viewing them through the [All Tags] link. Custom tags can be configured to be masked in the menu item "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\System Utilities\Tagged Data Objects".

  • [CARDS-53774]

    • Fixed balance amount calculation for Balance Type with BY_CURR tag specified in Standing Order.

  • [CARDS-53809]

    • Use of the TOTAL_BAL_TYPE tag for prepaid cards has been changed. See Client Upgrade Notes.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54097]

    • A new custom procedure, CUST_RECALC_BILLING has been added for custom actions after changing the billing date for the main contract.

  • [CARDS-54249]

    • Added a new check in the Product approve procedure. Now all accounting contracts for a multi-currency Product should have a default priority specified. If the tag MULTICURR_PRODUCT=Y is set in the top Product, accounting sub-products should have the SIBLING_PRIORITY tag filled.

  • [CARDS-54486]

    • Fixed system behaviour for balance type with history mode: after using backdated processing functionality, MAX amount counter calculation has been corrected.

  • [CARDS-54539]

    • Corrected system behaviour for balance type with history mode = Billing when saving history records if billing falls on the second day of the year and the first day is a holiday.

  • [CARDS-54626]

    • During the Financial Institution Init Settings (Copy) process, references to products are restored after copying all the products.

  • [CARDS-55111]

    • Corrected Oracle hint for API acnt_api.LEAVE_LAST_N_RECORDS().

  • [CARDS-55727]

    • Deleted some obsolete objects to prevent undesirable use of unsupported functionality. This has been done for future compatibility with the new Contract Parameter approach.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-56478]

    • Extended collecting information about System Instances into statistic CMS group "PARMS", node "INSTANCE_ROLE" with current schema name and schema roles.

  • [CARDS-56706]

    • Corrected custom fee amount inheritance from an authorization document for adjustment documents in SMS mode, when "FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT;" tag is used in the corresponding custom fee.

  • [CARDS-56774]

    • Fixed creation of Interbranch Routing records between source and target financial institutions when copying Interbranch Routing from the source institution to the target institution.

  • [I1604188226]/[CARDS-49967]

    • Error showing a related document by clicking the [Document] button in "Messages for <process name>" form has been fixed. Previously a document not related to this message might have been shown.

  • [I1605234769]/[CARDS-50337]

    • The DICT message dictionary is obsolete and will be deleted in WAY4 Cards 03.46. All forms that were using DICT have been updated to use MESS_DICT. The menu item "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Transaction Dictionary" now uses the form "Message Dictionary - Transactions".

    Updated Manuals: [accounting\WAY4_Accounting.pdf]

  • [I1606141324]/[CARDS-49152]

    • Now we check (update) the value of the standard classifier CONTR_STATUS on contract approval.

  • [I1607272853]/[CARDS-49858]

    • Full Payment and Late Payment date calculation has been fixed for different calendar types specified in an Account Scheme. For credit products without date schemes.

  • [I1609214156]/[CARDS-51424]

    • The error message "History mode can not be empty" has been modified to the warning message "History mode may be required" when approving a Service Package.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf]

  • [I1609229639]/[CARDS-50443]

    • Balance Type validation has been improved. "Latest items only" value of the "History Mode" field was removed.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf] [tags description]

  • [I1610117081]/[CARDS-50654]

    • The ability to move a contract from a child to a parent institution has been added.

  • [I1610143454]/[CARDS-50702]

    • Definition of routing idt for new contracts is regulated by the SKIP_ROUTING global parameter. When the value is "Y" (default), routing idt will not be filled in. If distributed processing is used and routing idt is a required attribute of real contracts, its definition can be additionally regulated by the client parameter SKIP_ROUTING, whose should be "Y" for cards that have been issued but not yet sold.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [I1610179670]/[CARDS-50722]

    • Added reset of environment variables (global parameters, cached data when posting events, contracts, etc.) when a session is initialized.

  • [I1611249741]/[CARDS-52334]

    • FX rate definition for multicurrency limit normalization has been fixed according to corresponding Posting Date.

  • [I1612046735]/[CARDS-52303]

    • For the "test script import" pipe, search for a CLIENT_TYPE value for the APPL_CLIENT.CLT tag has been modified, now only financial institution is checked.

  • [I1701109043]/[CARDS-56360]

    • Fixed rounding of "BASE_RATE" and "FX_MARKUP_PCT" tag values in DCC Info Inquire documents when default DCC conversion mode "IPS" is used.

  • [I1702061012]/[CARDS-52491]

    • Character buffer overflow error message generation when approving Service Packages with long name values has been fixed.

  • [I1703017366]/[CARDS-52374]

    • When an event is posted for a contract, the last CDU date is not checked for events that change contract status.

  • [I1703024740]/[CARDS-52378]

    • Standing order amount calculation has been fixed for cases when an order's posting date is earlier than the current banking date, and when the order's minimum and maximum amount currency differs from the account currency.

  • [I1704121197]/[CARDS-52967]

    • Processing of annual miscellaneous Service fees for contracts created on February 28 of any non-leap year has been fixed. See Client Upgrade Notes for details.

  • [I1704189347]/[CARDS-52998]

    • Fixed double fee charging in issuing contracts for financial documents that inherit the fee amount from an authorization document (FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT is used in basic transaction service setup) when the fee is configured as a Misc service with the tag "MTR_FEE;" and triggered by a usage limiter on authorization document processing.

  • [I1704206572]/[CARDS-52902]

    • Fixed excessive creation of subcontracts on contract approve when a sub-product is configured with "# of contracts" greater than zero and filled relation fields.

  • [I1704207687]/[CARDS-52889]

    • Performance of the Renew Account Scheme Changes procedure has been improved when the system validates the payment priority algorithm for an upper limit template.

  • [I1704281513]/[CARDS-53814]

    • Supplementary order processing has been enhanced.

  • [I1705264265]/[CARDS-54295]

    • Fixed first cycle history initialization for balance types with History Mode = "Billing (After Close)" and "Billing (Before closing)". Corrected system behaviour when saving history records if billing falls on the first day of year.

  • [I1705317060]/[CARDS-53408]

    • Intermediate commits have been added to contract subtype and contract type check processes. The commit interval can be configured using process parameters. The default commit interval is 100 records.

  • [I1706260734]/[CARDS-54119]

    • To consolidate positive and negative Due Amounts from several Due Items for an acquiring product's accounts, the REFRESH_DUE tag should be set in the corresponding account templates. This tag should not be used for templates involved in per-transaction Merchant Payment Statements. By default, Due Amounts are never consolidated into one Due Normalization for acquiring products.

  • [I1709067810]/[CARDS-55097]

    • Restored the initial the behaviour of cards_reports.GET_ACC_GL_BAL() API. Now it returns GL turnover amounts from gl_transfer without the order_status filter.

  • [I1710173941]/[CARDS-55199]

    • Fixed issue. Now in "Balance Prediction" functionality, interest that has already been paid is excluded from the resulting amount for prediction on the current cycle date.

  • [I1710257336]/[CARDS-55494]

    • Fixed incorrect system behaviour: when using the "Duplicate" action in the Service screen, the amendment reference for the new record was not updated.

  • [I1711139617]/[CARDS-55559]

    • Increased the size of the copied account name in an account template to 200 symbols when adding a settlement currency (in the "FX Scheme" screen).

  • [I1803134990]/[CARDS-57133]

    • Corrected Interest Calculation for Interest Scheme = "-360" and Interest Delay = Yes when turnover is present for the last day of February.

  • [ICFEE-99]/[CARDS-51096]

    • Fee Base, Fee Min and Fee Max amounts for custom fees calculated with high accuracy and with currency conversion by Channel Rates, are rounded now with the same accuracy as defined in the PRECISION tag value in custom fee Service Details.

  • [CARDS-51495]

    • Reports XLS_CB_f250_1.rdf, XLS_CB_f250_2.rdf, XLS_CB_f250_3.rdf: - Added count of contactless cards, transactions and devices. - Supported consolidated report for all financial organization branches. - Supported counting of cards with only 2 groups: debit/credit.

    Updated Manuals: [rf_reporting\250\Form_250.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53819]

    • Currency overrides are supported in the standard form OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Currency Table.

    Updated Manuals: [accounting\Currency_Conversion.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54686]

    • Currency Table: Exponent for Chilean Peso and Uganda Shilling has been changed from 2 to 0 in the standard configuration.

  • [CARDS-54712]

    • Sending information about account closing to IPS has been added to the card contract status change procedure. Contract status codes should be configured in the ABU_CONTR_CLOSED_CODES global parameter (can be configured for a financial institution) to trigger information sending when the appropriate status is set. Information is only sent for contracts that have the ABU=Y tag configured in the contract subtype.

    Updated Manuals: ABU Issuing | MasterCard Automatic Billing Updater | Interacting

  • [CARDS-55466]

    • Added IPS MCX (Multicaixa). Added "MCX" channels with the "N" character and "Our MCX Cards" with the "n" character. Transaction Processing.

  • [I1704204444]/[CARDS-53062]

    • A new message channel with "Z" code has been registered for BELKART payment system and a message channel with "z" code has been registered for Our BELKART Cards. BELKART has been added to the Standard Handbook PAYMENT_SYSTEM list. BELKART card products have been added to the IPS product list.

    Core banking interface

  • [CARDS-49962]

    • Added a new parameter, "BASE_CH_JOIN" which allows the default join expression to be customised.

    Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\core_banking_interface\user_manuals\CBS_Interface_UFX.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48179]

    • RBS Outward processing: fixed "precision overflow (HASH_TOT_AMOUNT)" error.

  • [CARDS-50912]

    • IC Document Export: added a new pipe parameter "USE_TRANS_TYPE_IDT" = Y/N(default), which allows the "TransTypeIDT" element to be exported in the "Doc\TransType\TransCode" aggregate (for DETAILED_TRANS_CODE=Y mode).

    Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\core_banking_interface\user_manuals\CBS_Interface_UFX.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51109]

    • RBS Outward Processing: fixed "Can't buffer without truncating ()" error when executing the "GET_CLIENT_PARMS" procedure. If target or source accounts are longer than 32 symbols, they are truncated with a warning.

  • [CARDS-53805]

    • The necessary privilege to execute CARDS_PIPES package procedures has been added for RBS. Payments Import pipe.

  • [CARDS-54450]

    • Fixed ORA-01747 error during "empty" Assignment menu subitem execution in Scheduler.

  • [CARDS-56560]

    • Fixed error processing for zero rates loading. Added a new error category "Insert FX Error" for inserting error messages. RBS FX Rates Import, RBS FX Rates Import for future.

  • [I1511032735]/[CARDS-47173]

    • IC Documents Export, RBS. Transactions Export: fixed amounts for Reversal and Quasi Original when there are multiple Fin adjustments and Auth adjustments.

  • [I1607060884]/[CARDS-50105]

    • RBS FX Rate Import: fixed moving empty files to error directory.

  • [I1607143764]/[CARDS-50193]

    • IC.Documents Import: added additional check for DocRefSet elements.

  • [I1609226977]/[CARDS-51687]

    • RBS Document Import: fixed response file for import file after previous unsuccessful import.

  • [I1703209597]/[CARDS-52654]

    • Pipe RBS. Transactions Export (Batching): Fixed generation of duplicate empty files for a future date.

  • [I1705113768]/[CARDS-53779]

    • Supported Misc Fee data export in plain and UFX file formats for bank branches.

  • [I1707179843]/[CARDS-54270]

    • FPLP: Fixed Batch Approve result processing. Now Warnings are not processed as errors during FPLP process. Added tracing for FPLP.

  • [I1710189537]/[CARDS-55554]

    • RBS. Documents Export: Added checking length of transaction code.

  • [I1702036425]/[CARDS-52235]

    • Documents in the Core_banking_interface directory that describe work with C pipes have been renamed, with the OLD_ prefix added.

  • [CARDS-51263]

    • IC Documents Export: Added the ability to export PAN instead of TOKEN for ONUS token transactions. To export PANs, the value of the new pipe parameter "PAN_FOR_TOKEN_ONUS" should be set to "Y".

    Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\core_banking_interface\user_manuals\CBS_Interface_UFX.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55190]

    • Old RBS. Documents Import, Old RBS. Payments Import, Old RBS. Transaction Slips Import. Added pipe parameter DAYS_BETWEEN. This is the max number of days between File Creation Date and current date. Old files will be rejected.

    Customer profile

  • [CARDS-49434]

    • Standard classifier CLIENT_ROLE and corresponding Consumer Role field on forms is removed from data_etalon. Please contact OW Global support in case this classifier was used for defining the Consumers hierarchy.

  • [CARDS-51084]

    • Marketing personal messages are now limited to 4000 characters.

  • [CARDS-51292]

    • Marketing personal messages are now limited to 4000 characters.

  • [UFX-319]

    • Transaction downgrades have been supported for P2P operations

  • [UFX-320]

    • Transaction downgrades have been supported for bill payment operations

  • [CARDS-53839]

    • The Client Template Details form in the Customer Profile\Operations menu shows sensitive attributes as masked and non-editable. To comply with PA-DSS requirements, a service attribute which can contain PAN should inherit its value from a sensitive dynamic handbook parameter or be directly marked as sensitive by the SENSITIVE=Y tag in the Additional Data field.

    Updated Manuals: [customer_profile\Configuring_WAY4_Customer_Profile.pdf]

    Customer/account management

  • [I1610185239]/[CARDS-51106]

    • A new field, CLIENT_BRANCH, has been added to CONTRACT_DATA. This new field shows the client's branch. The BRANCH field shows the the contract's branch.

  • [CARDS-43148]

    • Added a new parameter P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS for the "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details.rdf" report for using the report with Way4Web.

    Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Merchant_Statements.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50085]

    • "Past Due Days" field has been added to Customer Support screen.

  • [CARDS-50178]

    • A new feature to change a card's Product during card replacement has been added. The functionality is supported for Products with a special tag REPLACE_TO=<Product Code> in the "custom data" field.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50192]

    • A new feature to change a card's Product during card replacement has been added. The functionality is supported for Products with a special tag REPLACE_TO=<Product Code> in the "custom data" field.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50750]

    • The P_SHOW_INSTALMENT_LIMITS parameter can be used to show instalment limits in a separate section of a cardholder statement.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51973]

    • Added a new parameter P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS for the "Cardholder Contract Statement" and "Merchant Contract Statement" reports for using these reports with Way4Web.

  • [CARDS-52014]

    • Added a new procedure cust_cms_stat() for gathering custom statistical information in the gather CMS statistics process.

  • [CARDS-52446]

    • In the "Contract_Analytic_Statement" and "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" reports an option has been added to show purchases made using loyalty bonuses in the separate section.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52828]

    • A new parameter has been added to the "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" report: P_HIDE_FEE_CONDITION, varchar(4000). The default value is "1=2". The parameter only works if P_SHOW_CUSTOM_FEE=Y. Use the parameter to hide fee amounts (convert fee amount to zero) in the transactions section.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53024]

    • The following variables have been added to support multicurrency debit products in statement reports ad: -%SIBLING_MTR%, with values Y / N indicating sibling order transaction. -%MTR_OPPOSITE$, prefix for the opposite contract from a transaction.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53363]

    • Authorization requests for cards with multiple relations will be rejected if no contract exists with the specified relation and the SET_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT global parameter is set to 'N'. Authorization advices and financial presentments will be processed for the default relation contract.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53732]

    • In a multiple relation configuration, if no relation is specified in an authorization document, the default contract will be chosen even if the global parameter SET_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT is set to 'N'.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54124]

    • The following variables have been added to support multicurrency debit products in statement reports ad: -%SIBLING_MTR%, with values Y / N indicating sibling order transaction. -%MTR_OPPOSITE$, prefix for the opposite contract from a transaction.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50683]

    • Fixed an issue in which clients remained not approved after running contract hierarchy approval in structures with top liability and sub-liability contracts. Clients for all subordinate contracts are checked when approving a contract.

  • [CARDS-50690]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of PIN change in cases when a card is linked to multiple account contracts.

  • [CARDS-51444]

    • Fixed performance trouble with procedure of calculation values current amount and current number fields on GUI forms.

  • [CARDS-52263]

    • Standard CUST_STATE_STR_TO_LOG procedure has been changed: duplication of records during contract balance prediction logging has been fixed.

  • [I1607274086]/[CARDS-50358]

    • In report "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details", the parameter "P_SHOW_EMPTY_CONTRACTS" affects the XML results - it applies a filter on the empty contracts.

  • [I1610123492]/[CARDS-50677]

    • Reversed entries are now shown in the CSS Doc Entry form.

  • [I1610145898]/[CARDS-50819]

    • Script for client_address.parent_address cleanup has been added into upgrade from version below 03.42.00.

  • [I1610210315]/[CARDS-51038]

    • Processing of temporary credit limits with "credit limit posting" mode has been fixed: now if a new "Temporary credit limit" is set with an effective period that overlaps with the previous "Temporary credit limit", the previous "Temporary credit limit" will be closed and the appropriate documents will be posted.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]

  • [I1611104436]/[CARDS-51187]

    • Precision of currency conversion rate stored for macrotransactions has been increased to 12 digits.

  • [I1611104436]/[CARDS-51596]

    • Increased the precision of reading FX rates for macrotransactions to 12 digits for use in screen forms and reports.

  • [I1704129756]/[CARDS-54082]

    • Optimized WAY4Manager Customer Support Screen to decrease tab opening time.

  • [I1707314157]/[CARDS-54433]

    • Fixed string buffer overflow in API - acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0.

  • [I1708219196]/[CARDS-54566]

    • WAY4Manager form for Memo Messages have been synchronized with DBM form.

    DB kernel

  • [DBK-2154]

    • The default value for line separator has been changed from LF to CRLF. The LINE_SEPARATOR parameter has been added and it configures the Java SQL Exporter Pipe.

  • [DBK-2209]

    • Application version registration has become a HA safe operation and can be done in secondary systems.

  • [DBK-2332]

    • Supported flexible interval qualifier for period processes start time.

  • [DBK-2339]

    • Changed call method of DB procedures called before link form. Now binding is used to pass IN parameter (Record ID) into the procedure.

  • [DBK-2373]

    • Changed error message when grants were not updated on upgrade.

  • [DBK-2375]

    • Table local_constants and view v_local_constants has been enhanced with additional sets of fields of different types. This allows to use this structure in DB Manager and WAY4 Manager User Interfaces for capturing more input parameters than before.

  • [I1610250251]/[CARDS-50863]

    • Supported hash partitioning of pk_evnt_action.

  • [I210244216]/[DBK-2210]

    • Date format in the status bar of DBM/W4M can be changed.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49808]

    • export.bat with "filt" option was exporting inactive keys (PM_KEYS table) as active

  • [CARDS-50648]

    • DML tagging for acnt_contract.last_scan does not work if "Upgrade Stoplist" synch flow is present.

  • [CARDS-51267]

    • Fixed document error message when a batch has already been posted, but not closed.

  • [CARDS-52983]

    • Fixed the possibility of infinite loop on BER-TLV tag parsing.

  • [DBK-2109]

    • The CopyOfficers script now locks a user account if Officer.is_active is not "Yes".

  • [DBK-2147]

    • Telescope was unable to run reports with report server version 11+ if a parameter contained a single quote character.

  • [DBK-2217]

    • Misspelling in the "Clear Old Processes" dialog box has been corrected.

  • [DBK-2238]

    • Now for any error, the SQL Exporter pipe saves error details to the process log and displays a message to the user.

  • [DBK-2241]

    • If a partitioned table is being encrypted, its existing partitions will be moved to the table tablespace (was: they resided in their current tablespace). This enables tablespace encryption for existing partitions.

  • [DBK-2278]

    • Object Task Scheduler fails if the node is not available.

  • [DBK-2280]

    • Fixed concurrency between object task and normal operations when the Object Task Scheduler is suspended.

  • [DBK-2282]

    • A periodic process will no longer try to start working when it is suspended.

  • [DBK-2283]

    • Fixed problem when process uniqueness control did not work if the process had the Suspended status.

  • [DBK-2284]

    • The data value of the "Suspended" process status in Process Log has been changed from "P" to "S".

  • [DBK-2331]

    • Concurrence on updating process_log in Way4Replication has been fixed.

  • [DBK-3012]

    • IPM Inward Processing. Removed DE55 format error messages from Process Log.

  • [DBK-3332]

    • Added a new global parameter, DM_ID_CACHE_LEN. This parameter defines the size of cache of dm_record.id values. The default value is 20. Increase this value if row lock contention on num_seq_range occurs during high volume of inserting into dm_record.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [I1611010227]/[DBK-2333]

    • Fixed: SQL error in OpenWay\WAY4U\Business Processes\Business Processes -> Data form.

  • [I1612278687]/[DBK-2428]

    • Non-periodic parallel process now processes Suspend and Resume correctly.

  • [I1705101042]/[CARDS-53222]

    • Fixed event messages display in the "Messages" form (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Event Types).

  • [CARDS-51765]

    • Updated Main Technical Requirements: minimum hardware requirements for running Reports software have been updated to 2 CPU, 4 Gb RAM. A new manual, system/ows_OracleReports12Setup.html has been added.

  • [CARDS-53785]

    • PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Disk Encryption section has been added (disk encryption is used when there is no Oracle Advanced Security option).

    DB manager

  • [CARDS-49626]

    • The menu item "OpenWay\Full\Process Log\Usage Actions - All" has been renamed to "Events Log". Names, buttons and columns containing "Usage Action" in forms have been renamed to "Events Log".

    Updated Manuals: [db_manager\DB_Manager_Administrator_Manual.pdf]

  • [DBK-2387]

    • Oracle Reports Servlet needs a new parameter reports_directory ( the path to the directory where RDF - files places). Parameters report_server_home, report_server_work, home_directory, work_directory not used any more.

  • [DBK-3021]

    • Migrated DB Manager to a new PowerBuilder version.

  • [I1601292690]/[DBK-2032]

    • DB Manager form selects a reference value from long reference tables (long DDDW) using a LIKE SQL operator. It causes searching without index if the DB column is encrypted. To prevent such a case, declare the list of encrypted columns directly. The form will use '=' in the SQL statement for these columns. Use the ENCRYPTED_COLUMNS DB.INI parameter to declare the column list. Format of the parameter: <table code 1>.<column code 1>,<table code 2>.<column code 2>,...

    Updated Manuals: [db_manager\DB_Manager_Administrator_Manual.pdf]

  • [I1606308820]/[CARDS-51357]

    • A template file HOME\install\mkwork\DB.INI has been adapted to Report Engine R2.

  • [CARDS-53163]

    • Fixed inability to add elements to several Exception Lists (OpenWay\Risk Based Assessment\Exception lists) without reopening the sub-form.

  • [DBK-2107]

    • Report Engine R2. Parameters P_USER, P_TITLE can be set in menu item parameter list.

  • [DBK-2139]

    • Reports Engine R2. New parameters for Batch report utility: errorStatusXml (to switch off corresponding Report Server parameter), errorDir (directory for error reports).

  • [DBK-2143]

    • Report Engine R2 generated an exception if it was requested to save result file on server.

  • [DBK-2162]

    • Reports Engine R2 processed double symbols '%' in parameter value incorrectly. Replace %% with %%%%.

  • [DBK-2629]

    • Fixed error "No such field error: truncReportDir" in WAY4 Remote Access when launching Oracle report.

  • [I1606063687]/[DBK-2100]

    • Reports Engine R2 no longer ignores the report_server_http_timeout parameter.

  • [I1609232726]/[DBK-2247]

    • Report Engine R2 batch mode. The engine incorrectly substituted SELECT columns into parameters if the substitutions were marked by sequence numbers (%1%, %2%, ...).

  • [I1611102005]/[DBK-2394]

    • Fixed problem when DB Manager didn't reset the value of the IS_READY field in some cases (when a user changed a DB record through a DB Manager form twice and another process set the field value to "Y" between the changes).

  • [I1612077255]/[DBK-2960]

    • Changed DB Manager behaviour in which focus on the error window was lost during "Process" menu subitem execution.

  • [I1710042561]/[DBK-3192]

    • Fixed issue with VISA BaseII/MasterCard IPM/AMEX GNS Inward: now all uncritical format errors are not logged in Process Log.

    Data preparation and card personalization

  • [CARDS-49197]

    • D-PAS (Diners Club) supported in data preparation module.

  • [CARDS-49447]

    • UPI Quickpass supported in Data Preparation module.

  • [CARDS-49494]

    • Export SecureCode AAV Validation Key in MC OBKM pipe supported.

    Updated Manuals: [mastercard_interface\MC_OBKM.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50214]

    • KM Keys LMK2LMK migration pipe now supports the ADK and ADK2 keys used in One-Time-Password MMA Authentication method

  • [CARDS-51466]

    • 3DS AAV Keys supported for magnetic cards with MC Virtual encoding method.

  • [CARDS-47977]

    • All HSM interaction logs are written in smifce sub-directory now. The whole path to smifce sub-directory is logged in Process Log.

  • [CARDS-49198]

    • Supported CA Interface (CA self-signed certificate loading, generating request for signing issuer key and loading issuer key certificate) for D-PAS.

  • [CARDS-49646]

    • The RSA EMV Key Management pipe no longer shows the Folder Selection dialog. Instead, the pipe shows a File Selection dialog with a list of all suitable files (if the SOURCE_DIR parameter is set) or selects the first suitable file from DEFAULT_PATH (if DEFAULT_PATH is set and SOURCE_DIR is not set).

  • [CARDS-49757]

    • Performance problem that appeared after PBID support has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-50203]

    • "CA Issuer Identifier" Key Option is supported. Key Option can be used to specify Issuer Identifier and has a higher priority than the MIR_ISSUER_IDENTIFIER pipe parameter for NSPK cards and than Bank Production Details for MasterCard cards.

  • [CARDS-49230]

    • Clearer error messages have been added for attempts to load CPV, VPA or MChip Advance profiles in an incorrect format.

  • [CARDS-49231]

    • Fixed bug in loading parameters to a Chip Scheme with parameter types from another Chip Scheme Template.

  • [CARDS-49237]

    • Loading of Issuer Authentication Flags (tag 9F55) and Issuer Proprietary Bitmap (tag 9F56) supported for CPV profile import.

  • [CARDS-50129]

    • Fixed Bug with CA RSA Key Mac translation from old to new LMK.

  • [CARDS-50276]

    • For MasterCard and JCB parameters issuer key serial number generation at key pair generation step fixed.

  • [CARDS-50452]

    • Categories supported for template tags in VPA Import chip scheme pipe.

  • [CARDS-50970]

    • Bug with usability of Issuer Script parameter "BF5B-PW Appl Internal Data Templ" fixed.

  • [CARDS-51112]

    • Default settings in the standard menu item for the RSA Emv Key Management pipe have changed. Keys and certificates are stored and read from @WORK_DIR@\data\keys directory.

  • [CARDS-51114]

    • Default ICC Key Pre-generation Menu Items have been fixed and no longer refer to unused PM_ICC_KEY view.

  • [CARDS-54319]

    • Redesigned the algorithm for defining a hierarchy of applications for loading into one plastic. Now a hierarchy of applications with different expiry dates and sequence numbers can be joined in one plastic.

  • [I1408123014]/[CARDS-43895]

    • Embossing Files.rdf: P_SHOW_ONLY_MAIN_APPLETS parameter has been added.N Plast and N PIN columns corrected

    Updated Manuals: [data_preparation_and_card_personalisation\user_manuals\Card_and_PIN_Production.pdf]

  • [I1512230336]/[CARDS-48394]

    • Fixed bug in counting total cards number, encoded cards and printed PIN mailers for cards with applet.

  • [CARDS-52785]

    • Updated "PA DSS Implementation Guide". The section "List of Third-Party Software Used, System Services and Protocols Used" has been changed. Added a warning that the mod_security component is an essential part of the application with regard to security.

  • [CARDS-52137]

    • Export MasterCard PayPass MagStripe CVC3 Validation Key suppored in MC OBKM pipe.

    Updated Manuals: [mastercard_interface\MC_OBKM.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52286]

    • Export of SecureCode AAV Validation Key from CAVV_A and CAVV_B in MC OBKM pipe supported.

    Updated Manuals: [mastercard_interface\MC_OBKM.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52669]

    • MIR Contactless supported in Data Preparation.

  • [PMPIPES-57]

    • Added support of QAUC parameter during SSAD calculation.

  • [I1711138961]/[CARDS-55913]

    • Added Issuer Script for updating C5 tag value to "NSPC MIR Generic" Chip Scheme Template.

    Datamart

  • [CARDS-49566]

    • The OpenWay\WAY4 Data Warehouse Interface menu has been renamed to OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface. See the "Upgrade Notes on Impact changes" section for more details.

  • [CARDS-49832]

    • OpenWay\WAY4 Data Warehouse Interface\Configuration Setup\Payment Scheme Identification screen form has been modified.

  • [CARDS-51382]

    • Soft synchronization of sy_conf_group_val records ("DWD_CARD_BRAND" configuration group) is now performed with the menu item "OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\OpenWay Settings\Synchronize DWD_CARD_BRAND with IPS_PRODUCT". If a record with a certain code has to be added to DWD_CARD_BRAND and a deleted record with this code was found, the deleted record is restored and a new record is not created. Synchronization of the PAYMENT SCHEME list ("PAYMENT_SCHEME" configuration group) with sy_std_handbook "PAYMENT_SYSTEM" has been added.

  • [CARDS-51390]

    • Added the "Shift" button to the "Datamart operation types" form to adjust an operation's priority. Added the "Overlaps" link to the "Datamart operation type rules" form to show rules that overlap with the selected rule.

  • [CARDS-51888]

    • A new form, "Mp Payment Scheme Member BINs" has been created for the new table, mp_ps_member_bin; a link to "Mp Payment Scheme Member BINs" has been added to the "Mp Payment Scheme Identification" form.

    Updated Manuals: Datamart | Datamart_WAY4_Settings.pdf [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51991]

    • A new form, "Mp Payment Scheme Member BINs" has been created for the new table, mp_ps_member_bin; a link to "Mp Payment Scheme Member BINs" has been added to the "Mp Payment Scheme Identification" form.

    Updated Manuals: [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52308]

    • In WAY4 Datamart version 03.45.10, new FI Group Load functionality for performing several loads to Datamart (ETLs) for one banking date has been supported. The fi_load_group tag should be put in f_i.special_parms to configure financial institution groups to be loaded during a certain ETL. The mp_fi_load_group table and forms for filling in the fi_load_group tag in f_i.special_parms has been added from WAY4 Cards version 03.45.30.

    Updated Manuals: [Datamart\manuals\language\Datamart_Administration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54943]

    • Corrected Process Messages for creation of consistency points with the CLOSE_GL consistency type. They no longer mention WAY4 Datamart. Starting from WAY4 Cards version 03.45.30, the POINT_TYPE tag in the mp_consist_type.add_info field is expected to differentiate consistency points used by WAY4 Datamart (POINT_TYPE tag with the "DM" value) and those used by WAY4 Cards (POINT_TYPE tag has the "C" value). For WAY4 Cards version 03.44.30, mention of WAY4 Datamart has been excluded for creation of consistency points with the CLOSE_GL consistency type.

  • [CARDS-49980]

    • In the "Account Roles - Customized" form "Product Category" values are taken from the "Product Category" dictionary. New forms have been added for Datamart: "Balance Types mapping - Customized" and "Last Head Process".

  • [CARDS-50684]

    • updating 'PR' tag in acnt_contract.ext_data has been excluded from golden gate synch

  • [CARDS-50759]

    • Creating DM consist point for End of Day based in ldate_log have been done.

  • [CARDS-54963]

    • DCI IPSE Export: fixed negative transaction amounts export in Transaction File. Now F111 (Transaction Amount) always contains unsigned value. The sign is defined in F127 (Debit/Credit Flag).

  • [CARDS-55128]

  • [CARDS-55215]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Fixed filling of the "Record Type" field for an Account File if the pipe parameter ACC_LVL_FOR_BAL is set.

  • [CARDS-55418]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Fixed filling of "SIC Code" and "Merchant Specific Code" fields in TRA file. Now if SIC code has a value between 3000 and 3999, it is put in the "Merchant Specific Code" field, otherwise in the "SIC Code" field.

  • [CARDS-55433]

    • Changed the behaviour of the BAL file fields marked as "Information provided on the statement date only" in the DCI IPSE manual that are now exported only if the "Record Type" field value is "B".

  • [CARDS-55540]

    • DCI Outward: Fixed field AQGEO filling (for DCI Release 15.2 and higher). Now the pipe gets Country from the corresponding financial institution.

  • [I1801165374]/[CARDS-56538]

    • Corrected behaviour for DCI Clearing Import and DCI Inward Processing. Now ATM Service Fee transactions are processed as special Misc transactions. Previously they were processed as general ATM transactions.

  • [I1801177190]/[CARDS-56533]

    • Fixed converting document SIC code to DCI "Charge Type" field in DCI Outward pipe. Previously the pipe couldn't find "Charge Type" for SIC codes starting with zero.

  • [CARDS-50949]

    • DCI Inward Processing: For loading Acquirer Confirmation File - changed message code S1--I--- trans type "Interchange Total" to S1-AI--- trans type "Acq Interchange Total" and code S1--F--- trans type "Reimbursement Fee Total" to S1-AF--- trans type "Acq Reimbursement Fee Total". They must be changed manually or by loading Copy Configuration file. Supported loading Interchange Issuer Detail File.

Inward Processing\DCI DXS Inward Processing has been removed.

    Updated Manuals: [diners_club_interface\Diners_Interface.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53712]

    • Supported export of DCI Card Product Submission file for different DCI Releases. Version number filled from DCI_RELEASE global parameter.

  • [CARDS-53713]

    • DCI: Supported loading and processing Card Product File for Acquirer.

    Updated Manuals: [diners_club_interface\Diners_Interface.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53769]

    • Supported processing DCI Card Production Confirmation file and storing information from this file in the process log.

  • [CARDS-54266]

    • DCI MPE Import, CPF Acquirer Import. Supported DCI Card Products codes C and D in default value for pipe parameters PRODUCT2AFS_MAP and PRODUCT2PTI_MAP.

  • [CARDS-54413]

    • DCI IPSE Export. Fixed filling "Information Products File Name" field in the Control file.

  • [CARDS-54636]

    • Implemented loading of historical data. Three new parameters have been added to the pipes com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.clearing_import.jar and com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.inward_processing: - HISTORY_MODE=Y/N (the default value is "N") - pipe's mode of operation. If HISTORY_MODE=Y, data from an incoming file are loaded without addendums and with outward status="History" . - HIST_ARN_LIST - ARN filter (list of ARN with commas as delimiters) for historical documents. The parameter only works if HISTORY_MODE=Y. If the ARN of a processed document is included in this list, the document is downloaded. If HIST_ARN_LIST is empty and HISTORY_MODE =Y, all documents from the incoming file are downloaded as historical documents. - HISTORY_POSTING=Y/N (the default value is "N"). If HISTORY_POSTING=Y, an attempt to post a downloadable document is made.

  • [CARDS-54752]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Added customization point for "Last Billing Date" field in Accounts File.

  • [CARDS-54754]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Added customization point for "Expiration Date" field in Accounts File.

  • [CARDS-54769]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Added customization point for "Last Purchase Date", "Last Payment Date", and "Last Payment Amount" fields in Balance File.

  • [CARDS-54941]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Supported filling Transaction File fields "Record of Charge/Ticket No." and "Supplemental Information" from Airline Addendum.

  • [CARDS-54962]

    • DCI IPSE Export: Added customization points for Account Number fields in Accounts and Balance files. Added the ACC_CONNECT_BY parameter for additional account filtration.

  • [CARDS-55113]

    • Removed CARD_CONTRACT_TYPE pipe parameter as deprecated.

  • [CARDS-56453]

    • Removed EMPTY field from Recap Header Message (rollbacked issue CARDS-42749). DCI Outwards Processing, DCI Clearing Import.

  • [I1704129157]/[CARDS-52876]

    • DCI MPE (Sys Ops XML File) Import: Supported loading Product Id, Account Funding Source and Product Category fields in BIN Table. Added DCI products to IPS Product Definition (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Routing\IPS Product Definition).

    Updated Manuals: [diners_club_interface\Diners_Interface.pdf]

    Dispute assistant

  • [CARDS-49711]

    • DA v2: Creation of automatic SAFE / FRS documents has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-49733]

    • DA v2: Retail Reversal processing if a case is being created for an incoming chargeback.

  • [CARDS-49902]

    • DA v2. Form "Dispute Rule - Doc Parms.dataform.xml" restored field "Check Level".

  • [CARDS-50286]

    • DA v2: The "Change Trusted Amount" activity must be configured with "Amount Type Group" = "Client Amounts".

  • [CARDS-50569]

    • Accept Documents: Fixed Fee Collection performance impact by removing searching by PS Reference Number.

  • [CARDS-50779]

    • DA v2. Added the [Complete Image Activity] button to the CM.New Case Activity.dataform.xml dataform.

  • [CARDS-51270]

    • DA v.2: Added Rule "-> Go to Processing Representment Step" in the "Pre-Arbitration" step of the MasterCard Issuer Standard Strategy and AMEX GNS Issuer Standard Strategy.

  • [CARDS-52496]

    • DA v2. Fixed situation when incoming Presentment Reversals/Adjustments and MasterCard Fee Collection secondary documents were not linked to the corresponding cases.

  • [CARDS-52939]

    • Dispute Assistant v2. Fixed the procedure to get the last document in a chain.

  • [CARDS-52942]

    • Fixed posting of secondary documents, now when an optional document is reversed, the previous document status is not restored.

  • [CARDS-53484]

    • Dispute Assistant v2: Suppressed Automatic Final Write-Off for zero summary balances.

  • [CARDS-53800]

    • Enhanced dispute documents matching. When a duplicate dispute document is processed, the DSP_DUPL=Y tag is set in the document. Matching of reclassified chargebacks will check the mandatory reason code change, and can be turned off for different payment systems using the global parameter DSP_RECLASSIFIED_CBKS_% with the "N" value, where % is the channel code. A document with the DSP_DUPL=Y tag will initiate a separate case in Dispute Assistant.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] Dispute Management

  • [CARDS-54197]

    • DA R2: Fixed invalid case amounts when a Credit Reversal is processed.

  • [CARDS-54246]

    • DA R2. Fixed duplicate call procedure to calculate amounts for secondary documents if they are opened to edit several times.

  • [CARDS-54393]

    • Dispute Assistant R2: Fixed wrong bank balance and representment amount calculation on acquirer side when there is a first presentment reversal before chargeback.

  • [CARDS-54644]

    • Dispute Assistant R2: Added menu "ROOT\OpenWay\Dispute Assistant R2\Setup" for access to Case Management setup.

  • [CARDS-54711]

    • The "Add Info" field has been added to the W4M "Reply Doc" form opened by the buttons "Doc-Brief ->Cbk/Rpr" and "Doc-Brief ->Pt Cbk/Rpr", and to the W4M "Reversal Doc" form, opened by the buttons "Doc-Brief ->Reverse".

  • [CARDS-55547]

    • DA R2. Fixed function to check Fraud Counter. Now this is performed only for Issuing contracts.

  • [03.45.30.22]/[CARDS-56660]

    • Fixed processing of a duplicate chargeback document when a presentment reversal was declined. Duplicate chargeback documents are no longer declined in such situations.

  • [I1408182397]/[CARDS-51748]

    • Dispute Assistant v1, v2: Changed MasterCard default type of rate for amount conversion from MDB to MDM.

  • [I1503163246]/[CARDS-49248]

    • DA v2. Fee Collection processing in part of case creation and linking.

  • [I1512106388]/[CARDS-49388]

    • DA v2: Supported Dispute Case creation for final chargeback matched with history representment. Supported activities for Acquirers to add history representment, history chargeback and history presentment for such cases.

  • [I1512231114]/[CARDS-53570]

    • Fixed an issue with filling in the "Trans Date" field for Reimbursements. Now, a database system date is used for the "Trans Date" field and can be redefined when using the Product Inspector.

  • [I1601117197]/[CARDS-47499]

    • DA v2: Final Write-Off amounts processing.

  • [I1604192767]/[CARDS-49093]

    • DA v2. Supported changing Trusted Amount currency. The currency may be the First Presentment transaction or settlement currency.

  • [I1606077949]/[CARDS-49565]

    • DA v2. Fixed amount calculation if case is initiated by Orphaned Chargeback.

  • [I1606108037]/[CARDS-49851]

    • DA v2: Added "No Such Card" detection for not fully posted documents when contracts are found but no macro-transaction under the document.

  • [I1606168942]/[CARDS-49685]

    • Duplicate chargeback processing has been fixed. Now a duplicate chargeback is posted with response code RC=57, chained with the first presentment and added to the existing dispute case.

  • [I1607081471]/[CARDS-51266]

    • DA v2: Fixed amount processing if the global parameter USE_TRANS_AMOUNT=Y.

  • [I1607269017]/[CARDS-50154]

    • DA v2: Fixed the procedure to get the last document in a chain. Supported processing reversals that were not generated in the DA interface. The activity "Accepted Presentment Reversal (Iss)" (idt DSP_ACPT_PRS_REV_SYSACT) must be registered in the acquirer strategy.

  • [I1609075192]/[CARDS-50165]

    • Fixed Accept Fee Collection Documents issue: now an unnecessary search is not made for related documents if there is no ARN and PS Ref Number in the document as this search significantly affected performance.

  • [I1609086162]/[CARDS-51433]

    • DA v.2: Fixed filling reimbursement amounts by default.

  • [I1609086162]/[CARDS-52526]

    • DA v2. Fixed Reimbursement Transaction Amount processing if a reimbursement is created manually.

  • [I1609213579]/[CARDS-50737]

    • DA v2: Fixed Reject documents processing (adding to a case).

  • [I1610184379]/[CARDS-51319]

    • DA v2: Restored the reopen case feature if a new document is added to a closed case.

  • [I1701125638]/[CARDS-53582]

    • Resolved issue: Now dispute documents with fee return can be processed even if the original document's services have been deleted by Housekeeping. If the FEE_RETURN=ALL option is configured, a fee will be returned; in other cases, a document will be processed without fee return.

  • [I1702080846]/[CARDS-52354]

    • DA v2. Fixed settlement amount calculation for credit Second Presentments.

  • [I1702105338]/[CARDS-52777]

    • Fixed creation of duplicate Retail Reimbursements in DA R2: For write-off of a dispute case with a presentment for "No Such Card", if a reimbursement (in this case, write-off of the presentment) is created manually, it won't be created automatically by the standard dispute case write-off procedure.

  • [I1702225414:ISMP 2075322 : MC International CBK are all rejected since MC Release 16.2]/[CARDS-52243]

    • DA v1: Restored channel M (MasterCard International Channel) processing. Only for DA v1!!!

  • [I1703145086]/[CARDS-52516]

    • Changed Target Member Id filling in DA v2. Now Target Member Id is not pre-filled in a created Fee Collection. It is filled during routing search.

  • [I1703175143]/[CARDS-52525]

    • "CM Dispute Assistant" menu item distribution process has been fixed. Now it is uploaded to customers who have a license for Dispute Assistant functionality.

  • [I1703281144]/[CARDS-53100]

    • DA v2: Added checking that data in the document add_info field is properly terminated with a semicolon for documents that are manually edited. If not, a semicolon will be added to the end of the add_info field.

  • [I1707055765]/[CARDS-54206]

    • Fixed an issue with calculating (predicting) an amount for Partial Second Presentment to prevent an empty result in the amount fields. The calculation algorithm has not been changed.

  • [I1707289866]/[CARDS-55300]

    • DA R2: Fixed reversal processing for No Such Card case. Now reversals will be added under the case. If a reversal is not matched with the first presentment, a new case will be created.

  • [I1709135169]/[CARDS-55245]

    • DA R2: Fixed document "Requirement" field filling for MasterCard Fulfillment - Fee Collection. Now DA sets "Requirement" to "ER1" instead of "1".

  • [I1710100883, I1710100829]/[CARDS-55210]

    • DA R2. Fixed Outgoing Fee Collection processing: added setting tag OUR_CARD in the add_info field of the doc table.

  • [I1801241324]/[CARDS-57194]

    • DA R2: Added case amounts recalculation for moving documents.

  • [I403199808]/[CARDS-52506]

    • Restored the original conditions (that were used before DA v2 was developed) to call DA v1.

  • [CARDS-51624]

    • MasterCard Transaction Management. A warning message and opening a "CHBK_FRAUD_COUNTER" Event have be added for cases when the number of Fraud Chargebacks is exceeded. DA v2. Create Chargeback activity can't be performed if the number of Fraud Chargebacks is exceeded.

  • [CARDS-52048]

    • DA v2: Supported processing of a duplicate secondary document if is matched with an original document.

  • [CARDS-54531]

    • DA R2: Added use of Trusted Amount in amount pre-calculation for a final chargeback if the first chargeback is for the full transaction amount.

  • [CARDS-54810]

    • Transaction Management: Removed Documentation Indicator check for VISA VCR secondary documents.

  • [CARDS-54855]

    • Supported new Activities in DA R2 which are performed in the VCR Chargeback, Chargeback Reversal, Representment, and Representment Reversal Notification documents posting process. Now these documents are added to the appropriate cases and processed.

    Updated Manuals: [dispute_assistant\Dispute_Assistant_Case_Configuration.pdf]

    Distributed processing

  • [CARDS-52057]

    • Replication Loop for distributed processing is supported in Advanced Applications R2.

  • [DBK-2692]

    • The ability has been added to migrate HA services between nodes in force mode.

    Updated Manuals: [db_kernel\db_replication\DB_Replication_Monitoring.pdf] [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_operation.pdf]

  • [DBK-2756]

    • The ability has been added to migrate HA services between nodes in force mode.

    Updated Manuals: [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_operation.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50101]

    • Added ability to check that all contract groups are processed on the primary node in a Distributed Processing configuration.

  • [CARDS-52058]

    • Contract state check on contract daily update loop is supported for Distributed Processing configuration.

  • [DBK-2914]

    • Added the ability to not deactivate reserve services at the same time as the main service with the global parameter SW_UCHK_DEACTIVATE_RESERVE=N.

  • [DBK-3023]

    • Added the capability to correct change_versions of rows when a force apply request from a secondary node is processed. Set the value of the additional global parameter CORRECT_VER_ON_APPLY_REQ to "Y" to enable this feature.

  • [DBK-3108]

    • Added the capability to correct change_versions of rows when a force apply request from a secondary node is processed. Set the value of the additional global parameter CORRECT_VER_ON_APPLY_REQ to "Y" to enable this feature.

  • [DBK-3310]

    • Added logging of copy_dt (new column in 3.46.30+ and COPY_DT tag in action_details in previous versions) and inst_id, dbms_specific, sid, serial_number in si_conn_src values (3.46.30+ only) to si_log_dst table.

  • [CARDS-49989]

    • CDU with LAST_SCAN_MODE=S skipped new contracts.

  • [CARDS-51868]

    • Fixed incorrect document applying in an HA solution primary node when original processing did not modify static data.

  • [CARDS-52111]

    • Fixed incorrect authorisation document replication processing which led to inconsistency of data between primary and secondary nodes.

  • [CARDS-52358]

    • Fixed error "Data are not consistent" after timeout.

  • [CARDS-52602]

    • Fixed error an occurring on Authentication Server with the Distributed Processing configuration.

  • [CARDS-52704]

    • Restored menu entry OpenWay\Distributed Processing\Configuration Setup\Primary Node Routing Check

  • [CARDS-53077]

    • Fixed chip card requests processing on a High Availability primary node after authorization processing was switched to a secondary node.

  • [CARDS-53210]

    • Removed unexpected call of document reprocessing when routing a message in the Distributed Processing solution.

  • [CARDS-54255]

    • Backward document replication (document reprocessing) now updates the Application Transaction Counter (ATC) value for declined authorizations.

  • [CARDS-54608]

    • Fixed chip data processing when authorization and information requests (i.e. ministatement) are received on different nodes of a distributed processing solution within a short time gap.

  • [CARDS-54673]

    • The issue when a declined transaction on a secondary node was blocking money on the primary node has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-54861]

    • Fixed note acceptance documents reprocessing on High Availability primary node.

  • [CARDS-54862]

    • Fixed error in deferred apply of tokenization document when a rejected document without addendum cannot be successfully applied on the primary node.

  • [CARDS-54890]

    • Fixed processing of replicated documents created by first transaction for newly produced plastic.

  • [CARDS-55584]

    • Declined authorization message processing corrected to avoid increment of authorization code counter which can lead to exception on non-home node HA

  • [CARDS-55799]

    • Added routing IDT propagation for contract subordinate tables on contract approve if routing IDT is changed.

  • [CARDS-56690]

    • Postponed accept of financial document if the corresponding authorization is loaded from a secondary node and not yet processed.

  • [CARDS-56727]

    • Corrected filling doc.change_version for rejected documents on HA secondary node

  • [CARDS-56811]

    • Implemented additional validation of FX sequence for Secondary node of Distributed Processing when FX sequence is searching on Issuing Authorization. If last FX sequence was not found or has invalid state, the the last valid FX Sequence will be used in Authorization.

  • [DBK-2176]

    • To avoid a large number of queries to gv$instance from multithread periodic jobs, set the process parameter EXIT_ON_MAX_DELAY = 'N'.

  • [DBK-2379]

    • Added the ability to set the primary node to unavailable with a console connected to a secondary node if another secondary node exists.

  • [DBK-2605]

    • Fixed issue when operations with services other than default failed before the in-flight time.

  • [DBK-2672]

    • Fixed high concurrency on synch_proc_instance_log while running High Availability deferred apply with a lot of parallel threads.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [DBK-2676]

    • Error when High Availability service was not always switched to active nodes after in-flight time has been fixed.

  • [DBK-2822]

    • Distributed Processing: fixed Migrate Service to a secondary if it was initiated from another secondary.

  • [DBK-2888]

    • Some static tables were not populated with the new change version during Deferred Apply.

  • [DBK-2939]

    • Transaction Switch will now repeat operations on primary node that failed due to "Replication Loop" data inconsistency.

    Updated Manuals: [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_setup.pdf] [ultimate_ha\ha_replication_loop\HA_Replication_Loop.pdf]

  • [DBK-3019]

    • Fixed Incorrect Transaction Switch delay time with replication loop related exceptions.

  • [DBK-3300]

    • Added additional logging for high DELAY_MS value exception messages in TS Log.

  • [DBK-3325]

    • Added the ability to eliminate high concurrency for sw_node_action when TS switches between nodes.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [DBK-3369]

    • Fixed the error "A record has been changed without creating a doc" on Primary.

  • [DBK-3417]

    • Fixed an error when deferred apply did not skip tasks if WAY4 Replication was late.

  • [DBK-3575]

    • Big latancy in Way4R in case of 'unique constraint violated'

  • [DBK-3642]

    • Fixed incorrect activation of default service on the primary node after the node has been set unavailable from a secondary node

  • [I1707312971]/[CARDS-54205]

    • Corrected contract identifier calculation for putting a document in the apply queue after replication from an HA solution secondary node.

  • [WFCKF-2636, WFCKF-2637, WFCKF-2710(DUP)]/[CARDS-54449]

    • Local/remote versions were not updated for chip authorization documents rejected on a secondary node of the WAY4 Distributed Processing solution.

  • [WFCKF-2637]/[CARDS-54518]

    • Declined transactions on secondary now increment the version number of the main contract.

  • [WFCKF-2658]/[CARDS-54568]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of replicated documents created on an HA distributed processing secondary node by a repeat SMS request.

  • [WFCKF-2687,WFCKF-2707(DUP)]/[CARDS-54603]

    • Fixed incorrect reprocessing of replicated documents for PIN change on HA primary node.

  • [WFCKF-2713,WFCKF-2714(DUP)]/[CARDS-54617]

    • Fixed incorrect reprocessing of declined documents after replication from HA secondary node.

  • [WFCKF-2733]/[DBK-3038]

    • Fixed activating services on both nodes at the same time after double switching. Set Available, Set Unavailable, Migrate Service, Restore Default actions are now allowed only after In-Flight time after previous switch-over.

  • [WFCKF-2740]/[CARDS-54689]

    • Fixed issue with distributed processing replication of AuthCheck documents.

  • [WFCKF-2870 WFCKF-2843]/[CARDS-54958]

    • Corrected re-processing of documents transferred from a secondary node of the HA solution to improve repeating values of the auth_seq_n field in contract records affected by the document.

    Fast track upgrade

  • [DBK-2438]

    • For LOCK/UNLOCK/KILL_SESSION actions, the optional procedure Sys.OWS_ADMINISTER_USER no longer checks that the user account being processed has system privileges. Otherwise, it would not be able to manage the HSK Owner user. These privileges continue to be checked for other actions with user accounts. Note that this is an insignificant reduction in security in the new version of the procedure.

  • [I1608166252]/[DBK-2288]

    • "Checksum: the divergence of data in the constant tables" fixed.

    Fee Prediction

  • [CARDS-54576]

    • The Fee Prediction configuration has been added to support VISA Bahrain Domestic IRF.

  • [CARDS-54714]

    • The Fee Prediction configuration has been added to support VISA Jordan Domestic IRF.

  • [CARDS-51673]

    • MasterCard MPE Import. Supported loading amount restriction from MPE for a particular IRD by tag in the configuration. Now the configuration supports loading amount restriction for Spain IRD 75 and 85 for retail transactions.

  • [CARDS-51894]

    • MasterCard IRD configuration has been modified for Europe region: transaction condition "All Face To Face (Group)" has been replaced by "All Cardholder, Card (Group)" for IRD S2.

  • [CARDS-52707]

    • The RewardsBusiness product has been added in RA configuration for Interregional jurisdiction.

  • [CARDS-52798]

    • UPI Fee Prediction. Fixed the channel in the OpenWay\UPI Fee Prediction\UPI IRF Criteria form.

  • [CARDS-54160]

    • MasterCard IRD Calculation. Supported setting conditions by DE40 (Service Code) and DE22 (Point Of Service Data Code) in one scope.

  • [CARDS-54298]

    • MasterCard IRD Calculation: Added check of "Active" records to all selects from MPE tables.

  • [CARDS-54961]

    • VISA Fee Prediction: added a restriction for Prepaid card category to the IS_NON-SEC_PP fee descriptor for Iceland.

  • [CARDS-54986]

    • Fixed IRD 47 definition for Europe Region. MasterCard IRD Calculation.

  • [CARDS-55276]

    • Fixed an issue with applying the appropriate interchange rules (VISA RA calculation when the additional global parameter VISA_CALC_RA is set to "Y"). Now if no domestic (intra-country) interchange rules exist, the system finds another rule (i.e. regional interchange rule).

  • [I1703025952]/[CARDS-52595]

    • IRD PE configuration has been modified for Interregional and Intra-LAC region transactions.

  • [I1704192981. Wrong IC for new visa B2B Virtual Payments (ICFEE-178)]/[CARDS-52895]

  • [I1704245616]/[CARDS-53038]

    • IRD criteria of contactless transactions have been revised in the MEA region according to the MasterCard Interchange manual.

  • [I1706151492]/[CARDS-54192]

    • Modified VISA RA configuration for the EU region.

  • [I1710012034]/[CARDS-55015]

    • VISA Fee Prediction: Changed the default rate type for amount conversion to VDM (VISA Daily Middle). It can be changed by the additional global parameter IF_FX_TYPE_VISA.

  • [I1710101072]/[CARDS-55146]
