    Fleet cards

  • [CARDS-49861]

    • Implemented database API for user interface Fleet document screens.

  • [CARDS-50224]

    • Available amount restricted by the lowest triggered limiter can be included in the response BERTLV tags for Retail, PreAuth, and Sales Completion transactions: - MoneyLimit - F0.EA.FFXX.C7, - UnitsLimit - F0.EA.FFXX.C8, - LimitExpire - F0.EA.FFXX.C9 for each Bill Item.

    Updated Manuals: [WAY4_Fleet_Data.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47707]

    • Created a new "Fleet.Items" form that describes in details the Retail Line Item Documents related to a selected Main Retail Document.

  • [CARDS-49271]

    • Fleet bertlv message tag E3.E3.C6 is deprecated and no more processed.

  • [CARDS-49421]

    • Fuel solution enhanced. Additional column has been added to Goods Categories dictionary in order to allow Goods Categories filtering by Goods Nomenclatures

  • [CARDS-49526]

    • New validation rule has ben added in the processing of the clearing documents. Posting of Fleet Item clearing document can only be started by posting of the transaction main document.

  • [CARDS-49941]

    • Code refactoring only

  • [CARDS-49970]

    • Fleet goods pipe filename prefix is no longer case-sensitive.

  • [CARDS-49973]

    • code refactoring only

  • [CARDS-50678]

    • New inbound fleet bertlv tag E3.EA.FFXX.DA (PriceCurrency) has been supported.

    Updated Manuals: [WAY4_Fleet_Data.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50787]

    • New inbound fleet bertlv tag E3.EA.FFXX.DA (PriceCurrency) has been supported.

  • [CARDS-50925]

    • Retail Line Item transaction type has been added.

  • [CARDS-51115]

    • A new tag, F0.EA.FFXX.C9, has been added to the Fleet decline response bertlv message. The tag will be filled in with the exceeded limiter's expiry date when at least one of the MoneyLimit(F0.EA.FFXX.C7) and UnitsLimit(F0.EA.FFXX.C8) tags in the response message also contains values.

  • [CARDS-51120]

    • A new tag, F0.EA.FFXX.C9, has been added to the Fleet decline response bertlv message. The tag will be filled in with the exceeded limiter's expiry date when at least one of the MoneyLimit(F0.EA.FFXX.C7) and UnitsLimit(F0.EA.FFXX.C8) tags in the response message also contains values.

  • [CARDS-51403]

    • Usage limiter remainder values (units and money, units or money, units, money) returned for successful transactions are now regulated by the FLEET_RETURN_LIMITERS global parameter.

  • [CARDS-51405]

    • Usage limiter remainder values (units and money, units or money, units, money) returned for successful transactions are now regulated by the FLEET_RETURN_LIMITERS global parameter.

  • [CARDS-52380]

    • Supported new Fleet BERTLV request tags: EA.FFXX.DB - Item cost for client including total discount calculated by third-party device, EA.FFXX.DC - Item price for client including per-unit discount calculated by third-party device, EA.FFXX.DD - Total item discount for client calculated by third-party device.

  • [CARDS-53330]

    • New tags have been added to Fleet BERTLV response message: EA.FFXX.D6 - Item cost for client including total discount calculated by issuer, EA.FFXX.D7 - Item price for client including per-unit discount calculated by issuer, EA.FFXX.D8 - Total item discount for client calculated by issuer.

  • [CARDS-54776]

    • Fleet transactions reposting by selection has been implemented in the OpenWay\Full\Documents Input & Update\Documents Troubleshooting\Documents - Repost by Selection form.

  • [CARDS-55005]

    • FeeMin, FeeMax tariff attributes has been supported for fleet cards fee calculation process. Only applicable to fees defined as transaction price percent.

  • [I1606243717]/[CARDS-50604]

    • Added logging of fleet invoicing period change.

  • [CARDS-49267]

    • Fixed padding in bertlv number format

  • [CARDS-49317]

    • Fixed issue with Recons Amount during RePosting of Advice-Adjustment docs chain.

  • [CARDS-49462]

    • ITEM_AMOUNT, ITEM_CURR tags are calculated for the documents loaded from clearing files.

  • [CARDS-49585]

    • CODING_SET_EXT, CODING_SET tags stored in the document created in UI form on validation stage.

  • [CARDS-49673]

    • Fleet REST_AMOUNT clearing item doc tag made optional and can be ommited in the clearing files.

  • [CARDS-50119]

    • Small fixes in Fleet CUST procedures standard templates comments.

  • [CARDS-50857]

    • Transit of another root bertlv containers together with Fleet bertlv container has been supported from terminal to issuer and back from issuer to terminal.

  • [CARDS-50999]

    • Fixed filling the value of the "LAST_INV_DATE" tag in the acnt_contract.ext_data field for fuel invoices during execution of the WRITE_PERIOD_DATES procedure.

  • [CARDS-51164]

    • Correct usage limiter renew time returned in the F0.EA.FFXX.C9 LimitExpire Fleet bertlv tag.

  • [CARDS-51826]

    • Displayed "Discount Amount" value sign has been changed for authorization documents.

  • [CARDS-53670]

    • Updated the discount calculation algorithm with the BEST_PRICE option. A new BEST_PRICE_USE_STELLA calculation mode has been added to allow selection of the best price: tariff price or pump price.

  • [CARDS-54039]

    • Fixed an issue with inheritance of the Trans_Country, Trans_State, Trans_City, Trans_Details, Merchant_Id, Sic_Code attributes from the main transaction document to line item documents.

  • [CARDS-54300]

    • IC Documents Import/Export (pipes) : fixed error "Document with id xx not our document or wrong Message Sequence Number." when exporting the response for a batch document which was imported in DETAIL_DOC=Y mode.

  • [CARDS-54633]

    • Fixed an issue with fleet transactions report related to documents with empty doc__orig__id field value (Standing Orders). Additional conditions have been added to exclude such document records.

  • [CARDS-54671]

    • Fleet Operator Workbench: Oracle index for cards search by last digits has been renamed from OPT_ANCT_CONTRACT_REV to OPT_ACNT_CONTRACT_REV.

  • [CARDS-55162]

    • Fixed duplicated line item document rows (if multiple macrotransactions were created) in statement reports.

  • [CARDS-55324]

    • Fixed fleet clearing documents transaction amount validation rounding issue.

  • [CARDS-56473]

    • Improved Fleet bertlv message content returned to terminal in the case of an acquiring processing error. Item response codes values added.

  • [I1603304602]/[CARDS-49586]

    • Target Fin institution currency rate selected to convert discount amount defined in target tariff.

  • [I1606027645]/[CARDS-49250]

    • Adjustment documents fee calculation algorithm is changed to avoid rounding issues.

  • [I1611117514]/[CARDS-51060]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of the list of redefined fields when personalized usage limiters are modified.

  • [I1706056722]/[CARDS-53767]

    • Fixed adjustment amounts rounding issue in the end of month fee recalculation procedure.

  • [I1709071752]/[CARDS-55179]

    • Fixed appearance of retail line item documents in the "Posted" state but without any m_transactions linked to them.

  • [I1711038051]/[CARDS-55878]

    • Fixed incorrect fleet target fee resulting from the end-of-month fee recalculation procedure for a document chain with two adjustments.

    Health Monitoring

  • [DBK-2584]

    • "Node availability" status supported.

  • [DBK-2550]

    • Only processes that can be activated in the current node are monitored.

  • [CARDS-53916]

    • PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Health Monitoring section has been added.

    High availability

  • [CARDS-51340]

    • Deferred apply: the ability to delay before processing replicated documents. The global parameter HA.DEFFERED_DOC_APPLY_DELAY defines the delay interval in seconds. The default is 0.

    Updated Manuals: [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_setup.pdf]

  • [DBK-2844]

    • DB HA service statuses and node availability are now replicated across all HA nodes by DB Connection Pool of Transaction Switch in addition to WAY4 Replication. This functionality can be activated/deactivated by a Transaction Switch parameter. Please consult the setup manual of the appropriate High Availability solution. The corresponding Transaction Switch version should be installed; please contact Customer Support.

  • [CARDS-52059]

    • Authorisation document request category is now inherited from a secondary node.

  • [DBK-2337]

    • Added action 'Restore defaults' for recovering from state when a service is active on both nodes

    Updated Manuals: [db_kernel\db_replication\DB_Replication_Monitoring.pdf] [ultimate_ha\ha_cluster\HA_Cluster_operation.pdf] [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_operation.pdf] [ultimate_ha\ha_switch\HA_Switch_operation.pdf] [ultimate_ha\Stand-in\Stand-In_operation.pdf]

  • [DBK-2847]

    • Supported real-time displaying of critical services status on DB Replication Console. See DB Replication Console documentation for additional information.

    Updated Manuals: DB Replication Console

  • [CARDS-49559]

    • Added replication of contract's counter value which used for authorisation code generation when documents from secondary node loading to primary one

  • [CARDS-51452]

    • Added deferred authorisation processing to financial document accept procedure.

  • [CARDS-51739]

    • Fixed typo in code of HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY and HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY_DELAY global parameters.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53396]

    • SAF forwarding works on HA secondary node.

  • [CARDS-54998]

    • Fixed document reprocessing for documents created by IRouter on a High Availability secondary node.

  • [CARDS-55070]

    • Fixed reprocessing of IPS negative advice received on HA secondary node.

  • [CARDS-56684]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of message for CBS on secondary HA node

  • [CARDS-56862]

    • Fixed error which lead to incorrect standing order transfer replication from secondary HA node to primary one

  • [DBK-2180]

    • Fixed service migration (switching Main and Reserve nodes). After migration, a service becomes Inactive on the old Main node and Active on the new Main node.

  • [DBK-2186]

    • Now cdu process is ready to receive incrrect ContractID

  • [DBK-2235]

  • [DBK-2255]

    • Unable to switch easily between primary and secondary of the old version.

  • [DBK-2258]

    • Eliminated use of all available parallel query servers by the "Retry All" action in High Availability console.

  • [DBK-2291]

    • High Concurrency on sw_service_activity when switching services to another node has been fixed.

  • [DBK-2326]

    • Fixed latency of WAY4Replication copy process.

  • [DBK-2342]

    • Online services was not able to reject operations routed to not-critical services without waiting for time-out in situations when no suitable active services were found.

  • [DBK-2404]

    • Fixed bug: Excluding some actions from outward replication did not work. Now updating last_scan during CDU is excluded from GG replication.

  • [DBK-2433]

    • Copying officer privileges now processes only roles prefixed with OWS_Owner name (i.e. WAY4 roles) and ignores others (Oracle or custom roles, if any).

  • [DBK-2592]

    • Fixed incorrect HA services switching when WAY4R has a big latency.

  • [DBK-2604]

    • Fixed issue when a High-Availability service returned to an active state at the secondary node after the node became unavailable.

  • [DBK-2624]

    • "Upgrade the Online1 Node" procedure now requires using Forced switch, as described in section "Emergency Mode" for HA-Switch Solution.

    Updated Manuals: [ultimate_ha\ha_switch\HA_Switch_operation.pdf]

  • [DBK-2729]

    • Eliminated large latency in WAY4R when 'unique constraint violated'.

  • [DBK-2855]

    • Services are not activated on primary after setting Partial Secondary unavailable.

  • [DBK-3009]

    • Fixed issue: now transactions uncommitted at the time of the "prepare" action are populated into an attached node.

  • [DBK-3193]

    • Fixed incorrect determining of new routing in switching between HA nodes.

  • [DBK-3230]

    • Activating services in a node is always properly replicated to another nodes

  • [DBK-3242]

    • Insufficient grants for autoswitchover monitoring

  • [DBK-3271]

    • Fixed periodical switching HA services on and off in Autoswitchover.

  • [DBK-3716]

    • Some changes of dynamic tables were rejected when the same row tries to be inserted by two Way4R threads at the same time

  • [I1612293501]/[CARDS-51620]

    • Incorrect PostingStatus values are no longer assigned to documents moved from a secondary HA node when deferred processing takes these records in a different order than the original one.

  • [I1705286645]/[DBK-2552]

    • Password verify function is supported for "Recreate Links" in HA console.

  • [CARDS-55122]

    • Added information to documentation that describes enabling an additional mechanism for replicating the state of nodes and services. For more information, see the Setup Manual for the appropriate High Availability solution.

  • [CARDS-39148]

    • Exception Request List: Supported High Availability mode.

    Host card emulation

  • [CARDS-50279]

    • Added "BlockApp" action to "HCE Cards" form.

  • [CARDS-50291]

    • Actions "Unblock App", "Block VAN", "Unblock VAN" are added to HCE Cards menu item

  • [CARDS-50533]

    • Fixed problem with HCE token enrollment event generation.

  • [CARDS-50856]

    • Deactivated, Suspended, Active and Inactive statuses for tokens have been added. Processing logic for the token parameter F_ENABLED has been changed. See documentation for details.

    Host2Host interface

  • [CARDS-51458]

    • TMID value selection in affiliated authorisation now uses the same algorithm as own acquiring, including "device H2H".

  • [CARDS-48158]

    • If acquirer parameters are not found by member ID, a search is made for default acquirer parameters by the "default" member id.

    Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Acquiring_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48188]

    • Affiliated BII Inward:Fixed invalid "DEV" tag filling.

  • [CARDS-49232]

    • Affiliated BaseII Outward: 16-byte length Transaction Identifier processing.

  • [CARDS-51586]

    • IRouter: Removed unnecessary incorrect PIN tries processing in routing contract.

  • [CARDS-51983]

    • TMID value is inherited from the original document when a secondary document is posted in routing transit authorisation messages.

  • [CARDS-54161]

    • A Transit Reversal or Adjustment message will sent to a target member even if the message contains different data from the original message, if the target channel is not included in the list defined by the global parameter AUTH_REV.REJ_FRAUD_FOR. Forwarded document will contain the 'SUSP_REV_FRAUD;' tag in the add_info field.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54358]

    • UFX Documents Import (pipe): if FROM_TRANSIT=Y pipe parameter is set but "Originator\TransitId" element is absent then doc.source_member is filled with "Originator\MemberId" element value.

  • [CARDS-55733]

    • Fixed an issue with the "TOKEN" transaction attribute missing for affiliate transactions according to the bin_table settings.

  • [CARDS-56676]

    • Supported check of filling the first 16 symbols of the TC05TCR3 Data Content field for an affiliate's downloaded documents when this TCR3 is not used for an addendum (no tag AT). A warning message is written to the process log. Pipe affected: Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing.cpp

  • [CARDS-57123]

    • Supported sending stop list messages to MasterCard via Host2Host channel.

  • [I1509142952]/[CARDS-51531]

    • IC Documents Export, IC Documents Import. The "EXCLUDE_TAGS" parameter has been added to IC Documents Export, IC Documents Import pipes, making it possible to exclude export/import of the specified tags from/to doc.add_info.

  • [I1612082027]/[CARDS-51341]

    • Affiliated BII Inward: fixed fallback detection for several types of POS Terminal Capabilities.

  • [I1612096107]/[CARDS-52844]

    • IC Document Export: fixed "An invalid XML character (Unicode: 0x1a) was found" error when exporting a document containing special characters. Invalid symbols are replaced with the "?" character in an outgoing file.

  • [I1612151492]/[CARDS-51420]

    • Fixed "CHIP_TRANS ::ERROR: Wrong Data Detected" error when exporting chip NSPK transactions using the "Affiliated BII Outward Processing" pipe.

  • [I1704246960]/[CARDS-54064]

    • Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing (pipe) : Fixed "Illegal BaseII message length" error when exporting transaction with incomplete "AI" addendum.

  • [I1705264283]/[CARDS-53576]

    • IC Documents Import (pipe): removed incorrect check of DocRefSet/DRN element length.

  • [I1707067331]/[CARDS-53986]

    • Affiliated BII Outward Processing: fixed "Message Format Failed" error.

  • [I1708094567]/[CARDS-54400]

    • IC Documents Export (pipe): fixed the sign of the amount in the "Billing" element for "H2H" mode and when the "USE_MTRANSACTION"="Y" parameter is set. Now only a positive amount will be exported.

  • [I1710031301]/[CARDS-54988]

    • Fixed incorrect creation of advice in cases when processing of a transit request for a foreign member's card is rejected.

  • [CARDS-49060]

    • H2H Affiliated BASE II: supported new tags required for NSPK.

  • [CARDS-49061]

    • NSPK Inward, Affiliated Base II interface: supported NSPK MIR Loyalty messages.

  • [CARDS-49804]

    • When Money transfer for not ONUS cards occurs in H2H Money transfer specific tags for clearing are taken from BERTLV-buffer.

  • [CARDS-54129]

    • IRouter stored procedures: Added ownership property for NextChannel in ON_US_CH tag of NextAddData parameter. Values are Own(Y)/Affiliated(A)/Foreign(N).

  • [CARDS-54375]

    • IC Documents Import (pipe) : supported import of NSPK MIR Loyalty transactions.

    Housekeeping

  • [DBK-2305]

    • Added support of two new modes for the "Save" action: Single Sql which uses insert with append and nologging in the corresponding table and Custom mode which allows building custom Save procedures.

  • [DBK-2663]

    • Added support of two new modes for the "Save" action: Single Sql which uses insert with append and nologging in the corresponding table and Custom mode which allows building custom Save procedures.

  • [CARDS-52097]

    • In order to make housekeeping for Cases - relations between CM_CASE_ACTIV and CM_CASE_OBJ are switched off for the Housekeeping process in the standard Housekeeping setting. "Import Standard Settings" must be performed after upgrade.

  • [CARDS-53989]

    • Removed the unused report in the Reporting.Spending Reports form (OpenWay\Corporate Reporting\Corporate Reports\Spending Reports). Removed the "OWS.Corporate Reporting.Spending.Exceptions Report" menu item. Removed the Exceptions.rdf report template.

  • [DBK-2239]

    • 'ORA-06502: PL/SQL: : character string buffer too small' while restoring data from a table with large number of columns (like appl_acnt) was fixed for form "OpenWay\Housekeeping\Runtime\Save Table Log"

  • [DBK-2240]

    • 'ORA-00936: Missing expression' while restoring data to a custom table was fixed for form "OpenWay\Housekeeping\Runtime\Save Table Log"

  • [DBK-2839]

    • Added deallocate unused extents of an archived table after failed "Single Sql/Custom Save" Housekeeping step.

  • [DBK-2840]

    • Support of parallel dml has been added for Custom Sql Step.

  • [DBK-2912]

    • Fixed SQL error on saving tables with CLOB or BLOB columns.

  • [I1607059217]/[DBK-2199]

    • Fixed capability of clearing the House Keeping collections from OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Housekeeping\Runtime\Collections

    Updated Manuals: [housekeeping\housekeeping.pdf]

  • [I1712122265]/[DBK-3363]

    • Fixed issue: now Housekeeping deletes Addendum Doc data related to expired Doc.

    Instalment management

  • [CARDS-49702]

    • Differentiated payment schemes are supported for Instalments.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49310]

    • Way4 now supports the ability to create an instalment plan after the adjustment of the original document is posted on the amount of the advice macrotransaction of the received adjustment. To enable this feature set the INST_CREATE_ON_ADJUSTMENT=Y global parameter or tag in the "Special Parms" field of the financial institution's details.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49311]

    • Early Repayment for instalment plans with Shift Fee Charge Mode=Capitalize Fees Every Month / Capitalize Fees on First Portion is supported.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49414]

    • New global parameter INST_PAYIN is introduced, to specify the Payment options supported by Issuer, who provide the MasterCard Instalements, in response to the authorizations, received from MasterCards Instalments capable terminal. This parameter can also be specified as tag in Special Parm field of the FI, in Custom Data of the Product or in Service Details field of Service for Instalment plan simulation.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49511]

    • Instalment Tariffs with the Instalment Fee and Instalment Scheme roles now can be configured to check document tags and additional properties. This makes it possible to specify "If Preference Type" for an Instalment Fee tariff, for example.

  • [CARDS-50029]

    • Installments behavior changed. Installments with extra fee are added into the principal amount . An Additional fee capitalization invoice will be created to reflect the fee amount calculated and create the proper funds transfers.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50063]

    • Unpacking of E2.E1 BERTLV tag into INST_IRATE document tag added.

  • [CARDS-50095]

    • An Instalment Option can be configured and chosen when creating an instalment plan. Depending on the selected option, a tariff value can be used for the plan.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50096]

  • [CARDS-50254]

    • New custom procedure CUST_INSTL_FEE_DOC added. It allows to add some tags into document using instalment parameters for correct search of instalment fee tariffs.

  • [CARDS-50348]

    • The ability to set a temporary Instalment limit added. A limit may be set for a time period, after which it will be set to zero or to the current value used, depending on the limit's configuration.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50349]

    • The ability to automatically close instalment limits by an event has been added. The CLOSE_INST_LIMITS tag should be specified in event type special parameters. This event will close personal instalment limits listed in the CLOSE_BY_LIM_CODE tag when it is posted.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50601]

    • Instalment plans can be recalculated if fee rates changed. The existing recalculation procedure for calendar changes is used, the new mode is enabled if the global parameter INST_RENEW_RATES is set to "Y".

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50749]

    • Validation of temporary credit limits and instalment limits set for future dates has been added to check that the future effective periods of these limits don't overlap.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50993]

    • A new brief form for configuration of instalment schemes has been added. This form is used by default. The old form with full scheme information is accessible using the "Full Info" link from the brief form.

  • [CARDS-51604]

    • Simulated instalment plan save mode has been added. Plans can be saved in full mode ("F" - default), partial ("P"), minimum ("M"), or not saved at all ("N"). Save mode is determined by the INST_SIM_SAVE global parameter which can be redefined by the same tag in Service special parameters.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf] [tags description]

  • [CARDS-52493]

    • Added the ability to perform early repayment of an instalment transaction. The Service should be configured with the INVOICE_ACTION=EARLY_REPAYMENT tag in service details. The document's additional data field can contain the INST_PLAN_IDT tag with the idt of the instalment plan for which early repayment is being performed. If no tag is present in the document, all instalment plans will be paid one by one in the order of creation. Early repayment keep mode can be specified using the INST_ER_KEEP tag with the values "T" - keep tenor, "P" - keep portion amount.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52521]

    • Instalment plan recalculation is now automatically called when contract Billing Date or Due Date is changed.

  • [CARDS-52746]

    • The ability to postpone the first payment for an instalment plan up to a certain date has been added. This date should be specified as the value of the SHIFT_DATE tag in document tags, instalment scheme special parameters, or instalment tariff special parameters in YYMMDD format. The first payment will be scheduled according to instalment scheme date configuration but not earlier than the specified date.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf] [tags description] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53053]

    • Using the CUST_INSTL_FEE_DOC procedure, instalment plan portion amount, tenor, and fee rates can be customized using standard instalment tags.

  • [CARDS-53888]

    • Simulated instalment plan save mode has been added. Plans can be saved in full mode ("F" - default), partial ("P"), minimum ("M"), or not saved at all ("N"). Save mode is determined by the INST_SIM_SAVE global parameter which can be redefined by the same tag in Service special parameters.

  • [CARDS-54041]

    • The ability to configure an instalment fee to waive all not opened fee invoices on full early repayment has been added. To enable this mode, the WAIVE_ON_FER tag should be specified in special parameters for the fee in the instalment scheme.

  • [CARDS-54042]

    • Special type of fee - Merchant Fee with amortization is supported for instalment plans. The fee is configured in fees for an instalment scheme. Invoices for merchant fee are not included in portion amount and total plan amount, they could not be paid (never become Open). Invoice events should be configured with one of two new amount types, Merchant Fee or Total Merchant Fee. The source document contract can be used to get a tariff for an instalment scheme and instalment scheme fee - the USE_CONTRA_TRF tag should be set in the instalment scheme or specific fee for the instalment scheme

  • [CARDS-54054]

    • Fee calculation from transaction date is supported for instalments created by a service. To enable calculation from transaction date, the INST_FROM_TRANS_DATE tag should be set in service details or in the transaction subtype. If the billing cycle with the transaction date is already closed when document posting is performed, plan dates will depend on the instalment scheme's "Dates mode". If dates mode is billing-based, plan dates will be calculated starting from the current billing cycle. If dates mode is transaction-based, the dates will be based on transaction date and if no plan shift is configured, the first portion may be created with overdue status.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf] [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54201]

    • A new instalment limit type, "Total Principal Amount", has been added. The limit amount used depends on the total principal amount (without interest and fees) of active instalment plans. A limit is only restored when the plan is totally paid or closed.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54261]

    • The AUTO_ER_KEEP contract parameter can now be used to configure keeping either the tenor or portion amount in instalment plan recalculation when billing date is changed. If the contract parameter is not configured, behaviour depends on the INST_RENEW_RATES global parameter. If INST_RENEW_RATES=Y, tenor is kept; in other cases, portion amount is kept.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54302]

    • Fee calculation from transaction date is supported for instalments created by a service. To enable calculation from transaction date, the INST_FROM_TRANS_DATE tag should be set in service details or in the transaction subtype. If the billing cycle with the transaction date is already closed when document posting is performed, plan dates will depend on the instalment scheme's "Dates mode". If dates mode is billing-based, plan dates will be calculated starting from the current billing cycle. If dates mode is transaction-based, the dates will be based on transaction date and if no plan shift is configured, the first portion may be created with overdue status.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf] [tags description]

  • [CARDS-54333]

    • The INST_PLAN_ID tag is set in documents created for invoice event fees. Additional tags can be inherited from an instalment plan into a document created by an invoice event or invoice event fee. The list of tags should be configured in the INST_EVENT_INHERIT_TAGS global parameter (can be specified for a financial institution).

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54365]

    • The ability to configure different invoice events for manual and automatic instalment plan closure / partial and full early repayment has been added. The IS_MANUAL tag with "Y" or "N" values can be configured in the invoice_event "Add Condition" field; in this case, the invoice event will only be triggered if instalment action is either manual or automatic, respectively.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54366]

    • Fee charging options can now be selected when manually closing an instalment plan. The INST_ADV_FEE_WAIVE_ON_CLOSE global parameter has been enhanced with two new values: "A" - Charge unbilled fees for the whole plan, and "1" - Charge unbilled fees for one portion.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54833]

    • A new custom procedure, CUST_INSTL_AUTO_ER has been added. In this procedure, the default order for automatic early repayment of instalment plans can be redefined.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55222]

    • Included markup fee in principal amount when creating an instalment plan for a transaction.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55551]

    • Added the ability to take an instalment fee amount from a custom fee. The tag SERVICE_FEE=<list of fee codes> should be added to instalment fee special parameters. If the fee should be taken from a contra service, the additional tag CONTRA_SERVICE should be also set. Only an instalment fee with a flat fee calculation scheme can be based on a service, however it can be of any fee category (ordinary fee, merchant fee, extra fee and so on).

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [I1802071449]/[CARDS-56715]

    • Saving of Instalment plans state on billing is now regulated by global parameter INST_BILLING_HISTORY (could be redefined on Financial Institution). Default value of parameter is Y and instalment plans state stored to INVOICE_LOG_HISTORY table on billing to be used on statement generation. To turn off saving this data, parameter should be set to N.

  • [CARDS-49472]

    • New fee calculation parameters for Instalment Schemes are now used when performing the "Change Instalment Terms" operation.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49648]

    • Fixed instalment limits check error in the "Payment Holidays" action causing failure in creation of a new plan.

  • [CARDS-49759]

    • Fee Capitalized into principal changes the Unpaid Principal amount limit upon the capitalization when corresponding invoice event changes it's status from "Written-off".

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49785]

    • Fixed instalment advance fee calculation in secondary actions when there are several fees for the instalment plan.

  • [CARDS-50019]

    • Custom fees excluded from standard summary rate (INST_INF_RATE tag in invoice_log.posting_details) calculation.

  • [CARDS-50513]

    • Fixed instalment plan creation when Monthly Interest = Next Working Day in the Instalment Scheme.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50738]

    • Interest for the first portion of an instalment plan is always calculated for the entire period, not on a daily basis if the USE_MONTH_WEIGHT global parameter or tag in the Accounting Scheme is set to "B". A new value, "W", is supported for the INST_ADV_FEE_OPEN global parameter. This value can be used to waive an "Advance Fee" for early repayment or other actions that cause plan recalculation.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51005]

    • Fixed activation of an instalment plan with recalculation if custom fee parameters are used.

  • [CARDS-51040]

    • INST_INF_RATE tag format has been fixed. The new format has two decimal digits and no decimal point.

  • [CARDS-51426]

    • Added the "Confirm Payment Holidays" item to the "Actions..." context menu in the "Instalment For Approval" form.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51965]

    • Instalment fee code is now taken from an Instalment Scheme even if the fee rate is passed in document tags. Previous system behaviour was to use "FEE" as a fee code value regardless of Instalment Scheme settings.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52133]

    • Instalment Event = "Plan Closed", according to which an Instalment Event Fee is charged is no longer generated when an instalment plan in preview or inactive status is closed.

  • [CARDS-52170]

    • Corrected instalment plan recalculation when fee capitalization is used.

  • [CARDS-52361]

    • Corrected information portion status in an instalment plan after "Change Instalment Terms".

  • [CARDS-52686]

    • Fixed changing of the "Is Ready" contract attribute when performing manual instalment actions using DB Manager.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53113]

    • Fixed parsing of the "E2.E1 BERTLV" tag that contains an instalment interest rate.

  • [CARDS-53394]

    • Filtering out of recalculated entries added on instalment creation.

  • [CARDS-53733]

    • Corrected the process for converting a transaction from a previous cycle into an instalment. Now transfers are generated as separate documents, not as macrotransactions for the original document.

  • [CARDS-53823]

    • Corrected fee processing when closing an instalment plan if a flat fee is used.

  • [CARDS-53918]

    • Original document tags are now not skipped on instalment plan recalculation.

  • [CARDS-53919]

    • It is not recommended to use the same fee type for Instalment Event Fees and other Misc Fees as this may affect reversal processing.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53983]

    • Instalment Payment holidays portion amount calculation has been corrected for the "Keep Tenor" option.

  • [CARDS-54144]

    • Corrected an issue with filling in the "INST_FDATE" and "INST_FAMNT" tags when capitalization is used. Now, the capitalization portions are skipped and data from the first real portion are used.

  • [CARDS-54357]

    • The amount of an unused instalment limit for posting to accounts is now calculated without the amount used by inactive instalment plans. The available instalment limit for plan creation still takes inactive plans into account. If an instalment plan created on authorization should not affect posted instalment limits, INST_AUTH_ACTION=CREATE_INACTIVE should be configured in the service or using the global parameter.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54359]

    • Matching of simulated instalment plans will now depend on the INST_VER tag of a financial document (E2.CF bertlv tag). If the tag value is MC_INST, MasterCard specification for instalment plan mandatory fields for matching will be used and mandatory fields will be INST_NUM, INST_INF_RATE, INST_FEE, EFF_RATE, INST_TYPE. In other cases, OpenWay notation for mandatory fields will be used and mandatory fields will be INST_NUM, INST_AMNT, INST_TOTAL.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54372]

    • Changed Last Updated field value from system date to emulated banking date for instalment 'PAYMENT' invoices during test script run in Product Inspector.

  • [CARDS-54415]

    • Fixed the calculation algorithm for a value of funds available for early repayment that is shown during "Early Repayment" actions. Now, configuration of the balance types in global parameters or in account scheme is considered.

  • [CARDS-54448]

    • Supported Timezone configuration when processing the instalment event fees.

  • [CARDS-54456]

    • Corrected tenor calculation for instalments with fee capitalization.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54482]

    • When an instalment plan is created with interest capitalization and specified portion amount, the calculated tenor is rounded to the nearest integer, instead of rounding up as done in other cases.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54618]

    • Added a new shift mode, "Instalment Start Date" to define the posting date for an Instalment Event Fee. When a transaction from a previous billing cycle is converted to an instalment (using the backdated processing module), an Instalment Event Fee with the specified shift mode is processed with a posting date equal to the current banking date, not the date of the original transaction.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54718]

    • Reapplication of Instalment Event Fee with "Instalment Start Date" posting date shift mode has been corrected on subsequent backdated processing.

  • [CARDS-54812]

    • Corrected filling of the "E2.CB" tag for instalment simulation in a transaction.

  • [CARDS-54878]

    • Corrected filling of the "CB" tag and the "C1", "C2", "C4", "CE", and "D4" tags when annual rate is fractional in the instalment simulation bertlv data.

  • [CARDS-54902]

    • Enhanced filling of the "E2.CB" tag. Now, it is always returned in the bertlv data for a Mastercard authorisation request from a terminal capable of processing an instalment even if no instalment simulation was done. Together with the "E2.D6" tag, they form the correct answer for a terminal capable of processing an instalment.

  • [CARDS-54932]

    • Fixed the instalment simulation behaviour for authorisation request in case if no instalment plans were simulated due to configuration issues: a warning message is created for a document and an instalment simulation answer is registered in the bertlv tags E2.CB and E2.D6 for a payment without instalments.

  • [CARDS-55085]

    • Corrected instalment plan recalculation on billing change when interest capitalization is used and interest for an additional first period shift has not yet been paid or capitalized.

  • [CARDS-55443]

    • Corrected generation of the chain identifier for an instalment plan converted from a transaction in previous cycles if another plan was created and closed for the same transaction.

  • [CARDS-56129]

    • Corrected a flat fee calculation for the "Payment Holidays" action if the current plan has overdue portions.

  • [CARDS-56542]

    • Corrected the format of the "E2.CB" bertlv tag that contains an instalment type on authorisation response.

    Invoice management

  • [CARDS-48139]

    • A new global parameter, DO_NOT_SCAN_INVOICES, has been added. This parameter regulates the scanning of invoices on CDU.

  • [CARDS-50579]

    • When creating an Invoice, the effective date can be taken from the document's "Transaction Date". To use this function, the tag INV_FROM_TRANS_DATE should be set on the service which creates the invoice.

  • [CARDS-51201]

    • Fixed standing order generation for invoice payment reject actions.

  • [CARDS-51647]

    • Overdue substate restore procedure has been fixed for invoice payment reject.

  • [CARDS-52323]

    • Fixed error when cross-balance macrotransactions created by a standing order were not linked to the document.

  • [I1606027788]/[CARDS-49471]

    • Fixed processing of reversal batch entries in a batch invoice if they belong to a different cycle with an advice entry.

  • [I1608165474]/[CARDS-50110]

    • Fixed suspending batch invoice generation if any of the batch documents was declined

  • [I1703249552]/[CARDS-52604]

    • Calculation of due date during invoice resend has been fixed.

    Issuing

  • [CARDS-50858]

    • Chip scheme "UICS with C-Less v. 2013 Generic" made from "UICS v. 2013 Generic" with adding of specific tags for contactless part of application.

  • [CARDS-49794]

    • PIN change is now enabled when a card is marked for reissuing of plastic only.

  • [CARDS-50055]

    • Data in the "Installment" block of the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report can now be sorted.

  • [CARDS-51274]

    • New Chip Scheme Template "PayCorn OnLine Generic" added

  • [CARDS-51447]

    • "3DS AAV Key" type has been added to the dictionary for double 3DS AAV DES Key.

  • [CARDS-52305]

    • The internal procedure for creating a duplicate contract no longer "forces" approval of the contract if it was duplicated because it is linked with another contract, for example, in the case of combo-cards.

  • [CARDS-52978]

    • The U_PBT_BY_TOKEN=N parameter should be added to disable unlocking renewed plastic by authorisations initiated by a token.

  • [I1602180440]/[CARDS-50616]

    • Added ability to enabe to set new PIN for a card again before than previous try has finished.

  • [I1606218834]/[CARDS-50952]

    • Added ability to disable global parameter CLOSE_PREV_PLASTIC=Y by tag CLOSE_PREV_PLASTIC=N; in FinancialInstitution.special_parms or ContractSubtype.add_parms

  • [ID310172902]/[CARDS-37245]

    • In the e-commerce section of the "Visa Statistics Acquiring Business" report use of trans_type table has been replaced by trans_group.

  • [CARDS-49369]

    • Updated Manuals: [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49694]

    • Aligned blocks of text in the "Corrections" section for the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report.

  • [CARDS-49814]

    • In the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Contract Types\Plastic Codes" added the new columns"Offline PIN (fill only for Chip cards)" and "Contactless (fill only for Chip cards)". In the menu "OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Dictionaries\Statistic Attributes (custom)" added the new attribute "PS_IS_COMBINED".

    Updated Manuals: [data_preparation_and_card_personalisation\administrator_manuals\Card_Production_Setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49955]

    • Fixed incorrect value for STND_LENGTH additional card data record after marking card for reissuing.

  • [CARDS-50609]

    • Fixed incorrect inheritance of PIN_SET tag's value when card reissuing with ERASE_SEC_VAL mode.

  • [CARDS-51235]

    • Fixed incorrect ability to mark an additional card applet for production without the main one.

  • [CARDS-52848]

    • Fixed use of the P_IS_IMPERSONAL parameter for the XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Issuing_Business_Prepared report.

  • [CARDS-53012]

    • In the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report, default values are calculated for the P_FORALLCURR, P_LANGUAGE, and P_AMOUNTS_SIGN parameters even if the P_CONNID parameter is not set.

  • [CARDS-53799]

    • Corrected the status of the link for a card related to an account when the card was reissued as Lost or Stolen.

  • [CARDS-54060]

    • If changes in the "Embossing" field group were made for a client, the changes are inherited to the client's contracts during the "Check" activity. If parameters were redefined earlier in a contract, the new values are not inherited to these contracts.

  • [CARDS-54100]

    • Corrected processing of applet-related card data records when marking a card contract for production and selecting the record for incoming messages.

  • [CARDS-54310]

    • CARDS-53799 has been redesigned. Relations with invalid cards are excluded from the "Related Cards" screen form.

  • [CARDS-55033]

    • On card replacement with same product, product init events are not repeated.

  • [CARDS-55212]

    • Added grants on INST_LIMIT_TYPE view and STORNO_CORRECTION and STORNO_CASE tables for the Cardholder Contract Statement report to fix issue with insufficient privileges on Cardholder Statement generation.

  • [CARDS-55899]

    • Added a form to set "DateFrom" and "DateTo" parameters as the first subitem to the standard menu item (OWS.Processing Status Report), which calls the Processing Status Report report (ROOT.OpenWay.Full.Daily Procedures.Processing Status Report).

  • [I1609214123]/[CARDS-50964]

    • The Move Contract procedure has been fixed when a new parent Account Scheme is the same as the old one (for example, when the same Account Scheme is used both for cards that have not yet been assigned and for assigned cards).

  • [I1611018583]/[CARDS-51391]

    • Fixed incorrect usage limiter redefinition processing which lead to Oracle exception when all previously made redefinitions was already terminated.

  • [I1704173799]/[CARDS-53010]

    • Added a new parameter, P_HINT_Q5, varchar2(255), to the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report. The default value is "/*+rule*/". The parameter makes it possible to change the hint instruction for Q_5 query used for selecting acnt_contracts.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [I1704204444]/[CARDS-52880]

    • Fixed definition of IPS Product for MasterCard subtypes.

  • [I1705301217]/[CARDS-53533]

    • Improved processing of Application for usage limiter deletion. Fixed issue with incorrect processing when Usage Template was closed and Usage Template Approved remains active.

  • [I1706072562]/[CARDS-53673]

    • Corrected calculation of previous card expiry date in unmarking procedure.

  • [CARDS-52786]

    • Updated "PA DSS Implementation Guide". The section "Specifying Sensitive Data" has been changed. Added a warning that the system cannot function normally without the PVV and Encrypted PIN fields.

  • [CARDS-51360]

    • Pan reference identifier, Token reference identifier and Token requestor identifier have been added as document and authentication scheme tags.

  • [CARDS-52167]

    • Consumer's Activation Method Preference for MDES transactions has been added to doc.add_info.

  • [CARDS-53715]

    • If contract_subtype.add_parms contains the WSP_ADD_PERS_DATA_B64 tag, the tag value will be sent to the response for a token creation request as "Additional Personalization Data". The tag value must contain data in base64 format.

  • [CARDS-54087]

    • If the parameter AUTH_REQ_TOKEN_CHECK is set to "Y" or is not set (the default value is "Y"), its value can be changed in a financial institution or contract subtype. If the parameter contains a comma-separated list of token service providers, no checking for these providers will be performed. If the list of service providers is empty, checking for all service providers is disabled (prohibited).

    Issuing authorisation

  • [CARDS-49383]

    • MDES (NFC wallets) API including TKN_ELIGIBILITY, TKN_ACTIVATION, TKN_ACTIVATION_CODE, TKN_COMPLETE, TKN_EVENT operations and additional MDES Token information checking on authorization operations has been implemented. To select transaction flow (green or yellow) Response Codes 85 an 00 following the analysis of DE124SF3 according to Master Card Issuer Implementation are set.

  • [CARDS-49492]

    • Added processing of several sequence numbers for card's applications accordance MIR (NSPK) specification. See documentation for details.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49795]

    • Added ability to permit no more than the specified number of transactions with certain conditions. See documentation for details.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [issuing_authorisation\Authorisation_system.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49826]

    • Unique and opaque identifier for VDEP verification method has been added

  • [CARDS-50172]

    • PM_parm option WEAK_PIN_CHECK added

  • [CARDS-50262]

    • Online Dispute documents have been supported.

  • [CARDS-50352]

    • The following tags have been added under TAR-request document: - SE10 Wallet Service Provider Device Score, - SE11 Wallet Service Provider Account Score, and - SE15 Mobile Number Last 4 Digits

  • [CARDS-50488]

    • VISA token statuses processing have been added for TKT_EVENT request.

  • [CARDS-50547]

    • All tags specified for MDES/VDEP in BERTLV are set in document add_info.

  • [CARDS-50733]

    • Added the ability to fill doc.acq_ref_number in online processing of messages received from RTSI interface.

  • [CARDS-50816]

    • The additional global parameter CHIP_ATC_DEFERRED=ENABLE may be used to enable chip deferred authorisation request processing.

  • [CARDS-50877]

    • Financial document inherits MCC from authorisation on DirectP2P transactions now (feature revoked in 03.44.30.25 and above)

  • [CARDS-50946]

    • PVV will be calculated in a change PIN request and sent to the payment system later when the value of the additional global parameter SEND_PVV_2_PS is "Y" and the tag SEND_PVV_2_PS=N; is absent in card subtype additional parameters independently from the PIN validation scheme.

  • [CARDS-52020]

    • Tokenization activation code stored under a document has been masked.

  • [CARDS-52061]

    • Issuer scripts creation is supported for cards permanently working in a secondary node.

  • [CARDS-52062]

    • It is possible to create Tokens in Stand-In mode.

    Updated Manuals: [ultimate_ha\distributed processing\Distributed_Processing_setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52113]

    • Added the ability to log missing ATC values to a document's additional information. A new global parameter, LOG_MISSING_ATC_TO_DOC=Y activates this feature.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [tags description]

  • [CARDS-52194]

    • Added support for external management of transaction value date by sending the Posting Date parameter in IssFundsTransfer, IssPaymentFromContract, IssPaymentToContract web services when working in SMS mode. Requires the appropriate version of W4W.

  • [CARDS-52215]

    • Data from field 112 have been parsed on Purchase token operation.

  • [CARDS-54379]

    • Added the ability to redefine LOCKED_CARD_RC for a financial institution. The actual value should be assigned by the LOCKED_CARD_RC=<RC>; tag in the special_parms field of the corresponding F_I table record.

  • [CARDS-54452]

    • Added the ability to set the AUTH_REQ_ADD_AUTH_METHOD parameter on the financial institution level.

  • [CARDS-55790]

    • Added device name (WSP_DEVNAME), device ID (WSP_DEVID) and last four digits of mobile phone number (WSP_L4DIG) saving in the database as token parameters on MDES / VTS enrolment.

  • [I1503163267]/[CARDS-50700]

    • The additional global parameter CHIP_ATC_DEFERRED=ENABLE may be used to enable chip deferred authorisation request processing.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [I1604194090]/[CARDS-50615]

    • Tag DOC_MODE=SMS; has been added into message type dictionary for "ATM Fin Request" (02000A and fin_cash_atm) records

  • [I1606292776]/[CARDS-50780]

    • If a successful authorization advice is received after a reversal, a new hold will be made on contract funds.

  • [I1611021596]/[CARDS-51345]

    • Authorization messages matching procedure has been changed. Now authorization messages matching is done at an online interface only. New additional global parameter NO_ALT_AUTH_MATCHING_FOR added to disable using of proprietary matching algorithm

  • [I1612121917]/[CARDS-51820]

    • "No Check" Auth scenario has been removed from forms as obsolete. The additional global parameter ENABLE_NO_CHECK is no longer supported.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49780]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of "non-zero" approval response codes on IRouter for transit authorisation request responses.

  • [CARDS-49926]

    • Eliminated clear PANs in process_mess in debug mode.

  • [CARDS-50573]

    • Multiple authorisations matching (with PS_REF_NUMBER) has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-50580]

    • When an attempt to create or change token information is made in Stand-In mode, the error "Tokenization is not available in stand-in mode" occurs.

  • [CARDS-50681]

    • Fixed incorrect checking of card expiration date for linked contract requests when plastic is locked

  • [CARDS-50742]

    • Multiple authorisations matching by PS Ref Number has been added.

  • [CARDS-50850]

    • The VDEP_TYPE tag to define the identification type for VDEP has been supported for Financial Institutions, Services and Contract Subtypes.

  • [CARDS-50919]

    • Suppressed duplication of the error message "Not sufficient funds available" for overdraft limiter checking when several contracts are related

  • [CARDS-50931]

    • View AUTH_RECORD has been redesigned. Blocked amounts displays in corrected conditions now.

  • [CARDS-50974]

    • VISA Interface: supported TCR5 pos 150 PAN Token field. It is stored/exported from "D_TKN" tag.

  • [CARDS-51199]

    • Corrected behaviour. The original value of an internal key will sent to H2H when a secondary message contains the other value of the key.

  • [CARDS-51435]

    • Fixed incorrect "PIN change" processing on TS IRouter when request to an external system is required.

  • [CARDS-51774]

    • Error in formatting activation methods in TKN_VERIFICATION messages has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-51930]

    • Error in TKN_VERIFICATION method has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-51941]

    • Error in BERTLV data format in retail MDES transactions has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-52074]

    • Fixed incorrect inheritance of the return code from an original document when a repeat message is received.

  • [CARDS-52142]

    • Error using three delimiters ('|') instead of two when answering TAR messages during MDES transactions has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-52278]

    • Fixed incorrect redefinition of message settlement date on IRouter authorisation.

  • [CARDS-52534]

    • IRouter authorisation procedures have been corrected to suppress mistaken error messages.

  • [CARDS-52535]

    • The authorisation code generation algorithm has been restored to a contract counter-based one when the UPD_AUTH_SEQ_N parameter is not set.

  • [CARDS-52547]

    • Fixed incorrect selection of message code for Core banking system. IRouter.

  • [CARDS-52752]

    • When a PIN is changed after marking a card for reproduction but before receiving a reproduction results file, the new PIN value is also written to the new plastic record.

  • [CARDS-52771]

    • Fixed frequent rereading of ADD_GLOBAL_PARMS on authorisation.

  • [CARDS-52877]

    • Fixed incorrect chip request processing on a High Availability secondary node when the response contains empty issuer script.

  • [CARDS-52990]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of new authentication data elements for schemes that were created before authentication type modification.

  • [CARDS-53031]

    • Corrected CHANGE_PIN processing on IRouter for combo-cards

  • [CARDS-53221]

    • Decreased possibility of deadlock when several authorization requests for one card are received at the same time.

  • [CARDS-53251]

    • Changed behaviour: now processing of authorization documents with service class Transaction, Online Payment or External Payment will change a contract's counter for authorization code generation independently of the UPD_AUTH_SEQ_N parameter value.

  • [CARDS-53291]

    • Fixed the inability to redefine the PARTIAL_APPROVAL_ENABLE property in Services or transaction subtypes.

  • [CARDS-53434]

    • Corrected behaviour: now an IPS STIP negative advice message (0120) creates a reversal document when it is received after posting an original request which was received in single-message mode.

  • [CARDS-53685]

    • Corrected secondary online messages routing when online and clearing channels are different.

  • [CARDS-53780]

    • Removed the CARDHOLDER transaction attribute from the <<All Contactless (Group)>> group transaction condition. Transaction Processing.

  • [CARDS-53788]

    • Corrected process information message for deactivated or absent token.

  • [CARDS-53821]

    • Fixed the inability to receive authorization requests from one payment system member to another when both members are served in the same processing centre but direct interbranch routing between them is blocked.

  • [CARDS-53822]

    • Tokens for Incontrol requests aren't checked as MDES/VDEP tokens.

  • [CARDS-54145]

    • Suppressed sending the corresponding message to the IPS when completion of a PIN change attempt is unsuccessful.

  • [CARDS-54245]

    • Incorrect Response Code 85 on TAR / TER for products without the MDES_TYPE tag has been changed to 05.

  • [CARDS-54268]

    • Added consideration of more scenarios for sequences for receiving financial and authorization messages to avoid unnecessary holds on cardholder funds which could occur if a financial document arrived earlier than an authorization. Improved processing performance.

  • [CARDS-54325]

    • Corrected filling document is_authorisation field for transit reversals

  • [CARDS-54419]

    • MDES: Changed RC to "00" for Tokenization Event Notification messages with Tokenization Event Indicator = 8.

  • [CARDS-54546]

    • Added the global parameter DETECT_FIN_PRESENTMENT_EARLIER_AUTH_ADVICE for incoming authorisation advice processing. This parameter's "N" value deactivates additional searching for previously processed financial advices.

  • [CARDS-54710]

    • Transit authorization reversal processing has been fixed. Previously reversals were rejected with RC 91 - "Autonomus mode disabled".

  • [CARDS-54897]

    • Fixed processing of transaction reversal messages for own cards on IRouter when communication with an external system is required (for example Risk or Banking).

  • [CARDS-54905]

    • Supported Activation Code Notification (ACN) transactions without token.

  • [CARDS-55079]

    • Corrected transit rejected message processing by IRouter to avoid to inserting unnecessary credit_history records.

  • [CARDS-55308]

    • Corrected reversal fraud prevention validation condition to avoid rejection of payment reversals.

  • [CARDS-55355]

    • Eliminated the ability to generate an authorisation code value unsuitable to VISA restrictions.

  • [CARDS-55387]

    • Restored processing of cases when a reversal transaction message is received before the authorization request. Added limit on the period for stopping attempts to search for reversals preceding the corresponding request. By default the search is performed within 24 hours. This period can be redefined with the global parameter UNM_AUTH_REV_FLASHBACK_DAYS.

  • [CARDS-55426]

    • Added check of received card data values on IRouter even if security values are absent in the message.

  • [CARDS-55507]

    • Corrected processing of authorization requests in SMS mode if a reversal message was received earlier.

  • [CARDS-56250]

    • Fixed incorrect document reprocessing after replication to HA solution primary node when request and reversal was received in wrong order.

  • [CARDS-56492]

    • Removed trace messages on routing search that were written even if trace was off.

  • [CARDS-56686]

    • Added accounting of message direction into algorithm of message code parsing and generation.

  • [I1605090243]/[CARDS-48914]

    • Fixed incorrect suppression of sending credit authorization reversals to the core banking system.

  • [I1605201553]/[CARDS-49598]

    • Added check for request category of PIN-based message to disable unlocking plastic by secondary operation.

  • [I1606039198]/[CARDS-49213]

    • Now credit authorisations with an amount less than 1 minimum currency unit for an account will be rejected.

  • [I1607219702]/[CARDS-49729]

    • Authorisation code generation algorithm has been corrected to supply of it's uniqueness when standing order on Bank's contract is using.

  • [I1701111004]/[CARDS-51791]

    • Corrected processing of repeat messages for partial approved requests.

  • [I1701270697]/[CARDS-52291]

    • Fixed incorrect currency conversion rate use in issuer authorization after return from Stand-in.

  • [I1702160876, I1704098675]/[CARDS-52727]

    • Fixed Member Id definition for online routing. The change affects instances which route online messages by Member Id on NetServer/Transaction Switch.

  • [I1704076220]/[CARDS-52730]

    • Change PIN procedure has been corrected to avoid the possibility of falling into an infinite loop.

  • [I1704109597]/[CARDS-52737]

    • Feature implemented by CARDS-50877 has been revoked (financial document inherits MCC from authorisation on DirectP2P transactions) and previous behaviour has been restored.

  • [I1704243534]/[CARDS-52916]

    • Fixed "No Data Found" error during authorisation processing if contr_subtype.bin_record is invalid.

  • [I1705038641]/[CARDS-53109]

    • Eliminated the possibility for incorrect rejection of reversal for a partial approved request due to a different transaction amount.

  • [I1706151932]/[CARDS-53649]

    • Corrected processing of IPS STIP authorisation advices so that funds are not held when an online message is received after a clearing file.

  • [I1706200082]/[CARDS-53694]

    • Changed temporary variable declaration to avoid overflow.

  • [I1706305190]/[CARDS-53937]

    • Transit authorizations created by IRouter and rejected with negative RC aren't increasing usage limiter counters now.

  • [I1707247431]/[CARDS-54180]

    • Adjustment and Reversal financial documents that exceed the presentment amount are now posted to a dispute account with "Decline Service" posting status.

  • [I1707313211]/[CARDS-54296]

    • The Currency field of usage limiter templates with adaptive algorithms for calculating amount thresholds must be filled in. A usage limiter's Currency field value is saved every time the limiter is updated.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Usage_Limiters.pdf]

  • [I1708067216, I1710023006, I1801126919]/[CARDS-56400]

    • Corrected processing of timeout reversals with unexpected transaction id (ps_ref_number).

  • [I1708303819]/[CARDS-54590]

    • Fixed incorrect Usage Limiter processing when a product configuration uses one service package for related contracts with different currencies.

  • [I1709072151, I1711087480]/[CARDS-55725]

    • Excluded the possibility to route an authorization document to the source channel.

  • [I1709190410]/[CARDS-54889]

    • Removed unnecessary transaction amount validation for transit authorization reversals.

  • [I1709204499, I1709299082]/[CARDS-55117]

    • Corrected partial approval amount calculation to avoid reject when the request currency is more expensive than the card account currency.

  • [I1709297428]/[CARDS-55104]

    • Fixed repeat message processing when a CBS response to an original request has not yet been received.

  • [I1710022917]/[CARDS-55047]

    • Fixed authorization advice processing by issuers when messages are routed by a dedicated online service - AFF_AUTH or IRouter.

  • [I1710135034]/[CARDS-55135]

    • Corrected handling of transit financial advice when the message target is maintained in the same processing center.

  • [I1710135034]/[CARDS-55198]

    • Corrected handling of transit financial advice on NetServer when the message target is maintained in the same processing center.

  • [I1710259099]/[CARDS-55431]

    • Fixed issue. Now by default the authorisation process does not apply deferred tasks and the Secondary->Primary Synchronisation process does not create deferred tasks. If you use High Availability solutions, set HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY=Y global parameter to restore the old behaviour and make sure that Object Task Scheduler is always running.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [I1711138024]/[CARDS-55916]

    • Corrected behaviour: now a reversal message is forwarded to the next member even when the response for processing the primary message has not yet been received.

  • [I1712288846]/[CARDS-56343]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of authorisation requests. An authorisation will no longer be rejected if two similar Warning messages occurred.

  • [PI-67]/[CARDS-55710]

    • Disabled sensitive data storage for EMV cards.

  • [CARDS-50457]

    • Correct notice of refusal has been supported when maximum possible (i.e.five) TAR MDES requests with wrong CVC2 occur.

  • [CARDS-51933]

    • Product Configuration ID can also be configured as contract subtype MDES_ISS_ID tag.

  • [CARDS-52080]

    • The TAR response code for VISA authorizations has been changed from 5 to the real response code of the transaction.

  • [CARDS-52104]

    • VDEP Active account management velocity checking result and Device identifier tags have been added to document.

  • [CARDS-52166]

    • Tokenization correlation identifier and device type for MDES transactions have been added to doc.add_info.

  • [CARDS-52180]

    • Primary account number source and Device type fields have been added under authentication scheme.

  • [CARDS-52198]

    • Final tokenization decision tag has been added to TNK_ACTIVATION message.

  • [CARDS-53714]

    • Added the ability to specify the AUTH_TOKEN_ANSW tag in Service details.

  • [CARDS-55064]

    • Tokenization Event Notification (TVN) message with Event Indicator 8 (exception) is allowed regardless of token number presence in a request. This TVN message doesn't change token status in the system (if present).

    JCB interface

  • [CARDS-43952]

    • Stop List: Moved area handbook from Standard to Custom. Removed checking an area by the handbook list.

  • [CARDS-49455]

    • Merchant Management: Fixed processing of operations that were not completed.

  • [CARDS-49561]

    • JCB Merchant Approve: truncate Legal and Trading names if they exceed the allowable length.

  • [CARDS-50304]

    • JCB BIN Table Import: fixed record processing for Maintenance file with OperationSign=01 (Add record).

  • [CARDS-50400]

    • Merchant Management: No data found error for next action after incomplete previous initial action.

  • [CARDS-51131]

    • JCB ISO Outward: fixed "Strange situation" error.

  • [CARDS-51165]

    • JCB ISO Outward Processing: fixed NPE when exporting chargeback.

  • [CARDS-51178]

    • JCS ISO Inward: fixed calculating fee amount sign for settlement documents.

  • [CARDS-51196]

    • JCB ISO Interface: fixed "Unknown message type" for Chargeback Reversals processing.

  • [CARDS-51238]

    • JCB ISO Outward - fixed "Unknown message type" error when exporting Partial 2nd Presentment.

  • [CARDS-51579]

    • JCB Variable Outward: fixed ARN field 31 subfield 2 filling. Now it matches PDE3901.2. Removed DE14 filling for non ICC transactions.

  • [CARDS-52320]

    • JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe): fixed incorrect creation of settlement documents with zero amount.

  • [CARDS-52365]

    • JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe) : fixed rejected Interchange Message processing.

  • [CARDS-53216]

    • JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe): fixed "Settlement Data doesn't contain settlement amounts" error.

  • [CARDS-53558]

    • JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe) : fixed filling of "transaction date" field for incoming S2 documents.

  • [CARDS-53579]

    • JCB Outward Processing.dll (pipe) : fixed size of letters for filling "Merchant Name" and "City Name" fields.

  • [CARDS-45952]

    • JCB Inward: added settlement processing.

  • [CARDS-45955]

    • JCB Stoplist Import: new format supported (PAN up to 21 digits). No manual action required.

  • [CARDS-49716]

    • JCB: Added functionality for loading JCB BIN Table.

    Updated Manuals: [jcb_interface\JCB_Interface.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51140]

    • JCB ISO Inward: added support for incoming files without RDW. To import such files, the "NORDW"="Y" pipe parameter must be set.

  • [CARDS-51280]

    • JCB: Added requirements for JCB ISO.

  • [CARDS-51481]

    • JCB ISO Outward (variable): added the "EXT_CURR_EXP" parameter for changing the currency exponent on transaction export.

  • [CARDS-52210]

    • JCB Rel Apr 17: supported IIN file format changes.

  • [CARDS-52399]

    • JCB ISO Outward Processing (pipe): improved DE4 and DE49 function for dispute transactions. If a document's reconciliation currency does not match the 1st presentment currency, the document's transaction amount/currency will be exported instead.

  • [CARDS-52832]

    • Added the FILTER parameter (pipe:JCB. Outward Processing.cpp).

  • [CARDS-53268]

    • JCB Outward: for all chip read transactions the "C" value is exported in 22.7 subfield.

  • [CARDS-53336]

    • JCB: Added message codes ("RjP-----","RJP-----","RmP-----","RmR-----") for reject processing.

  • [CARDS-53379]

    • JCB ISO. Added the "OWS.Accept Clearing" subitem to the menu item "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. Daily Procedures\JCB. Inward Processing\JCB ISO Inward Processing".

  • [CARDS-53510]

    • JCB Outward Processing, JCB ISO Outward processing (pipes): added the ability to set up start sequence numbers for outgoing file numbering. If needed, the new "START_FILE_SEQ" pipe parameter must be set with the desired number.

  • [CARDS-53771]

    • JCB ISO Inward (pipe): added the ability to charge a cardholder using Cardholder Billing Amount (BIT 6) instead of Reconciliation Amount (BIT 5). "ACP_<memberid>"="Y" new pipe parameter must be set to use this functionality for a specific member.

  • [CARDS-53853]

    • JCB: Added menu items "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. File Management\JCB Outward Rejected" and "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. File Management\JCB Rejects".

  • [CARDS-53926]

    • [JCB Release 17.2] BIT54 is inherited now in chargebacks. No additional action is required.

  • [CARDS-53928]

    • [JCB Release 17.2] changed BIT 22.5 filling according to new documentation. The "JCB_RELEASE"="17.2" additional global parameter must be set to enable this functionality.

  • [I1606211754]/[CARDS-50027]

    • JCB: Added menu item OpenWay\JCB\JCB. Daily Procedures\JCB. Load Bin Table and Handbooks\JCB BIN Table Import.

  • [I1702212586]/[CARDS-52413]

    • JCB Interface fixed format (pipes): supported contactless PEM.

    Loyalty

  • [CARDS-50240]

    • A new menu item, OpenWay\Loyalty Module\Configuration\Loyalty Identification Types to configure loyalty identification types has been added.

  • [CARDS-51461]

    • Added the ability to limit the bonus points amount accrued for a client contract within a loyalty campaign. The limit amount should be set in the "Action Total Limit" field of the tariff action, the ACTION_LIMIT_MODE=LOCAL tag indicates that the action limit should be calculated for each contract. A new strict mode has been added to check the action limit, it prevents total points from exceeding the specified limit with the last transaction; ACTION_LIMIT_MODE=STRICT should be set for the tariff action.

  • [CARDS-51610]

    • Added the ability to limit the bonus points amount accrued for a client contract within a loyalty campaign. The limit amount should be set in the "Action Total Limit" field of the tariff action, the ACTION_LIMIT_MODE=LOCAL tag indicates that the action limit should be calculated for each contract. A new strict mode has been added to check the action limit, it prevents total points from exceeding the specified limit with the last transaction; ACTION_LIMIT_MODE=STRICT should be set for the tariff action.

  • [CARDS-50984]

    • Tariff action processing has been fixed. When applying a tariff action, two tariff data records are automatically created: one from the date the action starts and the second - from the date the action is finished.

  • [CARDS-51371]

    • Fixed action approval for loyalty actions with Action Total Limit specified.

    MasterCard interface

  • [CARDS-50504]

    • Filling of Issuer Product Configuration ID on TAR response is now supported. The Product Configuration ID can be configured as Transaction subtype MDES_ISS_ID tag or Card info MDES_ISS_ID tag.

  • [CARDS-44427]

    • Changed length of fields in IRD_FEE_DESC, FEE_PROGRAM tables from 4000 to 3900.

  • [CARDS-49182]

    • MasterCard MPE Processing for BIN Table: Now Supporting Licensed Product ID filling in BIN Table.

  • [CARDS-49184]

    • "BIN Table - All.srd" form: Added "Licensed Product Idt" field.

  • [CARDS-49920]

    • Different activation methods have been supported for MDES transactions . The AUTH_TOKEN_ANSW parameter containing list of required methods has been created. This parameter is supported for financial institutions or on the global level.

  • [CARDS-50183]

    • Tariff Structure and Data Import: Added the parameter DATE_CHECK_MODE=ANY_DATE to the standard menu item for VISA and MasterCard.

  • [I1607206085]/[CARDS-50650]

    • acq_stateless.TRN_PHASE1 PINPrevalid output parameter filled in with device_type.emv_conf_file DEV tag Subfield YYYY. If the value found is valid and at least one of bits: 4 - "Online PIN (default for simple PIN)" or 5 - "(reserved) OffLine PIN clear" or 6 - "(reserved) Offline PIN encrypted (default for offline PIN)" is set, the "O" value will be returned. Otherwise, the procedure will return the "N" value.

  • [CARDS-42412]

    • In reports: MC_Inward_Monetary_Transactions.rdf, MDS_Notification.rdf, Mastercard_Notification.rdf, Monetary_Transactions.rdf, Unmatched_Trans_DiffAmounts.rdf, Unmatched_Trans_NotAuth.rdf, VISA Inward Monetary Transactions.rdf calculation of Reimbursement Fee for reversal is corrected - now fee amount are used with sign which depends on document request category.

  • [CARDS-43810]

    • MC BIN Table loading: fixed loss of some acquirer records.

  • [CARDS-48289]

    • MasterCard Debit Switch is supported in the XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf report. The P_CHANNEL parameter added. The default value is 'D', 'E', 'e'. Changes have been made to the standard version of cust_stat_attr_value. Please see Upgrade Notes on Impact changes for details.

    Updated Manuals: [core\WAY4 Statistical Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48323]

    • IRD configuration has been modified for Spain.

  • [CARDS-48435]

    • MasterCard IPM Inward: Stopped logging non-fatal file format errors to Process Log.

  • [CARDS-48547]

    • MasterCard Inward Processing: Processing File Reject messages.

  • [CARDS-48950]

    • Affiliated BII Outward: fixed error message when processing unmatched secondary documents.

  • [CARDS-49102]

    • SenderFirstName and SenderLastName fields of ISO messages are populated correctly when Card Track1 CardholderName data are used.

  • [CARDS-49496]

    • Condition for the "Accounts at Beginning Quarter" and "Accounts at Beginning Quarter - Blocked" columns has been corrected.

  • [CARDS-49549]

  • [CARDS-49606]

  • [CARDS-49627]

  • [CARDS-49672]

    • IC tariffs have been modified for Italy in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Bulletin No. 22.

  • [CARDS-49697]

    • IC Fraud import: Fixed fraud document processing when no authorisation with the found ID exists in the database.

  • [CARDS-49704]

    • There are two ways for implementing additional identification when TAR occurs. The first is to set the global parameter AUTH_REQ_ADD_AUTH_METHOD='1'. When the parameter is set and the special tag FORCE_AUTH in the Service is set to "Y", error code 85 is returned. When Primary Account Number Source method of PAN capture is manually entered by the cardholder or if it is a "card on file" from the wallet provider, error code 85 is returned.

  • [CARDS-49745]

    • Card contracts for the "Transactions Feature Details" block are analysed in the "MasterCard Statistics Issuing Business" report.

  • [CARDS-50097]

    • In report "MasterCard Statistics Issuing Business" the sum conversion by parameter P_FX_RATE in "Delinquent Outstanding" section was fixed (same as in transactions section).

  • [CARDS-50392]

    • MasterCard Stop List import: Supported records without trailing spaces processing.

  • [CARDS-50880]

    • Loading BIN Tables: Fixed BIN Table record update when the same record is updated several times.

  • [CARDS-50908]

    • Counting of "New cards obtained during quarter" has been changed for the "MC Statistics Issuing Business" report - reissued cards are no longer counted.

  • [CARDS-50929]

    • Country Table: Afghanistan moved from MasterCard Asia/Pasific Region to Middle East/Africa Region.

  • [CARDS-51041]

    • Error in tokenization processing when IRouter is used as an authorization channel has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-51049]

  • [CARDS-51314]

    • DE 124 in TAR messages will also be sent also for green channel.
