  • [CARDS-54177]

    • IRD configuration has been modified for Interregional, LAC, AP and MEA regions.

  • [CARDS-54299]

    • MasterCard Inward Processing. Rollbacked issue CARDS-52613. Changed CH Payment transaction processing if Fast Funds option is used (the value of the global parameter MC_FAST_FUNDS is Y).

  • [CARDS-54316]

    • MasterCard Inward: If pipe parameter USE_PAYMENT_TRANSACTION=N, Cardholder Payment transactions will not be converted to Notifications (Fast Funds mode).

  • [CARDS-54417]

    • Added new statistic attributes "Contract Group: AMEX Card Brand" (AMEX_BRAND), "Contract Group: MC Card Brand" (MC_BRAND), "Contract Group: VISA Card Brand" (VISA_BRAND) to enhance statistics gathering on transactions performed on account contract level data if a client's account contract can have several valid cards (card contracts) for different payment systems. In this case, the new MC_BRAND or VISA_BRAND values should be set for the P_ATTR_PS_CONTRACT_NAME parameter for the "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" and "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Busines" reports, respectively. No changes in report parameter settings are required to support current report behaviour.

    Updated Manuals: [mastercard_statistical_reports\Quarterly_MasterCard_Reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54465]

    • Safe Inward Processing (pipe): fixed import of the "Chargeback Indicator" field for "Acquirer Loss" and "Issuer Loss" records.

  • [CARDS-54523]

    • IPM ONUS Outward Processing (pipe): added support for PDS0207 ("Wallet Identifier").

  • [CARDS-54750]

    • MasterCard IRD Configuration loading from MPE. Fixed checking of Full MPE IRD Configuration presence when loading Daily MPE files.

  • [CARDS-54928]

    • MasterCard CDF Export: Fixed "Country is not specified!" error. Now the pipe doesn't ignore the custom value of the "CountryCode" field.

  • [CARDS-55014]

    • MasterCard IRD Calculation and Fee Prediction: Removed dependency on USE_OWN_FX parameter. Added additional global parameter IF_FX_TYPE_MC to override default rate type.

  • [CARDS-55066]

    • Improved performance of XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf report.

  • [CARDS-55161]

    • MasterCard MPE Import. Fixed loading table IP0053T1 (Interchange Fee Type).

  • [CARDS-55164]

    • Resolved an issue with the Delinquent Outstanding section in the "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" and "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" reports when they do not contain data for account contracts having both the Credit and Charge card contracts attached.

  • [CARDS-55501]

    • Fixed an issue when ABU messages were wrongly selected and sent to IPS online by Transaction Switch DBFileUpdate.

  • [CARDS-55614]

    • MasterCard CDF Export: fixed processing of the "CustomIdentifierType" field defined in the ADD_FIELDS_FINANCIAL_TRANSACTION_5000 pipe parameter. The "CustomIdentifierType" field was erroneously filled with the "CustomIdentifier" custom tag value instead of the "CustomIdentifierType" custom tag value. Also fixed "CustomIdentifier" field processing - it is cut if length is greater than allowed by the format.

  • [CARDS-55628]

    • Fixed the customized fields processing for MasterCard CDF Export process. If a customized field in the ADD_FIELDS_XX pipe parameters had [null] value, non-customized value was used for export. Now standard value is used only when there is no customized field in the ADD_FIELDS_XX pipe parameters. Otherwise, a customized value is used even if it has [null] value.

  • [CARDS-56459]

    • Fixed loading files containing "eof" symbol. MABU Issuer Response File Import.

  • [CARDS-56616]

    • Supported database currencies overrides for the MasterCard CDF interface.

  • [CARDS-56671]

    • Added the ability to skip export of unchanged corporations for the MasterCard CDF Export interface.

  • [I1608095069]/[CARDS-50680]

    • MasterCard Inward Processing: Control symbols in DE63.2 are now replaced by the "?" character.

  • [I1608151726]/[CARDS-49964]

    • The sequence to redefine the SIC value for calculating IRD has changed. When accepting a transaction, a device contract's SIC can be redefined in the following sequence: with the SIC=<sic code> tag setting in the transaction subtype, or if not found in the subtype, with FORCE_SIC_TO=<sic code> in the corresponding service.

  • [I1608222937]/[CARDS-52329]

  • [I1701112611]/[CARDS-52396]

    • A new parameter has been added to the "MC Statistics Acquiring Business" report, P_ATTR_VALUE_ISONUS. The default value is "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)" to customize the "is_on_us" flag. The default value has been changed for the P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_1 - checks by group_channel are extended by analysis of card_brand for support of affiliated transactions - " trans.chain_type in ('U') and target.card_brand like 'E_%' ".

  • [I1709203798]/[CARDS-54805]

    • IPS Product Definition. Restored necessary data about MasterCard and Maestro Cards in standard configuration.

  • [I1710098485]/[CARDS-55125]

    • MasterCard IRD Calculation. Fixed IRD PT definition: added condition for requirement "The card cannot be a contactless card".

  • [I1710137253]/[CARDS-55184]

    • IPM Inward Processing: fixed error when processing file with reconciliation message which contains "000" currency code.

  • [I1711137893]/[CARDS-55724]

    • Fixed the calculation algorithm for the PS_TRN_NAME statistic attribute in all statistics reports. The algorithm uses the document's source and target channel codes to define a transaction Payment Scheme. Added the priority to choose a channel code for calculation: On-Us channels have the highest priority, then Affiliated channels are taken into account, and other channels have the lowest priority in the algorithm. Without such prioritization, the PS_TRN_NAME attribute could have an incorrect value for transactions processed in the channels other than On-Us and Affiliated channels.

  • [I1711236209]/[CARDS-55890]

    • Corrected getting default values for report fields in MasterCard report "Location Administration Tool (LAT)" (OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. Reports\ATM Location). If the proper parameter value is not set in the device contract, default values from sy_handbook (with filter: group_code="MC_LAT_ATM") are used. Refer to OW_HOME\manuals\language\MasterCard_statistical_reports\Quarterly_MasterCard_Reporting\MC_ATM_Location_Report.pdf for details.

  • [CARDS-54136]

    • Supported MasterCard Automatic Billing Updater (MABU) functionality for Acquirers.

  • [CARDS-50660]

    • IRD configuration has been changed pursuant to MasterCard Release 16Q4 requirements.

  • [CARDS-50661]

    • Fee Prediction configuration (payment products) has been modified in accordance with release 16Q4.

  • [CARDS-50775]

    • MasterCard MPE processing. Now the "Product Type ID" field from MPE table IP0040T1 is transferred to the BIN Table Product Category field instead of the Service Indicator field.

  • [CARDS-50860]

    • MasterCard CDF Export: Supported additional customization points.

  • [CARDS-51019]

    • MasterCard Inward Processing: Supported loading PDS0170, PDS0171, PDS0172, PDS0173, PDS0174 in the corresponding document tags by the pipe parameter LOAD_CA_DATA=Y.

  • [CARDS-51082]

    • MasterCard IPM Outward: Supported Multi-Clearing transactions.

  • [CARDS-51148]

    • MasterCard Release 17.Q2 Global 521, Global 533, Global 566, AP 345, MEA 323: Added Reject Error Messages with codes 0008, 2204, 2595, 2639, 2641, 2662, 2809, 2810, 2811, 2814, 2817, 2823, 2824.

  • [CARDS-51154]

    • MasterCard Release 17.Q2 Global 521. IPS Product Definition: Added the "MasterCard Flex Prepaid" product with the MPD code.

  • [CARDS-51438]

    • Interchange tariffs have been modified for Croatia in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Bulletin No. 18.

  • [CARDS-51561]

    • MasterCard Release 17.Q2 Global 594: Supported loading the Payment Account Reference field of an ADDR message to the document tag PAR.

  • [CARDS-51581]

    • MasterCard CDF Export: Supported merging documents for Financial Adjustment Records.

  • [CARDS-51658]

    • MasterCard NSPK Outward: From 28.02.2017, the pipe will fill PDS0765 for MoneySend Payment Transactions.

  • [CARDS-51757]

    • MasterCard IRD Calculation: Base IRD Configuration now uses native DE22, PDS0023 and PDS0052 values to define IRD specification.

  • [CARDS-51800]

    • MasterCard IPM Inward/Outward: Added PDS0047 (Trade Payment Option) to message layouts. No special processing.

  • [CARDS-51896]

    • MasterCard CDF Export: Supported separate transaction fees export by the FIN_TRANS_SPLIT pipe parameter.

  • [CARDS-51982]

    • MasterCard IPM Inward: Added loading PDS0059 in document tag WSP_REQ_ID.

  • [CARDS-52084]

  • [CARDS-52123]

    • MasterCard IRD Calculation: Base IRD Configuration now uses native DE22, PDS0023 and PDS0052 values to define IRD specification.

  • [CARDS-52267]

    Mobile banking

  • [CARDS-53086]

    • The problem with empty invoice details in Mobile Banking has been resolved.

  • [CARDS-53004]

    • Mobile banking: a requirement for the value of the allow_multiple_user_sessions parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.

  • [CARDS-53008]

    • Mobile banking: a requirement for the value of the debug_enabled parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.

    Money transfers

  • [CARDS-53816]

    • B2B and G2B money transfers license validation has been implemented for the following transaction application codes: FD,GD,MD,OG,C02,C03,C04,C05,C06,C09,C55,C56,C57.

  • [CARDS-54224]

    • B2B and G2B money transfers license validation has been implemented for the following transaction application codes: FD,GD,MD,OG,C02,C03,C04,C05,C06,C09,C55,C56,C57.

  • [CARDS-49961]

    • Trace output added to acq_p2p package.

  • [CARDS-50074]

    • RPNA_NO_DATA P2P configuration parameter default value has been changed to Error.

  • [CARDS-50163]

    • Support of replacement AFT with Quasi-cash has been removed as no more required by Visa. P2P_VISA2OTHER global parameter has no more actual.

  • [CARDS-50536]

    • Funds disbursement transactions have been supported for Visa and MasterCard.

  • [CARDS-50812]

    • Ability to add debited and credited cards member_id to doc tags has been implemented.

  • [CARDS-54643]

    • 1. BAI C07 support has been implemented for Account-to-Person Credit money requests when the debited Account (CPID) cannot be routed in our system (an eWallet number, for instance). 2. The ALLOWED_MTRANSF_METH global parameter is no longer used. Please contact Customer Support for details.

  • [CARDS-54787]

    • Added the INTP2P tag to the add_info field of B2C, C2C and Credit money transfer transaction documents.

  • [CARDS-49162]

    • State is optional if it is not used for corresponding country

  • [CARDS-49190]

    • Updated CPID, CSOF calculation algorithms according to IPS requirements

  • [CARDS-49204]

    • Fixed SenderName calculation algorithm

  • [CARDS-49335]

    • Expand CPRN tag value with leading zeros to be 16 char length.

  • [CARDS-49336]

    • CSOF tag is filled in for VISA transactions that are not USA.

  • [CARDS-49519]

    • Bin record search algorithm of CH Payment document processing for Debited card is fixed.

  • [CARDS-50134]

    • Fixed tags generation flow for P2P transfers from OffUs to OnUs cards.

  • [CARDS-50806]

    • Updated warning message text.

  • [CARDS-51563]

    • Ability to change the CUP Channel name letter has been implemented.

  • [CARDS-53107]

    • Routing search is performed either by member_id if filled, or by PAN.

  • [CARDS-53167]

    • P2P CSOF tag 06 value (DE104 Usage 02 DSID 5F Tag 08 Source of Funds) returned for Credit accounts and 05 value for Debit/deposit access accounts for money transfers to a VISA card from another IPS card according to VISA requirements.

  • [CARDS-53571]

    • Corrected behaviour: credited card channel license is only analyzed to determine if _DOM/_INT suffixes must be added to source_fee_code value.

  • [CARDS-54468]

    • Fixed issue when payment transactions with PTID=C04 were processed as MasterCard MoneySend transactions.

  • [CARDS-54484]

    • Modified the money transfer transactions PTID and RPBA tags analysis algorithm. The USE_PTID_IN_P2P global parameter is no longer used. The PTID tag value is used for processing documents when the target card is a MasterCard card. The RPBA tag is used for VISA and other international payment systems.

  • [CARDS-56496]

    • Implemented Visa BAI AA support for Account-to-Person Credit money requests when the debited Account (CPID) cannot be routed in our system (an eWallet number, for instance).

  • [I1609126520]/[CARDS-50263]

    • One of transaction participatns Sender or Recipient data can be omited in P2P acquiring request (in any bertlv or tags format). Another participant data will be selected from the database.

  • [I1609146279]/[CARDS-50459]

    • The field 'State" will not be filled in the BERTLV container prepared for the VISA channel if the State attribute is not applicable for the corresponding country.

  • [I1609146279]/[CARDS-50532]

    • Recipient and Sender bertlv container StreetAddress attribute length of up to 35 characters for the VISA channel. Added validation that the total length of FirstName and LastName does not exceed 30 characters. Numeric country code used for attributes in the bertlv container has been prepared for VISA.

  • [I1701163750]/[CARDS-51967]

    • BIN routing search has been changed for P2P transactions from cards to accounts.

  • [I1703076137]/[CARDS-52813]

    • Updated license validation for C2C to an affiliated channel. Affiliate OnUs transactions will not require IPS license setup. The correct routing configuration is as follows: Affiliate should be specified as card BIN Group Channel and the BIN Table channel should indicate IPS.

  • [I1703201358]/[CARDS-52738]

    • If device_parms.device_location value is used as the source of the CPNA tag and the value consists of one word only, the tag value will be calculated as two device_parms.device_location values separated by a space character.

  • [I1706069710]/[CARDS-53514]

    • Money transfers Sender Data made optional for OnUs and Domestic transactions for CUP cards.

  • [CARDS-49604]

    • Ability to save MoneyTransfer data received in F112 bertlv container to doc tags is implemented. To activate this feature add 'F112' key into P2P_ATTRS global parameter value.

  • [CARDS-51366]

    • P2P tags are filled in in the documents prepared for processing in the Affiliate H2H channels.

  • [CARDS-54891]

    • Changed VISA OCT reversal processing. OCT reversals with Target Channel "VISA SMS" are rejected with Return Code "12" and Posting Status "Under Workflow". OCT reversals with Target Channel "VISA" are not sent in the online phase and should be sent in clearing.

    Updated Manuals: [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55030]

    • Changed P2P Money Transfer Account Funding and Original Credit Transactions Jurisdiction rules according to Oct17 VISA Release. Transactions between cards issued in a list of EU countries will be processed as domestic transactions.

  • [I1607113056]/[CARDS-49574]

    • Validation of Country, City, SenderName attributes added for Visa Domestic transactions. To activate this verification add P2P_VISA_VALIDATE_DOMESTIC=Y tag in special_parms field of Device Fin institution.

  • [I1612198860]/[CARDS-51583]

    • P2P data validation rules required for IPS channels will also be validated for affiliate channels if the card BIN group channel is defined as an IPS channel.

    Multiple financial institutions

  • [CARDS-57134]

    • Fixed an incorrect system behaviour when copying a financial institution: if the "Numeration Scheme" field's value is set for the target financial institution, it is not duplicated from the source financial institution.

  • [CARDS-49993]

  • [CARDS-50045]

    Updated Manuals: [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50128]

    • NSPK Inward: EMV Chip data error checks are skipped.

  • [CARDS-50315]

    • NSPK Inward Processing: Fixed doc.rec_member_id filling for Fee Collection.

  • [CARDS-50435]

    • NSPK Outward : fixed error during DE37 check (when is present) for collection only documents.

  • [CARDS-50590]

    • NSPK Inward Processing: fixed "Inward Invalid number format for PDS-0301" error for large numbers. Also, the "TRAILER_CHECKS" parameter for the NSPK Inward Processing pipe has been added to skip checking values from trailers.

  • [CARDS-50626]

    • NSPK Outward Processing: added a check for DE12 (must not be greater then PDS-0105.2 (file date)). Added the "FILE_REF_DATE" pipe parameter for file date (PDS-0105.2) filling, parameter values are "SYSTEM" (default value, system time is used) and "BANK" (bank date is used).

  • [CARDS-50765]

    • NSPK Outward: fixed the rollback procedure for NSPK Collection Only files, so it is possible to export these transactions again.

  • [CARDS-50782]

    • Fixed calculation of total cards and active cards for the "NSPK Statistics Issuing Business Prepared" report.

  • [CARDS-50799]

    • NSPK Outward - fixed filling PDS 0025.2 for reversals of presentments. The correct date is taken from the settlement data for the original transaction.

  • [CARDS-50939]

    • NSPK Outward Processing: fixed filling PDS0025.1 for Fee Collection Reversals.

  • [CARDS-50955]

    • Visa Affiliated BII Inward: added the ability to import the DEV tag (device description) allowing some fields (ie DE22 in NSPK protocol) to be exported more precisely.

  • [CARDS-51130]

    • Fixed the precision of total sums in the "NSPK Statistics Acquiring Business" report.

  • [CARDS-51410]

    • Fixed "No or incorrect tag NSPK_TA" error when exporting a transit adjustment transaction to NSPK.

  • [CARDS-51434]

    • NSPK Outward ONUS: fixed PDS-0025.2 filling for reversals. A reversal will be exported only after receiving the appropriate [1644-685] (Financial Position) message for the original transaction.

  • [CARDS-51451]

    • NSPK Outward: added Member ID to error message when getting Member parameters.

  • [CARDS-51533]

    • NSPK SIOM Outward: fixed Oracle grants for Clerk role.

  • [CARDS-51572]

    • NSPK Outward Processing: fixed ARN recalculation for Adjustments, when an Adjustment has the same date as original transaction.

  • [CARDS-52966]

    • The menu branch "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR. Details" (with all menu items) and menu items "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Notification Report (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Acknowledgement Report (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Settlement Report (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Settlement Results (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Submission Report (briefly)" have been moved to "OpenWay\MIR\MIR. Reports\" menu branch.

  • [CARDS-53095]

    • NSPK Interface: posting date is used instead of transaction date to calculate ARN.

  • [CARDS-53334]

    • NSPK Processing (pipes): fixed incorrect processing for PDS-0176 and PDS-0190 for AMEX.

  • [CARDS-53358]

    • Fixed the inability to receive authorization requests from one IPS member to another when both members are served in the same processing centre but direct interbranch routing between them is blocked. Please check external services configuration to share the source channel for correct authorization processing where <ChannelCode> is a source channel: * for Transaction Switch users, external adapter contains "special_processing_options sourceChannelID=<ChannelCode>" * for NetServer users, external channel contains <MODULE TYPE="NETWORK"> section with <PARAMETER NAME="SOURCE_CHANNEL_ID" VALUE="<ChannelCode>"/> The case is directly related to situations when a message received from IPS channel will be routed back to the same channel.

  • [CARDS-54071]

    • NSPK MPE Import (pipe): fixed filling country code for MIR, JCB, AMEX, UPI BIN table import.

  • [CARDS-54360]

    • SIOM: fixed finding Issuer Member ID when creating an ONUS SIOM document for an Affiliated Bank's card.

  • [CARDS-54406]

    • NSPK SIOM Inward: fixed linking incoming documents to incorrect SIOM documents.

  • [CARDS-54681]

    • NSPK Outward. Fixed DE22.5 filling.

  • [CARDS-54841]

    • Removed delimiters from response to tkn_activation transaction when there is only one phone number.

  • [CARDS-55214]

    • Fixed NSPK VISA Bin Table Import: when an incoming range has at least one corresponding (smaller or bigger) original VISA BIN range, only these corresponding records are created (copied) in NSPK BIN Group. Before, the "bigger" original incoming NSPK BIN range was also added to WAY4.

  • [CARDS-55510]

    • NSPK Inward Processing: fixed incorrect processing of settlement incoming messages for financial advices as "Iss Ichng Detail Loyalty For Cardholder CR Inc". Now such messages without the DE-026 field are loaded as "Iss Ichng Detail CH Payment Inc" type.

  • [CARDS-55865]

    • Added analysis of the "On Us" transaction property when calculating "Number of Active cards" in the XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Issuing_Business_Prepared report.

  • [CARDS-56735]

    • Added the ability to run several NSPK Export processes in parallel.

  • [I1602295599]/[CARDS-47904]

    • Visa Inward: improved currency rate accuracy when loading settlement documents.

  • [I1608058069]/[CARDS-49956]

    • NSPK Inward: fixed message code for NSPK Loyalty Settlement.

  • [I1608316382]/[CARDS-50493]

    • Fixed error "Doc was not uploaded (ONUS) Mandatory field 31 is absent". Fixed Internet transaction detection for collection only export. Changed ARN date (DE31.3) filling - now selected from file date and not from transaction date. Added processing of "MIR_NSPK_AID" tag in addition to "NSPK_AID" tag when searching the Member Id for affiliated collection only export.

  • [I1611018920]/[CARDS-50902]

    • NSPK Outward Processing: ARN date (DE31.3) is recalculated for credit transactions converted from adjustments.

  • [I1702174295]/[CARDS-52110]

    • NSPK Inward Processing pipe: fixed incorrect message code (S2IIF1X1, S2III1X1) generation.

  • [I1702270914]/[CARDS-52869]

    • NSPK Outward Processing (pipe): fixed export of last adjustment, which reverses transaction completely.

  • [I1705221304]/[CARDS-53272]

    • IPS Products. Updated according to last NSPK specification.

  • [I1705264583]/[CARDS-53495]

    • NSPK Outward Processing (pipe): fixed ARN calculating for multiple adjustments.

  • [I1706150009]/[CARDS-53865]

    • NSPK Processing (pipes) : fixed processing of PDS 2063.

    Updated Manuals: [UFX_H2H_Interchange.pdf (NDA Specification for vendors)]

  • [I1710025092, I1710056161]/[CARDS-55020]

    • NSPK MPE Import: fixed performance issue when loading bin ranges for VISA (binv files). Changed default value for the "SEARCH_AS_SUB" pipe parameter from "N" to "Y". It allows new detailed VISA BIN token ranges to be imported more correctly. To restore old behaviour, the "SEARCH_AS_SUB"="N" pipe parameter must be set.

  • [I1710096925]/[CARDS-55076]

    • Changed the ARN calculation algorithm. To avoid "Incorrect Date in ARN (yDDD) : [7281], must not be less than trans_date" error, the transaction date is used to calculate ARN for the MIR interface. When the posting date is larger than the transaction date by 5 or more days, the posting date is used. For other payment system interfaces (MasterCard, Visa, AMEX) the transaction date is always used for ARN calculation.

  • [CARDS-54236]

    • Added installation and configuration manuals (issuing and acquiring modules) for the MIR Loyalty Program.

  • [CARDS-54898]

    • Updated 2017_10_NSPK_Requirements.pdf. The section containing NetServer settings for MIR B-05 requirement has been removed. NetServer unconditionally behaves in compliance with MIR B-05 requirement.

  • [CARDS-49008]

    • NSPK MIR: added support for NSPK Loyalty Program in clearing interface.

  • [CARDS-49012]

    • XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf: new columns (20 and 21) added. New parameters: P_IS_TRANSFER_CREDIT_FLT = tt.trans_type_idt = '0614 2' P_IS_TRANSFER_DEBIT_FLT= tt.trans_type_idt = '0513 1'

    Updated Manuals: [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49228]

    • MasterCard Inward Processing. Supported Retrieval Request Acknowledgement message without processing.

  • [CARDS-49499]

    • NSPK: supported field PDS-0176 Merchant Assigned ID.

  • [CARDS-49578]

    • MIR: Supported setting additional merchant parameters. Added the menu OpenWay\NSPK\NSPK. Merchant Management.

  • [CARDS-49583]

    • NSPK Proprietary: added support for PDS-2072.

  • [CARDS-49584]

    • NSPK Clearing: supported new DE22 values.

  • [CARDS-49905]

    • Added a new column, "Territory Code", for the NSPK "Acquiring Business" statistics report. This column contains the code of the territory where a device is located. The first two numbers of the OKATO code are used as the code.

    Updated Manuals: [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50278]

    • NSPK: supported SIOM (NSPK fraud reporting system) for Issuers.

  • [CARDS-50289]

    • NSPK Outward: changed DE43 filling for ATM transactions.

  • [CARDS-50290]

    • NSPK Outward: for offline transactions DE38 is not unloaded.

  • [CARDS-50330]

    • NSPK Outward Processing: Added additional check for DE031.3 (ARN Date) DE031.3 in (ClearingDate-8;ClearingDate] and DE031.3 >= DE012.1

  • [CARDS-50331]

    • If DE38(Auth Code) exists and DE37(RRN) is absent in a First Presentment, the document is not unloaded.

  • [CARDS-51484]

    • NSPK SIOM Processing: supported SIOM processing for Acquirer transactions.

    Updated Manuals:

  • [CARDS-51488]

    • NSPK SIOM: supported processing of ONUS/Affiliated fraud transactions.

    Updated Manuals:

  • [CARDS-51490]

    • NSPK SIOM: supported processing of unsuccessful authorization fraud transactions.

    Updated Manuals:

  • [CARDS-51594]

    • [NSPK REL] 17.1 B-02. NSPK Outward Processing will not export "1740-781" and "1740-782" messages if "NSPK_RELEASE"="17.1" global parameter is set.

  • [CARDS-51958]

    • NSPK Inward Processing (pipe): supported new G2C transaction processing.

  • [CARDS-51959]

    • Added the ability to validate a cardholder's date of birth together with other security values. See documentation for details.

    Updated Manuals:

  • [CARDS-53277]

    • Affiliated BII Outward Processing (pipe) : supported export of NSPK G2C Credit transactions.

  • [CARDS-53337]

    • [MIR REL] 2017.2 K-11: removed support of PDS2072 since 17.2 release. "NSPK_RELEASE"="17.2" global parameter must be set to support this functionality

  • [CARDS-53349]

    • [MIR REL] 2017.2 B-08: NSPK MPE Import (pipe) added support of new "TKN" product ranges. These ranges are marked with the "TOKEN_BIN"="Y" tag.

  • [CARDS-53376]

    • [MIR REL] 2017.2 K-10: supported new PDS2175. It is used to export/import Card Acceptor URL containing Cyrillic characters. "NSPK_RELEASE"="17.2" global parameter must be set to use this functionality.

  • [CARDS-53502]

    • [MIR REL] 2017.2 B-05. NSPK Outward Processing (pipe): EMV tag 84 is filled with the "EMV_AID" document tag value if tag 84 is absent in addendum_doc chip data.

    Updated Manuals: NSPK Interface | Release Requirements [UFX_H2H_Interchange.pdf (NDA Specification for vendors)]

  • [CARDS-53641]

    • NSPK Outward Processing (pipe) : added the "COMMIT_INTERVAL" parameter to manage commit interval.

  • [CARDS-53642]

    • NSPK MIR: Added product TKN (MIR Token).

  • [CARDS-53995]

    • MIR tokenization is supported.

  • [CARDS-54003]

    • [MIR REL] 2017.2 B-10 NSPK Clearing Interfaces (pipes): supported new cash-to-card transaction processing.

  • [CARDS-54018]

    • [MIR REL] 2017.2 K-12 : supported "B" value for PDS0165.1 field.

  • [CARDS-54308]

    • NSPK Inward Processing (pipe): G2C MIR Transactions will be imported as Notifications based on the "MIR_FAST_FUNDS" additional global parameter value. The "FF_TO_NOTIF" tag from the BIN table and "FF_TO_NOTIF_DEF" pipe parameter are not analyzed anymore. Notification will be converted to Advice by the Document Processing procedure if necessary.

  • [I1607313135]/[CARDS-50111]

    • NSPK MPE import: BINs of sanctioned banks starting with "67" are considered to be Cirrus/Maestro BINs.

  • [I1705026998, I1705127863, I1705153646, I1702208472, I1705297867]/[CARDS-53441]

    • NSPK Bin Table Import (pipe): if NSPK BIN range for VISA/MC is not found and smaller (fully included in NSPK range) VISA/MC BIN ranges exist, these VISA/MC ranges are copied to the appropriate NSPK BIN Group. To avoid copying and restore the old behaviour, the new "COPY_SUBRANGES"="N" pipe parameter must be set.

  • [I1709041130]/[CARDS-54857]

    • Created new statistical reports "NSPK Cards, Part 1 (Cards and BIN)", ''NSPK Cards, Part 2 (Cards and Territory)" required by NSPK Bulletin 37.2017.

    Updated Manuals: [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

    Notifications

  • [CARDS-51132]

    • Added new variables %TRANS_BONUS_ALL%, %TRANS_BONUS_AT:<AccountType>%, %TRANS_BONUS_LIST[:<Prefix>:<Expire>:<Days>]%, %TRANS_BONUS_DOC_ALL%, %TRANS_BONUS_DOC_AT:<AccountType>%, %TRANS_BONUS_DOC_LIST[:<Prefix>:<Expire>:<Days>]% for messaging about loyalty bonuses accrued as the result of some transactions. These variables can be used in client message setup for SMS Banking.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-43542]

    • Added searching information about participants (paym_rec) data under contract for %PARTY_...% variables.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50959]

    • The PARSE_TAG_PRM() procedure in the cards_msg package has been included in the public API.

  • [CARDS-50986]

    • The following new variables have been added for configuring message templates and client statements for multi-currency products: - %MULTI_CURRENCY_BALANCE:<Currency>% - the balance of a particular contract. - %MULTI_CURRENCY_CURR:<Currency>% - the currency of a particular contract. - %MULTI_CURRENCY_BALANCE_ALL% - list of all the client`s contract balances with currency. - %MULTI_CURRENCY_BALANCE_NONZERO% - list of the client`s contract balances that are not equal to zero.

    Updated Manuals: [notifications\transaction_notifications\Transaction_Notifications.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51017]

    • Added new variables: %PIN_ATTEMPTS%, %MAX_PIN_ATTEMPTS% for use in message templates.

    Updated Manuals: [notifications\transaction_notifications\Transaction_Notifications.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51089]

    • The "Priority" field has been added in the "Event Message No Edit" and "Event Message Text" forms.

    Updated Manuals: [notifications\transaction_notifications\Transaction_Notifications.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51253]

    • Added new variables %TRANS_MISC_FEE:<UsageType>%, %TRANS_MISC_LIM_FEE:<UsageType>% for messaging about misc document fee.

    Updated Manuals: [notifications\transaction_notifications\Transaction_Notifications.pdf]

  • [CARDS-43541]

    • Added the ability to define PaymTypeCode for invoice party variables (%PARTY_...%).

  • [CARDS-51002]

    • The language defined in the client record is used for SMS message creation if it is not specified in the message template.

  • [CARDS-51269]

    • Fixed the decimal and thousand separator for the variables %MULTI_CURRENCY_BALANCE%, %MULTI_CURRENCY_CURR%, %MULTI_CURRENCY_BALANCE_ALL%, %TRANS_MISC_FEE%, %TRANS_MISC_LIM_FEE%.

  • [CARDS-51361]

    • For date variables like %TRANS_DATE[[*shift]*date_format]% if [*date_format] is not declared the format with the "default" code described in "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Client Classifiers\Formatting Styles" is used. If there is no "default code" the standard date mask "YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS" is used.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51592]

    • Processing of the default Service (with id=0) for correct representation of "%SERVICE$..." variables has been added.

  • [CARDS-51904]

    • In the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report added calculation of values for %VAR% variables if they are set in the P_MESSAGECODE_P parameter.

  • [CARDS-52269]

    • If an online reversal did not lead to a change in the amount available, a notification will not created.

  • [CARDS-53409]

    • If an online reversal did not lead to a change in the amount available, a notification will not be created.

  • [CARDS-54717]

    • Changed the result of a value returned by the %TRANS_REASON_DETAILS% variable. Now it returns the whole text from the doc.reason_details field instead of text from doc.add_info.

    Updated Manuals: [notifications\transaction_notifications\Transaction_Notifications.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55459]

    • Corrected the "Event Message Text" form to avoid [Dictionary] button error.

  • [CARDS-56694]

    • Restored translation of %TRANS_TYPE% calculated variable to the language defined in the client record in client notification message templates. The problem with this variable was only observed in versions 03.44.31.06-07, 03.45.30.53-56, 03.46.30.05-08.

  • [CARDS-56753]

    • Added a new variable for client message notifications: %DFLT_TRANS_TYPE% It returns Transaction Name value from mess_dict without language translations.

  • [I1609195493]/[CARDS-51042]

    • The "Service Groups" and "Service Group - Edit" forms have been enhanced: any type of contract can now be specified in the "Service Contract" field.

  • [I1609233293]/[CARDS-50831]

    • Restored functionality of "ADD_ADDR_TYPES" tag.

  • [I1611154209]/[CARDS-51591]

    • Notification generation for expired fund holds unblocking has been corrected. A new event code "CLOSED_AUTH_DOC" has been added.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Events.pdf]

  • [I1704076451]/[CARDS-52945]

    • When an attempt is made to open a MTR_FIN_REVERSE Event, a check is made of whether an Event with the "AUTH_T_R" or "AUTH_P_R" code was opened earlier. If one of these Events was opened, the Event with the "MTR_FIN_REVERSE" code will not be opened.

  • [I1704120003]/[CARDS-52793]

    • The language defined in "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Global Constants" or for an Officer is no longer used for SMS messages.

  • [I1708045371]/[CARDS-54423]

    • Fixed "ORA-06502: numeric or value error: character string buffer too small" exception during notification message generation during the posting process when %IF% and %THEN% message constructions are converted into values greater than 255 symbols.

    Offline obfuscator

  • [DBK-2833]

    • Added support of FPE Encryption algorithm in Offline Obfuscator. Use the new additional global parameter OBFUSCATION_ALGORITHM with possible values TRANSPARENT (by default) - the old algorithm, and FPE - FPE encryption.

  • [DBK-2134]

    • ORA-16612 during parallel execution of Obfuscating All Tables has been fixed.

    PIN delivery

  • [CARDS-54578]

    • Fixed problem with RC 464 "More than one card found" error during PIN Delivery.

    POS management

  • [CARDS-48740]

    • Final advice is supported for P2P transactions.

  • [CARDS-50354]

    • Value "A" to ACQ_ONLINE tag has been added. This value changes vice versa online status of operation in operation table.

  • [CARDS-50408]

    • POS Purchase with CashBack: fixed incorrect behaviour of partial reversal.

  • [I1605055066]/[CARDS-49401]

    • DOC.fx_settl_date is inherited from Preauthorization document when Sales Completion occurs.

    Product inspector

  • [CARDS-48229]

    • Supported use of several Advanced Applications in one test script. Applications should be identified by the "APPL_IDT" tag in the initial application creation test step.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49416]

    • An XSD schema for validation of import and export file structure has been created for the "test_script_export" and "test_script_import" pipes.

  • [CARDS-49684]

    • ACNT_LOG records can now be logged when a Test Script is run.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49829]

    • A new step type, "Set Contract Parameter", has been added to Product Inspector.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49857]

    • The "Application" link has been added for the "Create & Process - No WF" action in Product Inspector.

  • [CARDS-50087]

    • The ability to log Contract Dates has been added to Product Inspector.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50196]

    • A new step, "Set Contract Status", has been added to Product Inspector.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50297]

    • Product Inspector for application testing now allows testing an application for related contracts.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50300]

    • Base relation contract field can be redefined when creating a contract in Product Inspector by using BASE_RELATION tag in the test step.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50359]

    • Ability to add custom logging of additional parameters during test script run is added. Procedure CUST_TEST_LOG_BLOCK is called for every object being logged, logged objects list depend on LOG_MODE of test script, test step and contract.

  • [CARDS-50427]

    • Base relation contract field can be redefined when creating a contract in Product Inspector by using BASE_RELATION tag in the test step.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50496]

    • Product Inspector for application testing allows now to check application error messages using ERR_MSG tag.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50748]

    • The Ability to generate PS Ref Number has been added to Product Inspector. The PS Ref Number template should be specified in the document template in the test step. The first characters of the generated number are taken from the template provided.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50990]

    • A new button, "Tariff Books" has been added to the "Test Contract Ext" form. For the button to be shown, the contract product must have the "ATTACH_BY_CODE_LIST" tag.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51026]

    • A link to Product configurations has been added to the "Last contract" form in the Product Inspector.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51076]

    • The abilities to duplicate test steps and initiate renumeration of steps have been added to Product Inspector.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51095]

    • Added the ability to define a list of logged statuses for a Product Inspector test run. The STATUSES_LIST tag with status codes delimited by commas should be set in the contract creation step or the step where statuses are logged.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51393]

    • The "Reset Loyalty Domain" action has been added to Product Inspector test steps. This action makes it possible to reset configured loyalty actions and tariffs in the specified domain.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51454]

    • Logging of minimum and maximum balance amounts and dates has been added to Product Inspector. Logging is enabled for balance types with the SAVE_LIMITS tag and in BALANCE_FULL, BALANCE_HISTORY logging modes.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48860]

    • Fixed behaviour when the current financial institution in local constants was cleared when the Product Inspector script launched.

  • [CARDS-49427]

    • Product Inspector scripts on the step for Case Management activity supports tag ASSERT_ERR - expected error: if the step is finished with this error the activity will be canceled and the script will be continued. The special parameter 'WITHOUT_CANCEL' on the step denies activity cancellation.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49602]

    • A client created when running a test script will have the same "Client Type" field value as the contract.

  • [CARDS-49665]

    • XSD schema corrected for applications.

  • [CARDS-49844]

    • The test script export process can be interrupted by a user.

  • [CARDS-49846]

    • Fixed attaching document addendums in the test script, now addendums will be attached with specified format.

  • [CARDS-49994]

    • Fixed error that occurred when opening the PI scripts form if the dbm.ini file included several identical keys in different sections.

  • [CARDS-50109]

    • Fixed information logging related to classifier's values in Product Inspector in case when a unique classifier code was defined in CLASSIFIER_LIST=<Classifiers_Code_List>; tag.

  • [CARDS-50162]

    • Fixed Product Inspector document creation for contracts with several plastics.

  • [CARDS-50175]

    • Added the ability to log a contract's own parameter values for parameters set directly in the contract (not inherited according to the hierarchy). CONTR_PARMS_OWN log mode should be used to enable logging a contract's own parameters.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50217]

    • Warnings are now skipped when setting a classifier value in PI script.

  • [CARDS-50222]

    • Fixed error when Product Inspector script continued execution when included script failed.

  • [CARDS-50539]

    • Product Inspector for application testing now allows several applications to be tested in the same test script. Applications created in a test script are saved when LOG_ALL_APPL=Y; in the test script is set. When this parameter is used, an application created in the script can be used in different steps according to the APPL_IDT definition.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51234]

    • A new "test_script_export" pipe parameter, SILENT, with Y/N values has been added for use from Scheduler. If the parameter value is "Y", no dialog message will be shown.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51237]

    • Changes have been implemented in balance logging during test script execution in Product Inspector with the tag LOG_MODE=BALANCE_FULL in the test step. Now the "Amount" and "Trx Count" field groups are not logged for balances with no HistoryMode option defined.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51449]

    • Added sorting by ID for application action logging in PI test results.

  • [CARDS-54184]

    • Fixed incorrect behaviour of the "Test Script Import" pipe when Standard Journals were imported even if the corresponding Test Scripts were not chosen for import. Now if Test Scripts are skipped by import, Standard Journals will be skipped as well.

  • [CARDS-54438]

    • The ability to attach contracts with non-unique contract numbers to a test script has been added. In this case, the BNK=<FI bank code> tag should be specified in the test step. Contract search will be performed in the specified financial institution.

  • [CARDS-55758]

    • Fixed an issue with the Product Inspector's "test script import" pipe that required UI elements and graphic objects when the pipe was running under Scheduler on *nix OS in silent mode (pipe parameter SILENT="Y").

  • [CARDS-55889]

    • Fixed transaction condition attributes mapping between values in the file and in the destination database during test scripts import.

  • [CARDS-57012]

    • Added processing of empty tags "TRANS_COND_ATTR", "SEC_TRANS_COND_ATT" values in test_script_import pipe.

  • [I1607210975]/[CARDS-49615]

    • Fixed "out of memory" error when loading large test scripts with standard script execution data.

  • [I1608026553]/[CARDS-49770]

    • Fixed product definition for creating subcontracts in Product Inspector.

  • [I1608108465]/[CARDS-49855]

    • Exporting product inspectors scripts is fixed. It now uploads all subscripts linked to the main script.

  • [I1611305656]/[CARDS-51348]

    • Product Inspector test script import has been modified when in the file being imported there are test scripts with codes that already exist: a UI dialog is displayed to confirm the script update. If script update is chosen, all the existing test steps will be deleted and the new one rewritten. This dialog window appears only if the pipe's SILENT mode parameter is switched off.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [I1612046735]/[CARDS-51874]

    • For the "test script import" pipe, added searching of CLIENT_TYPE values for the APPL_CLIENT.CLT tag with the additional condition "F_I=? and CCAT=?".

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [I1703160402]/[CARDS-52474]

    • Product Inspector test script import has been modified when in the file being imported there are test scripts with the same codes that already exist in the destination WAY4Cards system. Previously, all test script steps already present in the destination database were deleted, which led to links being lost in comparing script results with the standard ones. This behaviour cannot be restored. In the first step of the import procedure, all the existing test steps in the database are marked with the new status "Obsolete". In the second step, the system checks if the step number exists in the file being imported. If not, the step in the database is kept with the "Obsolete" status, otherwise the step gets a status and inherits other parameters from the file being imported. When a Product Inspector script is run, a step with the "Obsolete" status behaves the same way as a step with the "Skip" status.

    Updated Manuals: [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [I1709154318]/[CARDS-55378]

    • Fixed incorrect behavior of the "Test Script Import" pipe when Standard Journals were imported even if the corresponding Test Scripts were not chosen for import.

    Product management

  • [CARDS-49784]

    • The ability to compare a pair of tags/parameters/classifiers has been implemented for tagged data validation. New compare rules IF_COMPARE% can be defined in a Service in the Service Details field, in a Usage Template in the Spc Parms field, in a Tariff in the Apply Rules field or in Preferred in the CustomParms field.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf] [product_management\Usage_Limiters.pdf] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49972]

    • Multicurrency normalization has been enhanced. Use MCN_MODE for account templates and normalization standing orders. For more information, see the appropriate documentation.

  • [CARDS-50067]

    • New approach to the "Multi-currency cards" Product has been developed. Special instructions are provided by OpenWay consultants under separate agreements. Please contact OpenWay for more details.

  • [CARDS-49262]

    • Names of document tags for storing amounts in decimal format with a decimal point can be now listed in the form OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\!!! STAFF ONLY !!!\Main Dictionaries\Amount Format For Doc Tag.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49263]

    • New Billing Date functionality has been implemented for issuing products.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49264]

    • A new global parameter, LINK_COPIED_PRODUCTS, has been added for the Copy Branch procedure to link (by the product template field) a created contract to its source.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49286]

    • New Billing Date functionality has been implemented for issuing products.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49337]

    • A new field, "Reference Mode", has added to the form with full information about an account template.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49886]

    • Client and Contract Parameters UFX application loading and setting the contract parameter from Product Inspector requires the registration of the contract parameters in the OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Common Handbooks\Contract Parameters menu item.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf] [product_inspector\WAY4_Product_Inspector_Manual.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49888]

    • Now if a contract parameter has the "Tariff Domain" role, only "Top Level Only", "Billing Level Only", and "Current Level Only" hierarchy levels can be used.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49936]

    • The ability to redefine an entry due date from a custom document tag has been implemented. The tag DUE_DATE_TAG=<tag name> should be defined in the Service's "Service Details" field and the corresponding tag with value format 'YYMMDD' should pass in the document's "Add Info".

    Updated Manuals: [tags description]

  • [CARDS-50064]

    • The ability to calculate the number of days past due has been added. Account schemes should be configured accordingly.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf] [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50117]

    • New options to define the frequency for regular operation (fee charging or standing orders generation) are added: semi-annual and fortnightly.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Standing_Orders.pdf] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50127]

    • When re-ageing is performed and previous due account is not found in the contract, it will be created automatically according to the account template rules.

    Updated Manuals: [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50148]

    • New contract date type PD_DATE can be configured in Date Types to check contract delinquency period.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50372]

    • Contract parameter code is allowed as value for the CYCLE tag on the balance type which triggers the classifier. Old behavior (the value of this tag is defined as a counter) is also supported.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf] [tags description]

  • [CARDS-50403]

    • The ability to mark service pack to redefine the currency for fee account from "Parent pack local currency" to "child pack local currency" is now supported.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description]

  • [CARDS-50405]

    • The ability to mark service pack to redefine the currency for fee account from "Parent pack local currency" to "child pack local currency" is now supported.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description]

  • [CARDS-50476]

    • Multi-currency product: automatic creation of "related contracts" has been added. The functionality is implemented by the special tag SIBLING_PRODUCT =<Product Code>; in "custom data" of the "Base" Product (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Product Definition\Products).

  • [CARDS-50619]

    • Added the ability to mark an account scheme to redefine the interest account currency from the parent pack local currency to child pack local currency.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50729]

    • Contract parameter code is allowed as value for the CYCLE tag on the balance type which triggers the classifier. Old behavior (the value of this tag is defined as a counter) is also supported.

  • [CARDS-50969]

    • Uniqueness for a new field, "Social Security Number" is supported. Uniqueness is only checked if the "Social Security Number" field is filled in. The check is affected by the global parameter "UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_SOCIAL_NUMBER" or the same tag in the financial institution's "special parameters" field (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Financial Institutions - [Details]. Parameter values: "N" (No) - The system does not check for "Social Security Number" uniqueness "Y" (Yes) - The system checks social security number uniqueness as follows: if more than one record of clients with the same number is registered at the financial institution, during approval of contracts for these clients an error message will be generated and the contracts will have the "Not Ready" status. The default value is "Y" (Yes).

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Customer_Support.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51094]

    • Added the ability to define and show a past due date and period for a contract. Overdue balance should be configured to include all overdue accounts and the balance code should be specified in the PAST_DUE_BALANCE global parameter.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf] [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51133]

    • New tag REGISTERED_FOR=<TOP/BASE/BILLING/SELF/LIABILITY/GLOBAL/RELATED/CONTRACT_NUMBER> in event type "special parms" field has been added. This tag allows to check event type registration for "related" contract instead of current contract. For example, REGISTERED_FOR=BASE in SMS notification event type allows to send messages for "related" card in case if this service is available for "base" card contract.

  • [CARDS-51149]

    • Checking of some contract balances, classifiers and parameters has been supported for specific contract roles.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf] [product_management\Events.pdf] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf] [product_management\Standing_Orders.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51203]

    • Forms for Calculated Contract Parameter rules have been implemented for Products configuration.

  • [CARDS-51206]

    • A new value type "Calculated Amount" has been added for contract parameters. These parameters can be used for some calculations according to Product rules.

  • [CARDS-51230]

    • Trace information for some processing tags (MAX_TOTAL_AMOUNT_PARM; ADD_FEE; SUBTRACT_FEE; ROUND) has been improved.

  • [CARDS-51252]

    • Minimum total due threshold has been implemented.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51281]

    • The ability to skip Tariff Plan inheritance has been implemented.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51416]

    • The ability to skip Tariff Plan inheritance has been implemented.

  • [CARDS-51759]

    • The ability to customize contract state information gathered during contract balance prediction on future date has been added.

  • [CARDS-51990]

    • OpenWay\Full\CMS Stat\Create Statistics menu item has been enhanced. Now it will connect a new group "PRODUCT_GROUP" that contains key elements of product configuration scope.

  • [CARDS-52005]

    • The ability to customize contract state information gathered during contract balance prediction on future date has been added.

  • [CARDS-52070]

    • The CURRENT_CYCLE tag is supported for all Functional Dates.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52130]

    • A new value, "Year", has been added to limiter period types for usage limiter templates.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Usage_Limiters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52140]

    • Checking of some contract balances, classifiers and parameters has been supported for specific contract roles.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf] [product_management\Events.pdf] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf] [product_management\Standing_Orders.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52143]

    • Ability to use some client attributes as contract parameters without their registration has been implemented. For example CLIENT.COMPANY_NAME or CLIENT.AGE can now be used as IF_PARM tag values.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf] [product_management\Events.pdf] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52330]

    • "Instead orders" processing have been enhanced: sorting by the "priority" have been added.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Standing_Orders.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52461]

    • Current Usage Limiter Template Id (usage_templ_approved.id) has been added to exception output for usage limiter-related Oracle exceptions. Example of new output: ORA-20666: caused by ORA-01476: divisor is equal to zero [];[PROCESS_LIMIT_TEMPLATE_APPROVED=2710; ]; ORA-06512: at "OWS.CUST_USAGE_IS_ACTIVE", line 32 ..... ORA-06512: at "OWS.AUTH", line 3054

  • [CARDS-53161]

    • For Transaction Types (TRANS_TYPE table) added Trans_Code unique check: - in "Transaction Types" and "Transactions - All" forms with the button Actions... -> Check All - in Message Dictionary generation with the menu OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Generate Message Dictionary.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Common_References_Books.pdf] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53266]

    • The ability to limit a custom fee amount has been added - MAX_FEE. The predefined codes SRCF, SRCT, SRCA, TGTF, TGTT, and TGTA can be used as values of the MAX_FEE_FROM tag to take the limiting amount from the base macrotransaction.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53332]

    • Product Min/Max/Default credit limit amounts can be specified by threshold tariffs.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53755]

    • A new custom procedure, CUST_EXTRA_LIM_NORM_TOP, has been implemented to redefine the top contract for extra limit normalization.

  • [CARDS-53803]

    • Correct standing orders processing for terminal contracts with same Terminal ID in different financial institutions is supported. If this duplication exists in the client configuration, the global parameter ALLOW_DUPL_TERMINAL_ID should be set to "Y". In this case, standing order documents for device contracts will be filled with additional contract search attributes: Merchant ID, Member ID and Spc Scheme for source, Member ID and Spc Scheme for target.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53949]

    • Added the ability to mark multi-currency Products with the tag MULTICURR_PRODUCT=Y. The tag should be specified in the top Product of a hierarchy. When the tag is set, additional checks will be performed when approving Products and contracts. Multi-currency Products require a separate license. Contact OpenWay Support for more details.

  • [CARDS-53956]

    • Correct standing orders processing for terminal contracts with same Terminal ID in different financial institutions is supported. If this duplication exists in the client configuration, the global parameter ALLOW_DUPL_TERMINAL_ID should be set to "Y". In this case, standing order documents for device contracts will be filled with additional contract search attributes: Merchant ID, Member ID and Spc Scheme for source, Member ID and Spc Scheme for target.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54217]

    • Calculated contract parameters can now be used for Quarterly calculations.

  • [CARDS-54275]

    • Extended information has been added to balance inquiries for multi-currency cards. The amount returned for 01 balance in authorization requests for multi-currency cards includes amounts in all currencies.

  • [CARDS-54355]

    • Re-ageing (WAIVED_PD tag) can now be used for Current Due accounts. The corresponding balance type should be marked with the WAIVED_PD tag. See documentation for details.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf] [tags description] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54412]

    • New features in balance prediction (Late Payment and interest in ToPay amount).

  • [CARDS-54602]

    • Added the ability to calculate interest with "Int By Credit" mode for limit normalization between sibling contracts in multi-currency products. The target account template used in a sibling standing order should have the "Activate Int by Credit" value in the "Calc Int Mode" field. Multi-currency products require separate licenses. Please contact OpenWay Support for more details.

  • [CARDS-54950]

    • Added the ability to use one plastic for different accounting contracts depending on the transaction date. A separate license is required.

  • [CARDS-55227]

    • Added the ability to count a document's amount as a reversal in contract balances.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf] [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf] [transaction_management\Documents.pdf]

  • [I1511267446, I1608013738]/[CARDS-51157]

    • Added ability to set ONLINE_CREDIT_PENDING for a financial institution.

  • [CARDS-46540]

    • Due normalization has been improved for Issuing accounts with Due Types: Payment Due, Long Payment Due, Contract Due, Fixed Day Due. If several due items with the same Due Date exist for an account, then only one Due transfer will be performed for the total Due Amount.

  • [CARDS-49387]

    • BT_SIMPLE algorithm has been changed.

  • [CARDS-49650]

    • Fixed incorrect ageing of delinquent amounts when the MIN_DUE or MIN_DUE_AMOUNT tag is set in the "Template Details" field of an account template. A check is required. For more information, see Client Upgrade Notes.

  • [CARDS-49864]

    • SET_CONTRACT_PARM API to set a contract parameter with Mirror To Classifier has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-49892]

    • Additional validations of the tariff domain code used for attaching a tariff domain have been added for configurations when the corresponding contract parameter has location in Classifier or Mirror To = Classifier.

    Updated Manuals: [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49971]

    • Tariff Domain contract parameter validation has been fixed for "Billing Level Only" and "Top Level Only" parameters. Additional validation of the "Location of Current Value" field value has been added: the value for such contract parameters can be "Contract" or "Classifier" only.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50005]

    • Restored the ablity to set a standard classifier when a contract parameter with the same code and "Mirror To=Classifier" option is set.

  • [CARDS-50062]

    • INTEREST_WARNING event generation has been fixed. This event is executed automatically when a financial reversal document is processed if limit normalisation was performed between the registration of the original document's posting and its reversal. This event is only generated with the PATCH_REVERSE_INTEREST=Y global parameter.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Events.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50834]

    • Now a Balance Type with "regular" HISTORY_MODE (monthly, billing, yearly) is saved in the first billing period even if the contract balance changed on the last day of the billing period. To restore previous behaviour (to save history in the next billing period) use the special tag FIRST_ENTRY_MODE=TO_NEW_CYCLE; in the "Posting Details" field - OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\Balance Types.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf] [tags description]

  • [CARDS-50876]

    • New matching keys: SicGroup, Area, Tags (DOC_TAG/DOC_TAG_VALUE, SOURCE_CHANNEL, TARGET_CHANNEL, OWN_CURR, OWN_CURR_TYPE, TRANS_FX, MAX_SETTL_AMOUNT, MIN_SETTL_AMOUNT, SIC_LIST, EXC_SIC_LIST, AUTH_TYPE) has been added to Data Capture Conditions setup.

  • [CARDS-51268]

    • Fixed processing of the ORDER_MIN_PARM tag for standing orders with BY_BATCH mode.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Standing_Orders.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51683]

    • Usage_Limiters_Css.current_status value now considers the state of Contract Classifiers, as before. When the condition is false, the value is "S" (Service Deactivated).

  • [CARDS-51878]

  • [CARDS-51954]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of usage limiter additional actions (charging a fee or opening an Event, for example) when a document is declined.

  • [CARDS-52353]

    • Corrected behaviour: now the process OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Renew All For Institution correctly approves Service Packages with additional packs: first all additional packs, then main packages.

  • [CARDS-52709]

    • Analysis of the interest_delay field has been added to interest calculation for the current CYCLE.

  • [CARDS-52926]

    • Product approval has been changed, "Product Renew Mode" form has been added.

  • [CARDS-52997]

    • FX_RATE tag calculation has been fixed for DCC Info Inquire documents, when DCC_FX_MODE=CR, and IPS currency differs from Merchant and CH currency.

  • [CARDS-53169]

    • spac.RESET_INTEREST has been enhanced for custom cases, when Interest Rate should be changed from the Billing cycle start date after holidays, if Interest Rate should be changed in a custom procedure after a new billing cycle starts.

  • [CARDS-53218]

    • Changed the value displayed in the "Total Due" field in the "ROOT\OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service" form. Previously, the field showed the current due amount. Now the total due amount is displayed.

  • [CARDS-53703]

    • Fixed usage limiter redefinition when a contract is moved to another Product.

  • [CARDS-53826]

    • Calculation of maximum fee amount with the MAX_FEE tag has been enhanced. Calculation of minimum fee amount with the MIN_FEE tag has been added.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53994]

    • Validation of contract functional dates Late Payment Date (LP_DATE) and Full Payment Date (FP_DATE) has been enhanced for Set and Recalculate operations. The new value of these dates should be equal to or less than the contract's Next Billing Date + 1 day if the previous value met this condition. When Late Payment Date or Full Payment Date equals Next Billing Date + 1, it means that the LP event or FP event will proceed right before Billing.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54439]

    • A new global parameter, FROM_SEC_TRANS_DATE has been added to regulate behaviour of entry posting by transaction date (when FROM_TRANS_DATE configuration is used in services/transaction subtypes) for secondary documents. If FROM_SEC_TRANS_DATE = 'Y' (default behaviour) a secondary document's entries will be created with their own transaction date ('Sec Trans Date" document field). If FROM_SEC_TRANS_DATE = 'N', entries will be created with the original document transaction date ("Trans Date" document field).

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54550]

    • Enhanced due normalization for accounts with Due Type = "Contract Due" when the calculated date is a holiday according to the business calendar defined in the Account Scheme or Financial Institution, and when every calendar day is opened with the Contract Daily Updates process. In this case, Due normalization will be performed on the first working day after the holidays according to this business calendar. For due normalization, it is not recommended to use Functional Dates which may be a holiday. It is recommended to shift the resulting date to a working day.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54695]

    • Now due macrotransactions processed using a standing order are linked to a standing order document only for acquiring contracts. For issuing contracts, due macrotransactions are not linked and item_due records are not closed as it interferes with backdated processing.

  • [CARDS-54979]

    • Added amendment information refresh on approve of Products, Service Packs and Account Schemes linked with a template record (Product Template, Parent Pack, Parent Scheme).

  • [CARDS-55316]

    • Added a new action, "Refresh Product List" to the forms "Acq Main Contract.srd", "Iss Main Contract.srd", and "Iss Main Contract - Corp.srd". This action makes it possible to refresh the list of allowed products for the current contract, if contract has the approval status "No"

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55919]

    • Corrected client and parent contract status check when creating a contract manually or using Advanced Application R2. When the client or parent contract has an invalid status, contract approve will fail with an error.

  • [CARDS-56076]

    • Fixed No Data Found error for Interest by Credit for Sibling Orders processing.

  • [CARDS-56164]

    • Added closing of related card contracts (except Applet-Contracts) when the base contract is closed.

  • [CARDS-56408]

    • Corrected the WAY4 Manager "CS.Set Client Classifier" form: now it is synchronised with the similar DB Manager form.

  • [CARDS-56809]

    • Corrected behaviour of the SAVE_PAYMENT_FROM tag when there is a small underpayment for a card contract.

  • [I1606205888]/[CARDS-50255]

    • Additional condition by action_code = 'ORDER' for the link "Order Docs" at the forms All Usage Actions.srd, Storno.Events.srd, Usage Action.srd is added.

  • [I1606276157]/[CARDS-50225]

    • Doubling entries in EVNT_MSG_MEMO table for client and contractor messages fixed.

  • [I1607132625]/[CARDS-50318]

    • In form "Standing Order Personal", the fields "Payment Type" and "Date Event" are now available for editing if the order type is not defined as "UNIQUE INHERITED".
