    • VISA VCR: Added new Reason Codes. Contact Support for details.

  • [CARDS-52651]

    • Added Message Channels "Q" and "q" for IPS Mercury. Added Mercury Premium and Mercury Non-Premium products to IPS Products.

  • [CARDS-53131]

    • VISA BII Inward Processing: supported custom processing for TCRD records. If a TCRD record is present in an incoming transaction, it can be processed by the CUST_INS_DOC procedure.

  • [CARDS-53425]

    • VISA BASEII Inward Processing: supported import of new TC33 BASE II Dispute Financial Status Advice messages.

  • [CARDS-53426]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-541 Global Mandatory 2.7. "Authorization Source Code" field in outgoing BASE II presentments is filled according to new rules described in the article. The global parameter "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" must be set. From VISA release 17.4 and later, the global parameter VISA_PRC_TA will become obsolete.

  • [CARDS-53427]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-517 Global Optional 4.2. Implemented changes to allow issuers to receive a new data element "recipient name" in BASE II clearing records for OCT transactions. This field is stored in the "RPNA" tag.

  • [CARDS-53549]

    • VISA Release Oct17-522 CEMEA Mandatory 8.2.1: interchange reimbursement fees (IRF) for staged digital wallet transactions in Russia have been supported.

  • [CARDS-53567]

    • VISA VCF Export (pipe): added new "GET_CARDS_HINT", "GET_CARDS_IDS_HINT", "GET_CARDHOLDERS_HINT" pipe parameters to define Oracle hints for appropriate query optimization. If parameters are set, values must contain the entire hint including comment symbols, for example GET_CARDS_HINT=/*+cardinality(card 20)*/

  • [CARDS-53972]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-513 Global Mandatory 2.14, VISA BASEII Inward Processing (pipe): new "PAYMENT ACCOUNT REFERENCE" field is stored in the database field "safe_doc.details" if it is present in an incoming TC40 message.

  • [CARDS-53973]

    • Supported changes to the enhanced TC 33 Acquirer Capture File. Added new fields and new values and changed existing fields to existing TCR records. Implemented Money Transfer Data processing for original credit transactions(OCTs)

  • [CARDS-54031]

    • [VISA REL v.2] Oct17-541 Global Mandatory 2.7. Field "Authorization Source Code" in outgoing BII presentments is filled according to new rules, described in article. Global parameter "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" must be set.

  • [CARDS-54073]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-588 has been supported. Updating personalization data of tokens in 3730 message has been added.

  • [CARDS-54107]

    • VISA Fee Collection/Funds Transfer Reason Codes. Changed description for reason code 0150 to "Recovered card handling fees or rewards and ATM BI acquiring direct fee returns". Also revised all Fee Collection/Funds Transfer Reason Codes.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54114]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-558 Global Optional 4.3. VISA Outward Processing (pipe): for transactions with TAVV, but without CAVV, the "7" value is exported in the "Mail/Phone/Electronic Commerce and Payment Indicator" field.

  • [CARDS-54120]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-505 2.3, VISA Interface (clearing): supported database currencies overrides. "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" additional global parameter must be set to use this functionality. Affiliated BII interface uses its own channel override.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\20XX_XX_VISA_Requirements.pdf.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54148]

    • VISA: Added subregion CISSEE according to Release 17.4 article Oct17-600 (8.2.2).

  • [CARDS-54204]

    • [VISA REL] Oct17-505 2.3, VISA Interface: "VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File" and "VISA Loading SMS Acknowledgments" pipes now support database currency overrides. The "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" additional global parameter must be set to use this functionality. Affiliated BII interface uses its own channel override.

  • [CARDS-54307]

    • VISA BASEII Inward Processing, Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing (pipes): Original Credit Transactions will be imported as Notifications based on the "VISA_FAST_FUNDS" additional global parameter and "Fast Funds Indicator" field in an incoming transaction. The "FF_TO_NOTIF" tag from the BIN table and "FF_TO_NOTIF_DEF" pipe parameter are not analyzed anymore. Notification will be converted to Advice by DataBase if necessary.

  • [CARDS-54443]

    • Implemented service to export Initial Data load files and subsequent Update files from issuer to VAU.

  • [CARDS-54481]

    • Added support of new Initial and Update Data Load Response files import for Visa Account Updater service.

  • [CARDS-54515]

    • VAU/MABU: Added workflow to correct sent or rejected Issuer messages.

  • [CARDS-54834]

    • [VISA REL v.3] Oct17-541 Global Mandatory 2.7. "Authorization Source Code" field in outgoing BASE II presentments is filled according to new rules described in the article. The global parameter "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" must be set. From VISA release 17.4 and later, the global parameter VISA_PRC_TA will become obsolete.

  • [CARDS-54882]

    • VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File : [VISA REL v.3] Oct 17-582 Global Mandatory by Participation 3.15 Changes to the Enhanced TC 33 Acquirer Capture File. Added new fields and new values and changed existing fields to existing TCR records. Implemented Money Transfer Data processing for original credit transactions (OCTs).

  • [CARDS-54945]

    • VISA VCF Export: Added condition: if pipe parameters ADD_FIELDS_4, ADD_FIELDS_6 contain tags F72, F92, F12, the mandatory fields client First Name, Last Name, and Company Name can be omitted in uploaded records.

  • [CARDS-54996]

    • Added the new pipe parameter TEST_MODE=Y (valid values: "Y"/"N"(default)) to enable the test mode for debugging uploaded data in VCF Export.

  • [CARDS-55069]

    • VISA VCF Export: added pipe parameter PERIOD_ID_FORMAT. Valid values: F, L. F (default value) - period ID is calculated from the beginning of the current billing period. L - period ID is calculated from the end of the previous billing period.

  • [CARDS-55203]

    • Updated VISA SMS: when posting a Fee Collections document, the system adds now the NETWORK_ID tag with proper value "0004" or "0002" to the document add_info field. The value is then used to fill in F63.1.

  • [CARDS-55263]

    • Renamed "Number of Active Cards" field to "Number of Active Cards (at least one transaction)" in "Card Issuance" section of XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report and added new "Number of Active Cards (at least one Contactless transaction)" field.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-55807]

    • VISA Acquirer Capture Import: supported import of Multiple Clearing Sequence Number and Multiple Clearing Count into the CLR_SEQ_NUM and CLR_SEQ_COUNT tags.

  • [CARDS-56090]

    • Added a new parameter DISABLE_CHECK_CLIENT for the VISA VCF Export pipe. Valid values are "Y" and "N" (default). If this parameter is set to "Y", verification of T4 Cardholder records duplication is disabled.

  • [CARDS-56557]

    • Added the TOTAL_TRN_NUM tag for VSS120 documents. The tag has the value from the "First Count" field (TC46 TCR 1 Report Subgroup = 4). VISA BASEII Inward processing.

  • [CARDS-56736]

    • Added tag SENT_BY_TGT=Y for incoming TC33 VCR advices where Originator Recipient Indicator = "O" (for "outgoing" transactions).

  • [I1510277050]/[CARDS-48484]

    • RA configuration has been modified for CEMEA and Russia.

  • [I1609197138]/[CARDS-51333]

    • VISA RA and Tariffs calculation: Now the additional global parameter VISA_CALC_RA can contain a comma separated list of alpha codes of acquiring countries for which the system must calculate RA/Tariffs.

  • [I1611286121]/[CARDS-51384]

    • RA configuration has been modified for EU region.

  • [I1612120086]/[CARDS-51705]

    • In the "Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report, added new parameter P_CEMEA for grouping "Acquirer Data" and "MOTO (Mail and Telephone Order) Data" sections by regional tiers.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [I1612213707]/[CARDS-51675]

    • RA configuration and interchange tariffs have been modified for Portugal.

  • [I1612266331]/[CARDS-51667]

    • RA configuration has been modified for Interregional transactions.

  • [I1702080176]/[CARDS-54790]

    • Added display of VISA FRS Reject/Warning codes. These codes are saved in the SAFE_DOC.detail field. Format: RC1=<code 1>;RC2=<code2>;

  • [I1703091921]/[CARDS-52543]

    • Modified RA configuration and IC tariffs for Ireland according to VISA requirements published on 2 March 2017.

  • [I1710317086]/[CARDS-56502]

    • Changed the VISA_FAST_FUNDS additional global parameter default value from the existing value "Y" to a new value "A". If VISA_FAST_FUNDS is set to "A", all original credit transactions will be converted into notifications regardless of the Fast Funds Indicator value. For all other transactions, the processing logic remains unchanged. The changes affect the VISA Base II Inward Processing and Affiliated Base II Inward Processing pipes. Please see CUN for required additional actions.

  • [I1711030543, I1711172189]/[CARDS-55721]

    • Added the configuration to calculate VISA Reimbursement Attribute for Ukraine.

    Updated Manuals: [visa_interface\VISA_RA_Configuration.pdf]

    WAY4 Web

  • [DBK-2697]

    • Checking W4Web components privileges has been changes. See manuals.

    Updated Manuals: [W4W\doc\Web_Client\Language\System_Core\Officers_and_Grants.pdf]

  • [DBK-2722]

    • Checking W4Web components privileges has been changes. See manuals.

    Updated Manuals: [W4W\doc\Web_Client\Language\System_Core\Officers_and_Grants.pdf]

  • [DBK-2841]

    • Added OFFICER_GROUP_CODE and LOAD_USRGRP_UNMATCHED_ROWS parameters to layout export/import pipes. These parameters define filtering and matching of officers and groups for layout creators.

  • [DBK-2981]

    • Added OFFICER_GROUP_CODE and LOAD_USRGRP_UNMATCHED_ROWS parameters to layout export/import pipes. These parameters define filtering and matching of officers and groups for layout creators.

  • [CARDS-52573]

    • 1.Application processing error in Delete Usage action has been fixed. 2. Application processing of tagged fields has been restored.

  • [CARDS-52808]

    • In WAY4 Web added check of client privileges to access uploaded files and merchant tree contracts.

  • [DBK-2201]

    • Now audit log is active by default. To exclude, set AUDIT_MODE='N' To include for a particular group, set AUDIT_MODE for this group.

  • [DBK-2900]

    • Fixed W4W grants incorrect behaviour (to exclude situations when access to a component is denied, but it is visible in the UI).

  • [DBK-2974]

    • WAY4Web layout import pipe behaviour has changed: existing wx_scheme layouts are NOT deleted by default now.

  • [DBK-3410]

    • W4W logout in DP/HA configuration does not result into errors in WS Runtime logs in FINISH_OPERATION_PRIM

  • [I1708301443]/[CARDS-54853]

    • Fixed calculation of W4Web grants in officer groups using local variables.

  • [CARDS-53009]

    • WAY4 Web: a requirement for the value of the EnableDeveloperInfo parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.

  • [CARDS-53083]

    • Password complexity requirements can now be added as parameters for WAY4Web user authentication scheme.

    WAY4 manager

  • [WM-2859]

    • Flag 'Escape Parameters' is now available for editing in MenuItem's editor - for subitems of ExeFile type.

  • [WM-2862]

    • If there are any changes in the data area that have not been applied, the user management dialog (OpenWay.Full.DB Administrator Utilities.Users & Grants.User Groups and Users - Edit) will warn the user when OK is pressed.

  • [WM-2866]

    • Redundant line with grants for the "Sql cycle" menu item has been deleted.

  • [WM-2871]

    • Button "Cancel" has been added into forms synchronization window

  • [WM-2909]

    • Way4 Manager - Main menu item's context action "Copy path to clipboard" uses '\' as path separator.

  • [WM-2990]

    • History tables display active record first.

  • [WM-3083]

    • Oracle table name is no longer available for Clerks via Design > Information.

  • [WM-3093]

    • New option SHOW_ERROR_STACK_TRACE has been supported in OW_WORK\DB.ini. It allows error stack traces to be shown/hidden from Clerk users.

  • [WM-3094]

    • Oracle table name is no longer available for Clerks via Design > Information.

  • [I1611172704]/[WM-2981]

    • SQL executor manages query history safely.

  • [WM-2898]

    • WAY4 Manager password processing has been changed to fire an error when forbidden characters are used.

  • [WM-2908]

    • Actions in forms with "no_save" now save data after additions.

  • [WM-2926]

    • It is prohibited to edit Way4Web and other special user groups in WAY4 Manager.

  • [WM-2928]

    • Password encryption feature has been fixed: both plain and encrypted passwords are verified through Oracle password policies.

  • [WM-2939]

    • Closing modal form without data has been fixed

  • [WM-2944]

  • [WM-2949]

    • Edit mask value from a domain can be used.

  • [WM-2986]

    • User notification is improved for errors in password changing.

  • [I1603071865]/[WM-2857]

    • Fixed bug with incorrect form refresh after subitem Up/Down operations in menu item editor.

  • [I1604142526]/[WM-2882]

    • Fixed problem creating history records for forms without "can save".

  • [I1604259041]/[WM-2897]

    • Enabling Condition script generation has been fixed in dataforms.

  • [I1606081236]/[WM-2921]

    • Bug has been fixed: records are deleted successfully.

  • [I1611303231]/[WM-2980]

    • Functioning of form editor/column editor has been improved.

  • [I1703314633]/[WM-3049]

    • MessageBox menu item step has been switched to OPW message formatting protocol.

  • [I1704039532]/[WM-3064]

    • Master-details interface behaviour has been fixed: master selection change causes correct details view content update.

  • [I1704055962, I1704055907]/[WM-3035]

    • Menu Item editor has been fixed: <parameter> inclusions can be used in Parameters and Name fields.

  • [I1706133104]/[WM-3066]

    • [Design/Open data form] context popup menu action is no longer available for modal forms.

  • [I1706209051]/[WM-3063]

    • Cyclic behaviour has been restored for the tree search tool: if the search is over downwards/upwards it is immediately restarted from top down/bottom up.

  • [I1712209189]/[WM-3140]

    • Fixed procedure of password changing to cover the natural expiration case.

  • [I1801176554]/[WM-3157]

    • Fixed default name assignment for a menu item.

    Web banking

  • [I1610123173]/[CARDS-50603]

    • Problem with recurring payments appearing in web banking multiple times has been resolved.

  • [CARDS-53176]

    • PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Lifestyle Banking section has been updated (information about play.id and %padss.application.mode=prod has been added).

    Web services

  • [CARDS-51680]

    • New menu branches have been added: OpenWay\Web Services and OpenWay\Way4Web. The "WS Users & Grants" menu branch has been moved from OpenWay\System\DB Administrator Utilities to these new menu branches; the linked menu OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\WS Users & Grants has been removed. For more details, see the section "Client Upgrade Notes on Impact changes".

    e-Commerce acquiring

  • [CARDS-49880]

    • Added API to create TD_DOC in case of unsuccessful authentication.

  • [CARDS-50420]

    • Added merchant currency and terminal information support to EGW interface

  • [CARDS-51111]

    • Transaction Processing: Luhn digit check condition.

  • [CARDS-54171]

    • Implemented the license for AFT transactions with single debit document and C07,C52,AA, and PP transaction application codes.

    e-Commerce issuing

  • [CARDS-49676]

    • Preferred counterparties (used for services and usage limiters) processing has been redesigned. See documentation for details.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Preferred_Counterparties.pdf]

  • [I1607043388]/[CARDS-50717]

    • Authentication scheme's parameters processing utilities has been refactored for better usability

  • [CARDS-50800]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of usage limiters with special condition containing tags CHANGE_IP and CHANGE_COUNTRY.

  • [CARDS-53387]

    • Discontinued saving of unnecessary data in td_doc.posting_details for RBA request processing.

  • [I1705026827]/[CARDS-53413]

    • Fixed incorrect counter value calculation for RBA rules.

    Changes Grouped by Releases

    Change types:

    • Added New Feature
    • Changed Feature
    • Fixed Bug
    • New Task
    • Sub-task
    • Support of Payment System Release Requirements
    • Standard Configuration Update
    • Backporting
    • Information Note

    Cards

    • 03.44.31.10
      • CARDS-57275 [ATM management] Changed amout format in report ATM Dispense from NNNGNNNGNNNGNN0D00 to NNNGNNNGNNNGNN0DNN
      • I1803204099 [CB Gate] [CARDS-57166] Corrected inability to run cb_gate_balance_load by clerk with password which contains xml-forbidden characters
      • [DBK-3642] Fixed incorrect activation of default service on the primary node after the node has been set unavailable from a secondary node
      • [DBK-3716] Some changes of dynamic tables were rejected when the same row tries to be inserted by two Way4R threads at the same time
      • [CARDS-57123] Supported sending stop list messages to MasterCard via Host2Host channel.
      • [CARDS-57134] Fixed an incorrect system behaviour when copying a financial institution: if the "Numeration Scheme" field's value is set for the target financial institution, it is not duplicated from the source financial institution.
      • I1801241324 [CARDS-57194] DA R2: Added case amounts recalculation for moving documents.
      • I1803134990 [CARDS-57133] Corrected Interest Calculation for Interest Scheme = "-360" and Interest Delay = Yes when turnover is present for the last day of February.
    • 03.44.31.09
      • CARDS-56958 [Statistical Reports] Added directory with configuration data file for filter "MIR Statistics Reports"
      • CARDS-56747 [Statistical Reports] Changed default P_TITLE parameter value for reports GL_Trial_Balance.rdf - into "Account Trial GL Balance" Trial Balance.rdf - into "Account Trial Balance" Trial_Balance.rdf - into "Trial Account Balance"
      • CARDS-56811 [Distributed processing] Implemented additional validation of FX sequence for Secondary node of Distributed Processing when FX sequence is searching on Issuing Authorization. If last FX sequence was not found or has invalid state, the the last valid FX Sequence will be used in Authorization.
      • CARDS-56990 [QR Payments] Supported currency overrides.
      • CARDS-57012 [Product inspector] Added processing of empty tags "TRANS_COND_ATTR", "SEC_TRANS_COND_ATT" values in test_script_import pipe.
      • [CARDS-56736] Added tag SENT_BY_TGT=Y for incoming TC33 VCR advices where Originator Recipient Indicator = "O" (for "outgoing" transactions).
      • [CARDS-56672] Fixed interchange routing search on repost of an incoming document when routing by forwarding member is used.
      • [CARDS-56753] Added a new variable for client message notifications: %DFLT_TRANS_TYPE% It returns Transaction Name value from mess_dict without language translations.
      • [CARDS-56809] Corrected behaviour of the SAVE_PAYMENT_FROM tag when there is a small underpayment for a card contract.
      • [CARDS-56862] Fixed error which lead to incorrect standing order transfer replication from secondary HA node to primary one
      • [CARDS-56868] Corrected item intersection if backdated processing done after account scheme changes apply.
      • [DBK-3569] Optimized standard data creation during configuration export.
      • [DBK-3575] Big latancy in Way4R in case of 'unique constraint violated'
      • I1801176554 [WM-3157] Fixed default name assignment for a menu item.
    • 03.44.31.08
      • CARDS-56616 [MasterCard interface] Supported database currencies overrides for the MasterCard CDF interface.
      • CARDS-56671 [MasterCard interface] Added the ability to skip export of unchanged corporations for the MasterCard CDF Export interface.
      • CARDS-56735 [NSPK interface] Added the ability to run several NSPK Export processes in parallel.
      • [CARDS-56676] Supported check of filling the first 16 symbols of the TC05TCR3 Data Content field for an affiliate's downloaded documents when this TCR3 is not used for an addendum (no tag AT). A warning message is written to the process log. Pipe affected: Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing.cpp
      • [CARDS-56688] Fixed VCR Dispute Condition field processing in inward BASE II TCx5-x7 messages. VCR Dispute Condition is trimmed now.
      • I1801243168 [CARDS-56639] Fixed the "Empty Merchant Country Code Field" issue in downloaded TC52 Retrieval Requests in VISA and Affiliated BASE II inward pipes. Pipes affected: Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing.dll VISA BASEII Inw History Processing.dll VISA BASEII Inward Processing.dll
      • I1802071449 [CARDS-56715] Saving of Instalment plans state on billing is now regulated by global parameter INST_BILLING_HISTORY (could be redefined on Financial Institution). Default value of parameter is Y and instalment plans state stored to INVOICE_LOG_HISTORY table on billing to be used on statement generation. To turn off saving this data, parameter should be set to N.
      • [CARDS-54717] Changed the result of a value returned by the %TRANS_REASON_DETAILS% variable. Now it returns the whole text from the doc.reason_details field instead of text from doc.add_info.
      • [CARDS-56047] Optimized financial document check if authorization was not found. No checks are performed if a document was created by the acquiring authorization procedure and processed for an external target. In other cases, search for a presentment with the same authorization code is limited to 10 days from the transaction date.
      • [CARDS-56644] Improved the ClientAdditionalInfo and ContractAdditionalInfo applications in the Advanced Applications R2 module. Now tags in the "AddInfoXX" fields can be processed separately.
      • [CARDS-56684] Fixed incorrect processing of message for CBS on secondary HA node
      • [CARDS-56686] Added accounting of message direction into algorithm of message code parsing and generation.
      • [CARDS-56690] Postponed accept of financial document if the corresponding authorization is loaded from a secondary node and not yet processed.
      • [CARDS-56694] Restored translation of %TRANS_TYPE% calculated variable to the language defined in the client record in client notification message templates. The problem with this variable was only observed in versions 03.44.31.06-07, 03.45.30.53-56, 03.46.30.05-08.
      • [CARDS-56706] Corrected custom fee amount inheritance from an authorization document for adjustment documents in SMS mode, when "FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT;" tag is used in the corresponding custom fee.
      • [CARDS-56727] Corrected filling doc.change_version for rejected documents on HA secondary node
      • [CARDS-56749] Corrected handling of events with Duration Type = "Billing" in backdated processing.
      • [CARDS-56774] Fixed creation of Interbranch Routing records between source and target financial institutions when copying Interbranch Routing from the source institution to the target institution.
      • 03.45.30.22 [CARDS-56660] Fixed processing of a duplicate chargeback document when a presentment reversal was declined. Duplicate chargeback documents are no longer declined in such situations.
      • I1710090102 [CARDS-56487] Improved performance for the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report by using data prepared before running the report.
    • 03.44.31.07
      • I1801165374 [Diners Club interface] [CARDS-56538] Corrected behaviour for DCI Clearing Import and DCI Inward Processing. Now ATM Service Fee transactions are processed as special Misc transactions. Previously they were processed as general ATM transactions.
      • I1801291030 [CARDS-56617] Now if the AMEX GNS Outward pipe parameter MERCHANT_FEE_CODE is specified but there are no special Merchant Fee tags in a document, the pipe exports this document as a document without Merchant Fee.
      • [CARDS-56465] Implemented the ability to set the "BASE_TARIFF" tag for tariffs that are Base Tariffs themselves.
      • [CARDS-55426] Added check of received card data values on IRouter even if security values are absent in the message.
      • [CARDS-56588] Corrected handling of suspended events created in current billing cycle in backdated processing.
      • [CARDS-56601] Corrected the logic for checking contract groups for a case when an acquiring MEMBER_ID changed during the reporting period. Now transactions are split into two groups by MEMBER_ID. This may downgrade performance of statistics collecting.
      • [CARDS-56560] Fixed error processing for zero rates loading. Added a new error category "Insert FX Error" for inserting error messages. RBS FX Rates Import, RBS FX Rates Import for future.
    • 03.44.31.06
      • [CARDS-56558] Supported saving of the Settlement Flag from TC 33 into the SFLG tag in a document. Pipes: Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing, VISA BASEII Inward Processing.
      • [CARDS-56557] Added the TOTAL_TRN_NUM tag for VSS120 documents. The tag has the value from the "First Count" field (TC46 TCR 1 Report Subgroup = 4). VISA BASEII Inward processing.
      • [CARDS-56496] Implemented Visa BAI AA support for Account-to-Person Credit money requests when the debited Account (CPID) cannot be routed in our system (an eWallet number, for instance).
      • [CARDS-56542] Corrected the format of the "E2.CB" bertlv tag that contains an instalment type on authorisation response.
      • I1712209189 [WM-3140] Fixed procedure of password changing to cover the natural expiration case.
    • 03.44.31.05
      • I1801177190 [Diners Club interface] [CARDS-56533] Fixed converting document SIC code to DCI "Charge Type" field in DCI Outward pipe. Previously the pipe couldn't find "Charge Type" for SIC codes starting with zero.
      • [CARDS-56478] Extended collecting information about System Instances into statistic CMS group "PARMS", node "INSTANCE_ROLE" with current schema name and schema roles.
      • [CARDS-56535] Fixed calculation of previous billing date in Reversal Management when "Apply Account Scheme Changes" was applied during the same billing cycle.
      • I1801189477 [CARDS-56519] Corrected response processing on IRouter to stop sending unnecessary reversal when RC=91 is received.
      • [DBK-3410] W4W logout in DP/HA configuration does not result into errors in WS Runtime logs in FINISH_OPERATION_PRIM
      • I1710317086 [CARDS-56502] Changed the VISA_FAST_FUNDS additional global parameter default value from the existing value "Y" to a new value "A". If VISA_FAST_FUNDS is set to "A", all original credit transactions will be converted into notifications regardless of the Fast Funds Indicator value. For all other transactions, the processing logic remains unchanged. The changes affect the VISA Base II Inward Processing and Affiliated Base II Inward Processing pipes. Please see CUN for required additional actions.
      • [UFX-502] Supported Preferred fields TimeInterval, WeekDays, WorkDay for Application and Contract Information requests.
    • 03.44.31.04
      • CARDS-56298 [QR Payments] Implemented import of Alipay clearing files.
      • CARDS-56197 [Diners Club interface] Fixed processing transaction type for historical data. DCI Clearing Import, DCI Inward Processing.
      • CARDS-56199 [Diners Club interface] Fixed processing of historical data. DCI Clearing Import, DCI Inward Processing.
      • CARDS-56200 [Diners Club interface] Fixed processing ARN filter for historical data import. DCI Clearing Import, DCI Inward Processing.
      • CARDS-56408 [Product management] Corrected the WAY4 Manager "CS.Set Client Classifier" form: now it is synchronised with the similar DB Manager form.
      • CARDS-56459 [MasterCard interface] Fixed loading files containing "eof" symbol. MABU Issuer Response File Import.
      • I1711090861 [CB Gate] [CARDS-56412] Fixed exception "com.openwaygroup.pkgj.cliint.IStnd is undefined in the context" in cb_gate_balance_load pipe.
      • I1712227712 [Bill payments] [CARDS-56335] Added creation of a historical record in sy_handbook table when IssFeeCode is updated with a ProvidePaymentReceiverDetailsRequest.
      • CARDS-56441 [QR Payments] Added the menu "OpenWay\Alipay".
      • CARDS-56453 [Diners Club interface] Removed EMPTY field from Recap Header Message (rollbacked issue CARDS-42749). DCI Outwards Processing, DCI Clearing Import.
      • I1711091288 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-56053] Supported MasterCard requirements Q1 2018 in the XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business report. Transaction data is reported in two separate forms: acquiring debit, acquiring credit.
      • [CARDS-55567] Implemented extended logging of backdated processing results. Classifier and balance differences after backdated processing can be logged based on the STORNO_LOG_OBJECTS global parameter. The parameter value is a list of required object types delimited by commas: C - classifiers (default value), B - balances. To log both classifiers and balances C,B should be set as the parameter value.
      • [CARDS-56429] Corrected export of GL corrections when backdated processing is performed several times for the same period and the global parameter STORNO_AUTO_HIDE_GL_CORRECTION=Y is set.
      • [CARDS-56432] Added a new value "XF Entry" for the DDDW "Entry Type"
      • [CARDS-56433] Supported the High Precision transfers in the "Full \ Documents Input & Update \ Doc - General Form \ All Docs \ [Srvc / Fees]" form.
      • [CARDS-56473] Improved Fleet bertlv message content returned to terminal in the case of an acquiring processing error. Item response codes values added.
      • [CARDS-56492] Removed trace messages on routing search that were written even if trace was off.
      • [CARDS-56493] Fixed instalment plan recalculation for billing day change in backdated processing if an instalment has no interest-based fees.
      • I1701109043 [CARDS-56360] Fixed rounding of "BASE_RATE" and "FX_MARKUP_PCT" tag values in DCC Info Inquire documents when default DCC conversion mode "IPS" is used.
      • I1708067216, I1710023006, I1801126919 [CARDS-56400] Corrected processing of timeout reversals with unexpected transaction id (ps_ref_number).
      • I1712288846 [CARDS-56343] Fixed incorrect processing of authorisation requests. An authorisation will no longer be rejected if two similar Warning messages occurred.
      • I1801043828 [CARDS-56349] Corrected how the reversal entries of adjustment documents are shown in the "Merchant Statement Standing Order Entry Details" report when only the fee from adjustment is included in the statement. Fixed the optional ACQ_PAYMENT functionality which prepares data for external merchant statements.
      • I1801224994 [CARDS-56482] Corrected inheritance of custom fee amount from authorisation document if amount calculated on authorisation was zero.
      • [DBK-3417] Fixed an error when deferred apply did not skip tasks if WAY4 Replication was late.
    • 03.44.31.03
      • CARDS-55702 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: supported export of closed (Lost/Stolen) cards.
      • CARDS-55968 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export 1) Modified period ID calculation: if the PERIOD_ID_FORMAT pipe parameter is set to "L", current period ID equals the last day of the previous period for all record types. 2) Added the new pipe parameter DISABLE_CHECK_CLIENT with the default value "N". If this parameter is set to "Y", verify that duplicate T4 Cardholder records are disabled.
      • CARDS-56118 [SEPA interface] Added check for SOURCE MEMBER ID and TARGET CODE to SEPA Customer to bank export. If these fields are null, an error message is written in the process log and the document is skipped.
      • CARDS-56158 [Statistical Reports] Corrected calculation of "Interest Rates" section in the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • CARDS-56090 [VISA interface] Added a new parameter DISABLE_CHECK_CLIENT for the VISA VCF Export pipe. Valid values are "Y" and "N" (default). If this parameter is set to "Y", verification of T4 Cardholder records duplication is disabled.
      • I1711138961 [Data preparation and card personalization] [CARDS-55913] Added Issuer Script for updating C5 tag value to "NSPC MIR Generic" Chip Scheme Template.
      • [CARDS-56169] Excluded use of a bank account contract as a case contract when a new case for a document is created in a domain with the "Acquiring" category.
      • [CARDS-55865] Added analysis of the "On Us" transaction property when calculating "Number of Active cards" in the XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Issuing_Business_Prepared report.
      • [CARDS-56129] Corrected a flat fee calculation for the "Payment Holidays" action if the current plan has overdue portions.
      • [CARDS-56135] Excluded balance duplicates in the "Account Balances" section of the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • [CARDS-56164] Added closing of related card contracts (except Applet-Contracts) when the base contract is closed.
      • [CARDS-56250] Fixed incorrect document reprocessing after replication to HA solution primary node when request and reversal was received in wrong order.
      • [CARDS-56309] Added the ability for documents from "Hotel", "Airline" and "Car rental" SIC groups to be excluded from consideration as multi-clearing/multi-authorisation transactions by setting the global parameter MULTI_AUTH_STRICT=Y (default value is "N"). In this case, if a transaction is not specified as multi-clearing it will be considered as a normal transaction, with no additional processing for multi-capture/multi-authorisations. The AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT_RETAIL parameter will be used to define the possible difference between an authorisation and financial presentment for total funds unblocking instead of the AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT parameter used for multiple mode transactions.
      • I1711290412 [CARDS-55791] Increased the number of digits (from 30 to 32) in the "Reference Number" field of the GL Transfer table to avoid uniqueness collisions.
      • I1712183916 [CARDS-56115] Changed sub-case creation when moving a document from one financial case to another. Now it calls the activity to create a new sub-case for the document for the target case if there is no such sub-case for the source case. Otherwise, the sub-case will be re-subordinated for the target case.
      • [DBK-3369] Fixed the error "A record has been changed without creating a doc" on Primary.
      • I1712122265 [DBK-3363] Fixed issue: now Housekeeping deletes Addendum Doc data related to expired Doc.
    • 03.44.31.02
      • [CARDS-56076] Fixed No Data Found error for Interest by Credit for Sibling Orders processing.
      • [DBK-3332] Added a new global parameter, DM_ID_CACHE_LEN. This parameter defines the size of cache of dm_record.id values. The default value is 20. Increase this value if row lock contention on num_seq_range occurs during high volume of inserting into dm_record.
    • 03.44.31.01
      • I1711241438 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-55804] Endless loop while iterating contracts tree has been fixed
      • [CARDS-54776] Fleet transactions reposting by selection has been implemented in the OpenWay\Full\Documents Input & Update\Documents Troubleshooting\Documents - Repost by Selection form.
      • [CARDS-54943] Corrected Process Messages for creation of consistency points with the CLOSE_GL consistency type. They no longer mention WAY4 Datamart. Starting from WAY4 Cards version 03.45.30, the POINT_TYPE tag in the mp_consist_type.add_info field is expected to differentiate consistency points used by WAY4 Datamart (POINT_TYPE tag with the "DM" value) and those used by WAY4 Cards (POINT_TYPE tag has the "C" value). For WAY4 Cards version 03.44.30, mention of WAY4 Datamart has been excluded for creation of consistency points with the CLOSE_GL consistency type.
      • [CARDS-54959] Supported FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT mode for custom fees. Other values of the FROM_AUTH tag are not supported. If the blocked Fee Amount currency differs from the posting Fee Amount currency, conversion is made according to custom fee Service rules.
      • [CARDS-55005] FeeMin, FeeMax tariff attributes has been supported for fleet cards fee calculation process. Only applicable to fees defined as transaction price percent.
      • [CARDS-55110] Increased doc.ps_ref_number field length to 255 characters.
      • [CARDS-55120] New actions for balance recalculation, that can be initiated using the menu item "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Recalc Balances for Contracts" have been added: Balance Turnover Initialization for Contract and Balance Turnover Initialization for Product.
      • [CARDS-55144] Added the ability to keep properties (e.g. amount) of an event-based fee in backdated processing. The STORNO_FEE_ACTION=REAPPLY tag should be configured in the special parameters field of the event type.
      • [CARDS-55222] Included markup fee in principal amount when creating an instalment plan for a transaction.
      • [CARDS-55227] Added the ability to count a document's amount as a reversal in contract balances.
      • [CARDS-55551] Added the ability to take an instalment fee amount from a custom fee. The tag SERVICE_FEE=<list of fee codes> should be added to instalment fee special parameters. If the fee should be taken from a contra service, the additional tag CONTRA_SERVICE should be also set. Only an instalment fee with a flat fee calculation scheme can be based on a service, however it can be of any fee category (ordinary fee, merchant fee, extra fee and so on).
      • [CARDS-55790] Added device name (WSP_DEVNAME), device ID (WSP_DEVID) and last four digits of mobile phone number (WSP_L4DIG) saving in the database as token parameters on MDES / VTS enrolment.
      • [CARDS-53774] Fixed balance amount calculation for Balance Type with BY_CURR tag specified in Standing Order.
      • [CARDS-54486] Fixed system behaviour for balance type with history mode: after using backdated processing functionality, MAX amount counter calculation has been corrected.
      • [CARDS-54539] Corrected system behaviour for balance type with history mode = Billing when saving history records if billing falls on the second day of the year and the first day is a holiday.
      • [CARDS-55085] Corrected instalment plan recalculation on billing change when interest capitalization is used and interest for an additional first period shift has not yet been paid or capitalized.
      • [CARDS-55111] Corrected Oracle hint for API acnt_api.LEAVE_LAST_N_RECORDS().
      • [CARDS-55152] Fixed error when macrotransactions were duplicated for acquiring documents. The error occurred when a "PostAuth" document was processed simultaneously with the posting procedure.
      • [CARDS-55162] Fixed duplicated line item document rows (if multiple macrotransactions were created) in statement reports.
      • [CARDS-55164] Resolved an issue with the Delinquent Outstanding section in the "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" and "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" reports when they do not contain data for account contracts having both the Credit and Charge card contracts attached.
      • [CARDS-55276] Fixed an issue with applying the appropriate interchange rules (VISA RA calculation when the additional global parameter VISA_CALC_RA is set to "Y"). Now if no domestic (intra-country) interchange rules exist, the system finds another rule (i.e. regional interchange rule).
      • [CARDS-55279] Corrected the algorithm for determining the need to redirect an advice message to the core banking system when its processing finished with rejection.
      • [CARDS-55308] Corrected reversal fraud prevention validation condition to avoid rejection of payment reversals.
      • [CARDS-55312] Changed constant data for the mVisa request according to VISA requirements.
      • [CARDS-55316] Added a new action, "Refresh Product List" to the forms "Acq Main Contract.srd", "Iss Main Contract.srd", and "Iss Main Contract - Corp.srd". This action makes it possible to refresh the list of allowed products for the current contract, if contract has the approval status "No"
      • [CARDS-55324] Fixed fleet clearing documents transaction amount validation rounding issue.
      • [CARDS-55355] Eliminated the ability to generate an authorisation code value unsuitable to VISA restrictions.
      • [CARDS-55387] Restored processing of cases when a reversal transaction message is received before the authorization request. Added limit on the period for stopping attempts to search for reversals preceding the corresponding request. By default the search is performed within 24 hours. This period can be redefined with the global parameter UNM_AUTH_REV_FLASHBACK_DAYS.
      • [CARDS-55443] Corrected generation of the chain identifier for an instalment plan converted from a transaction in previous cycles if another plan was created and closed for the same transaction.
      • [CARDS-55501] Fixed an issue when ABU messages were wrongly selected and sent to IPS online by Transaction Switch DBFileUpdate.
      • [CARDS-55507] Corrected processing of authorization requests in SMS mode if a reversal message was received earlier.
      • [CARDS-55511] Corrected processing of financial online messages. They are now received without restriction by category.
      • [CARDS-55547] DA R2. Fixed function to check Fraud Counter. Now this is performed only for Issuing contracts.
      • [CARDS-55584] Declined authorization message processing corrected to avoid increment of authorization code counter which can lead to exception on non-home node HA
      • [CARDS-55666] Changed usage change amount definition on financial document posting when USE_TRANS_AMOUNT=F. If no account for the contract exists in the transaction currency, the settlement amount will be used for usage.
      • [CARDS-55708] Added additional check of amnd_state in document accept process to prevent situations when documents selected for processing have been deleted in a parallel session.
      • [CARDS-55711] Added the possibility to create ContractAddInfo or ClientAddInfo application section with the ActionType defined in the application type.
      • [CARDS-55722] Corrected "For Export" field filling in GL Traces created during backdated processing if the original GL trace was also created by backdated processing.
      • [CARDS-55727] Deleted some obsolete objects to prevent undesirable use of unsupported functionality. This has been done for future compatibility with the new Contract Parameter approach.
      • [CARDS-55733] Fixed an issue with the "TOKEN" transaction attribute missing for affiliate transactions according to the bin_table settings.
      • [CARDS-55749] Added clearing of internal state for backdated processing on fatal error. Prevented incorrect processing of successive documents when automatic backdated processing of one of them resulted in a fatal error during mass document processing.
      • [CARDS-55799] Added routing IDT propagation for contract subordinate tables on contract approve if routing IDT is changed.
      • [CARDS-55817] Fixed an issue related to POS Terminal cycle reconciliation when the cycle counter was renewed.
      • [CARDS-55825] Fixed issue. Now generation of GL corrections for misc fee macrotransactions in backdated processing is based on target fee amount. If the correction macrotransaction has the same fee amount and equal GL traces, no GL corrections will be generated even if transaction amounts are different.
      • [CARDS-55864] Eliminated the possibility of deadlocks in bank contract accounts when backdated processing is done in parallel. Parallel-safe structures are used when reversing transactions for bank contracts.
      • [CARDS-55919] Corrected client and parent contract status check when creating a contract manually or using Advanced Application R2. When the client or parent contract has an invalid status, contract approve will fail with an error.
      • I1608314406 [CARDS-54939] Improved performance of XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.
      • I1707289866 [CARDS-55300] DA R2: Fixed reversal processing for No Such Card case. Now reversals will be added under the case. If a reversal is not matched with the first presentment, a new case will be created.
      • I1708081991 [CARDS-55285] Corrected filling number of documents for an item when posting a zero entry (e.g. when the total amount of all documents is 0). Zero documents number led to closing of zero due instead of creating a due transfer even if the ALLOW_ZERO_DUE tag was configured.
      • I1708301443 [CARDS-54853] Fixed calculation of W4Web grants in officer groups using local variables.
      • I1709071752 [CARDS-55179] Fixed appearance of retail line item documents in the "Posted" state but without any m_transactions linked to them.
      • I1709072151, I1711087480 [CARDS-55725] Excluded the possibility to route an authorization document to the source channel.
      • I1709135169 [CARDS-55245] DA R2: Fixed document "Requirement" field filling for MasterCard Fulfillment - Fee Collection. Now DA sets "Requirement" to "ER1" instead of "1".
      • I1709148207 [CARDS-55495] Modified the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report - supported a new section, "Co-Brand / Affinity Program Data". This block is hidden by default and can be shown by the parameter P_ATTR_PS_COBRAND_PROGRAM. Added new parameters: P_ATTR_PS_COBRAND_PROGRAM P_ATTR_BIN P_COBRAND_TRANS_TYPES Added the COBRAND_PROGRAM configuration group PS_COBRAND_PROGRAM and new BIN statistic attributes
      • I1710100883, I1710100829 [CARDS-55210] DA R2. Fixed Outgoing Fee Collection processing: added setting tag OUR_CARD in the add_info field of the doc table.
      • I1710116985 [CARDS-55265] Fixed macrotransactions duplication error in acquiring documents. The error occurs if a reversal document was processed simultaneously with the posting procedure.
      • I1710135034 [CARDS-55198] Corrected handling of transit financial advice on NetServer when the message target is maintained in the same processing center.
      • I1710173941 [CARDS-55199] Fixed issue. Now in "Balance Prediction" functionality, interest that has already been paid is excluded from the resulting amount for prediction on the current cycle date.
      • I1710194662 [CARDS-55224] Corrected incorrect routing search for incoming documents if ROUTE_BY_FORWARDING_MEMBER_FOR_CHANNELS global parameter is set.
      • I1710242617 [CARDS-55320] Corrected behaviour of the global parameter TRIVIAL_GL_TRANSFER. For the default value of the additional global parameter TRIVIAL_GL_TRANSFER=N, GL_TRACE/GL_TRANSFER records are not created now when debit and credit accounts are equal. Accounts are equal when their account numbers, gl_numbers and account templates match. Previously only account numbers and account templates were compared.
      • I1710257336 [CARDS-55494] Fixed incorrect system behaviour: when using the "Duplicate" action in the Service screen, the amendment reference for the new record was not updated.
      • I1710259099 [CARDS-55431] Fixed issue. Now by default the authorisation process does not apply deferred tasks and the Secondary->Primary Synchronisation process does not create deferred tasks. If you use High Availability solutions, set HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY=Y global parameter to restore the old behaviour and make sure that Object Task Scheduler is always running.
      • I1711038051 [CARDS-55878] Fixed incorrect fleet target fee resulting from the end-of-month fee recalculation procedure for a document chain with two adjustments.
      • I1711137893 [CARDS-55724] Fixed the calculation algorithm for the PS_TRN_NAME statistic attribute in all statistics reports. The algorithm uses the document's source and target channel codes to define a transaction Payment Scheme. Added the priority to choose a channel code for calculation: On-Us channels have the highest priority, then Affiliated channels are taken into account, and other channels have the lowest priority in the algorithm. Without such prioritization, the PS_TRN_NAME attribute could have an incorrect value for transactions processed in the channels other than On-Us and Affiliated channels.
      • I1711138024 [CARDS-55916] Corrected behaviour: now a reversal message is forwarded to the next member even when the response for processing the primary message has not yet been received.
      • I1711139617 [CARDS-55559] Increased the size of the copied account name in an account template to 200 symbols when adding a settlement currency (in the "FX Scheme" screen).
      • I1711236209 [CARDS-55890] Corrected getting default values for report fields in MasterCard report "Location Administration Tool (LAT)" (OpenWay\MasterCard\MC. Reports\ATM Location). If the proper parameter value is not set in the device contract, default values from sy_handbook (with filter: group_code="MC_LAT_ATM") are used. Refer to OW_HOME\manuals\language\MasterCard_statistical_reports\Quarterly_MasterCard_Reporting\MC_ATM_Location_Report.pdf for details.
      • I1711286506 [CARDS-56011] Added a new process that is started in the Process Log when the "Recalc Additional Balances" procedure (OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Recalc Balances for Contracts -> Recalc Additional Balances) is executed.
      • PI-67 [CARDS-55710] Disabled sensitive data storage for EMV cards.
      • [CARDS-54515] VAU/MABU: Added workflow to correct sent or rejected Issuer messages.
      • [CARDS-54538] Created requests for sending information on cards reissued or activated to VAU/MABU IPS services.
      • [CARDS-55007] Supported DCC operations on authorization confirmation for "Single Auth – Single Compl" terminal mode.
      • [CARDS-55030] Changed P2P Money Transfer Account Funding and Original Credit Transactions Jurisdiction rules according to Oct17 VISA Release. Transactions between cards issued in a list of EU countries will be processed as domestic transactions.
      • [CARDS-55197] Added the SEND_CN and DEST_CN tags to the MoneyTransfers document add_info attribute with the values of the 3-letter country code for the corresponding cards.
      • [CARDS-55203] Updated VISA SMS: when posting a Fee Collections document, the system adds now the NETWORK_ID tag with proper value "0004" or "0002" to the document add_info field. The value is then used to fill in F63.1.
      • [CARDS-55466] Added IPS MCX (Multicaixa). Added "MCX" channels with the "N" character and "Our MCX Cards" with the "n" character. Transaction Processing.
      • [CARDS-55784] Added the P2P_ONUS tag to money transfer documents if both the Payer's and Recipient's cards in a transaction are OnUs.
      • [CARDS-55827] Supported the ability to store data from PDS1013 in a document when using MasterCard IPM Inward Processing pipe.
      • I1709041130 [CARDS-54857] Created new statistical reports "NSPK Cards, Part 1 (Cards and BIN)", ''NSPK Cards, Part 2 (Cards and Territory)" required by NSPK Bulletin 37.2017.
      • [DBK-2305] Added support of two new modes for the "Save" action: Single Sql which uses insert with append and nologging in the corresponding table and Custom mode which allows building custom Save procedures.
      • [DBK-2692] The ability has been added to migrate HA services between nodes in force mode.
      • [DBK-2833] Added support of FPE Encryption algorithm in Offline Obfuscator. Use the new additional global parameter OBFUSCATION_ALGORITHM with possible values TRANSPARENT (by default) - the old algorithm, and FPE - FPE encryption.
      • [DBK-2844] DB HA service statuses and node availability are now replicated across all HA nodes by DB Connection Pool of Transaction Switch in addition to WAY4 Replication. This functionality can be activated/deactivated by a Transaction Switch parameter. Please consult the setup manual of the appropriate High Availability solution. The corresponding Transaction Switch version should be installed; please contact Customer Support.
      • [DBK-2337] Added action 'Restore defaults' for recovering from state when a service is active on both nodes
      • [DBK-2697] Checking W4Web components privileges has been changes. See manuals.
      • [DBK-2847] Supported real-time displaying of critical services status on DB Replication Console. See DB Replication Console documentation for additional information.
      • [DBK-2914] Added the ability to not deactivate reserve services at the same time as the main service with the global parameter SW_UCHK_DEACTIVATE_RESERVE=N.
      • [DBK-3023] Added the capability to correct change_versions of rows when a force apply request from a secondary node is processed. Set the value of the additional global parameter CORRECT_VER_ON_APPLY_REQ to "Y" to enable this feature.
      • [DBK-3078] Removed restriction which prevents assigning a Scheduler Job to a day of month greater than 28.
      • [DBK-3310] Added logging of copy_dt (new column in 3.46.30+ and COPY_DT tag in action_details in previous versions) and inst_id, dbms_specific, sid, serial_number in si_conn_src values (3.46.30+ only) to si_log_dst table.
      • [DBK-2719] Fixed: HA support for SAF in TS.
      • [DBK-2729] Eliminated large latency in WAY4R when 'unique constraint violated'.
      • [DBK-2785] Corrected merging of MP_ETL_PARM table records using Configuration Inspector.
      • [DBK-2822] Distributed Processing: fixed Migrate Service to a secondary if it was initiated from another secondary.
      • [DBK-2888] Some static tables were not populated with the new change version during Deferred Apply.
      • [DBK-2900] Fixed W4W grants incorrect behaviour (to exclude situations when access to a component is denied, but it is visible in the UI).
      • [DBK-2912] Fixed SQL error on saving tables with CLOB or BLOB columns.
      • [DBK-2939] Transaction Switch will now repeat operations on primary node that failed due to "Replication Loop" data inconsistency.
      • [DBK-2974] WAY4Web layout import pipe behaviour has changed: existing wx_scheme layouts are NOT deleted by default now.
      • [DBK-3009] Fixed issue: now transactions uncommitted at the time of the "prepare" action are populated into an attached node.
      • [DBK-3019] Fixed Incorrect Transaction Switch delay time with replication loop related exceptions.
      • [DBK-3131] Excluded personal tariffs from Configuration Inspector export in ALL and ALL_BY_DATE modes. Personal tariffs are already skipped if collected as child objects of tariff domains.
      • [DBK-3132] Skipped INSTITUTION parameter value and no error is shown during export of Datamart configuration by Configuration Inspector
      • [DBK-3193] Fixed incorrect determining of new routing in switching between HA nodes.
      • [DBK-3230] Activating services in a node is always properly replicated to another nodes
      • [DBK-3242] Insufficient grants for autoswitchover monitoring
      • [DBK-3271] Fixed periodical switching HA services on and off in Autoswitchover.
      • [DBK-3300] Added additional logging for high DELAY_MS value exception messages in TS Log.
      • [DBK-3325] Added the ability to eliminate high concurrency for sw_node_action when TS switches between nodes.
      • I1705286645 [DBK-2552] Password verify function is supported for "Recreate Links" in HA console.
      • WFCKF-2733 [DBK-3038] Fixed activating services on both nodes at the same time after double switching. Set Available, Set Unavailable, Migrate Service, Restore Default actions are now allowed only after In-Flight time after previous switch-over.

      • I1707289866 [CARDS-55300] DA R2: Fixed reversal processing for No Such Card case. Now reversals will be added under the case. If a reversal is not matched with the first presentment, a new case will be created.
      • I1709072151, I1711087480 [CARDS-55725] Excluded the possibility to route an authorization document to the source channel.
      • I1711137893 [CARDS-55724] Fixed the calculation algorithm for the PS_TRN_NAME statistic attribute in all statistics reports. The algorithm uses the document's source and target channel codes to define a transaction Payment Scheme. Added the priority to choose a channel code for calculation: On-Us channels have the highest priority, then Affiliated channels are taken into account, and other channels have the lowest priority in the algorithm. Without such prioritization, the PS_TRN_NAME attribute could have an incorrect value for transactions processed in the channels other than On-Us and Affiliated channels.
    • 03.44.30.84
      • CARDS-54551 [Core] A new parameter "P_LIAB_TOP_SQL" has been added to the "Cardholder_Contract_Statement.rdf" report. The length is varchar2(4096). The default value for this parameter is "select a.id from client c, acnt_contract a where c.amnd_state = 'A' and a.client__id = c.id and a.amnd_state = 'A' and a.liab_contract is null and a.acnt_contract__oid is null". The new parameter allows the report to be run in batch mode together with the P_LIAB_CAT_LIST parameter.
      • [CARDS-55551] Added the ability to take an instalment fee amount from a custom fee. The tag SERVICE_FEE=<list of fee codes> should be added to instalment fee special parameters. If the fee should be taken from a contra service, the additional tag CONTRA_SERVICE should be also set. Only an instalment fee with a flat fee calculation scheme can be based on a service, however it can be of any fee category (ordinary fee, merchant fee, extra fee and so on).
      • [CARDS-55666] Changed usage change amount definition on financial document posting when USE_TRANS_AMOUNT=F. If no account for the contract exists in the transaction currency, the settlement amount will be used for usage.
      • [CARDS-55708] Added additional check of amnd_state in document accept process to prevent situations when documents selected for processing have been deleted in a parallel session.
      • I1711139617 [CARDS-55559] Increased the size of the copied account name in an account template to 200 symbols when adding a settlement currency (in the "FX Scheme" screen).
      • PI-67 [CARDS-55710] Disabled sensitive data storage for EMV cards.
      • [DBK-3242] Insufficient grants for autoswitchover monitoring
    • 03.44.30.83
      • CARDS-55418 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: Fixed filling of "SIC Code" and "Merchant Specific Code" fields in TRA file. Now if SIC code has a value between 3000 and 3999, it is put in the "Merchant Specific Code" field, otherwise in the "SIC Code" field.
      • CARDS-55614 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: fixed processing of the "CustomIdentifierType" field defined in the ADD_FIELDS_FINANCIAL_TRANSACTION_5000 pipe parameter. The "CustomIdentifierType" field was erroneously filled with the "CustomIdentifier" custom tag value instead of the "CustomIdentifierType" custom tag value. Also fixed "CustomIdentifier" field processing - it is cut if length is greater than allowed by the format.
      • CARDS-55628 [MasterCard interface] Fixed the customized fields processing for MasterCard CDF Export process. If a customized field in the ADD_FIELDS_XX pipe parameters had [null] value, non-customized value was used for export. Now standard value is used only when there is no customized field in the ADD_FIELDS_XX pipe parameters. Otherwise, a customized value is used even if it has [null] value.
      • [CARDS-55110] Increased doc.ps_ref_number field length to 255 characters.
      • [CARDS-54486] Fixed system behaviour for balance type with history mode: after using backdated processing functionality, MAX amount counter calculation has been corrected.
      • [CARDS-54539] Corrected system behaviour for balance type with history mode = Billing when saving history records if billing falls on the second day of the year and the first day is a holiday.
      • [CARDS-55164] Resolved an issue with the Delinquent Outstanding section in the "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" and "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" reports when they do not contain data for account contracts having both the Credit and Charge card contracts attached.
      • [CARDS-55584] Declined authorization message processing corrected to avoid increment of authorization code counter which can lead to exception on non-home node HA
      • I1709148207 [CARDS-55495] Modified the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report - supported a new section, "Co-Brand / Affinity Program Data". This block is hidden by default and can be shown by the parameter P_ATTR_PS_COBRAND_PROGRAM. Added new parameters: P_ATTR_PS_COBRAND_PROGRAM P_ATTR_BIN P_COBRAND_TRANS_TYPES Added the COBRAND_PROGRAM configuration group PS_COBRAND_PROGRAM and new BIN statistic attributes
    • 03.44.30.82
      • CARDS-55114 [VISA interface] Modified the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf report. Now "Number of Statements Mailed" and "Number of Statements Mailed with Finance Charges" are gathered only for card categories with the parent value of card programme = "CREDIT" (DWD_CARD_CATEGORY classifier values with the "Parent value"="CREDIT") and multiplied on billing cycles number. Added new parameters: - P_FILTER_11 - P_FILTER_12
      • CARDS-55534 [VISA interface] XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business: fixed amount balance available calculation algorithm in the "Prepaid cards" section, line "Balance available/remaining at end of quarter". Now: if there are several Prepaid cards related to the same accounting contract in a main-sub hierarchy, its account balance will be included in the report only once. Before: it used to be multiplied by the number of cards.
      • CARDS-55540 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: Fixed "Transaction Amount" field filling in TRA file (added sign).
      • CARDS-55569 [VISA interface] Fixed issue in the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report. Now the value "Of which are only Contact" in the "Card Issuance" block is calculated as "Number of issued Chip cards" minus "Of which are only Contactless" and "Of which are Contact and Contactless".
      • CARDS-54236 [NSPK interface] Added installation and configuration manuals (issuing and acquiring modules) for the MIR Loyalty Program.
      • CARDS-54996 [VISA interface] Added the new pipe parameter TEST_MODE=Y (valid values: "Y"/"N"(default)) to enable the test mode for debugging uploaded data in VCF Export.
      • I1710189537 [CARDS-55554] RBS. Documents Export: Added checking length of transaction code.
      • [CARDS-55547] DA R2. Fixed function to check Fraud Counter. Now this is performed only for Issuing contracts.
      • [DBK-3230] Activating services in a node is always properly replicated to another nodes
    • 03.44.30.81
      • CARDS-54054 [Instalment management] Fee calculation from transaction date is supported for instalments created by a service. To enable calculation from transaction date, the INST_FROM_TRANS_DATE tag should be set in service details or in the transaction subtype. If the billing cycle with the transaction date is already closed when document posting is performed, plan dates will depend on the instalment scheme's "Dates mode". If dates mode is billing-based, plan dates will be calculated starting from the current billing cycle. If dates mode is transaction-based, the dates will be based on transaction date and if no plan shift is configured, the first portion may be created with overdue status.
      • CARDS-55471 [AMEX interface] Added a new parameter to the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report: P_GROUP_CHANNELS, varchar2(255), the default value is " 'X','Y','x','y' ". The parameter is used for transaction filtering in the "Discount Business Summary" and "POS Billing Detail By Industry" sections.
      • CARDS-55510 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward Processing: fixed incorrect processing of settlement incoming messages for financial advices as "Iss Ichng Detail Loyalty For Cardholder CR Inc". Now such messages without the DE-026 field are loaded as "Iss Ichng Detail CH Payment Inc" type.
      • CARDS-54636 [Diners Club interface] Implemented loading of historical data. Three new parameters have been added to the pipes com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.clearing_import.jar and com.openwaygroup.pipe.dci.inward_processing: - HISTORY_MODE=Y/N (the default value is "N") - pipe's mode of operation. If HISTORY_MODE=Y, data from an incoming file are loaded without addendums and with outward status="History" . - HIST_ARN_LIST - ARN filter (list of ARN with commas as delimiters) for historical documents. The parameter only works if HISTORY_MODE=Y. If the ARN of a processed document is included in this list, the document is downloaded. If HIST_ARN_LIST is empty and HISTORY_MODE =Y, all documents from the incoming file are downloaded as historical documents. - HISTORY_POSTING=Y/N (the default value is "N"). If HISTORY_POSTING=Y, an attempt to post a downloadable document is made.
      • [CARDS-54959] Supported FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT mode for custom fees. Other values of the FROM_AUTH tag are not supported. If the blocked Fee Amount currency differs from the posting Fee Amount currency, conversion is made according to custom fee Service rules.
      • [CARDS-55005] FeeMin, FeeMax tariff attributes has been supported for fleet cards fee calculation process. Only applicable to fees defined as transaction price percent.
      • [CARDS-55324] Fixed fleet clearing documents transaction amount validation rounding issue.
      • [CARDS-55501] Fixed an issue when ABU messages were wrongly selected and sent to IPS online by Transaction Switch DBFileUpdate.
      • [CARDS-55507] Corrected processing of authorization requests in SMS mode if a reversal message was received earlier.
      • [CARDS-55511] Corrected processing of financial online messages. They are now received without restriction by category.
      • I1710257336 [CARDS-55494] Fixed incorrect system behaviour: when using the "Duplicate" action in the Service screen, the amendment reference for the new record was not updated.

Now by default the authorisation process does not apply deferred tasks and the Secondary->Primary Synchronisation process does not create deferred tasks. If you use High Availability solutions, set HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY=Y global parameter to restore the old behaviour and make sure that Object Task Scheduler is always running.

      • [CARDS-54943] Corrected Process Messages for creation of consistency points with the CLOSE_GL consistency type. They no longer mention WAY4 Datamart. Starting from WAY4 Cards version 03.45.30, the POINT_TYPE tag in the mp_consist_type.add_info field is expected to differentiate consistency points used by WAY4 Datamart (POINT_TYPE tag with the "DM" value) and those used by WAY4 Cards (POINT_TYPE tag has the "C" value). For WAY4 Cards version 03.44.30, mention of WAY4 Datamart has been excluded for creation of consistency points with the CLOSE_GL consistency type.

      • I1708081991 [CARDS-55285] Corrected filling number of documents for an item when posting a zero entry (e.g. when the total amount of all documents is 0). Zero documents number led to closing of zero due instead of creating a due transfer even if the ALLOW_ZERO_DUE tag was configured.
      • I1710242617 [CARDS-55320] Corrected behaviour of the global parameter TRIVIAL_GL_TRANSFER. For the default value of the additional global parameter TRIVIAL_GL_TRANSFER=N, GL_TRACE/GL_TRANSFER records are not created now when debit and credit accounts are equal. Accounts are equal when their account numbers, gl_numbers and account templates match. Previously only account numbers and account templates were compared.

The PTID tag value is used for processing documents when the target card is a MasterCard card. The RPBA tag is used for VISA and other international payment systems.

      • I1710095553, I1710100916 [VISA interface] [CARDS-55092] VISA Base II Outward Processing : fixed "Error in CPS Data format" error when exporting documents with "F62" document tag that contains 62.26 subfield.

      • I1709067810 [CARDS-55097] Restored the initial the behaviour of cards_reports.GET_ACC_GL_BAL() API. Now it returns GL turnover amounts from gl_transfer without the order_status filter.
      • I1709297428 [CARDS-55104] Fixed repeat message processing when a CBS response to an original request has not yet been received.
      • I1710057271 [CARDS-55095] Corrected calculation of the date range for display in standard forms when limiter parameters are modified by a tariff.
      • I1710096925 [CARDS-55076] Changed the ARN calculation algorithm. To avoid "Incorrect Date in ARN (yDDD) : [7281], must not be less than trans_date" error, the transaction date is used to calculate ARN for the MIR interface. When the posting date is larger than the transaction date by 5 or more days, the posting date is used. For other payment system interfaces (MasterCard, Visa, AMEX) the transaction date is always used for ARN calculation.
      • [CARDS-55082] Now during the document processing procedure on the acquiring side, the error message "Invalid capture currency" is generated for Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC) transactions only if DCC Financial document POI Currency differs from preauthorization transaction currency.
      • [DBK-3023] Added the capability to correct change_versions of rows when a force apply request from a secondary node is processed. Set the value of the additional global parameter CORRECT_VER_ON_APPLY_REQ to "Y" to enable this feature.
      • [CARDS-54125] [UPI REL] Oct17 2.6: supported database currency overrides. The "CUP_RELEASE"="17.2" additional global parameter must be set to use this functionality.
      • [CARDS-54133] UPI Inward: Revised Dual Message Settlement File Reject Codes. Added filling Reason Code in reject documents.
    • 03.44.30.72
      • CARDS-54662 [Core] Added a new parameter, "P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS", to "Cardholder_Account_Statement", "Merchant Standing Orders Details", and "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details" reports. The length is varchar2(3). The default value is "Y". This is an internal technical parameter for DB Manager/WAY4 Manager/WAY4 Web client. Added a new parameter, "P_READ_LOCAL_CONSTANTS", to "Cardholder_Account_Statement", "Cardholder_Contract_Statement", "Merchant Contract Statement", "Merchant Standing Orders Details", "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details", and "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details" reports. The length is varchar2(1). The default value is "Y". The parameter makes it possible to change the ability to read report parameter values from the LOCAL_CONSTANTS table . The "P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS" and "P_READ_LOCAL_CONSTANTS" parameters work as a pair. Only if both parameters are "Y" and the "P_CONNID" parameter is not null, report parameter values will be read from the LOCAL_CONSTANTS table.
      • CARDS-54450 [Core banking interface] Fixed ORA-01747 error during "empty" Assignment menu subitem execution in Scheduler.
      • CARDS-54671 [Fleet cards] Fleet Operator Workbench: Oracle index for cards search by last digits has been renamed from OPT_ANCT_CONTRACT_REV to OPT_ACNT_CONTRACT_REV.
      • CARDS-55009 [UnionPay interface] CUP Audit Trailer Import. added the ability to disable creation of settlement documents for Fee Collections (FCP file) by setting the third position of the LOAD_STL parameter to "N".
      • I1710025092, I1710056161 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-55020] NSPK MPE Import: fixed performance issue when loading bin ranges for VISA (binv files). Changed default value for the "SEARCH_AS_SUB" pipe parameter from "N" to "Y". It allows new detailed VISA BIN token ranges to be imported more correctly. To restore old behaviour, the "SEARCH_AS_SUB"="N" pipe parameter must be set.
      • CARDS-55037 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Added the ability to customize the CorporateProduct field for the AccountInformation_4300Type aggregate.
      • CARDS-55038 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Added the ability to customize the PostedCurrencyConversionDate field for the FinancialTransaction_5000Type and the PostedCurrencyConversionDateJulian field for the FinancialAdjustmentRecord_5900Type aggregates.
      • CARDS-55060 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Added the ability to customize the PostalCode field for the HierarchyAddress_4410Type aggregate.
      • CARDS-55069 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: added pipe parameter PERIOD_ID_FORMAT. Valid values: F, L. F (default value) - period ID is calculated from the beginning of the current billing period. L - period ID is calculated from the end of the previous billing period.
      • [CARDS-54950] Added the ability to use one plastic for different accounting contracts depending on the transaction date. A separate license is required.
      • [CARDS-54897] Fixed processing of transaction reversal messages for own cards on IRouter when communication with an external system is required (for example Risk or Banking).
      • [CARDS-54998] Fixed document reprocessing for documents created by IRouter on a High Availability secondary node.
      • [CARDS-55008] Updated ATM Retail contract copy procedure ("Multiple" action button) to copy contracts only to devices belonging to the same category as the reference contract.
      • [CARDS-55011] Corrected re-ageing due normalization recalculation on payment reversal using backdated processing.
      • [CARDS-55014] MasterCard IRD Calculation and Fee Prediction: Removed dependency on USE_OWN_FX parameter. Added additional global parameter IF_FX_TYPE_MC to override default rate type.
      • [CARDS-55033] On card replacement with same product, product init events are not repeated.
      • [CARDS-55070] Fixed reprocessing of IPS negative advice received on HA secondary node.
      • I1710012034 [CARDS-55015] VISA Fee Prediction: Changed the default rate type for amount conversion to VDM (VISA Daily Middle). It can be changed by the additional global parameter IF_FX_TYPE_VISA.
      • I1710022917 [CARDS-55047] Fixed authorization advice processing by issuers when messages are routed by a dedicated online service - AFF_AUTH or IRouter.
      • I1710031301 [CARDS-54988] Fixed incorrect creation of advice in cases when processing of a transit request for a foreign member's card is rejected.
      • [CARDS-55064] Tokenization Event Notification (TVN) message with Event Indicator 8 (exception) is allowed regardless of token number presence in a request. This TVN message doesn't change token status in the system (if present).
      • I1709018682 [CARDS-55061] Fixed issue with Union Pay Inward: now the pipe takes into account file name when checking file duplication.

      • CARDS-55122 [High availability] Added information to documentation that describes enabling an additional mechanism for replicating the state of nodes and services. For more information, see the Setup Manual for the appropriate High Availability solution.

      • CARDS-54945 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: Added condition: if pipe parameters ADD_FIELDS_4, ADD_FIELDS_6 contain tags F72, F92, F12, the mandatory fields client First Name, Last Name, and Company Name can be omitted in uploaded records.
      • CARDS-54962 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: Added customization points for Account Number fields in Accounts and Balance files. Added the ACC_CONNECT_BY parameter for additional account filtration.
      • [CARDS-54474] Implemented flexible redefinition of Effective Contract for Balance Type posting.
      • [CARDS-54602] Added the ability to calculate interest with "Int By Credit" mode for limit normalization between sibling contracts in multi-currency products. The target account template used in a sibling standing order should have the "Activate Int by Credit" value in the "Calc Int Mode" field. Multi-currency products require separate licenses. Please contact OpenWay Support for more details.
      • [CARDS-54833] A new custom procedure, CUST_INSTL_AUTO_ER has been added. In this procedure, the default order for automatic early repayment of instalment plans can be redefined.
      • [CARDS-54095] AMEX GNS Demographics Processing: Removed checking rule that Merchant Id (Service Establishment Number) must be unique among Demographics messages.
      • [CARDS-54932] Fixed the instalment simulation behaviour for authorisation request in case if no instalment plans were simulated due to configuration issues: a warning message is created for a document and an instalment simulation answer is registered in the bertlv tags E2.CB and E2.D6 for a payment without instalments.
      • [CARDS-54986] Fixed IRD 47 definition for Europe Region. MasterCard IRD Calculation.
      • [CARDS-54094] AMEX GNS Demographics Export/Response Import: implemented a new response matching method with the "Transport Data" field. This method is now the default because Merchant Id (Service Establishment Number) used before as a matching key can be non-unique.
      • [CARDS-54891] Changed VISA OCT reversal processing. OCT reversals with Target Channel "VISA SMS" are rejected with Return Code "12" and Posting Status "Under Workflow". OCT reversals with Target Channel "VISA" are not sent in the online phase and should be sent in clearing.
    • 03.44.30.70
      • CARDS-54826 [AMEX interface] Supported correct counting of reissued cards in the "AMEX Statistics Issuing Business (excel)" report. Reissued cards are now counted as one card.
      • CARDS-54886 [AMEX interface] AMEX GNS: Added a special member AEGN_DAF for settlement documents in the standard configuration.
      • CARDS-54898 [NSPK interface] Updated 2017_10_NSPK_Requirements.pdf. The section containing NetServer settings for MIR B-05 requirement has been removed. NetServer unconditionally behaves in compliance with MIR B-05 requirement.

      • [CARDS-54841] Removed delimiters from response to tkn_activation transaction when there is only one phone number.
      • [CARDS-54890] Fixed processing of replicated documents created by first transaction for newly produced plastic.
      • [CARDS-54902] Enhanced filling of the "E2.CB" tag. Now, it is always returned in the bertlv data for a Mastercard authorisation request from a terminal capable of processing an instalment even if no instalment simulation was done. Together with the "E2.D6" tag, they form the correct answer for a terminal capable of processing an instalment.
