      • I1709190410 [CARDS-54889] Removed unnecessary transaction amount validation for transit authorization reversals.
      • [CARDS-54712] Sending information about account closing to IPS has been added to the card contract status change procedure. Contract status codes should be configured in the ABU_CONTR_CLOSED_CODES global parameter (can be configured for a financial institution) to trigger information sending when the appropriate status is set. Information is only sent for contracts that have the ABU=Y tag configured in the contract subtype.

      • [CARDS-54720] Transaction Processing. Now the attributes CARD (if no NO_CARD attribute) and CARDHOLDER (if no NO_CARDHOLDER attribute) are added to the transaction attribute list if the MPOS attribute is present .
      • [CARDS-54739] Backdated processing of liability contract hierarchy has been corrected when some contracts are opened on the processing date and others were opened earlier. Now the "Contract Billing not found" message does not occur in such cases.
      • [CARDS-54750] MasterCard IRD Configuration loading from MPE. Fixed checking of Full MPE IRD Configuration presence when loading Daily MPE files.
      • [CARDS-54792] Order of reapplying events with duration type = "Billing" has been corrected in backdated payment processing.
      • I1706238241 [CARDS-54542] Extended PAN mask format with Card Category [:C] for variables (like %CONTRACT_NUMBER[:NXM]%): %CONTRACT_NUMBER:NXM[:K][:C]%, where: <N> - number of visible digits at the beginning of the number. <X> - filler symbol for the hidden part of the number. <M> - number of visible digits at the end of the number. <K> - number of filler symbols; this parameter is not mandatory. <C> - contract category code; only contract numbers belonging to this category will be masked. By default, these are card contracts. The possible values are: "C" - card contracts; "B" - bank contracts; "A" - account contracts and "M" - device contracts; this is not a mandatory parameter, "C" is the default value. Contract Number for card contracts (with PAN) will always be masked, even if "contract category code" does not contain "C".
      • I1709135528 [CARDS-54734] When a transit authorization and financial presentment have different transaction types, the transaction direction is additionally checked. Documents are not matched if the direction differs. The funds unblock procedure is no longer called for a transit authorization document if direction is the same.
      • WFCKF-2733 [DBK-3038] Fixed activating services on both nodes at the same time after double switching. Set Available, Set Unavailable, Migrate Service, Restore Default actions are now allowed only after In-Flight time after previous switch-over.

      • [CARDS-53154] Corrected issue in sending reversals to the CBS by IRouter.
      • [CARDS-54618] Added a new shift mode, "Instalment Start Date" to define the posting date for an Instalment Event Fee. When a transaction from a previous billing cycle is converted to an instalment (using the backdated processing module), an Instalment Event Fee with the specified shift mode is processed with a posting date equal to the current banking date, not the date of the original transaction.

      • [CARDS-54687] A check for empty macrotransaction currency has been added to API function api.PUT_MTR. If the currency is empty, a fatal error with the message 'Currency can not be empty' will be generated.
      • [CARDS-54688] Backdated processing start date is now always shifted to the previous working day before a holiday, according to the business calendar, even if the global parameter STORNO_SKIP_HOLIDAYS=N is set.
      • [CARDS-54695] Now due macrotransactions processed using a standing order are linked to a standing order document only for acquiring contracts. For issuing contracts, due macrotransactions are not linked and item_due records are not closed as it interferes with backdated processing.

      • [CARDS-54550] Enhanced due normalization for accounts with Due Type = "Contract Due" when the calculated date is a holiday according to the business calendar defined in the Account Scheme or Financial Institution, and when every calendar day is opened with the Contract Daily Updates process. In this case, Due normalization will be performed on the first working day after the holidays according to this business calendar. For due normalization, it is not recommended to use Functional Dates which may be a holiday. It is recommended to shift the resulting date to a working day.

      • [CARDS-54362] The "Custom Parms" new button has been added to the "Contract Preferred" form (OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Cardholder Input & Update by Applications) to pack/unpack the "Custom Parms" tagged field. A section with the "Preferred" object type is supported for applications created manually according to the application types.
      • [CARDS-54366] Fee charging options can now be selected when manually closing an instalment plan. The INST_ADV_FEE_WAIVE_ON_CLOSE global parameter has been enhanced with two new values: "A" - Charge unbilled fees for the whole plan, and "1" - Charge unbilled fees for one portion.
      • [CARDS-54432] A new tag, "SEND_CHAIN_REV_ERR;", in device type configuration has been supported. This tag can be used to indicate an incorrect sequence of documents received from a merchant. If the "SEND_CHAIN_REV_ERR;" tag is specified in device_type and a Preauthorization Reversal is received after processing a Sales Completion, it will be rejected with Response Code 95.
      • [CARDS-54440] Contract balance refreshing functionality called from the menu item "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Recalc Balances for Contracts" has been optimized.
      • [CARDS-54452] Added the ability to set the AUTH_REQ_ADD_AUTH_METHOD parameter on the financial institution level.
      • [CARDS-51641] Added the [Saved Limits] link to the "Acnt Balance" form. It allows saved limits to be viewed for balance types without History mode and with the USAGE=BALANCE; parameter in the "Posting Details" field.
      • [CARDS-54393] Dispute Assistant R2: Fixed wrong bank balance and representment amount calculation on acquirer side when there is a first presentment reversal before chargeback.
      • [CARDS-54417] Added new statistic attributes "Contract Group: AMEX Card Brand" (AMEX_BRAND), "Contract Group: MC Card Brand" (MC_BRAND), "Contract Group: VISA Card Brand" (VISA_BRAND) to enhance statistics gathering on transactions performed on account contract level data if a client's account contract can have several valid cards (card contracts) for different payment systems. In this case, the new MC_BRAND or VISA_BRAND values should be set for the P_ATTR_PS_CONTRACT_NAME parameter for the "XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business" and "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Busines" reports, respectively. No changes in report parameter settings are required to support current report behaviour.
      • [CARDS-54419] MDES: Changed RC to "00" for Tokenization Event Notification messages with Tokenization Event Indicator = 8.
      • [CARDS-54426] When a financial presentment is created by online processes and the PREAUTH_ID tag is present, a check for duplicate presentments is skipped on this document accept. For partial shipments, documents created by the online module are not checked for duplication.
      • [CARDS-54437] When every day including holidays is opened in WAY4 and documents are posted on holidays, backdated processing should not skip holidays when contract state is recalculated. To ensure this, the global parameter STORNO_SKIP_HOLIDAYS=N should be set (can be set for a financial institution). When the parameter's value is 'Y' (default value), backdated processing skips holidays and does not perform CDU or any other actions with contracts on holidays.
      • [CARDS-54438] The ability to attach contracts with non-unique contract numbers to a test script has been added. In this case, the BNK=<FI bank code> tag should be specified in the test step. Contract search will be performed in the specified financial institution.
      • [CARDS-54439] A new global parameter, FROM_SEC_TRANS_DATE has been added to regulate behaviour of entry posting by transaction date (when FROM_TRANS_DATE configuration is used in services/transaction subtypes) for secondary documents. If FROM_SEC_TRANS_DATE = 'Y' (default behaviour) a secondary document's entries will be created with their own transaction date ('Sec Trans Date" document field). If FROM_SEC_TRANS_DATE = 'N', entries will be created with the original document transaction date ("Trans Date" document field).
      • [CARDS-54448] Supported Timezone configuration when processing the instalment event fees.
      • [CARDS-54456] Corrected tenor calculation for instalments with fee capitalization.
      • [CARDS-54469] Transaction Conditions: Changed defaults for tokenized base TC to corresponding non-tokenized TC.
      • I1602048068 [CARDS-54200] Fixed Source and Target in transaction type "Notif Prs Payment Item".
      • I1707314157 [CARDS-54433] Fixed string buffer overflow in API - acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0.
      • I1708033522 [CARDS-54471] Now "When Available" and "When Credit" transactions for bank accounting contracts are processed without funds blocking. Consequently, if a target contract is closed and as a result redefined by a dispute contract, funds will not be blocked.
      • I1708045371 [CARDS-54423] Fixed "ORA-06502: numeric or value error: character string buffer too small" exception during notification message generation during the posting process when %IF% and %THEN% message constructions are converted into values greater than 255 symbols.
      • WFCKF-2636, WFCKF-2637, WFCKF-2710(DUP) [CARDS-54449] Local/remote versions were not updated for chip authorization documents rejected on a secondary node of the WAY4 Distributed Processing solution.
      • [DBK-2900] Fixed W4W grants incorrect behaviour (to exclude situations when access to a component is denied, but it is visible in the UI).
    • 03.44.30.59
      • CARDS-53603 [Tariff management] Forms and actions for managing Product Tariff Campaigns have been implemented. A separate license is required. A manual for Product Tariff Campaigns has been created: [loyalty\loyalty_discounts\Tariff_Campaign.pdf].
      • CARDS-53696 [Bill payments] Supported OTP_SMS templates per CP service.
      • CARDS-49686 [Transaction management] The WAY4Manager form "GL Transfer No Edit.dataform.xml" now displays the "Extracted" value instead of the code "E" for the GL Entry status field.
      • CARDS-53101 [SEPA interface] Fixed Ultimate Creditor / Ultimate Debtor data export for sepa_customer_to_bank_export pipe.
      • CARDS-53777 [UnionPay interface] UnionPay Interface: Added the OUT_ST=Y; tag to the "CH Payment" and "CH Payment Rev" message types.
      • CARDS-53989 [Housekeeping] Removed the unused report in the Reporting.Spending Reports form (OpenWay\Corporate Reporting\Corporate Reports\Spending Reports). Removed the "OWS.Corporate Reporting.Spending.Exceptions Report" menu item. Removed the Exceptions.rdf report template.
      • CARDS-54184 [Product inspector] Fixed incorrect behaviour of the "Test Script Import" pipe when Standard Journals were imported even if the corresponding Test Scripts were not chosen for import. Now if Test Scripts are skipped by import, Standard Journals will be skipped as well.
      • CARDS-54300 [Fleet cards] IC Documents Import/Export (pipes) : fixed error "Document with id xx not our document or wrong Message Sequence Number." when exporting the response for a batch document which was imported in DETAIL_DOC=Y mode.
      • CARDS-54321 [AMEX interface] AMEX GNS Inward. Changed order of rejects processing in financial mode by changing the menu subitem in the menu item OpenWay\AMEX GNS\AMEX. Daily Procedures\AMEX. Inward Processing\AMEX GNS Inward Processing. Now personal rejects are processed before file reject.
      • CARDS-54336 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): fixed duplicating erroneous second export of T4 record when a cardholder belongs to more than one company.
      • CARDS-54358 [Host2Host interface] UFX Documents Import (pipe): if FROM_TRANSIT=Y pipe parameter is set but "Originator\TransitId" element is absent then doc.source_member is filled with "Originator\MemberId" element value.
      • I1708094567 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-54400] IC Documents Export (pipe): fixed the sign of the amount in the "Billing" element for "H2H" mode and when the "USE_MTRANSACTION"="Y" parameter is set. Now only a positive amount will be exported.
      • CARDS-53642 [NSPK interface] NSPK MIR: Added product TKN (MIR Token).
      • CARDS-54107 [VISA interface] VISA Fee Collection/Funds Transfer Reason Codes. Changed description for reason code 0150 to "Recovered card handling fees or rewards and ATM BI acquiring direct fee returns". Also revised all Fee Collection/Funds Transfer Reason Codes.
      • CARDS-54266 [Diners Club interface] DCI MPE Import, CPF Acquirer Import. Supported DCI Card Products codes C and D in default value for pipe parameters PRODUCT2AFS_MAP and PRODUCT2PTI_MAP.
      • CARDS-54308 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward Processing (pipe): G2C MIR Transactions will be imported as Notifications based on the "MIR_FAST_FUNDS" additional global parameter value. The "FF_TO_NOTIF" tag from the BIN table and "FF_TO_NOTIF_DEF" pipe parameter are not analyzed anymore. Notification will be converted to Advice by the Document Processing procedure if necessary.
      • CARDS-54413 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export. Fixed filling "Information Products File Name" field in the Control file.
      • I1705247555, I1708094368, I1707184590 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-54327] Modified IRD configuration for all regions according to MPE files until 2017-08-07.
      • [CARDS-54304] AMEX GNS Inward: Fixed filling posting status for Reject File documents.
      • [CARDS-53816] B2B and G2B money transfers license validation has been implemented for the following transaction application codes: FD,GD,MD,OG,C02,C03,C04,C05,C06,C09,C55,C56,C57.
      • [CARDS-54224] B2B and G2B money transfers license validation has been implemented for the following transaction application codes: FD,GD,MD,OG,C02,C03,C04,C05,C06,C09,C55,C56,C57.
      • [CARDS-53024] The following variables have been added to support multicurrency debit products in statement reports ad: -%SIBLING_MTR%, with values Y / N indicating sibling order transaction. -%MTR_OPPOSITE$, prefix for the opposite contract from a transaction.
      • [CARDS-53732] In a multiple relation configuration, if no relation is specified in an authorization document, the default contract will be chosen even if the global parameter SET_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT is set to 'N'.
      • [CARDS-53755] A new custom procedure, CUST_EXTRA_LIM_NORM_TOP, has been implemented to redefine the top contract for extra limit normalization.
      • [CARDS-54124] The following variables have been added to support multicurrency debit products in statement reports ad: -%SIBLING_MTR%, with values Y / N indicating sibling order transaction. -%MTR_OPPOSITE$, prefix for the opposite contract from a transaction.
      • [CARDS-54261] The AUTO_ER_KEEP contract parameter can now be used to configure keeping either the tenor or portion amount in instalment plan recalculation when billing date is changed. If the contract parameter is not configured, behaviour depends on the INST_RENEW_RATES global parameter. If INST_RENEW_RATES=Y, tenor is kept; in other cases, portion amount is kept.
      • [CARDS-54275] Extended information has been added to balance inquiries for multi-currency cards. The amount returned for 01 balance in authorization requests for multi-currency cards includes amounts in all currencies.
      • [CARDS-54302] Fee calculation from transaction date is supported for instalments created by a service. To enable calculation from transaction date, the INST_FROM_TRANS_DATE tag should be set in service details or in the transaction subtype. If the billing cycle with the transaction date is already closed when document posting is performed, plan dates will depend on the instalment scheme's "Dates mode". If dates mode is billing-based, plan dates will be calculated starting from the current billing cycle. If dates mode is transaction-based, the dates will be based on transaction date and if no plan shift is configured, the first portion may be created with overdue status.
      • [CARDS-54333] The INST_PLAN_ID tag is set in documents created for invoice event fees. Additional tags can be inherited from an instalment plan into a document created by an invoice event or invoice event fee. The list of tags should be configured in the INST_EVENT_INHERIT_TAGS global parameter (can be specified for a financial institution).
      • [CARDS-54355] Re-ageing (WAIVED_PD tag) can now be used for Current Due accounts. The corresponding balance type should be marked with the WAIVED_PD tag. See documentation for details.
      • [CARDS-54361] "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Setup\Appl Type" now allows the TARIFF_CODE_EXT tag to be used in Tariff sections for setting a tariff code.
      • [CARDS-54365] The ability to configure different invoice events for manual and automatic instalment plan closure / partial and full early repayment has been added. The IS_MANUAL tag with "Y" or "N" values can be configured in the invoice_event "Add Condition" field; in this case, the invoice event will only be triggered if instalment action is either manual or automatic, respectively.
      • [CARDS-54379] Added the ability to redefine LOCKED_CARD_RC for a financial institution. The actual value should be assigned by the LOCKED_CARD_RC=<RC>; tag in the special_parms field of the corresponding F_I table record.
      • [CARDS-50683] Fixed an issue in which clients remained not approved after running contract hierarchy approval in structures with top liability and sub-liability contracts. Clients for all subordinate contracts are checked when approving a contract.
      • [CARDS-53799] Corrected the status of the link for a card related to an account when the card was reissued as Lost or Stolen.
      • [CARDS-53936] Authentication services domain parameters are now read through the cache now to avoid performance issues.
      • [CARDS-54043] Changed how the activity checks user competence. For dispute cases, an activity for which a document is not specified checks user competence against the maximum absolute amount among the active financial documents attached to the case, not against the summary of document amounts as for financial cases. This amount is calculated by the entries for the case contract accounts, not for the document target contract.
      • [CARDS-54161] A Transit Reversal or Adjustment message will sent to a target member even if the message contains different data from the original message, if the target channel is not included in the list defined by the global parameter AUTH_REV.REJ_FRAUD_FOR. Forwarded document will contain the 'SUSP_REV_FRAUD;' tag in the add_info field.
      • [CARDS-54245] Incorrect Response Code 85 on TAR / TER for products without the MDES_TYPE tag has been changed to 05.
      • [CARDS-54246] DA R2. Fixed duplicate call procedure to calculate amounts for secondary documents if they are opened to edit several times.
      • [CARDS-54249] Added a new check in the Product approve procedure. Now all accounting contracts for a multi-currency Product should have a default priority specified. If the tag MULTICURR_PRODUCT=Y is set in the top Product, accounting sub-products should have the SIBLING_PRIORITY tag filled.
      • [CARDS-54255] Backward document replication (document reprocessing) now updates the Application Transaction Counter (ATC) value for declined authorizations.
      • [CARDS-54268] Added consideration of more scenarios for sequences for receiving financial and authorization messages to avoid unnecessary holds on cardholder funds which could occur if a financial document arrived earlier than an authorization. Improved processing performance.
      • [CARDS-54287] Ageing reclassification behaviour has been enhanced. Threshold amount "WAIVED_PD" can now be compared according to the following rule: account balance less than or equal to "WAIVED_PD" amount. By default, account balance should be less than "WAIVED_PD". To use the comparison rule "less than or equal to", set the parameter "WAIVED_PD_MODE" to "<=" on the financial institution level, or in additional Global Parameters.
      • [CARDS-54298] MasterCard IRD Calculation: Added check of "Active" records to all selects from MPE tables.
      • [CARDS-54310] CARDS-53799 has been redesigned. Relations with invalid cards are excluded from the "Related Cards" screen form.
      • [CARDS-54319] Redesigned the algorithm for defining a hierarchy of applications for loading into one plastic. Now a hierarchy of applications with different expiry dates and sequence numbers can be joined in one plastic.
      • [CARDS-54325] Corrected filling document is_authorisation field for transit reversals
      • [CARDS-54341] Changed how the "RBS Number" and "MemberID" fields are filled in Advanced Application R2 for contract modification. Field values are now inherited from the parent contract if they are empty.
      • [CARDS-54357] The amount of an unused instalment limit for posting to accounts is now calculated without the amount used by inactive instalment plans. The available instalment limit for plan creation still takes inactive plans into account. If an instalment plan created on authorization should not affect posted instalment limits, INST_AUTH_ACTION=CREATE_INACTIVE should be configured in the service or using the global parameter.
      • [CARDS-54359] Matching of simulated instalment plans will now depend on the INST_VER tag of a financial document (E2.CF bertlv tag). If the tag value is MC_INST, MasterCard specification for instalment plan mandatory fields for matching will be used and mandatory fields will be INST_NUM, INST_INF_RATE, INST_FEE, EFF_RATE, INST_TYPE. In other cases, OpenWay notation for mandatory fields will be used and mandatory fields will be INST_NUM, INST_AMNT, INST_TOTAL.
      • [CARDS-54360] SIOM: fixed finding Issuer Member ID when creating an ONUS SIOM document for an Affiliated Bank's card.
      • [CARDS-54372] Changed Last Updated field value from system date to emulated banking date for instalment 'PAYMENT' invoices during test script run in Product Inspector.
      • [CARDS-54406] NSPK SIOM Inward: fixed linking incoming documents to incorrect SIOM documents.
      • [CARDS-54415] Fixed the calculation algorithm for a value of funds available for early repayment that is shown during "Early Repayment" actions. Now, configuration of the balance types in global parameters or in account scheme is considered.
      • I1610077363,I1702062338 [CARDS-54159] Enhanced the "Lost Authorizations" form to show authorizations with the "Inactive" posting status that remain active due to partial financial clearing. The currently blocked amount is now shown as a separate column.
      • I1705264265 [CARDS-54295] Fixed first cycle history initialization for balance types with History Mode = "Billing (After Close)" and "Billing (Before closing)". Corrected system behaviour when saving history records if billing falls on the first day of year.
      • I1706056360 [CARDS-53789] Added new modes, SERVICE_TGT and SERVICE_SRC that allow services to be inherited for source or target only, unlike the SERVICE mode which can be configured in the FROM_AUTH tag to inherit services from an authorization document for both source and target.
      • I1707055765 [CARDS-54206] Fixed an issue with calculating (predicting) an amount for Partial Second Presentment to prevent an empty result in the amount fields. The calculation algorithm has not been changed.
      • I1707179843 [CARDS-54270] FPLP: Fixed Batch Approve result processing. Now Warnings are not processed as errors during FPLP process. Added tracing for FPLP.
      • I1707313211 [CARDS-54296] The Currency field of usage limiter templates with adaptive algorithms for calculating amount thresholds must be filled in. A usage limiter's Currency field value is saved every time the limiter is updated.
      • [CARDS-53995] MIR tokenization is supported.
      • [CARDS-54335] Transaction Attributes. Added normalization rule: for CAT4 with no AUTHENTICATED attribute, the NO_AUTH attribute is added.
      • [CARDS-54299] MasterCard Inward Processing. Rollbacked issue CARDS-52613. Changed CH Payment transaction processing if Fast Funds option is used (the value of the global parameter MC_FAST_FUNDS is Y).
      • [CARDS-53425] VISA BASEII Inward Processing: supported import of new TC33 BASE II Dispute Financial Status Advice messages.
      • [CARDS-54307] VISA BASEII Inward Processing, Affiliated BASEII Inward Processing (pipes): Original Credit Transactions will be imported as Notifications based on the "VISA_FAST_FUNDS" additional global parameter and "Fast Funds Indicator" field in an incoming transaction. The "FF_TO_NOTIF" tag from the BIN table and "FF_TO_NOTIF_DEF" pipe parameter are not analyzed anymore. Notification will be converted to Advice by DataBase if necessary.
      • [DBK-2833] Added support of FPE Encryption algorithm in Offline Obfuscator. Use the new additional global parameter OBFUSCATION_ALGORITHM with possible values TRANSPARENT (by default) - the old algorithm, and FPE - FPE encryption.
      • [DBK-2939] Transaction Switch will now repeat operations on primary node that failed due to "Replication Loop" data inconsistency.
      • I1707259086 [UFX-424] Fixed an issue that could lead to removal of the "Last Name" field instead of the "Company Name" field while importing advanced application R2.
    • 03.44.30.56
      • CARDS-54177 [MasterCard interface] IRD configuration has been modified for Interregional, LAC, AP and MEA regions.
      • CARDS-54202 [VISA interface] Interchange tariffs have been modified for the CEMEA region.
      • I1706151492 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-54192] Modified VISA RA configuration for the EU region.
      • CARDS-53549 [VISA interface] VISA Release Oct17-522 CEMEA Mandatory 8.2.1: interchange reimbursement fees (IRF) for staged digital wallet transactions in Russia have been supported.
      • CARDS-54191 [Fee Prediction] Commercial domestic interchange fees have been updated in Romania according to VISA Business News on 9 March 2017.
      • CARDS-54195 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q4 Global AN 1038: the new product code MWP has been added to Payment Product.
      • CARDS-54204 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Oct17-505 2.3, VISA Interface: "VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File" and "VISA Loading SMS Acknowledgments" pipes now support database currency overrides. The "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" additional global parameter must be set to use this functionality. Affiliated BII interface uses its own channel override.
      • [CARDS-54122] VISA SMS: Fixed problem with checking duplicate technical Adjustments which are sent through Transaction Switch.
      • [CARDS-54139] Multiple Capture mode checking for devices has been added.
      • [CARDS-54160] MasterCard IRD Calculation. Supported setting conditions by DE40 (Service Code) and DE22 (Point Of Service Data Code) in one scope.
      • [CARDS-54171] Implemented the license for AFT transactions with single debit document and C07,C52,AA, and PP transaction application codes.
      • [CARDS-54197] DA R2: Fixed invalid case amounts when a Credit Reversal is processed.
      • I1707121917 [CARDS-54188] Corrected matching of a financial document with a transit authorization when WAY4 is used as the sponsor for both acquirer and issuer.
      • I1707171415 [CARDS-54190] Resolved issue with empty case status when two "New Activity" windows are opened and processed.
      • I1707247431 [CARDS-54180] Adjustment and Reversal financial documents that exceed the presentment amount are now posted to a dispute account with "Decline Service" posting status.
      • I1707312971 [CARDS-54205] Corrected contract identifier calculation for putting a document in the apply queue after replication from an HA solution secondary node.
      • [CARDS-54185] AMEX GNS Inward: Fixed reject document fields filling.
      • [CARDS-54115] AMEX Inward/Outward (Release 17.2): Supported Icelandic Krona and Uganda Shilling Currency Decimalization Change by using database overrides. The additional global parameter AMEX_RELEASE must be set to 17.2.
      • [CARDS-54125] [UPI REL] Oct17 2.6: supported database currency overrides. The "CUP_RELEASE"="17.2" additional global parameter must be set to use this functionality.
      • [CARDS-54133] UPI Inward: Revised Dual Message Settlement File Reject Codes. Added filling Reason Code in reject documents.
      • [DBK-2914] Added the ability to not deactivate reserve services at the same time as the main service with the global parameter SW_UCHK_DEACTIVATE_RESERVE=N.
      • [DBK-2822] Distributed Processing: fixed Migrate Service to a secondary if it was initiated from another secondary.
      • [DBK-2912] Fixed SQL error on saving tables with CLOB or BLOB columns.
      • I1707037614 [CARDS-53871] IPM Inward Processing: fixed "Length = [1] data elements is out of Allowed Range = [3-3] for Variable Length Field 407" error.
      • [CARDS-53467] [MC REL] 17.Q4 - AN 1034. MCInterface (clearing): supported database currency overrides. The "MC_RELEASE"="17.Q4" additional global parameter must be set to use this functionality.
    • 03.44.30.55
      • CARDS-52434 [VISA interface] Corrected calculation of POS and ATM (include Chip and Contactless devices) in the "Which are EMV compliant" field (EMV compliance is the ability to accept EMV (Chip) cards) of the XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business report.
      • CARDS-54071 [NSPK interface] NSPK MPE Import (pipe): fixed filling country code for MIR, JCB, AMEX, UPI BIN table import.
      • CARDS-54099 [Diners Club interface] DCI Card Product File Import. Fixed Detail Cycle Range Record processing.
      • CARDS-54110 [Diners Club interface] "BIN Table - All" and "BIN Table" forms. Now the "Data Source" field is synchronized with the "Data Source" domain.
      • I1704129756 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-54082] Optimized WAY4Manager Customer Support Screen to decrease tab opening time.
      • CARDS-53502 [NSPK interface] [MIR REL] 2017.2 B-05. NSPK Outward Processing (pipe): EMV tag 84 is filled with the "EMV_AID" document tag value if tag 84 is absent in addendum_doc chip data.
      • CARDS-54073 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Oct17-588 has been supported. Updating personalization data of tokens in 3730 message has been added.
      • [CARDS-53949] Added the ability to mark multi-currency Products with the tag MULTICURR_PRODUCT=Y. The tag should be specified in the top Product of a hierarchy. When the tag is set, additional checks will be performed when approving Products and contracts. Multi-currency Products require a separate license. Contact OpenWay Support for more details.
      • [CARDS-53956] Correct standing orders processing for terminal contracts with same Terminal ID in different financial institutions is supported. If this duplication exists in the client configuration, the global parameter ALLOW_DUPL_TERMINAL_ID should be set to "Y". In this case, standing order documents for device contracts will be filled with additional contract search attributes: Merchant ID, Member ID and Spc Scheme for source, Member ID and Spc Scheme for target.
      • [CARDS-54041] The ability to configure an instalment fee to waive all not opened fee invoices on full early repayment has been added. To enable this mode, the WAIVE_ON_FER tag should be specified in special parameters for the fee in the instalment scheme.
      • [CARDS-54042] Special type of fee - Merchant Fee with amortization is supported for instalment plans. The fee is configured in fees for an instalment scheme. Invoices for merchant fee are not included in portion amount and total plan amount, they could not be paid (never become Open). Invoice events should be configured with one of two new amount types, Merchant Fee or Total Merchant Fee. The source document contract can be used to get a tariff for an instalment scheme and instalment scheme fee - the USE_CONTRA_TRF tag should be set in the instalment scheme or specific fee for the instalment scheme
      • [CARDS-53703] Fixed usage limiter redefinition when a contract is moved to another Product.
      • [CARDS-53800] Enhanced dispute documents matching. When a duplicate dispute document is processed, the DSP_DUPL=Y tag is set in the document. Matching of reclassified chargebacks will check the mandatory reason code change, and can be turned off for different payment systems using the global parameter DSP_RECLASSIFIED_CBKS_% with the "N" value, where % is the channel code. A document with the DSP_DUPL=Y tag will initiate a separate case in Dispute Assistant.
      • [CARDS-53823] Corrected fee processing when closing an instalment plan if a flat fee is used.
      • [CARDS-54060] If changes in the "Embossing" field group were made for a client, the changes are inherited to the client's contracts during the "Check" activity. If parameters were redefined earlier in a contract, the new values are not inherited to these contracts.
      • [CARDS-54066] Now the system does not search for transit authorization documents during financial document processing if the document was created in SMS mode (the initial authorization document was converted to financial during issuing authorization processing). If no transit authorizations are created at all due to system configuration, the global parameter SKIP_TRANSIT_AUTH_SEARCH with the "Y" value can be set to omit transit authorization search.
      • [CARDS-54097] A new custom procedure, CUST_RECALC_BILLING has been added for custom actions after changing the billing date for the main contract.
      • [CARDS-54100] Corrected processing of applet-related card data records when marking a card contract for production and selecting the record for incoming messages.
      • [CARDS-54116] Backdated processing has been corrected so that contract state is not automatically recalculated for financial advice documents with the current date created in SMS mode.
      • [CARDS-54126] When approving a personal tariff, Tariff Start Date will be checked by the date of the contract's financial institution.
      • [CARDS-54144] Corrected an issue with filling in the "INST_FDATE" and "INST_FAMNT" tags when capitalization is used. Now, the capitalization portions are skipped and data from the first real portion are used.
      • [CARDS-54145] Suppressed sending the corresponding message to the IPS when completion of a PIN change attempt is unsuccessful.
      • I1603095080 [CARDS-54062] Added transaction type category check when matching secondary financial documents. Only documents with the same category will be matched in the chain.
      • I1704189347 [CARDS-52998] Fixed double fee charging in issuing contracts for financial documents that inherit the fee amount from an authorization document (FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT is used in basic transaction service setup) when the fee is configured as a Misc service with the tag "MTR_FEE;" and triggered by a usage limiter on authorization document processing.
      • I1706133880 [CARDS-54098] Fixed issue. Now the posting process doesn't recalculate document parameters like ARN for rejected secondary documents that have been sent again.
      • I1706260734 [CARDS-54119] To consolidate positive and negative Due Amounts from several Due Items for an acquiring product's accounts, the REFRESH_DUE tag should be set in the corresponding account templates. This tag should not be used for templates involved in per-transaction Merchant Payment Statements. By default, Due Amounts are never consolidated into one Due Normalization for acquiring products.
      • [CARDS-53819] Currency overrides are supported in the standard form OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Currency Table.
      • [CARDS-53863] [MC REL] 17.Q4 AN 1002 - Miscellaneous Core Systems Updates: update message for Tokenization event notification has been added.
      • [CARDS-54087] If the parameter AUTH_REQ_TOKEN_CHECK is set to "Y" or is not set (the default value is "Y"), its value can be changed in a financial institution or contract subtype. If the parameter contains a comma-separated list of token service providers, no checking for these providers will be performed. If the list of service providers is empty, checking for all service providers is disabled (prohibited).
      • [CARDS-54114] [VISA REL] Oct17-558 Global Optional 4.3. VISA Outward Processing (pipe): for transactions with TAVV, but without CAVV, the "7" value is exported in the "Mail/Phone/Electronic Commerce and Payment Indicator" field.
      • [CARDS-54129] IRouter stored procedures: Added ownership property for NextChannel in ON_US_CH tag of NextAddData parameter. Values are Own(Y)/Affiliated(A)/Foreign(N).
      • [CARDS-54148] VISA: Added subregion CISSEE according to Release 17.4 article Oct17-600 (8.2.2).
      • [PMPIPES-57] Added support of QAUC parameter during SSAD calculation.
      • I1704246960 [CARDS-54064] Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing (pipe) : Fixed "Illegal BaseII message length" error when exporting transaction with incomplete "AI" addendum.
      • [CARDS-54120] [VISA REL] Oct17-505 2.3, VISA Interface (clearing): supported database currencies overrides. "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" additional global parameter must be set to use this functionality. Affiliated BII interface uses its own channel override.
      • [DBK-2847] Supported real-time displaying of critical services status on DB Replication Console. See DB Replication Console documentation for additional information.
      • [DBK-2888] Some static tables were not populated with the new change version during Deferred Apply.
    • 03.44.30.52
      • CARDS-54039 [Fleet cards] Fixed an issue with inheritance of the Trans_Country, Trans_State, Trans_City, Trans_Details, Merchant_Id, Sic_Code attributes from the main transaction document to line item documents.
      • I1706209234 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-54014] Corrected behaviour: now the DEV tag value will only affect PBT Status if defined on the Device Type override level.
      • CARDS-53973 [VISA interface] Supported changes to the enhanced TC 33 Acquirer Capture File. Added new fields and new values and changed existing fields to existing TCR records. Implemented Money Transfer Data processing for original credit transactions(OCTs)
      • CARDS-54003 [NSPK interface] [MIR REL] 2017.2 B-10 NSPK Clearing Interfaces (pipes): supported new cash-to-card transaction processing.
      • CARDS-54018 [NSPK interface] [MIR REL] 2017.2 K-12 : supported "B" value for PDS0165.1 field.
      • [UFX-407] Fixed length of Application RegNumber and OrigAppNumber in UFX schema. They now have the same maximum length of 64 characters.
      • [CARDS-51604] Simulated instalment plan save mode has been added. Plans can be saved in full mode ("F" - default), partial ("P"), minimum ("M"), or not saved at all ("N"). Save mode is determined by the INST_SIM_SAVE global parameter which can be redefined by the same tag in Service special parameters.
      • [DBK-2305] Added support of two new modes for the "Save" action: Single Sql which uses insert with append and nologging in the corresponding table and Custom mode which allows building custom Save procedures.
      • [DBK-2692] The ability has been added to migrate HA services between nodes in force mode.
      • [DBK-2844] DB HA service statuses and node availability are now replicated across all HA nodes by DB Connection Pool of Transaction Switch in addition to WAY4 Replication. This functionality can be activated/deactivated by a Transaction Switch parameter. Please consult the setup manual of the appropriate High Availability solution. The corresponding Transaction Switch version should be installed; please contact Customer Support.
      • [DBK-2337] Added action 'Restore defaults' for recovering from state when a service is active on both nodes
      • [DBK-2697] Checking W4Web components privileges has been changes. See manuals.
      • [DBK-2719] Fixed: HA support for SAF in TS.
      • [DBK-2729] Eliminated large latency in WAY4R when 'unique constraint violated'.
      • [DBK-2785] Corrected merging of MP_ETL_PARM table records using Configuration Inspector.
      • I1705286645 [DBK-2552] Password verify function is supported for "Recreate Links" in HA console.
      • [CARDS-53805] The necessary privilege to execute CARDS_PIPES package procedures has been added for RBS. Payments Import pipe.
      • I1703209597 [CARDS-52654] Pipe RBS. Transactions Export (Batching): Fixed generation of duplicate empty files for a future date.
      • I1705113768 [CARDS-53779] Supported Misc Fee data export in plain and UFX file formats for bank branches.
      • I1704039532 [WM-3064] Master-details interface behaviour has been fixed: master selection change causes correct details view content update.
      • I1706133104 [WM-3066] [Design/Open data form] context popup menu action is no longer available for modal forms.
      • I1706209051 [WM-3063] Cyclic behaviour has been restored for the tree search tool: if the search is over downwards/upwards it is immediately restarted from top down/bottom up.
      • [CARDS-52680] VISA BASE II Prepared Outward Processing. Additional check of pipe parameters has been implemented - now the pipe checks correctness of the "FILTER" parameter.
      • I1705165707 [CARDS-53868] VISA Inward Processing (pipe): fixed import of currency messages if scale factor is more than 9.
      • I1707067331 [CARDS-53986] Affiliated BII Outward Processing: fixed "Message Format Failed" error.
      • [CARDS-53972] [VISA REL] Oct17-513 Global Mandatory 2.14, VISA BASEII Inward Processing (pipe): new "PAYMENT ACCOUNT REFERENCE" field is stored in the database field "safe_doc.details" if it is present in an incoming TC40 message.
      • I1703287643 [CARDS-52613] MasterCard IPM Inward: Now MoneySend transactions are converted to Notifications (by the additional global parameter MC_FAST_FUNDS=Y) only for programs (PDS0043) C07, C52, C53, C54, C55, C56, C57 and C67.
      • I1705100654 [CARDS-53824] IPM Inward Processing (pipe) added grant on select from vec_history.
      • I1705263934 [CARDS-53784] IPM Inward Processing: fixed incorrect processing when DE43.2 contains incorrect symbols.
      • [CARDS-52936] MasterCard IPM Inward Processing. Supported the ability to transfer data from PDS1000, PDS1001, PDS1003, PDS1004, PDS1005, PDS1006, PDS1012, PDS1014 to document.
    • 03.44.30.49
      • CARDS-52828 [Customer/account management] A new parameter has been added to the "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" report: P_HIDE_FEE_CONDITION, varchar(4000). The default value is "1=2". The parameter only works if P_SHOW_CUSTOM_FEE=Y. Use the parameter to hide fee amounts (convert fee amount to zero) in the transactions section.
      • CARDS-53948 [Acquiring authorisation] Fixed error in VISA OCT reversal document processing. Added a new check on VISA SMS channel when OCT reversal occurs. Previously, a check of the VISA SMS channel was not performed.
    • 03.44.30.48
      • CARDS-53985 [Acquiring authorisation] Added support for mVISA QR Code generation.
      • CARDS-53556 [SEPA interface] SEPA Customer-To-Bank export: creditor address data is exported for SEPA Credit Transfer.
      • CARDS-53780 [Issuing authorisation] Removed the CARDHOLDER transaction attribute from the <<All Contactless (Group)>> group transaction condition. Transaction Processing.
      • CARDS-53826 [Product management] Calculation of maximum fee amount with the MAX_FEE tag has been enhanced. Calculation of minimum fee amount with the MIN_FEE tag has been added.
      • CARDS-53983 [Instalment management] Instalment Payment holidays portion amount calculation has been corrected for the "Keep Tenor" option.
      • CARDS-53990 [AMEX interface] AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring report: format for new amount fields in the "Discount Business" section has been corrected.
      • CARDS-53994 [Product management] Validation of contract functional dates Late Payment Date (LP_DATE) and Full Payment Date (FP_DATE) has been enhanced for Set and Recalculate operations. The new value of these dates should be equal to or less than the contract's Next Billing Date + 1 day if the previous value met this condition. When Late Payment Date or Full Payment Date equals Next Billing Date + 1, it means that the LP event or FP event will proceed right before Billing.
      • CARDS-54005 [Application management] Fixed issue: now an empty record in the Contract/Client Extra Info application section is not processed and doesn't cause an error if this section is defined as Not Mandatory.
      • I1704219382 [Merchant portal] [CARDS-53378] Added new API trans_api.GET_MTR_AMOUNT_EXT()
    • 03.44.30.47
      • CARDS-53927 [AMEX interface] XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business: merchant contract filtering has been corrected.
      • I1706305190 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-53937] Transit authorizations created by IRouter and rejected with negative RC aren't increasing usage limiter counters now.
    • 03.44.30.46
      • CARDS-53899 [Acquiring authorisation] mVISA payments are supported. Merchants can receive mVISA payments for their accounts, issuer applications can read QR codes for payments and send transactions to a network.
      • CARDS-53583 [AMEX interface] Unnecessary grouping by MCC has been excluded for the "POS Terminal Statistics" and "ATM Statistics" sections of the XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business report.
      • CARDS-53409 [Notifications] If an online reversal did not lead to a change in the amount available, a notification will not be created.
      • CARDS-53741 [Acquiring authorisation] Error in P2P check operation has been fixed.
      • CARDS-53839 [Customer profile] The Client Template Details form in the Customer Profile\Operations menu shows sensitive attributes as masked and non-editable. To comply with PA-DSS requirements, a service attribute which can contain PAN should inherit its value from a sensitive dynamic handbook parameter or be directly marked as sensitive by the SENSITIVE=Y tag in the Additional Data field.
      • CARDS-53918 [Instalment management] Original document tags are now not skipped on instalment plan recalculation.
      • CARDS-53919 [Instalment management] It is not recommended to use the same fee type for Instalment Event Fees and other Misc Fees as this may affect reversal processing.
      • I1705165707 [VISA interface] [CARDS-53868] VISA Inward Processing (pipe): fixed import of currency messages if scale factor is more than 9.
      • I1705170227 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-53896] New parameters have been added to the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report: - P_ATTR_VALUE_ISONUS. The default value is "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)" to customize the "is_on_us" flag. - P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_1 and P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_2 have been added for filtering transactions. The default value for P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_1 is "trans.chain_type in ('U')"; for P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_2 it is "1=2". - P_HIDE_REPOST. The default value is "Y". Used to hide reversal and repost operations. - P_FX_RATE. The default value is empty. - P_FX_DATE. The default value is empty. - P_FX_CURR. The default value is empty. New sections have been added to the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report: - Discount Business Summary - POS Billing Detail By Industry
      • I1706274643 [CB Gate] [CARDS-53891] Fixed balance update algorithm to not update a balance if the account is closed.
      • CARDS-53926 [JCB interface] [JCB Release 17.2] BIT54 is inherited now in chargebacks. No additional action is required.
      • CARDS-53928 [JCB interface] [JCB Release 17.2] changed BIT 22.5 filling according to new documentation. The "JCB_RELEASE"="17.2" additional global parameter must be set to enable this functionality.
    • 03.44.30.45
      • CARDS-53332 [Product management] Product Min/Max/Default credit limit amounts can be specified by threshold tariffs.
      • CARDS-53817 [Application management] Advanced Applications R2 can skip Product status verification during contract application approval if the new global parameter APPL_ALLOW_NOT_READY is set to "Y". Application accept will check this status anyway.
      • CARDS-52680 [VISA interface] VISA BASE II Prepared Outward Processing. Additional check of pipe parameters has been implemented - now the pipe checks correctness of the "FILTER" parameter.
      • CARDS-53412 [Acquiring authorisation] ORA-01403: fixed no data found exception that occurred during MoneySend Reversal Request.
      • CARDS-53670 [Fleet cards] Updated the discount calculation algorithm with the BEST_PRICE option. A new BEST_PRICE_USE_STELLA calculation mode has been added to allow selection of the best price: tariff price or pump price.
      • CARDS-53685 [Issuing authorisation] Corrected secondary online messages routing when online and clearing channels are different.
      • CARDS-53693 [Core] Corrected fee amount calculation for authorizations when an additional fee is taken by a limiter.
      • CARDS-53710 [Core] Masked document tags containing sensitive data when viewing them through the [All Tags] link. Custom tags can be configured to be masked in the menu item "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\System Utilities\Tagged Data Objects".
      • CARDS-53733 [Instalment management] Corrected the process for converting a transaction from a previous cycle into an instalment. Now transfers are generated as separate documents, not as macrotransactions for the original document.
      • CARDS-53759 [MasterCard interface] The XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business and XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business reports now show account balances in the "Delinquent Outstanding" section at the end of the last reporting period day.
      • CARDS-53763 [Risk management] Corrected the algorithm for calculating the amount to check limits on online standing order processing: the transaction currency is used instead of contract currency.
      • CARDS-53768 [UnionPay interface] UPI Fee Prediction. Fixed determination of processing code.
      • CARDS-53788 [Issuing authorisation] Corrected process information message for deactivated or absent token.
      • CARDS-53794 [Case management] It is no longer necessary to register the "Case Management" menu for the clerk user group to allow clerk users to perform an activity in "Dispute Assistant CM" and other Case Management operation screens.
      • CARDS-53805 [Core banking interface] The necessary privilege to execute CARDS_PIPES package procedures has been added for RBS. Payments Import pipe.
      • CARDS-53807 [VISA interface] XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business and XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business reports include contracts with date_expire on first day of report period.
      • CARDS-53809 [Core] Use of the TOTAL_BAL_TYPE tag for prepaid cards has been changed. See Client Upgrade Notes.
      • CARDS-53821 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed the inability to receive authorization requests from one payment system member to another when both members are served in the same processing centre but direct interbranch routing between them is blocked.
      • CARDS-53822 [Issuing authorisation] Tokens for Incontrol requests aren't checked as MDES/VDEP tokens.
      • CARDS-53866 [Reversal management] Intelligent backdated processing now supports instalment event fees recalculation during the correction process.
      • I1704281513 [Core] [CARDS-53814] Supplementary order processing has been enhanced.
      • I1705100654 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53824] IPM Inward Processing (pipe) added grant on select from vec_history.
      • I1705113768 [Core banking interface] [CARDS-53779] Supported Misc Fee data export in plain and UFX file formats for bank branches.
      • I1705248633 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-53731] VISA Outward: "Merchant State/Province Code" field is filled with spaces for non US/CA Merchant Country transactions.
      • I1706022663 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53682] NSPK MPE Loading: fixed situation when not all issuer records for one MasterCard range are copied to NSPK BIN group.
      • I1706056722 [Fleet cards] [CARDS-53767] Fixed adjustment amounts rounding issue in the end of month fee recalculation procedure.
      • I1706072562 [Issuing] [CARDS-53673] Corrected calculation of previous card expiry date in unmarking procedure.

      • I1707037614 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53871] IPM Inward Processing: fixed "Length = [1] data elements is out of Allowed Range = [3-3] for Variable Length Field 407" error.
      • CARDS-53785 [DB kernel] PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Disk Encryption section has been added (disk encryption is used when there is no Oracle Advanced Security option).
      • CARDS-53916 [Health Monitoring] PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Health Monitoring section has been added.
      • CARDS-49061 [Host2Host interface] NSPK Inward, Affiliated Base II interface: supported NSPK MIR Loyalty messages.
