      • CARDS-53336 [JCB interface] JCB: Added message codes ("RjP-----","RJP-----","RmP-----","RmR-----") for reject processing.
      • CARDS-53426 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Oct17-541 Global Mandatory 2.7. "Authorization Source Code" field in outgoing BASE II presentments is filled according to new rules described in the article. The global parameter "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" must be set. From VISA release 17.4 and later, the global parameter VISA_PRC_TA will become obsolete.
      • CARDS-53427 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Oct17-517 Global Optional 4.2. Implemented changes to allow issuers to receive a new data element "recipient name" in BASE II clearing records for OCT transactions. This field is stored in the "RPNA" tag.
      • CARDS-53705 [UnionPay interface] Union Pay Audit Trailer Import. Supported loading Exceptional Processing Credit Adjustments and settlement for them.
      • CARDS-53712 [Diners Club interface] Supported export of DCI Card Product Submission file for different DCI Releases. Version number filled from DCI_RELEASE global parameter.
      • CARDS-53713 [Diners Club interface] DCI: Supported loading and processing Card Product File for Acquirer.
      • CARDS-53714 [Issuing authorisation] Added the ability to specify the AUTH_TOKEN_ANSW tag in Service details.
      • CARDS-53715 [Issuing] If contract_subtype.add_parms contains the WSP_ADD_PERS_DATA_B64 tag, the tag value will be sent to the response for a token creation request as "Additional Personalization Data". The tag value must contain data in base64 format.
      • CARDS-53769 [Diners Club interface] Supported processing DCI Card Production Confirmation file and storing information from this file in the process log.
      • CARDS-53771 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward (pipe): added the ability to charge a cardholder using Cardholder Billing Amount (BIT 6) instead of Reconciliation Amount (BIT 5). "ACP_<memberid>"="Y" new pipe parameter must be set to use this functionality for a specific member.
      • CARDS-53808 [MasterCard interface] Areas: "South Sudan" (code SSD) is included in "MC: Middle East, Africa (E)" area.
      • CARDS-53853 [JCB interface] JCB: Added menu items "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. File Management\JCB Outward Rejected" and "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. File Management\JCB Rejects".
      • CARDS-54031 [VISA interface] [VISA REL v.2] Oct17-541 Global Mandatory 2.7. Field "Authorization Source Code" in outgoing BII presentments is filled according to new rules, described in article. Global parameter "VISA_RELEASE"="17.4" must be set.
    • 03.44.30.43
      • I1706068798 [Product management] [CARDS-53661] When searching for a Source Service for interbranch macrotransactions, processing of the global parameter "IBR_CHECK_COUNTRY" has been added. If the parameter value is "Y", the country will be analyzed on the Target side. The default value of the global parameter "IBR_CHECK_COUNTRY" is "N".
      • I1706151932 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-53649] Corrected processing of IPS STIP authorisation advices so that funds are not held when an online message is received after a clearing file.
      • CARDS-52807 [Security & key management] "PA DSS Implementation Guide" has been updated. The section "Encryption and Protected Protocols for Data Transmission" has been changed. Added a warning that when the TLS 1.2 protocol is used, encryption using the RC4 algorithm must be disabled.
      • CARDS-53376 [NSPK interface] [MIR REL] 2017.2 K-10: supported new PDS2175. It is used to export/import Card Acceptor URL containing Cyrillic characters. "NSPK_RELEASE"="17.2" global parameter must be set to use this functionality.
    • 03.44.30.42
      • CARDS-50856 [Host card emulation] Deactivated, Suspended, Active and Inactive statuses for tokens have been added. Processing logic for the token parameter F_ENABLED has been changed. See documentation for details.
      • CARDS-53188 [MasterCard interface] Deactivated tokens have been excluded from MAX_TOKENS count.
      • CARDS-53337 [NSPK interface] [MIR REL] 2017.2 K-11: removed support of PDS2072 since 17.2 release. "NSPK_RELEASE"="17.2" global parameter must be set to support this functionality
      • CARDS-53349 [NSPK interface] [MIR REL] 2017.2 B-08: NSPK MPE Import (pipe) added support of new "TKN" product ranges. These ranges are marked with the "TOKEN_BIN"="Y" tag.
      • CARDS-53459 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q4 AN1001, AN1025, AN1032. Added new reject messsage codes: 2835, 2837, 2838, 2839, 2698, 2469.
      • CARDS-53460 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q4 AN 1002. SIC with code 3300 renamed from "3300 PEACH AVIATION LIMITED" to "3300 AZUL AIR".
      • CARDS-53461 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q4 AN1002. MPE Import: Supported changes in IP0053T1.
      • CARDS-53462 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q4 AN1002. Changed "Authorization ID" field type from an to ans for 250-byte Batch Data File.
      • CARDS-53568 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q4 AN1025. MasterCard Inward/Outward: Added PDS0004 to message layout without special processing. Removed Program Registration ID (PDS0043) value C67 from list of MoneySend Program Registration IDs.
      • CARDS-53597 [CB Gate] Added a default value (1000) for the commit_interval parameter of the cb_gate_balance_load pipe.
    • 03.44.30.41
      • CARDS-53267 [Acquiring authorisation] The ability to decline transactions in the second phase when CVV was not checked has been added. The CVC2R tag with the values 'N', 'P', 'U' or 'S' transferred from the controller implements this functionality. The global parameter CHECK_CVV_ON_ISS switches on this functionality. If the parameter is empty, these transactions are successful. If it contains an error number, this error is transferred to the controller and the document is rejected.
      • CARDS-53468 [Core] A new work mode has been added to acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0() - with the parameters ObjToCache => acnt_api.CollScopeFinAndAuth and AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllNonFin. The API returns authorization and financial documents with balance changes, and records from credit_history that did not change balances and/or account Amount Available. - with the parameters ObjToCache => acnt_api.CollScopeAllCreditHistory and AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllNonFin. The API returns only records from credit_history that did not change balances and/or account Amount Available.
      • CARDS-53469 [Core] In API acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0() with call mode AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllNonFin added a filter: API returns records from credit_history with service_class from list: Balance Inquiry, Top Up, Online Payment, External Payment, Online Statement, Verification, Additional Online Service.
      • CARDS-53474 [Core] A new work mode has been added to acnt_api.PREPARE_ENTRY_DATA0() with the parameters ObjToCache => acnt_api.CollScopeFinAndAuth, AuthFilterMode => acnt_api.afAllWithNonFin. The API returns authorization and financial documents with balance changes, and records from credit_history which did not change balances and/or an account's Amount Available.
      • CARDS-53270 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import. Supported creating settlement documents for Fee Collection/ Funds Disbursements (FCP file).
      • CARDS-53558 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe) : fixed filling of "transaction date" field for incoming S2 documents.
      • CARDS-53571 [Money transfers] Corrected behaviour: credited card channel license is only analyzed to determine if _DOM/_INT suffixes must be added to source_fee_code value.
      • CARDS-53572 [Transaction management] Filling of merchant information for Batch Header documents added on document accept.
      • CARDS-53579 [JCB interface] JCB Outward Processing.dll (pipe) : fixed size of letters for filling "Merchant Name" and "City Name" fields.
      • I1512231114 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-53570] Fixed an issue with filling in the "Trans Date" field for Reimbursements. Now, a database system date is used for the "Trans Date" field and can be redefined when using the Product Inspector.
      • I1701125638 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-53582] Resolved issue: Now dispute documents with fee return can be processed even if the original document's services have been deleted by Housekeeping. If the FEE_RETURN=ALL option is configured, a fee will be returned; in other cases, a document will be processed without fee return.
      • I1705098865 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-53521] AMEX DAF Import: Fixed filling counters in acknowledgement file.
      • I1705264283 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-53576] IC Documents Import (pipe): removed incorrect check of DocRefSet/DRN element length.
      • I1705301217 [Issuing] [CARDS-53533] Improved processing of Application for usage limiter deletion. Fixed issue with incorrect processing when Usage Template was closed and Usage Template Approved remains active.
      • I1706021774 [UnionPay interface] [CARDS-53513] Union Pay Outward: Fixed problem with selecting documents for wrong channel.
      • I1706057036 [Transaction management] [CARDS-53523] Generation of the "Trace stack overflow" error message during the document processing procedure has been fixed for transactions processed in WAY4 Cards by Interchange Payment System exchange rates (for example, Dynamic Currency Conversion transactions) if Trace message logging was switched on.
      • I1706069710 [Money transfers] [CARDS-53514] Money transfers Sender Data made optional for OnUs and Domestic transactions for CUP cards.
      • CARDS-53510 [JCB interface] JCB Outward Processing, JCB ISO Outward processing (pipes): added the ability to set up start sequence numbers for outgoing file numbering. If needed, the new "START_FILE_SEQ" pipe parameter must be set with the desired number.
      • CARDS-53517 [Diners Club interface] Supported service to export DCI Card Product Submission file (format version 00162).
      • CARDS-53567 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): added new "GET_CARDS_HINT", "GET_CARDS_IDS_HINT", "GET_CARDHOLDERS_HINT" pipe parameters to define Oracle hints for appropriate query optimization. If parameters are set, values must contain the entire hint including comment symbols, for example GET_CARDS_HINT=/*+cardinality(card 20)*/
      • CARDS-53569 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q4 AN 1038. IPS Product Definition: Added the "MasterCard World Prepaid" product with the MCW Product Idt code and MWP Licensed Product Idt code.
      • I1706018366 [Transaction management] [CARDS-53473] VISA SMS: Fixed case when Transaction Switch sends duplicate Reversals.
    • 03.44.30.39
      • CARDS-50183 [MasterCard interface] Tariff Structure and Data Import: Added the parameter DATE_CHECK_MODE=ANY_DATE to the standard menu item for VISA and MasterCard.
      • CARDS-52380 [Fleet cards] Supported new Fleet BERTLV request tags: EA.FFXX.DB - Item cost for client including total discount calculated by third-party device, EA.FFXX.DC - Item price for client including per-unit discount calculated by third-party device, EA.FFXX.DD - Total item discount for client calculated by third-party device.
      • CARDS-53330 [Fleet cards] New tags have been added to Fleet BERTLV response message: EA.FFXX.D6 - Item cost for client including total discount calculated by issuer, EA.FFXX.D7 - Item price for client including per-unit discount calculated by issuer, EA.FFXX.D8 - Total item discount for client calculated by issuer.
      • CARDS-53363 [Customer/account management] Authorization requests for cards with multiple relations will be rejected if no contract exists with the specified relation and the SET_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT global parameter is set to 'N'. Authorization advices and financial presentments will be processed for the default relation contract.
      • CARDS-53422 [Authentication management] Authentication domain option added: ACCESS_LOG=N to suppress unwanted process log messages on authentication result. NB: audit log records will be present anyway.
      • CARDS-52131 [VISA interface] Information about Prepaid Cards has been added to the "Card Issuance" section in the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • CARDS-53434 [Issuing authorisation] Corrected behaviour: now an IPS STIP negative advice message (0120) creates a reversal document when it is received after posting an original request which was received in single-message mode.
      • CARDS-53481 [Reversal management] Intelligent Backdated Processing functionality has been improved to correct balance history entry amounts for advice and reversal transactions when a balance type is specified in a custom fee service with an empty Fee Type reference.
      • CARDS-53484 [Dispute assistant] Dispute Assistant v2: Suppressed Automatic Final Write-Off for zero summary balances.
      • I1705099074 [CB Gate] [CARDS-53246] Fixed incorrect processing of CBGate balance loading when the last transaction linked to the balance was delivered to CBS by SAF.
      • I1705221109 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-53488] Fixed COMS_LOG parsing in database. Fixed error "ERROR in Buffer Packed Data. Field Request Failed. 3 4" occurring when parsing pay_gate messages (using the "Cr.Log Flds" button in the form opened with the menu item "Online Log Not Safe" OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\Emergency Reports\Online Log - Not Safe).
      • I1705264583 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-53495] NSPK Outward Processing (pipe): fixed ARN calculating for multiple adjustments.
      • I1705026998, I1705127863, I1705153646, I1702208472, I1705297867 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-53441] NSPK Bin Table Import (pipe): if NSPK BIN range for VISA/MC is not found and smaller (fully included in NSPK range) VISA/MC BIN ranges exist, these VISA/MC ranges are copied to the appropriate NSPK BIN Group. To avoid copying and restore the old behaviour, the new "COPY_SUBRANGES"="N" pipe parameter must be set.
    • 03.44.30.38
      • CARDS-51850 [Bill payments] It is now possible to clear the ServiceComment and License fields of a PaymentType using mBilling request.
      • CARDS-53161 [Product management] For Transaction Types (TRANS_TYPE table) added Trans_Code unique check: - in "Transaction Types" and "Transactions - All" forms with the button Actions... -> Check All - in Message Dictionary generation with the menu OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Generate Message Dictionary.
      • CARDS-53266 [Product management] The ability to limit a custom fee amount has been added - MAX_FEE. The predefined codes SRCF, SRCT, SRCA, TGTF, TGTT, and TGTA can be used as values of the MAX_FEE_FROM tag to take the limiting amount from the base macrotransaction.
      • CARDS-51300 [Transaction management] Import of historic acquiring transactions has been fixed to support source contract custom search by Merchant ID (if the terminal ID is not present in WAY4). This functionality is only used during migration from legacy platforms to WAY4.
      • CARDS-51494 [Core] Excessive processing of unmatched usage limiters in document posting is skipped if this has already been done by the authorization module.
      • CARDS-51859 [CB Gate] Fixed reversal message routing to core banking system for utility payments.
      • CARDS-51867 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Outward: Now PDS158 sf4 (IRD) for a second presentment is inherited from the presentment, not from the chargeback.
      • CARDS-52958 [VISA interface] In the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report supported separation of "Acquired Electronic Commerce Transactions Data" section into V PAY and non-V PAY subsections.
      • CARDS-53205 [Diners Club interface] Supported General order category to retrieve data for Merchant Registration. DCI Russia Merchant Management.
      • CARDS-53373 [Transaction management] Transaction conditions and attributes inheritance from authorization document is supported for tokenized transactions.
      • CARDS-53375 [AMEX interface] AMEX DAF Import. Fixed totals checking.
      • CARDS-53387 [e-Commerce issuing] Discontinued saving of unnecessary data in td_doc.posting_details for RBA request processing.
      • CARDS-53394 [Instalment management] Filtering out of recalculated entries added on instalment creation.
      • CARDS-53396 [High availability] SAF forwarding works on HA secondary node.
      • I1701112611 [VISA interface] [CARDS-51790] A new parameter has been added to the "Visa Statistics Acquiring Business" report, P_ATTR_VALUE_ISONUS - varchar(4000) with the default value "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)" for customising the "is_on_us" flag. Checks by group_channel have been replaced by card_brand analysis (... card_brand like 'V_%' ...) for supporting affiliated transactions.
      • I1702284309 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52248] Now we trust the PREAUTH_ID document tag for preauthorisation search on accept and do not save duplicate PREAUTH tags.
      • I1703241228 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-53397] Fixed the error "Not a current doc" when sorting P2P documents.
      • I1705026827 [e-Commerce issuing] [CARDS-53413] Fixed incorrect counter value calculation for RBA rules.
      • I1705222395 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53347] MC IPM Outward. Now the pipe doesn't fill DE38 (Approval Code) for non-intracountry transactions in Offline Chip Card Data Input Mode.
      • I1705235303 [Product management] [CARDS-53377] Selection of Bank Date and Local Date for CS Status Log has been changed when a classifier value is restored by a Classifier Action. This is relevant only for those customers who use Reversal Management or/and Datamart.
      • I1705317060 [Core] [CARDS-53408] Intermediate commits have been added to contract subtype and contract type check processes. The commit interval can be configured using process parameters. The default commit interval is 100 records.
      • CARDS-53083 [WAY4 Web] Password complexity requirements can now be added as parameters for WAY4Web user authentication scheme.
      • CARDS-53351 [SEPA interface] SEPA. Added the menu item OpenWay\SEPA\SEPA. File Management\SEPA Outgoing Pending Files
      • CARDS-53379 [JCB interface] JCB ISO. Added the "OWS.Accept Clearing" subitem to the menu item "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. Daily Procedures\JCB. Inward Processing\JCB ISO Inward Processing".
    • 03.44.30.37
      • CARDS-53195 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export. Fixed Billing File records generation.
      • CARDS-53226 [Reversal management] Generation of corrections in intelligent backdated processing has been improved. When a liability tree is processed, corrections will be generated for transfers between Main/Sub trees in the liability hierarchy. Additionally corrections can now be generated for transfers to not amount available accounts, this feature can be enabled by setting the STORNO_NOT_AMAV_CORRECTIONS global parameter to "Y".
      • CARDS-53283 [Core] Each ITEM_DUE is now processed separately in Acquiring products configuration. Previously, using a Due Type other then Value Days Due could cause a collapse of several ITEM_DUE with different signs, leading to incorrect information in Merchant Statement reports.
      • CARDS-53291 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed the inability to redefine the PARTIAL_APPROVAL_ENABLE property in Services or transaction subtypes.
      • CARDS-53334 [NSPK interface] NSPK Processing (pipes): fixed incorrect processing for PDS-0176 and PDS-0190 for AMEX.
      • CARDS-53358 [NSPK interface] Fixed the inability to receive authorization requests from one IPS member to another when both members are served in the same processing centre but direct interbranch routing between them is blocked. Please check external services configuration to share the source channel for correct authorization processing where <ChannelCode> is a source channel: * for Transaction Switch users, external adapter contains "special_processing_options sourceChannelID=<ChannelCode>" * for NetServer users, external channel contains <MODULE TYPE="NETWORK"> section with <PARAMETER NAME="SOURCE_CHANNEL_ID" VALUE="<ChannelCode>"/> The case is directly related to situations when a message received from IPS channel will be routed back to the same channel.
      • I1704189347 [Core] [CARDS-52998] Fixed double fee charging in issuing contracts for financial documents that inherit the fee amount from an authorization document (FROM_AUTH=FEE_AMOUNT is used in basic transaction service setup) when the fee is configured as a Misc service with the tag "MTR_FEE;" and triggered by a usage limiter on authorization document processing.
      • I1705221304 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-53272] IPS Products. Updated according to last NSPK specification.
      • CARDS-53277 [NSPK interface] Affiliated BII Outward Processing (pipe) : supported export of NSPK G2C Credit transactions.
    • 03.44.30.36
      • CARDS-53000 [Reversal management] Liability contract hierarchy is supported in reversal management. To allow intelligent backdated processing for a contract with liability subcontracts, the STORNO_LIAB tag should be set in its product; in this case, the whole liability tree will be recalculated.
      • CARDS-52941 [Reversal management] The ability has been added to properly recalculate contract state with correction documents for fees and interest in intelligent backdated processing. Correction transaction types should be marked using the STORNO_DELAY tag with the "Y" value if a fee is posted in Contracts Daily Update with the preceding date and "N" if a fee is posted in Contracts Daily Update with the current date.
      • CARDS-53201 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): added the ability to redefine card numbers for some accounts on export for mixed company structure. The prefixes of these accounts must be listed in the "ACCOUNT_PREFIX" pipe parameter value, separated by commas. The new pipe parameter, "CUST_GET_CARD_NUMBER" must contain an SQL expression which returns the redefined card number value.
      • CARDS-53163 [DB manager] Fixed inability to add elements to several Exception Lists (OpenWay\Risk Based Assessment\Exception lists) without reopening the sub-form.
      • CARDS-53238 [VISA interface] Th P_ORDER_AGED_ANALYSIS parameter has been deleted from the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • CARDS-53251 [Issuing authorisation] Changed behaviour: now processing of authorization documents with service class Transaction, Online Payment or External Payment will change a contract's counter for authorization code generation independently of the UPD_AUTH_SEQ_N parameter value.
      • I1704041217 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53192] MasterCard IPM OnUs Outward. The pipe no longer fills DE93.
      • I1704187095 [Product management] [CARDS-53269] Usage limiter's end date calculation has been enhanced for usage limiters with Period Type = Billing for sub-contracts.
      • CARDS-51624 [Dispute assistant] MasterCard Transaction Management. A warning message and opening a "CHBK_FRAUD_COUNTER" Event have be added for cases when the number of Fraud Chargebacks is exceeded. DA v2. Create Chargeback activity can't be performed if the number of Fraud Chargebacks is exceeded.
      • CARDS-53149 [Diners Club interface] DCI Merchant Management. Supported DCI International Merchant Registration.
      • CARDS-53265 [AMEX interface] AMEX GNS Inward. Supported empty chargeback gross settlement amount for certification.
      • CARDS-53268 [JCB interface] JCB Outward: for all chip read transactions the "C" value is exported in 22.7 subfield.
    • 03.44.30.34
      • CARDS-46540 [Product management] Due normalization has been improved for Issuing accounts with Due Types: Payment Due, Long Payment Due, Contract Due, Fixed Day Due. If several due items with the same Due Date exist for an account, then only one Due transfer will be performed for the total Due Amount.
      • CARDS-49243 [VISA interface] An equal condition is used to count the number of accounts in the "Total Outstanding" line of the "Aged Analysis of Total Outstanding" section, and "Number of Accounts" line of the "Card Issuance" section in the "QMR VISA Statistics Issuing" report.
      • CARDS-51954 [Product management] Fixed incorrect processing of usage limiter additional actions (charging a fee or opening an Event, for example) when a document is declined.
      • CARDS-52827 [Accounting] Supported configuration of the "Cardholder_Account_Statement" and "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" reports using Date Schemes.
      • CARDS-53193 [Transaction management] Correct funds unblocking is supported for multiple financial presentments and multiple authorizations in different currencies for one transaction chain. In this case, the new pending amount is calculated as the difference between all authorizations pending (without fees) and the financial presentment settlement amount converted into the contract currency. Then it is accumulated under the first matched authorization. The pending value for the initial authorization is stored in the document add_info tags BLK_BASE, BLK_FEE, BLK_CURR.
      • CARDS-53210 [Distributed processing] Removed unexpected call of document reprocessing when routing a message in the Distributed Processing solution.
      • CARDS-53211 [AMEX interface] Date_Expire and Card_Expire contract dates are now considered in calculation of the "Account Balance" section of the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • CARDS-53214 [Transaction management] Fixed incorrect filling of source and target number fields for chargeback documents if the message contains EMV cryptogram data.
      • CARDS-53216 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe): fixed "Settlement Data doesn't contain settlement amounts" error.
      • CARDS-53218 [Product management] Changed the value displayed in the "Total Due" field in the "ROOT\OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service" form. Previously, the field showed the current due amount. Now the total due amount is displayed.
      • CARDS-53221 [Issuing authorisation] Decreased possibility of deadlock when several authorization requests for one card are received at the same time.
      • I1705088151 [VISA interface] [CARDS-53212] VISA BASE II Outward (pipe) : fixed incorrect inheritance for second export of 1st presentment.
      • I1705101042 [DB kernel] [CARDS-53222] Fixed event messages display in the "Messages" form (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Event Types).
      • I1705154150 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53184] MasterCard PVV Offset Export. Fixed error if no data to export.
      • CARDS-53176 [Web banking] PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Lifestyle Banking section has been updated (information about play.id and %padss.application.mode=prod has been added).
    • 03.44.30.33
      • CARDS-52728 [AMEX interface] Added grouping of totals by regions in the "BILLINGS & FEES" section of the XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.
      • CARDS-53053 [Instalment management] Using the CUST_INSTL_FEE_DOC procedure, instalment plan portion amount, tenor, and fee rates can be customized using standard instalment tags.
      • CARDS-52860 [AMEX interface] The "Account Balances" section in the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report has been corrected: - Corrected calculation of 'Credit Outstanding Balance Total' and 'Current Credit Outstanding Balance' amount when the P_MIRROR_OVD parameter value is 'Y'. - Changed row order to fit AMEX specification requirements. - Delinquency group's rows are shown with zero values if there are no corresponding data.
      • CARDS-53107 [Money transfers] Routing search is performed either by member_id if filled, or by PAN.
      • CARDS-53164 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard MPE Import. Fixed TOKEN_BIN tag filling in BIN Table.
      • CARDS-53167 [Money transfers] P2P CSOF tag 06 value (DE104 Usage 02 DSID 5F Tag 08 Source of Funds) returned for Credit accounts and 05 value for Debit/deposit access accounts for money transfers to a VISA card from another IPS card according to VISA requirements.
      • CARDS-53169 [Product management] spac.RESET_INTEREST has been enhanced for custom cases, when Interest Rate should be changed from the Billing cycle start date after holidays, if Interest Rate should be changed in a custom procedure after a new billing cycle starts.
      • CARDS-53170 [Tariff management] Service limit tariffs with preference based on Issuer country (Area) can now be used for source services.
      • CARDS-53177 [AMEX interface] Merchant Management: Fixed processing of incomplete operations.
      • I1704101944; I1704113625 [Accounting] [CARDS-53090] The menu "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Generate Message Dictionary" shows errors if TRANS_TYPE checks failed.
      • I1705098865 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-53158] AMEX DAF Import. Fixed rare error due to checking unhandled messages.
    • 03.44.30.32
      • CARDS-52978 [Issuing] The U_PBT_BY_TOKEN=N parameter should be added to disable unlocking renewed plastic by authorisations initiated by a token.
      • CARDS-48323 [MasterCard interface] IRD configuration has been modified for Spain.
      • CARDS-51938 [Risk management] Excluded technical operations from risk usage limiter processing. Technical operations are operations where transaction type and service class are not filled.
      • CARDS-53113 [Instalment management] Fixed parsing of the "E2.E1 BERTLV" tag that contains an instalment interest rate.
      • I1705038641 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-53109] Eliminated the possibility for incorrect rejection of reversal for a partial approved request due to a different transaction amount.
      • CARDS-51958 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward Processing (pipe): supported new G2C transaction processing.
      • CARDS-53064 [Diners Club interface] DCI Issuer Detail File Import. Supported creating clearing documents. OpenWay\Diners Club\DCI. Daily Procedures\DCI. Inward Processing\DCI DXS Issuer Detail File Inward Processing is used to load issuer clearing and settlements. OpenWay\Diners Club\DCI. Daily Procedures\DCI. Inward Processing\DCI DXS Inward Processing has been removed.
      • CARDS-53131 [VISA interface] VISA BII Inward Processing: supported custom processing for TCRD records. If a TCRD record is present in an incoming transaction, it can be processed by the CUST_INS_DOC procedure.
    • 03.44.30.31
      • CARDS-53039 [Core] Problem when no changes occurred after using the "Change" button in the "Attached Tariff Domains" form has been fixed.
      • CARDS-53077 [Distributed processing] Fixed chip card requests processing on a High Availability primary node after authorization processing was switched to a secondary node.
      • CARDS-53086 [Mobile banking] The problem with empty invoice details in Mobile Banking has been resolved.
      • CARDS-53095 [NSPK interface] NSPK Interface: posting date is used instead of transaction date to calculate ARN.
      • I1703281144 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-53100] DA v2: Added checking that data in the document add_info field is properly terminated with a semicolon for documents that are manually edited. If not, a semicolon will be added to the end of the add_info field.
      • CARDS-51959 [NSPK interface] Added the ability to validate a cardholder's date of birth together with other security values. See documentation for details.
      • CARDS-52972 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Pipe switched to CDF3 Schema Version 16.01.00.00.
      • CARDS-53067 [AMEX interface] AMEX GNS Inward Processing. Added Addendum Type Code to Message Code in Original Doc table to differentiate transactions with Deferred Payment Plan addendum.
    • 03.44.30.30
      • CARDS-52269 [Notifications] If an online reversal did not lead to a change in the amount available, a notification will not created.
      • CARDS-52323 [Invoice management] Fixed error when cross-balance macrotransactions created by a standing order were not linked to the document.
      • CARDS-52808 [WAY4 Web] In WAY4 Web added check of client privileges to access uploaded files and merchant tree contracts.
      • CARDS-52966 [NSPK interface] The menu branch "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR. Details" (with all menu items) and menu items "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Notification Report (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Acknowledgement Report (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Settlement Report (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Settlement Results (briefly)", "OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports\MIR Submission Report (briefly)" have been moved to "OpenWay\MIR\MIR. Reports\" menu branch.
      • CARDS-52983 [DB kernel] Fixed the possibility of infinite loop on BER-TLV tag parsing.
      • CARDS-52989 [VISA interface] VISA BII Outward Processing: fixed creating and sending card-related Fee Collection/Funds Disbursement transactions.
      • CARDS-52990 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect processing of new authentication data elements for schemes that were created before authentication type modification.
      • CARDS-52997 [Product management] FX_RATE tag calculation has been fixed for DCC Info Inquire documents, when DCC_FX_MODE=CR, and IPS currency differs from Merchant and CH currency.
      • CARDS-53012 [Issuing] In the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report, default values are calculated for the P_FORALLCURR, P_LANGUAGE, and P_AMOUNTS_SIGN parameters even if the P_CONNID parameter is not set.
      • CARDS-53020 [Diners Club interface] DCI DXS Inward Processing. Fixed NullPointerException in case of transactions with addendums without date fields.
      • CARDS-53023 [Transaction management] Fixed matching of a transit authorization with a financial presentment from an external channel on the sponsor side.
      • CARDS-53031 [Issuing authorisation] Corrected CHANGE_PIN processing on IRouter for combo-cards
      • CARDS-53036 [Core] Behaviour of the FIRST_BILLING and MIN_BILLING=C tags has been enhanced.
      • I1612096107 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-52844] IC Document Export: fixed "An invalid XML character (Unicode: 0x1a) was found" error when exporting a document containing special characters. Invalid symbols are replaced with the "?" character in an outgoing file.
      • I1704121197 [Core] [CARDS-52967] Processing of annual miscellaneous Service fees for contracts created on February 28 of any non-leap year has been fixed. See Client Upgrade Notes for details.
      • I1704134961 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-52826] Downgraded transaction MasterCard attributes in a financial confirmation are inherited from the preauthorization document.
      • I1704173799 [Issuing] [CARDS-53010] Added a new parameter, P_HINT_Q5, varchar2(255), to the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report. The default value is "/*+rule*/". The parameter makes it possible to change the hint instruction for Q_5 query used for selecting acnt_contracts.
      • I1704174163 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52971] Fixed reversed advice macrotransaction status if reversal is processed for a transaction that has not been posted and the value of the global parameter POST_REVERSED_MTR is 'N'.
      • I1704211939 [Transaction management] [CARDS-53054] PS Ref Number equality is no longer mandatory for matching an authorization with a financial presentment, it is only used to define priority if several authorizations are found.
      • I1704245616 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-53038] IRD criteria of contactless transactions have been revised in the MEA region according to the MasterCard Interchange manual.
      • I1704264344 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52981] When searching for an authorization document for a financial presentment by RRN, no time period limitations are applied. In other search cases, the period is extended to 10 days.
      • I1705030725 [Transaction management] [CARDS-53058] When an authorization and financial presentment have different transaction types, the transaction direction is additionally checked. If the direction differs, documents are not matched.
      • CARDS-53004 [Mobile banking] Mobile banking: a requirement for the value of the allow_multiple_user_sessions parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53005 [Security & key management] Interactive channels API: a requirement for the value of the csrf_protection parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "true" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53006 [Security & key management] Messenger banking: a requirement to not disclose private IP addresses has been added in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53007 [Security & key management] Messenger banking: a requirement for the value of the session_expiry_sec parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "300" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53008 [Mobile banking] Mobile banking: a requirement for the value of the debug_enabled parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53009 [WAY4 Web] WAY4 Web: a requirement for the value of the EnableDeveloperInfo parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-54136 [MasterCard interface] Supported MasterCard Automatic Billing Updater (MABU) functionality for Acquirers.
      • CARDS-54137 [VISA interface] Supported VISA Account Updater (VAU) functionality for Acquirers.
      • CARDS-53033 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Services: Added services according to Release 17.Q3 article AN 1005.
      • CARDS-53040 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Services: Added services according to Release 17.Q3 article AN 1004.
      • CARDS-53047 [AMEX interface] Transaction Processing: Added checking of Service Code 701 as a chip code for AMEX.
      • ICFEE- 107 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-52986] RA configuration has been modified for fallback transactions in Europe.
    • 03.44.30.29
      • CARDS-52662 [Core] Reversal transactions have been excluded from the XLS_CB_f250_3.rdf report.
      • CARDS-52939 [Dispute assistant] Dispute Assistant v2. Fixed the procedure to get the last document in a chain.
      • CARDS-52942 [Dispute assistant] Fixed posting of secondary documents, now when an optional document is reversed, the previous document status is not restored.
      • I1702270914 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-52869] NSPK Outward Processing (pipe): fixed export of last adjustment, which reverses transaction completely.
      • I1704076451 [Notifications] [CARDS-52945] When an attempt is made to open a MTR_FIN_REVERSE Event, a check is made of whether an Event with the "AUTH_T_R" or "AUTH_P_R" code was opened earlier. If one of these Events was opened, the Event with the "MTR_FIN_REVERSE" code will not be opened.
      • I1704245840 [Tariff management] [CARDS-52943] The "No data found" exception error has been fixed during Advanced Application R1 file processing for Personal Usage Activation, in case of Limit Tariff in usage template.
      • CARDS-52936 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Inward Processing. Supported the ability to transfer data from PDS1000, PDS1001, PDS1003, PDS1004, PDS1005, PDS1006, PDS1012, PDS1014 to document.
    • 03.44.30.28
      • CARDS-51882 [Tariff management] Calculation of service fees depending on different tariffs for portions of one transaction amount has been implemented.
      • CARDS-52720 [Core] Extended IF_CS_TYPE_FOR, IF_PARM_FOR to check source/target contracts for a document.
      • CARDS-52746 [Instalment management] The ability to postpone the first payment for an instalment plan up to a certain date has been added. This date should be specified as the value of the SHIFT_DATE tag in document tags, instalment scheme special parameters, or instalment tariff special parameters in YYMMDD format. The first payment will be scheduled according to instalment scheme date configuration but not earlier than the specified date.
      • CARDS-52027 [Transaction management] A financial document will not be matched with an authorization that has a different "PS Reference Number".
      • CARDS-52395 [Transaction management] Functionality missing in 03.44 for linking a financial document to a matched preauthorization document has been restored. If a financial document received in back-office from an OnUs source, is matched with a preauthorization document during the document processing procedure, the preauthorization document's identifier is stored in the financial document's add_info field as the value of the "PREAUTH_ID" tag. System identifiers that a document was received from an OnUs source when at least one of the following conditions is met: 1. A document Source Channel is indicated with the parameter IsOnUs=Yes or IsOnUs=null in the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Message Channels". 2. A document Source Member Id value is null or is marked in the BIN Table with the "CAN_BE_ONUS;" tag or the value is registered as "Acq BIN" in the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Bank Acquiring Parameters" used for own acquiring configuration, or a financial institution is registered for this Member ID value in the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Financial Institutions".
      • CARDS-52609 [VISA interface] In the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf" report: 1. Changed the default value of the P_V_PAY_BRAND_NAME parameter from "V PAY" to "V_V". 2. Supported the ability to configure additional groups in SIC_GROUP table to arrange data groups in the "Merchant Category Group Data" and "Contactless" sections. 3. Added new parameter P_SIC_GROUP_CNTCLS_CLASS_TYPE for configuring data groups in the "Contactless" section. 3. Excluded "V PAY" transactions from the "Merchant Category Group Data" section when P_CEMEA = 'N'.
      • CARDS-52768 [Transaction management] Document Processing has been fixed to support matching between Financial and Auhtorization/Transit Authorization documents received from different sources.
      • CARDS-52848 [Issuing] Fixed use of the P_IS_IMPERSONAL parameter for the XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Issuing_Business_Prepared report.
      • CARDS-52868 [Transaction management] Fixed funds unblocking in the case of multiple authorizations with multiple presentments.
      • CARDS-52871 [Acquiring authorisation] Fixed an error with matching recurring transactions
      • CARDS-52877 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect chip request processing on a High Availability secondary node when the response contains empty issuer script.
      • CARDS-52893 [Core] New tags MIN_BAL_TYPE_SIGN/MAX_BAL_TYPE_SIGN have been supported for use together with MIN_BAL_TYPE/MAX_BAL_TYPE and LIMIT_AMOUNT tags.
      • CARDS-52899 [Acquiring authorisation] Optimized the query to select the main document for processing post authorization operations for P2P transactions.
      • CARDS-52915 [Authentication management] The "OFFICER" scope has been added to validation conditions for an authentication scheme linked to a consumer record.
      • CARDS-52926 [Product management] Product approval has been changed, "Product Renew Mode" form has been added.
      • CARDS-52934 [Transaction management] Fixed error on adjustment document posting if the original authorization was deleted by the Housekeeping process.
      • I1701241115 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52853] Optimized search for authorization documents when multiple authorizations are allowed.
      • I1703249728 [Application management] [CARDS-52849] Resolved issue with missing base relation for a new non-product based related contract during accept of an advanced application R2.
      • I1704121217, I1704192844 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52867] Optimised posting procedure performance for macrotransaction processing of Reversal and Adjustment documents if the value of the additional global parameter PATCH_REVERSE_INTEREST is set to "Y".
      • I1704135142 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52903] A financial document will not be matched with an authorization of a different transaction type even if the reference numbers are the same.
      • I1704188903 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52865] Fixed incorrect matching between Authorization and Financial documents that have the same Transaction Amount and no PS Ref Number reference specified, from merchants who support multiple authorization processing.
      • I1704192981. Wrong IC for new visa B2B Virtual Payments (ICFEE-178) [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-52895] Modified RA configuration for all regions and countries in accordance with VISA release (Apr17-341 Mandatory 2.2 New Visa Business-to-Business Virtual Payments Product).
      • I1704204444 [Issuing] [CARDS-52880] Fixed definition of IPS Product for MasterCard subtypes.
      • I1704206572 [Core] [CARDS-52902] Fixed excessive creation of subcontracts on contract approve when a sub-product is configured with "# of contracts" greater than zero and filled relation fields.
      • I1704207687 [Core] [CARDS-52889] Performance of the Renew Account Scheme Changes procedure has been improved when the system validates the payment priority algorithm for an upper limit template.
      • I1704243534 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-52916] Fixed "No Data Found" error during authorisation processing if contr_subtype.bin_record is invalid.
      • CARDS-52785 [Data preparation and card personalization] Updated "PA DSS Implementation Guide". The section "List of Third-Party Software Used, System Services and Protocols Used" has been changed. Added a warning that the mod_security component is an essential part of the application with regard to security.
      • CARDS-52786 [Issuing] Updated "PA DSS Implementation Guide". The section "Specifying Sensitive Data" has been changed. Added a warning that the system cannot function normally without the PVV and Encrypted PIN fields.
      • CARDS-52884 [Security & key management] Updated "PA DSS Implementation Guide". Full review for PA DSS 3.2 compliance (03.42.3.x, 03.43.3.x, 03.44.3.x).
      • CARDS-51488 [NSPK interface] NSPK SIOM: supported processing of ONUS/Affiliated fraud transactions.
      • CARDS-51490 [NSPK interface] NSPK SIOM: supported processing of unsuccessful authorization fraud transactions.
      • CARDS-52545 [AMEX interface] Added the FILTER parameter (pipe:AMEX GNS Outward Processing.cpp).
      • CARDS-52832 [JCB interface] Added the FILTER parameter (pipe:JCB. Outward Processing.cpp).
      • CARDS-52896 [MasterCard interface] Prepared MasterCard IRD configuration based on FULL MPE (Release 17Q2).
      • I1704129157 [Diners Club interface] [CARDS-52876] DCI MPE (Sys Ops XML File) Import: Supported loading Product Id, Account Funding Source and Product Category fields in BIN Table. Added DCI products to IPS Product Definition (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Routing\IPS Product Definition).
    • 03.44.30.27
      • CARDS-52308 [Datamart] In WAY4 Datamart version 03.45.10, new FI Group Load functionality for performing several loads to Datamart (ETLs) for one banking date has been supported. The fi_load_group tag should be put in f_i.special_parms to configure financial institution groups to be loaded during a certain ETL. The mp_fi_load_group table and forms for filling in the fi_load_group tag in f_i.special_parms has been added from WAY4 Cards version 03.45.30.
      • CARDS-52698 [Application management] "Device Parm Ctrl" and "Merchant Management" additional info types are now supported in Advanced Applications R2 for contract additional information.
      • CARDS-52803 [Transaction management] A new global parameter AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT_RETAIL has been added. The new parameter is used for all transactions except those with hotel, car rental or airline MCC codes, for which the existing parameter AUTH_AMOUNT_DIFF_PCNT is used. This parameter can set the maximum difference between authorization and financial presentment amounts as a percentage. If the difference is below this value, the whole blocked amount will be unblocked, otherwise only the financial amount will be unblocked.
      • CARDS-52809 [Transaction management] Fixed funds unblocking when multiple presentments for one authorization are posted in an order different from accept order.
      • CARDS-52815 [Core] Fixed lengthy execution of the approve process for related acquiring contracts.
      • CARDS-52821 [CB Gate] Fixed incorrect document posting status when the fee is waived by the CBS.
      • CARDS-52824 [Risk management] Restored the ability to recalculate usage limiter counters for acquiring. Testing - Usage Recalculation.
      • CARDS-52833 [Transaction management] Fixed definition of terminal category to search for target dispute contract in posting history documents.
      • I1703076137 [Money transfers] [CARDS-52813] Updated license validation for C2C to an affiliated channel. Affiliate OnUs transactions will not require IPS license setup. The correct routing configuration is as follows: Affiliate should be specified as card BIN Group Channel and the BIN Table channel should indicate IPS.
      • CARDS-51892 [Acquiring authorisation] Voice Authorization Screen application is compatible with Oracle 12c.
      • CARDS-52669 [Data preparation and card personalization] MIR Contactless supported in Data Preparation.
    • 03.44.30.25
      • CARDS-52446 [Customer/account management] In the "Contract_Analytic_Statement" and "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" reports an option has been added to show purchases made using loyalty bonuses in the separate section.
      • CARDS-52732 [Reversal management] Due tolerance configuration is now supported in backdated payment processing in the Reversal Management module. Maximum tolerance supported period is 10 days. In common cases it is recommended to use backdated payments instead of due tolerance setup.
      • CARDS-52735 [Acquiring authorisation] Fixed an error with printing or displaying an incorrect final fee amount on transactions with the issuer's or acquirer's fees.
      • CARDS-52752 [Issuing authorisation] When a PIN is changed after marking a card for reproduction but before receiving a reproduction results file, the new PIN value is also written to the new plastic record.
      • CARDS-52762 [CB Gate] Fixed BerTLV buffers parsing in Application Interface.
      • CARDS-52766 [Core] Validation of setting of classifier value for the contract or client has been enhanced.
      • CARDS-52771 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed frequent rereading of ADD_GLOBAL_PARMS on authorisation.
      • CARDS-52774 [Application management] Client AddOrUpdate Application R2 checks the existence of a client in accordance with the additional global parameters UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_NUMBER and UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_REG_NUMBER.

      • CARDS-52800 [VISA interface] Optimized getCardHolderVerificationMethodsReq query for VDEP.
      • I1610179670 [Core] [CARDS-50722] Added reset of environment variables (global parameters, cached data when posting events, contracts, etc.) when a session is initialized.
      • I1702105338 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-52777] Fixed creation of duplicate Retail Reimbursements in DA R2: For write-off of a dispute case with a presentment for "No Such Card", if a reimbursement (in this case, write-off of the presentment) is created manually, it won't be created automatically by the standard dispute case write-off procedure.
      • I1702160876, I1704098675 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-52727] Fixed Member Id definition for online routing. The change affects instances which route online messages by Member Id on NetServer/Transaction Switch.
      • I1703138261 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-52801] MasterCard IPM Outward: Now documents with an invalid Approval Code will be suspended. MasterCard IPM OnUs Outward: Now if a document has an invalid Approval Code, this Approval Code won't be exported.
      • I1703201358 [Money transfers] [CARDS-52738] If device_parms.device_location value is used as the source of the CPNA tag and the value consists of one word only, the tag value will be calculated as two device_parms.device_location values separated by a space character.
      • I1704041647 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-52697] Replaced incompatible Oracle JDBC driver library (used for Voice Authorisation) with WAY4 Cards bundled JDBC driver.
      • I1704109597 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-52737] Feature implemented by CARDS-50877 has been revoked (financial document inherits MCC from authorisation on DirectP2P transactions) and previous behaviour has been restored.
      • I1704120003 [Notifications] [CARDS-52793] The language defined in "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Global Constants" or for an Officer is no longer used for SMS messages.

    • 03.44.30.24
      • CARDS-52521 [Instalment management] Instalment plan recalculation is now automatically called when contract Billing Date or Due Date is changed.
      • CARDS-52559 [Acquiring authorisation] By default, the posting date after the cut-off time on a device is set to the next working day based on the default calendar. A new feature has been added to redefine the calendar type: the "ACQ_CLNDR_TYPE" parameter defines a special type of acquiring calendar (Full - Configuration Setup - Main Tables - Calendar Types). If the parameter "ACQ_CLNDR_TYPE" is not set, the default calendar will be used. This feature is available only if the "ENABLES_SHIFT_DAY" global parameter is set.
      • CARDS-52668 [Accounting] Interest calculation has been enhanced for Interest Scheme -360 and interest calculation on the 31st day of the month.
      • CARDS-52675 [Reversal management] Fixed changing of the "Is Ready" contract attribute when performing manual reversal management actions using DB Manager.
      • CARDS-52686 [Instalment management] Fixed changing of the "Is Ready" contract attribute when performing manual instalment actions using DB Manager.
      • CARDS-52692 [Transaction management] Document processing behaviour when secondary documents had a higher priority in the financial documents matching procedure than original documents has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52704 [Distributed processing] Restored menu entry OpenWay\Distributed Processing\Configuration Setup\Primary Node Routing Check
      • CARDS-52707 [Fee Prediction] The RewardsBusiness product has been added in RA configuration for Interregional jurisdiction.

ORA-06512: at "OWS.AUTH", line 3054
      • CARDS-52352 [Core] BIN record search on contract subtype validation now checks BIN record status. Active records have a higher priority for being selected than records that are inactive or closed. However, active BIN records with "Data Source" = Own have a lower priority than inactive or closed records from other sources.
      • CARDS-52540 [Case management] The activity to move an object from one case to another has been extended to work with case files. A new object role, "File" ("F") has been added to the system's standard configuration for all domain categories (OpenWay/Case Management/OpenWay Settings/Case Object Roles).

    • 03.44.30.20
      • CARDS-52265 [VISA interface] XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf report "Member and Merchant Data" report section now supports Liability hierarchy of merchant acquiring contracts. Calculation of the following rows has been updated: Number of Merchants: of which are acquiring MOTO transactions of which are acquiring E-Commerce transactions
      • CARDS-52493 [Instalment management] Added the ability to perform early repayment of an instalment transaction. The Service should be configured with the INVOICE_ACTION=EARLY_REPAYMENT tag in service details. The document's additional data field can contain the INST_PLAN_IDT tag with the idt of the instalment plan for which early repayment is being performed. If no tag is present in the document, all instalment plans will be paid one by one in the order of creation. Early repayment keep mode can be specified using the INST_ER_KEEP tag with the values "T" - keep tenor, "P" - keep portion amount.
      • CARDS-52531 [Core] New actions to recalculate contract functional dates have been added to the CSS screen OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service -> [Contr.Dates] form.
      • CARDS-49993 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward Processing (pipe): fixed PDS-0306 (File Message Counts) verification - rejected messages are excluded from the value for comparison.
      • CARDS-52534 [Issuing authorisation] IRouter authorisation procedures have been corrected to suppress mistaken error messages.
      • CARDS-52535 [Issuing authorisation] The authorisation code generation algorithm has been restored to a contract counter-based one when the UPD_AUTH_SEQ_N parameter is not set.
      • CARDS-52538 [VISA interface] For the "DWH_CONF" configuration group (OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\Configuration Groups), a new value has been added for the "DWD_CARD_CATEGORY" classifier - "Deferred Debit" (DEFERRED_DEBIT) for a separate card category.
      • CARDS-52547 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect selection of message code for Core banking system. IRouter.
      • CARDS-52556 [Case management] The Case Management activity "Create sub case" also stores an activity comment as a new case description when an application sub-case is created.
      • I1703275173 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52555] Performance of the procedure for matching financial and authorization documents during the document accept process has been optimized for the following cases: 1. Matching a financial document from an external (Off-Us) Acquirer and multiple authorization documents. 2. Matching a financial document and an authorization document according to RRN.
      • CARDS-51649 [VISA interface] For the "Visa Statistics Acquiring Business" report: - added a new block "MERCHANT ACQUIRING TOTAL" with sums of regional volumes. - calculation of "Sales - of which Electron" subsection in the transaction section has been supported. - the sections "No. of terminals installed at merchants" and "Number of mPOS terminals installed at merchants" have been renamed to "No. of terminals active at merchants" and "Number of mPOS terminals active at merchants". These sections contain information about terminals on which at least one transaction was made during the report period.
      • CARDS-51856 [Risk management] Created a new risk report, "Exceeded Total Credit/Refund Transact. Nmbr to Total Purchase Transact. Nmbr Ratio" (OpenWay\Acquiring\Merchant Risk Management\Risk Reports - Acquiring Single). It is necessary to set the TOTCRDRTRANSNUMRATIO risk scheme parameter (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Acquiring Products\Device Risk Schemes) - Total Credit/Refund Transact. Nmbr to Total Purchase Transact. Nmbr Ratio. Only device contracts for which the ratio of Credit/Refund transactions to the total number of purchase transactions in a period exceeds the value of the TOTCRDRTRANSNUMRATIO parameter set in the risk scheme will be included in the report. Only Credit(Trans Type IDT=0616) and Retail (Trans Type IDT=0515) transactions will be analysed when building the report.
      • CARDS-51857 [Risk management] Created a new report, Credits_Issued_By_Merchant.rdf. The report is run from OpenWay\MC Statistics Reports\Risk Reports\Credits Issued By Merchant.
      • CARDS-51864 [Risk management] Added a new report, MC_Acquiring_Fraud_Basis_Points.rdf, and statistic attributes (OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Dictionaries\Statistic Attributes (custom)) for its support: Trans classifier: Device Type Transaction (PS_TRN_DEVICE_TYPE) Trans classifier: Fraud Type (PS_TRN_FRAUD_TYPE) Trans classifier: Card Present (PS_TRN_IS_CARD_PRESENT), Trans classifier: Mastercard MO/TO/Ecomm Transaction (PS_TRN_MC_MOTOECOMM)

    • 03.44.30.17
      • CARDS-52471 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): fixed "status was changed from Close to Open" error when using custom card status (F333 in ADD_FIELDS_T3 pipe parameter).
      • CARDS-52475 [Reversal management] In the Reversal Management module, correction of "Behavior Type" changes has been fixed when changes were done at correction start date.
      • CARDS-52489 [VISA interface] The default value of the P_CEMEA parameter in the "Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report has been changed, the new value is "Y".
      • CARDS-52492 [Bill payments] Corrected visibility of payment type properties. Payment type properties created via mBilling request are now visible.
      • I1702061012 [Core] [CARDS-52491] Character buffer overflow error message generation when approving Service Packages with long name values has been fixed.
      • I1703160402 [Product inspector] [CARDS-52474] Product Inspector test script import has been modified when in the file being imported there are test scripts with the same codes that already exist in the destination WAY4Cards system. Previously, all test script steps already present in the destination database were deleted, which led to links being lost in comparing script results with the standard ones. This behaviour cannot be restored. In the first step of the import procedure, all the existing test steps in the database are marked with the new status "Obsolete". In the second step, the system checks if the step number exists in the file being imported. If not, the step in the database is kept with the "Obsolete" status, otherwise the step gets a status and inherits other parameters from the file being imported. When a Product Inspector script is run, a step with the "Obsolete" status behaves the same way as a step with the "Skip" status.
      • I1703174475 [Product management] [CARDS-52501] Unnecessary generation of "Invalid product changes" error message during Contracts Daily Update procedure has been fixed for contracts that do not have a product.
      • CARDS-52360 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard MCBS Import: Supported new format according to Global Operations Bulletin No. 2 - 1 February 2017.
      • CARDS-52403 [Acquiring authorisation] The Voice Authorization screen has been refactored and migrated to the last java version.
      • CARDS-52472 [MasterCard interface] Modified IRD configuration for Lebanon in accordance with MasterCard release 17Q2: MEA 323 - Introduction of Contactless IRD Structure in Lebanon.
    • 03.44.30.16
      • I1702106547 [Risk management] [CARDS-52437] Fixed incorrect validation of merchant stop list conditions for the predefined condition "Suspicious Contra Party" in usage limiters.

      • CARDS-52342 [Application management] In Advanced Applications R2, application accept has been downgraded to approve in secondary nodes for NoWorkflow mode if such behaviour is not refused by the global parameter APPL_NON_SAFE_ON_SECONDARY=DECLINE.
      • CARDS-52349 [Core] The "Active Tariffs" form in OpenWay\Tariffs\Tariff for Contracts (Edit Personal) - Active Trf has been enhanced. Tariffs specified in the account scheme, account templates, services, standing orders and date schemes are shown with the "Yes" value in the "Used In Cfg" field of the form.
      • CARDS-51361 [Notifications] For date variables like %TRANS_DATE[[*shift]*date_format]% if [*date_format] is not declared the format with the "default" code described in "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Client Classifiers\Formatting Styles" is used. If there is no "default code" the standard date mask "YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS" is used.

      • I1701112611 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-52396] A new parameter has been added to the "MC Statistics Acquiring Business" report, P_ATTR_VALUE_ISONUS. The default value is "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)" to customize the "is_on_us" flag. The default value has been changed for the P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_1 - checks by group_channel are extended by analysis of card_brand for support of affiliated transactions - " trans.chain_type in ('U') and target.card_brand like 'E_%' ".
      • I1702080846 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-52354] DA v2. Fixed settlement amount calculation for credit Second Presentments.

      • I1703017366 [Core] [CARDS-52374] When an event is posted for a contract, the last CDU date is not checked for events that change contract status.
      • I1703024740 [Core] [CARDS-52378] Standing order amount calculation has been fixed for cases when an order's posting date is earlier than the current banking date, and when the order's minimum and maximum amount currency differs from the account currency.
      • I1703038675 [Risk management] [CARDS-52383] Incorrect processing of several usage limiters with the same limiter type for one transaction is no longer possible.
      • CARDS-52137 [Data preparation and card personalization] Export MasterCard PayPass MagStripe CVC3 Validation Key suppored in MC OBKM pipe.
      • CARDS-52373 [VISA interface] VISA Prepare Outward Files (procedure): added the "COMMIT_BY" parameter to control intermediate commits. Possible values: BATCH/FILE/PROCESS(default).
      • CARDS-52386 [Acquiring] Additional tags BASE_RATE and FX_MARKUP_PCT are supported for DCC Info Inquiry documents.
      • CARDS-52387 [Fee Prediction] RA configuration and IC tariffs have been modified for the Czech Republic according to Visa Business News (AI06374,AI06367).
      • CARDS-52399 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Outward Processing (pipe): improved DE4 and DE49 function for dispute transactions. If a document's reconciliation currency does not match the 1st presentment currency, the document's transaction amount/currency will be exported instead.
      • CARDS-52409 [Acquiring authorisation] Voice Authorization Screen is functional.
      • CARDS-52412 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe) : added customization points.
      • I1702212586 [JCB interface] [CARDS-52413] JCB Interface fixed format (pipes): supported contactless PEM.
    • 03.44.30.11
      • CARDS-52015 [Bill payments] Biller Management: ATM Retail contracts are now created with consideration of the requested channel.
      • CARDS-52020 [Issuing authorisation] Tokenization activation code stored under a document has been masked.
      • CARDS-52061 [Issuing authorisation] Issuer scripts creation is supported for cards permanently working in a secondary node.
      • CARDS-52070 [Product management] The CURRENT_CYCLE tag is supported for all Functional Dates.
      • CARDS-52097 [Housekeeping] In order to make housekeeping for Cases - relations between CM_CASE_ACTIV and CM_CASE_OBJ are switched off for the Housekeeping process in the standard Housekeeping setting. "Import Standard Settings" must be performed after upgrade.
      • CARDS-52113 [Issuing authorisation] Added the ability to log missing ATC values to a document's additional information. A new global parameter, LOG_MISSING_ATC_TO_DOC=Y activates this feature.
      • CARDS-52215 [Issuing authorisation] Data from field 112 have been parsed on Purchase token operation.
      • CARDS-52302 [Tariff management] Corrected loyalty action limit restriction if bonus service is configured for another contract using the CONTRACT_FOR tag.
      • CARDS-52320 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe): fixed incorrect creation of settlement documents with zero amount.
      • CARDS-52331 [Diners Club interface] DCI Clearing Import: Supported loading files with long (more than 32 symbols) names.
      • CARDS-52353 [Product management] Corrected behaviour: now the process OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Renew All For Institution correctly approves Service Packages with additional packs: first all additional packs, then main packages.
      • I1611249741 [Core] [CARDS-52334] FX rate definition for multicurrency limit normalization has been fixed according to corresponding Posting Date.
      • I1612046735 [Core] [CARDS-52303] For the "test script import" pipe, search for a CLIENT_TYPE value for the APPL_CLIENT.CLT tag has been modified, now only financial institution is checked.
      • I1701270697 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-52291] Fixed incorrect currency conversion rate use in issuer authorization after return from Stand-in.
      • I1702157314 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52313] When validating a contract subtype, the BIN record is checked even if it is already filled.
      • I1702208476 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52312] Added a new response type, "Transaction Confirmed", to "Safe Doc" forms.
      • I1702225223 [Automated routines] [CARDS-52304] The Approve procedure can be be called for sub-products. If the main product is not ready, Approve will be executed for the entire hierarchy; if the main product is ready, only the sub-product will be approved. A new form has been added, OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Product Definition\Products (No Hierarchy), for viewing all products without hierarchy.
      • I1703076703 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-52318] Truncated address city field to 32 symbols when filling device parameters.
      • I1702036425 [Core banking interface] [CARDS-52235] Documents in the Core_banking_interface directory that describe work with C pipes have been renamed, with the OLD_ prefix added.
      • CARDS-51495 [Core] Reports XLS_CB_f250_1.rdf, XLS_CB_f250_2.rdf, XLS_CB_f250_3.rdf: - Added count of contactless cards, transactions and devices. - Supported consolidated report for all financial organization branches. - Supported counting of cards with only 2 groups: debit/credit.
      • CARDS-52223 [Fee Prediction] IC tariffs have been modified according to VISA release article: Apr17-335 2.9 Changes to Visa Gold International Interchange Reimbursement Fees for Japan Issuers.
      • CARDS-52252 [Fee Prediction] IC tariffs have been modified according to VISA release article: Apr17-341 2.2 New Visa Business-to-Business Virtual Payments Product.
      • CARDS-52321 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture file Import: added JCB specific for further export ECI (PDE3009) to JCB.
      • CARDS-52343 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe) : added the "FIN_TRANS_SPLIT" parameter which allows a fee transaction to be exported separately from the main transaction. Added the "ADD_FIELDS_T5_FEE" parameter to redefine T5 record fields for fee transactions. Added the "FIN_ADD_FIELD" parameter for customizing transactions select.
      • CARDS-52344 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe) : added "PAN_LENGTH_19" pipe parameter which allows account number fields with a length of 19 digits to be exported. Leading zeroes are added if necessary.
      • CARDS-52345 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): added "T1_FOR_T5" = Y/N(default) pipe parameter which allows export of T1 records when T5 records exist even if the billing period is not being closed.
      • CARDS-52346 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): additional customization points for T1 Last Payment Amount ( F292 ) and T1 Last Payment Date (F308 ) have been added.
    • 03.44.30.10
      • CARDS-52250 [Core] The KEEP_CONTRACT_ID tag is set in a Misc Service (Service Details) or transaction subtype (Fee Algorithm). When a Misc document is created, the contract identifier is specified in add_info.
      • I1612121917 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-51820] "No Check" Auth scenario has been removed from forms as obsolete. The additional global parameter ENABLE_NO_CHECK is no longer supported.
      • CARDS-52170 [Instalment management] Corrected instalment plan recalculation when fee capitalization is used.
      • CARDS-52263 [Customer/account management] Standard CUST_STATE_STR_TO_LOG procedure has been changed: duplication of records during contract balance prediction logging has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52278 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect redefinition of message settlement date on IRouter authorisation.
      • I1701316576 [Third-party batch interface] [CARDS-52274] RBS. Outward Processing: Added logging amounts: Total Amount from DB, Total File Amount, Total Source Amount.
      • I1702174295 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-52110] NSPK Inward Processing pipe: fixed incorrect message code (S2IIF1X1, S2III1X1) generation.
      • I1702211917 [VISA interface] [CARDS-52244] VISA Inward Processing: fixed doc.target_member_id filling for incoming Fee Collection with empty Destination BIN field.

    • 03.44.30.08
      • CARDS-52140 [Product management] Checking of some contract balances, classifiers and parameters has been supported for specific contract roles.
      • CARDS-52143 [Product management] Ability to use some client attributes as contract parameters without their registration has been implemented. For example CLIENT.COMPANY_NAME or CLIENT.AGE can now be used as IF_PARM tag values.
      • CARDS-51674 [Tariff management] Contract parameters with "Location of Current Value = TARIFF" configuration can be used now in Standing Orders and Event Types as tag values to redefine fixed amounts/counters with tariff data values.
      • CARDS-52208 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import: Fixed filling Send Member Id field in Funds Disbursement Outward transactions.

      • CARDS-52169 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced TC33 Acquirer Capture import pipe: "Total Authorization Amount" field is stored in the document for further export.
      • CARDS-52188 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: additional customization points have been added.
      • CARDS-52189 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: added the "ACCOUNT_PREFIX" parameter to define the first symbols of accounts for special processing. Default value is "CH".
      • CARDS-52190 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: added "REPORT_TO_LINK_T10" and "PARENT_LINK_T10" parameters which make it possible to override "REPORT_TO_LINK" and "PARENT_LINK" parameters for T10 records. Added "TWO_LEVEL_STRUCTURE"="Y"/"N"(default) parameter. If "Y" it is allowed to set the parent link for card directly to a corporate contract.

    • 03.44.30.07
      • CARDS-51680 [Web services] New menu branches have been added: OpenWay\Web Services and OpenWay\Way4Web. The "WS Users & Grants" menu branch has been moved from OpenWay\System\DB Administrator Utilities to these new menu branches; the linked menu OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\WS Users & Grants has been removed. For more details, see the section "Client Upgrade Notes on Impact changes".
      • CARDS-52059 [High availability] Authorisation document request category is now inherited from a secondary node.
      • CARDS-52022 [Risk management] Fixed incorrect processing of usage limiters with the SingleSliding period type when the limiter's period was not defined for a particular contract with an application or manually. Without this additional determination, the limiter is not analyzed.
      • CARDS-52093 [Authentication management] Fixed "Failed to calculate DP routing, use default routing" warning for Authentication Server Context operations.
      • CARDS-52111 [Distributed processing] Fixed incorrect authorisation document replication processing which led to inconsistency of data between primary and secondary nodes.
      • CARDS-52133 [Instalment management] Instalment Event = "Plan Closed", according to which an Instalment Event Fee is charged is no longer generated when an instalment plan in preview or inactive status is closed.
      • CARDS-52142 [Issuing authorisation] Error using three delimiters ('|') instead of two when answering TAR messages during MDES transactions has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52154 [Authentication management] User must change password if it was reset by admin and parameter DEF_PW_CHANGE is set to Y.
      • CARDS-52164 [Core] Display of balance amounts after performing the balance prediction procedure has been corrected in WAY4 Web. Cache clearing has been added.
      • I1702196631 [Product management] [CARDS-52141] Fixed amount calculation for standing orders with the BY_BATCH tag; now zero amount orders are not recalculated based on account balance.
      • I1702213736:B: Visa Croatia: wrong region defined between EEA card & Croatia merchant (ICFEE-164) [VISA interface] [CARDS-52171] VISA Country Table. Now the direct area for Croatia is VISA: European Economic Area Sub-region. Manual Action! No impact on transaction processing.
      • CARDS-52048 [Dispute assistant] DA v2: Supported processing of a duplicate secondary document if is matched with an original document.
      • CARDS-52080 [Issuing authorisation] The TAR response code for VISA authorizations has been changed from 5 to the real response code of the transaction.
      • CARDS-52084 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Added the ability to customize the StatusCode field for the CorporateInformation_4000 and AccountInformation_4300 aggregates.
      • CARDS-52104 [Issuing authorisation] VDEP Active account management velocity checking result and Device identifier tags have been added to document.
      • CARDS-52123 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IRD Calculation: Base IRD Configuration now uses native DE22, PDS0023 and PDS0052 values to define IRD specification.

      • CARDS-52014 [Customer/account management] Added a new procedure cust_cms_stat() for gathering custom statistical information in the gather CMS statistics process.

      • CARDS-52062 [Issuing authorisation] It is possible to create Tokens in Stand-In mode.

      • CARDS-43148 [Customer/account management] Added a new parameter P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS for the "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details.rdf" report for using the report with Way4Web.
      • CARDS-51973 [Customer/account management] Added a new parameter P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS for the "Cardholder Contract Statement" and "Merchant Contract Statement" reports for using these reports with Way4Web.
      • CARDS-51710 [Core] The BILLING_DAY contract parameter has now the highest priority for calculating Billing Date for Monthly billing.
      • CARDS-51725 [Core] To copy a Billing Date from the top contract to Sub-liab contracts when the Billing Date is recalculated for the top contract, the tag value RECALC_BILLING=COPY_TO_LIAB_SUBS; should be used.

      • CARDS-51928 [VISA interface] Corrected PVV data format in 0302 message for VISA.
      • CARDS-51960 [Transaction management] Country Table: Revised record for Madagascar. Code (3 bytes) must be "MDG", Code (2 bytes) must be "MG", Code (Numeric) must be "450", Curr Name must be "MALAGASY ARIARY", Curr Code must be "MGA", N Curr Code must be "969". No impact on transaction processing.
      • CARDS-51965 [Instalment management] Instalment fee code is now taken from an Instalment Scheme even if the fee rate is passed in document tags. Previous system behaviour was to use "FEE" as a fee code value regardless of Instalment Scheme settings.
      • I1701163750 [Money transfers] [CARDS-51967] BIN routing search has been changed for P2P transactions from cards to accounts.
      • I1701242974 [Transaction management] [CARDS-51980] Corrected contract status check - no reversals are allowed for a closed contract even if there is a valid contract status with code 14.
      • I1701271032 [Tariff management] [CARDS-51919] Changing Interest Tariff Apply Mode without changing interest rates has been enhanced.
      • I1702012564 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51961] MasterCard MPE Import: excluded the IP0036T1 table from checking for presence.
      • CARDS-51765 [DB kernel] Updated Main Technical Requirements: minimum hardware requirements for running Reports software have been updated to 2 CPU, 4 Gb RAM. A new manual, system/ows_OracleReports12Setup.html has been added.
