      • CARDS-48158 [Host2Host interface] If acquirer parameters are not found by member ID, a search is made for default acquirer parameters by the "default" member id.
      • CARDS-51234 [Product inspector] A new "test_script_export" pipe parameter, SILENT, with Y/N values has been added for use from Scheduler. If the parameter value is "Y", no dialog message will be shown.
      • CARDS-51434 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward ONUS: fixed PDS-0025.2 filling for reversals. A reversal will be exported only after receiving the appropriate [1644-685] (Financial Position) message for the original transaction.
      • CARDS-51451 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: added Member ID to error message when getting Member parameters.
      • CARDS-51752 [MasterCard interface] IRD configuration has been modified for IRD PW in EU.
      • CARDS-51762 [MasterCard interface] Error in sending additional data for MDES TAR response has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51780 [Authentication management] Fixed incorrect processing of long values for parameters of the procedure used by Authentication Server when the High Availability solution is not used.
      • CARDS-51783 [Transaction management] Matching procedure for Transit (Affiliated) Authorization and Financial documents has been fixed in cases when a transaction from an Affiliated Acquirer is addressed to an Issuer located on the same WAY4 host as the Affiliated Acquirer through connection to Payment Systems because there is no direct settlement (no interbranch routing setup) between such Affiliated Acquirer and Issuer Institutions. In such configuration WAY4 system logs two pairs of authorization and financial documents (from Affiliated Acquirer to Payment System and from Payment System to own Issuer).
      • CARDS-51824 [MasterCard interface] IPS Products: Removed duplicated records for MasterCard.
      • CARDS-51825 [AMEX interface] AMEX FSF Export: Supported empty Approval Code and empty batches won't be exported now.
      • CARDS-51826 [Fleet cards] Displayed "Discount Amount" value sign has been changed for authorization documents.
      • CARDS-51827 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import: Fixed outgoing transaction processing and CHANGE_CURR pipe parameter processing.
      • CARDS-51829 [Reversal management] Corrected filling history of latest operations in backdated processing.
      • CARDS-51836 [Tariff management] Optimized load of personal tariffs for large contract hierarchies.
      • CARDS-51859 [CB Gate] Fixed reversal message routing to core banking system for utility payments.
      • I1407093543 [VISA interface] [CARDS-43531] VISA BASEII Inw History Processing: removed duplicate check for History Out files without header TC90.

      • CARDS-51594 [NSPK interface] [NSPK REL] 17.1 B-02. NSPK Outward Processing will not export "1740-781" and "1740-782" messages if "NSPK_RELEASE"="17.1" global parameter is set.
      • CARDS-51636 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Apr17-340 2.1 Processing Requirements for Staged Digital Wallet Transactions. Supported a new value, "WT" for Business Application ID field in AI,AN,CA,FL,LG TCR3 records.

      • CARDS-51776 [VISA interface] VISA Stop List: Added action codes (request codes) 14 and 54 to the Standard Handbook.
      • CARDS-51784 [VISA interface] VISA BII ONUS Outward Processing: added new "PAN_FROM_TKN" parameter, if set to 'Y' and the "D_TKN" tag is not null, the "D_TKN" tag value will be exported in TCR0 pos 05-23 Account Number field instead of the "doc.TARGET_NUMBER" value.
      • CARDS-51808 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Apr17-390 2.14 : supported new "Token Requestor ID" field in "TCR4 - Supplemental Financial Data" in BASE II Draft Data Transactions. If this field has a meaningful value in the incoming transaction it is stored in the "WSP_REQ_ID" tag of the document.
      • CARDS-51823 [UnionPay interface] UPI Bin Table Import: Added the CDV_ALGORITHM pipe parameter. By default this parameter is null.
    • 03.44.29.47
      • CARDS-51734 [VISA interface] VISA Outward Processing: fixed "POS Terminal Capability" field filling when terminal capabilities are unknown.
      • CARDS-51739 [High availability] Fixed typo in code of HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY and HA.DEFERRED_DOC_APPLY_DELAY global parameters.
      • I1609226977 [Core banking interface] [CARDS-51687] RBS Document Import: fixed response file for import file after previous unsuccessful import.
      • I1611154209 [Notifications] [CARDS-51591] Notification generation for expired fund holds unblocking has been corrected. A new event code "CLOSED_AUTH_DOC" has been added.
      • CARDS-51637 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Apr17-376 4.5: supported new "Payment Account Reference" field in BASE II Draft Data Transactions. If this field has a meaningful value in an incoming transaction it is stored in the "PAR" tag in the document.
      • CARDS-51693 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File Import (pipe): the value of the "Purchase Identifier" field (TC33 CP01 TCR1 pos 45-69) is stored in the document's "PURCH_ID" tag instead of in the "CS_PURCH_ID" tag used earlier. VISA BASE II Outward pipe: supported export of the "Purchase Identifier" field (TC05 TCR1 pos 133-157) from the "PURCH_ID" tag.
      • I1612279006 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-51719] IRD configuration has been modified for EU region.
    • 03.44.29.45
      • CARDS-48740 [POS management] Final advice is supported for P2P transactions.
      • CARDS-51673 [Fee Prediction] MasterCard MPE Import. Supported loading amount restriction from MPE for a particular IRD by tag in the configuration. Now the configuration supports loading amount restriction for Spain IRD 75 and 85 for retail transactions.
      • CARDS-51676 [CB Gate] Utility Payment message routing to bank system rule selection algorithm has been corrected.
      • CARDS-51683 [Product management] Usage_Limiters_Css.current_status value now considers the state of Contract Classifiers, as before. When the condition is false, the value is "S" (Service Deactivated).
      • I1512213945 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51668] MasterCard Inward Processing: fixed FILE_MASK parameter processing in silent mode.
      • I1610259005 [Authentication management] [CARDS-50820] High Availability deferred apply can now process authentications log.
      • I1612227997 [Transaction management] [CARDS-51672] Fixed usage limiter counter calculation for partial reversals.
      • CARDS-50996 [Transaction management] The "TOKEN" transaction attribute has been set for acquiring transactions according to bin_table settings.
      • CARDS-51660 [VISA interface] VISA Interface: added support of Merchant Initiated Transactions.
      • CARDS-51662 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Apr17-341 2.2 : Added new Commercial Product ID 'X' to the default value of the 'COMMERCIAL_PRODUCT_ID' pipe parameter.

    • 03.44.29.41
      • CARDS-50923 [Acquiring] Default acquiring product configurations have been added to the standard configuration.
      • CARDS-51435 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect "PIN change" processing on TS IRouter when request to an external system is required.
      • CARDS-51629 [Core] The error message "History mode can not be empty" has been modified to the warning message "History mode may be required" when approving a Service Package.
      • CARDS-51647 [Invoice management] Overdue substate restore procedure has been fixed for invoice payment reject.
      • I1607269017 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-50154] DA v2: Fixed the procedure to get the last document in a chain. Supported processing reversals that were not generated in the DA interface. The activity "Accepted Presentment Reversal (Iss)" (idt DSP_ACPT_PRS_REV_SYSACT) must be registered in the acquirer strategy.
      • I1612293501 [High availability] [CARDS-51620] Incorrect PostingStatus values are no longer assigned to documents moved from a secondary HA node when deferred processing takes these records in a different order than the original one.
      • CARDS-51148 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q2 Global 521, Global 533, Global 566, AP 345, MEA 323: Added Reject Error Messages with codes 0008, 2204, 2595, 2639, 2641, 2662, 2809, 2810, 2811, 2814, 2817, 2823, 2824.
      • CARDS-51561 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q2 Global 594: Supported loading the Payment Account Reference field of an ADDR message to the document tag PAR.
      • CARDS-51631 [VISA interface] IPS Product Definition: Changed name for VISA product "X" from "Reserved" to "B2B Virtual Payments".
      • CARDS-51658 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard NSPK Outward: From 28.02.2017, the pipe will fill PDS0765 for MoneySend Payment Transactions.
    • 03.44.29.39
      • CARDS-49861 [Fleet cards] Implemented database API for user interface Fleet document screens.
      • CARDS-51097 [Tariff management] Tariff personalization forms have been enhanced. A separate form, "Tariff By Contract" that can be viewed at OpenWay\Tariffs\Tariff for Contracts (Edit Personal) - Active Trf shows contract tariffs that are available for personalization and makes it possible to personalize the product/template tariff or to restore the default value. Personalization can be performed by defining new tariff values, all other data is copied from the template/global tariff with the same "Tariff Code Ext" value.
      • CARDS-51277 [Core] Mirroring to Classifier for contract parameters with "Location of Current Vvalue" = Client configuration has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51535 [Core] Changing of hardcoded balances for contracts has been optimised.
      • CARDS-51592 [Notifications] Processing of the default Service (with id=0) for correct representation of "%SERVICE$..." variables has been added.
      • I1611104436 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-51596] Increased the precision of reading FX rates for macrotransactions to 12 digits for use in screen forms and reports.
    • 03.44.29.38
      • CARDS-51487 [Acquiring] For the "Merchant Contract Statement" report, parameter values (P_DATE_FROM; P_DATE_TO; P_ZIP_CODE; P_REPTYPE; P_SQL_TRACE; P_F_I; P_ID) can be set directly without local_constants. If these parameters are not set, values from local_constants will be used.
      • CARDS-51569 [Transaction management] Non tariff-dependent conditions for usage limiters with tariffs are checked before tariff search to minimize database load.
      • CARDS-51571 [Core] Fixed calculation of the "PS_ISS_INT_PRODUCT_NAME" statistic parameter.
      • CARDS-51572 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing: fixed ARN recalculation for Adjustments, when an Adjustment has the same date as original transaction.
      • CARDS-51579 [JCB interface] JCB Variable Outward: fixed ARN field 31 subfield 2 filling. Now it matches PDE3901.2. Removed DE14 filling for non ICC transactions.
      • CARDS-51580 [AMEX interface] Fixed calculation of the "Account Balance" section in the "AMEX Statistics Issuing Business" report.
      • CARDS-51586 [Host2Host interface] IRouter: Removed unnecessary incorrect PIN tries processing in routing contract.
      • CARDS-51154 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q2 Global 521. IPS Product Definition: Added the "MasterCard Flex Prepaid" product with the MPD code.

    • 03.44.29.37
      • CARDS-51449 [Product inspector] Added sorting by ID for application action logging in PI test results.
      • CARDS-51489 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export. Enhanced customization.
      • CARDS-51563 [Money transfers] Ability to change the CUP Channel name letter has been implemented.
      • I1611305656 [Product inspector] [CARDS-51348] Product Inspector test script import has been modified when in the file being imported there are test scripts with codes that already exist: a UI dialog is displayed to confirm the script update. If script update is chosen, all the existing test steps will be deleted and the new one rewritten. This dialog window appears only if the pipe's SILENT mode parameter is switched off.

      • CARDS-51452 [High availability] Added deferred authorisation processing to financial document accept procedure.

      • CARDS-51530 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File: fixed doc.MERCHANT_ID filling. This field is filled only from the TCR1 record of the file being imported.
      • CARDS-51533 [NSPK interface] NSPK SIOM Outward: fixed Oracle grants for Clerk role.
      • I1509142952 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-51531] IC Documents Export, IC Documents Import. The "EXCLUDE_TAGS" parameter has been added to IC Documents Export, IC Documents Import pipes, making it possible to exclude export/import of the specified tags from/to doc.add_info.

    • 03.44.29.34
      • CARDS-51466 [Data preparation and card personalization] 3DS AAV Keys supported for magnetic cards with MC Virtual encoding method.
      • I1611219869 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-51388] "AMEX Statistics Issuing Business" default behaviour has changed. Now the report will group data by Internal Product Names, not by AMEX IPS Product names as before. To support this behaviour, a new parameter, P_ATTR_PS_ISS_INT_PRODUCT_NAME, has been added to the report (the default value is "PS_ISS_INT_PRODUCT_NAME"). Also, additional configuration is required and statistics gathering should be repeated for the required period to see the results in the new format. To keep the old behaviour, the P_ATTR_PS_ISS_INT_PRODUCT_NAME parameter should be set with an empty value. Please contact OpenWay Support for more details.
      • I1612147610 [Tariff management] [CARDS-51483] The "Duplicate with Data" activity is now available for tariff subdomains. The result of "Duplicate with Data" is that all "Is Ready" status tariff data values are duplicated in the same "Is Ready" status.
      • CARDS-51380 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer File Import: Loading Fund Disbursement from FCP files.
      • CARDS-51486 [Tariff management] Additional validation for global tariff data input has been added. When "Start Date" is not specified, the ability to set the tariff from the current banking date will be validated. When it is prohibited, the error message "Tariff Start Date Missing" will be returned.
      • CARDS-51492 [AMEX interface] Transaction Processing: Added checking of Service Code 702 for AMEX.
      • CARDS-51496 [Transaction management] Now we collect multiple authorizations for one presentment only if ps_ref_number (TREF) are equal.
      • I1611305517 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51501] Interchange tariffs have been modified for EU (Intra-Western) in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Manual.
      • I1612200174 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51505] MasterCard IPM Outward: Now we don't send DE54 Cashback amount in chargebacks.
      • CARDS-51481 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Outward (variable): added the "EXT_CURR_EXP" parameter for changing the currency exponent on transaction export.
    • 03.44.29.32
      • CARDS-49263 [Product management] New Billing Date functionality has been implemented for issuing products.
      • CARDS-51447 [Issuing] "3DS AAV Key" type has been added to the dictionary for double 3DS AAV DES Key.
      • CARDS-51454 [Product inspector] Logging of minimum and maximum balance amounts and dates has been added to Product Inspector. Logging is enabled for balance types with the SAVE_LIMITS tag and in BALANCE_FULL, BALANCE_HISTORY logging modes.
      • CARDS-51458 [Host2Host interface] TMID value selection in affiliated authorisation now uses the same algorithm as own acquiring, including "device H2H".
      • CARDS-51461 [Loyalty] Added the ability to limit the bonus points amount accrued for a client contract within a loyalty campaign. The limit amount should be set in the "Action Total Limit" field of the tariff action, the ACTION_LIMIT_MODE=LOCAL tag indicates that the action limit should be calculated for each contract. A new strict mode has been added to check the action limit, it prevents total points from exceeding the specified limit with the last transaction; ACTION_LIMIT_MODE=STRICT should be set for the tariff action.
      • CARDS-51394 [Core] Fixed recalculation of values in the ON_DATE, ON_DATE_BALANCE fields of the Account table during the Accounting GL renumeration process.
      • CARDS-51429 [Application management] Unhandled exception when an XML advanced application for a client doesn't have a client identifier has been changed to return an error message.
    • 03.44.29.31
      • CARDS-49545 [NSPK interface] The OpenWay\NSPK menu has been renamed to OpenWay\MIR and contents have been renamed from NSPK to MIR. Menu OpenWay\NSPK\NSPK. Reports have been renamed and moved to OpenWay\MIR Statistics Reports.
      • CARDS-51294 [SEPA interface] The "Change Log" link in the OpenWay\SEPA\Mandate Input & Update forms open SEPA mandate changes history, not SEPA mandate application history.
      • CARDS-51382 [Datamart] Soft synchronization of sy_conf_group_val records ("DWD_CARD_BRAND" configuration group) is now performed with the menu item "OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface\OpenWay Settings\Synchronize DWD_CARD_BRAND with IPS_PRODUCT". If a record with a certain code has to be added to DWD_CARD_BRAND and a deleted record with this code was found, the deleted record is restored and a new record is not created. Synchronization of the PAYMENT SCHEME list ("PAYMENT_SCHEME" configuration group) with sy_std_handbook "PAYMENT_SYSTEM" has been added.
      • CARDS-51390 [Datamart] Added the "Shift" button to the "Datamart operation types" form to adjust an operation's priority. Added the "Overlaps" link to the "Datamart operation type rules" form to show rules that overlap with the selected rule.

    • 03.44.29.30
      • CARDS-49784 [Product management] The ability to compare a pair of tags/parameters/classifiers has been implemented for tagged data validation. New compare rules IF_COMPARE% can be defined in a Service in the Service Details field, in a Usage Template in the Spc Parms field, in a Tariff in the Apply Rules field or in Preferred in the CustomParms field.
      • CARDS-51340 [High availability] Deferred apply: the ability to delay before processing replicated documents. The global parameter HA.DEFFERED_DOC_APPLY_DELAY defines the delay interval in seconds. The default is 0.
      • CARDS-50685 [Core] For name generation by the menu item "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Generate Transaction Dictionary" added the CUST_TRANS_DICT() procedure to customise generation of names in MESS_DICT.
      • CARDS-50729 [Product management] Contract parameter code is allowed as value for the CYCLE tag on the balance type which triggers the classifier. Old behavior (the value of this tag is defined as a counter) is also supported.
      • CARDS-50784 [Core] Warning message that "Payment receiver is not found for client and payment type" during order document processing is created only for SEPA documents.
      • CARDS-50787 [Fleet cards] New inbound fleet bertlv tag E3.EA.FFXX.DA (PriceCurrency) has been supported.
      • CARDS-50816 [Issuing authorisation] The additional global parameter CHIP_ATC_DEFERRED=ENABLE may be used to enable chip deferred authorisation request processing.
      • CARDS-50891 [CB Gate] The STIP balance loading procedure has been improved by checking the fact of sending (and delivering) an operation to the CBS and matching it with information from the loading file. Added the ability to use last operation time instead of last operation reference number in STIP balance data files.
      • CARDS-51095 [Product inspector] Added the ability to define a list of logged statuses for a Product Inspector test run. The STATUSES_LIST tag with status codes delimited by commas should be set in the contract creation step or the step where statuses are logged.
      • CARDS-51152 [Core] New columns VALUE_TYPE, PARM_ROLE have been added to the CONTRACT_PARAMETER view. The CLIENT_PARAMETER view has been added with an additional filter, Current Value Location in (Client, Classifier).
      • CARDS-51203 [Product management] Forms for Calculated Contract Parameter rules have been implemented for Products configuration.
      • CARDS-51206 [Product management] A new value type "Calculated Amount" has been added for contract parameters. These parameters can be used for some calculations according to Product rules.
      • CARDS-51274 [Issuing] New Chip Scheme Template "PayCorn OnLine Generic" added
      • CARDS-51292 [Customer profile] Marketing personal messages are now limited to 4000 characters.
      • CARDS-51311 [Application management] Advanced Application R2 Accept has been adopted for Distributed Processing.
      • CARDS-51372 [Authentication management] Allow the "SINGLE" option for identification schemes.
      • CARDS-51381 [Core] A new value, FEE_CURR, can now be used for the REDEF_FEE_ACC_CURR tag.
      • CARDS-51393 [Product inspector] The "Reset Loyalty Domain" action has been added to Product Inspector test steps. This action makes it possible to reset configured loyalty actions and tariffs in the specified domain.
      • CARDS-51402 [Core] Added standard dictionary of payment systems supported by WAY4 (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Common Handbooks\Standard Handbooks - records with PAYMENT_SYSTEM Handbook Type). The form OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Routing\IPS Product Definition is based on the new handbook.

      • I1610118287 [Case management] [CARDS-50762] Financial and disputes case screens in Case Management have been improved by the links to additional case transactions information.
      • I1611021596 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-51345] Authorization messages matching procedure has been changed. Now authorization messages matching is done at an online interface only. New additional global parameter NO_ALT_AUTH_MATCHING_FOR added to disable using of proprietary matching algorithm
      • CARDS-50354 [POS management] Value "A" to ACQ_ONLINE tag has been added. This value changes vice versa online status of operation in operation table.
      • CARDS-50668 [Authentication management] Fixed: System cannot find 'TERMINAL' authentication scheme.
      • CARDS-50681 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect checking of card expiration date for linked contract requests when plastic is locked

      • CARDS-50688 [Transaction management] Transaction Processing: Changed priorities for Transaction Conditions with Token.
      • CARDS-50692 [Core] Fixed balance-based classifier processing when CYCLE_N > 1.
      • CARDS-50738 [Instalment management] Interest for the first portion of an instalment plan is always calculated for the entire period, not on a daily basis if the USE_MONTH_WEIGHT global parameter or tag in the Accounting Scheme is set to "B". A new value, "W", is supported for the INST_ADV_FEE_OPEN global parameter. This value can be used to waive an "Advance Fee" for early repayment or other actions that cause plan recalculation.
      • CARDS-50967 [Core] A check for main/sub account hierarchy links during the posting process has been added. The fatal error "Disturbed main/sub account hierarchy for contract [contract information]" occurs for broken links. To avoid such fatal errors, a validation script should be run once. See the "Upgrade Notes on Impact Changes" section for more details.
      • CARDS-51041 [MasterCard interface] Error in tokenization processing when IRouter is used as an authorization channel has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51100 [Core] Apply Rule tagged data for a classifier action's rules is now checked during processing.
      • CARDS-51114 [Data preparation and card personalization] Default ICC Key Pre-generation Menu Items have been fixed and no longer refer to unused PM_ICC_KEY view.
      • CARDS-51199 [Issuing authorisation] Corrected behaviour. The original value of an internal key will sent to H2H when a secondary message contains the other value of the key.
      • CARDS-51268 [Product management] Fixed processing of the ORDER_MIN_PARM tag for standing orders with BY_BATCH mode.
      • CARDS-51300 [Transaction management] Import of historic acquiring transactions has been fixed to support source contract custom search by Merchant ID (if the terminal ID is not present in WAY4). This functionality is only used during migration from legacy platforms to WAY4.
      • CARDS-51307 [Core] Added validation that a Product's tariff domain hierarchy has only one tariff domain for each Tariff Book. I.e. 2 domains may not have the same Tariff Book code.
      • CARDS-51344 [Core] Fixed possible "Accept abnormally failed with internal error instead" during the Contract Parameter set operation via applications in Product Inspector.
      • CARDS-51347 [Transaction management] Transaction Conditions: Added default TC for POS Chip PBT/SBT Token and Contactless Transaction Conditions.
      • CARDS-51364 [Application management] The APPROVAL_STAGE parameter has been removed from menu items for launching Advanced Applications R2 pipes. This parameter had no effect and was unused.

      • CARDS-51378 [Acquiring] Documents, that are registered in the technical cycle "AllDocs", were excluded from the reports "Merchant Contract Statement", "Merchant Transactions Statement" and %TRANS_CST_CYCLE_N%, %TRANS_CST_CYCLE_CODE% variables used in notification.

      • CARDS-51140 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward: added support for incoming files without RDW. To import such files, the "NORDW"="Y" pipe parameter must be set.
      • CARDS-51366 [Money transfers] P2P tags are filled in in the documents prepared for processing in the Affiliate H2H channels.

      • I1611286121 [VISA interface] [CARDS-51384] RA configuration has been modified for EU region.
    • 03.44.29.25
      • CARDS-40511 [Accounting] Contract parameters (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Common Handbooks\Contract Parameters) can now have a new Value Type - Calculated Amount. Such a calculated parameter can be based on Main-Only Balance Types with the USAGE=BALANCE; BY_CURR; tags. The rules for calculation should be setup on the Product level using tags in the custom_data field. These calculated parameters can be used as Fee Base for different fee calculation and also as Base Amount Type in Service Limit tariffs.
      • CARDS-49783 [Core] Several IF_CS and IF_PARM checks has been implemented.
      • CARDS-51119 [Bill payments] Added support for loading billers and payment types from external systems to WAY4.
      • CARDS-49418 [Core] Performance of interest calculation for end of month has been improved.
      • CARDS-50796 [Acquiring] The ability to override POS device type "Special Configuration" tags depending on transaction attributes has been implemented. A new button, "Overrides" has been added to Full/Configuration Setup/Merchant Device Setup/POS Types form. To activate this feature create a row in the OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Merchant Device Setup\Device Configurator Item Type form. Assign the Item Type Code value "DEV_TYPE_OVERRIDE" and select Item Type Category "Device Type Parameter".
      • CARDS-51021 [Tariff management] PL/SQL cache for Contracts and Tariff Domains has been improved.
      • CARDS-51253 [Notifications] Added new variables %TRANS_MISC_FEE:<UsageType>%, %TRANS_MISC_LIM_FEE:<UsageType>% for messaging about misc document fee.
      • CARDS-51281 [Product management] The ability to skip Tariff Plan inheritance has been implemented.
      • I1411073978 [Case management] [CARDS-50000] Case Management Strategy/Step activity configuration screen - ROOT.OpenWay.Case Management.Configuration Setup.Domain Configuration.Strategy Schemes - is extended by a new field "Parm List". Activity processing will merge parameters from this field with the original activity parameters from "ROOT.OpenWay.Case Management.Configuration Setup.Domain Configuration.Activities" and process them all together. This makes it possible to set some general activity parameters on the CM Activity level and create some step activities with different parameters - additional or overwritten.
      • CARDS-50233 [Core] Incorrect interests waiving has been fixed in case of two Full Payment dates from two previous periods fall withing the one Billing period.
      • CARDS-50683 [Customer/account management] Fixed an issue in which clients remained not approved after running contract hierarchy approval in structures with top liability and sub-liability contracts. Clients for all subordinate contracts are checked when approving a contract.
      • CARDS-51237 [Product inspector] Changes have been implemented in balance logging during test script execution in Product Inspector with the tag LOG_MODE=BALANCE_FULL in the test step. Now the "Amount" and "Trx Count" field groups are not logged for balances with no HistoryMode option defined.
      • CARDS-51257 [Application management] Advanced applications for contract update now call the contract approve process if the contract was changed even if the last sub-application in the tree is for contract status update and no changes were made to contract status.
      • CARDS-51267 [DB kernel] Fixed document error message when a batch has already been posted, but not closed.
      • CARDS-51269 [Notifications] Fixed the decimal and thousand separator for the variables %MULTI_CURRENCY_BALANCE%, %MULTI_CURRENCY_CURR%, %MULTI_CURRENCY_BALANCE_ALL%, %TRANS_MISC_FEE%, %TRANS_MISC_LIM_FEE%.
      • CARDS-51270 [Dispute assistant] DA v.2: Added Rule "-> Go to Processing Representment Step" in the "Pre-Arbitration" step of the MasterCard Issuer Standard Strategy and AMEX GNS Issuer Standard Strategy.
      • CARDS-51285 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: Amount fields default value.
      • CARDS-51287 [Core] FROM_TRANS_DATE behaviour has been restored for the explicit number of days defined in the tag value.
      • CARDS-51293 [AMEX interface] AMEX FSF Export: Fixed Approval Code field format checking.
      • CARDS-51299 [Authentication management] TAGS_GET_NODE procedure not updating CLIENT/CONSUMER references during UID resolving process.
      • CARDS-51314 [MasterCard interface] DE 124 in TAR messages will also be sent also for green channel.
      • I1607081471 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-51266] DA v2: Fixed amount processing if the global parameter USE_TRANS_AMOUNT=Y.
      • I1610143454 [Core] [CARDS-50702] Definition of routing idt for new contracts is regulated by the SKIP_ROUTING global parameter. When the value is "Y" (default), routing idt will not be filled in. If distributed processing is used and routing idt is a required attribute of real contracts, its definition can be additionally regulated by the client parameter SKIP_ROUTING, whose should be "Y" for cards that have been issued but not yet sold.
      • I1611072019 [Transaction management] [CARDS-51228] The USE_AUTH_FX parameter is now checked on the global and financial institution level.
      • I1611184862 [Risk management] [CARDS-51289] Corrected calculation of the amount sign for a parent usage limiter when the transaction direction and FOR_WHOM property both are opposite to the corresponding properties of the child limiter.
      • I1611219274 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51276] MasterCard SAFE Inward: Added the pipe parameters FILE_TEMPL and FILE_ARCH_TEMPL to change the file mask for loading files. A mask must have a directory and a fixed format (without the "*" character).
      • CARDS-51124 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer File Import: Supported loading Fee Collection and Fund Disbursement (FCP) files.
      • CARDS-51263 [Core banking interface] IC Documents Export: Added the ability to export PAN instead of TOKEN for ONUS token transactions. To export PANs, the value of the new pipe parameter "PAN_FOR_TOKEN_ONUS" should be set to "Y".
      • CARDS-51278 JCB ISO: Added menu items OpenWay\JCB\JCB. Daily Procedures\JCB. Outward Processing\JCB ISO Outward Processing and OpenWay\JCB\JCB. Daily Procedures\JCB. Inward Processing\JCB ISO Inward Processing. Added settlement message codes.
      • CARDS-51280 [JCB interface] JCB: Added requirements for JCB ISO.
    • 03.44.29.21
      • CARDS-51132 [Notifications] Added new variables %TRANS_BONUS_ALL%, %TRANS_BONUS_AT:<AccountType>%, %TRANS_BONUS_LIST[:<Prefix>:<Expire>:<Days>]%, %TRANS_BONUS_DOC_ALL%, %TRANS_BONUS_DOC_AT:<AccountType>%, %TRANS_BONUS_DOC_LIST[:<Prefix>:<Expire>:<Days>]% for messaging about loyalty bonuses accrued as the result of some transactions. These variables can be used in client message setup for SMS Banking.
      • CARDS-43542 [Notifications] Added searching information about participants (paym_rec) data under contract for %PARTY_...% variables.
      • CARDS-50146 [Risk management] The list of Response Codes for the Block action in the OpenWay\Full\Stop List\Block/Release Client menu item no longer contains STATUS_VALUE_CODE = "0" (Release).
      • CARDS-51120 [Fleet cards] A new tag, F0.EA.FFXX.C9, has been added to the Fleet decline response bertlv message. The tag will be filled in with the exceeded limiter's expiry date when at least one of the MoneyLimit(F0.EA.FFXX.C7) and UnitsLimit(F0.EA.FFXX.C8) tags in the response message also contains values.
      • CARDS-51230 [Product management] Trace information for some processing tags (MAX_TOTAL_AMOUNT_PARM; ADD_FEE; SUBTRACT_FEE; ROUND) has been improved.
      • CARDS-51245 [Acquiring] Document tags CYCLE_CB (Credit Banknote), CYCLE_DC (Debit Coin), CYCLE_CC (Credit Coin), CYCLE_DB2 (for ATMs with 2 dispensers) have been supported to define the cycle code to group entries for batch repayment.
      • CARDS-51252 [Product management] Minimum total due threshold has been implemented.
      • I1607206085 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-50650] acq_stateless.TRN_PHASE1 PINPrevalid output parameter filled in with device_type.emv_conf_file DEV tag Subfield YYYY. If the value found is valid and at least one of bits: 4 - "Online PIN (default for simple PIN)" or 5 - "(reserved) OffLine PIN clear" or 6 - "(reserved) Offline PIN encrypted (default for offline PIN)" is set, the "O" value will be returned. Otherwise, the procedure will return the "N" value.
      • CARDS-50826 [Transaction management] IPS Inward Processing: Changed inward file rollback processing.
      • CARDS-50955 [NSPK interface] Visa Affiliated BII Inward: added the ability to import the DEV tag (device description) allowing some fields (ie DE22 in NSPK protocol) to be exported more precisely.
      • CARDS-50957 [AMEX interface] Transactions for foreign devices are now shown in the "AMEX Statistics Issuing Business" report.
      • CARDS-51093 [Application management] The problem with empty AMND_PREV fields in new device records created by Advanced Applications has been resolved.
      • CARDS-51109 [Core banking interface] RBS Outward Processing: fixed "Can't buffer without truncating ()" error when executing the "GET_CLIENT_PARMS" procedure. If target or source accounts are longer than 32 symbols, they are truncated with a warning.
      • CARDS-51111 [e-Commerce acquiring] Transaction Processing: Luhn digit check condition.
      • CARDS-51131 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Outward: fixed "Strange situation" error.
      • CARDS-51164 [Fleet cards] Correct usage limiter renew time returned in the F0.EA.FFXX.C9 LimitExpire Fleet bertlv tag.
      • CARDS-51165 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Outward Processing: fixed NPE when exporting chargeback.
      • CARDS-51178 [JCB interface] JCS ISO Inward: fixed calculating fee amount sign for settlement documents.
      • CARDS-51196 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Interface: fixed "Unknown message type" for Chargeback Reversals processing.
      • CARDS-51201 [Invoice management] Fixed standing order generation for invoice payment reject actions.
      • CARDS-51223 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: fixed filling optional fields in "T6 block header" record.
      • CARDS-51227 [Core] Target ConsumerID calculation for decisions has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51238 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Outward - fixed "Unknown message type" error when exporting Partial 2nd Presentment.
      • I1609214123 [Issuing] [CARDS-50964] The Move Contract procedure has been fixed when a new parent Account Scheme is the same as the old one (for example, when the same Account Scheme is used both for cards that have not yet been assigned and for assigned cards).
      • I1610275964 [Application management] [CARDS-51126] Advanced Application R1 can be succesfully accepted even if it's blocked by the same officer who starts the accept process.
      • I1611018583 [Application management] [CARDS-51190] Exception handling has been added into usage limiter redefinition procedure
      • I1611104436 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-51187] Precision of currency conversion rate stored for macrotransactions has been increased to 12 digits.
      • I1611186375 [Tariff management] [CARDS-51136] Fixed tariff duplication when a personal tariff domain was copied from another card contract during card replacement.
      • I1611251560 [UnionPay interface] [CARDS-51249] UnionPay Outward Processing: Restored the possibility to send ATM Reversals.
      • CARDS-50793 [VISA interface] VCF Export: additional fields can be customized. Contact Customer Support if necessary.

    • 03.44.29.19
      • I1610185239 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-51106] A new field, CLIENT_BRANCH, has been added to CONTRACT_DATA. This new field shows the client's branch. The BRANCH field shows the the contract's branch.
      • CARDS-45551 [Core] The ability to post Event chains in a user-defined order has been added. A new field, "Step N" should be filled in for the Events in the chain to specify their posting order. A new event posting mode, DEPENDENT_CHAIN has been introduced to provide proper condition checking for cases when an Event depends on the results of previous Events in the chain.
      • CARDS-45602 [Case management] Formatting styles have been applied for all case management substitution variables using in case mangement messages and letters.
      • CARDS-45703 [Case management] "ROOT.OpenWay.Case Management.Configuration Setup.General Configuration.Activity Groups" has been extended by new links: "Activities In Group" which shows all Step Activities from the group, and "Not Grouped Activities" to show all not grouped Step Activities by the domain category.
      • CARDS-50601 [Instalment management] Instalment plans can be recalculated if fee rates changed. The existing recalculation procedure for calendar changes is used, the new mode is enabled if the global parameter INST_RENEW_RATES is set to "Y".
      • CARDS-51026 [Product inspector] A link to Product configurations has been added to the "Last contract" form in the Product Inspector.
      • CARDS-51089 [Notifications] The "Priority" field has been added in the "Event Message No Edit" and "Event Message Text" forms.
      • CARDS-51094 [Product management] Added the ability to define and show a past due date and period for a contract. Overdue balance should be configured to include all overdue accounts and the balance code should be specified in the PAST_DUE_BALANCE global parameter.
      • CARDS-51110 [Tariff management] Supported automatic inheritance of a tariff domain contract parameter value from a sub to a main contract according to linked classifier value priority.
      • CARDS-51115 [Fleet cards] A new tag, F0.EA.FFXX.C9, has been added to the Fleet decline response bertlv message. The tag will be filled in with the exceeded limiter's expiry date when at least one of the MoneyLimit(F0.EA.FFXX.C7) and UnitsLimit(F0.EA.FFXX.C8) tags in the response message also contains values.
      • CARDS-51133 [Product management] New tag REGISTERED_FOR=<TOP/BASE/BILLING/SELF/LIABILITY/GLOBAL/RELATED/CONTRACT_NUMBER> in event type "special parms" field has been added. This tag allows to check event type registration for "related" contract instead of current contract. For example, REGISTERED_FOR=BASE in SMS notification event type allows to send messages for "related" card in case if this service is available for "base" card contract.
      • CARDS-51149 [Product management] Checking of some contract balances, classifiers and parameters has been supported for specific contract roles.
      • CARDS-51186 [Transaction management] Duplicate TRANS_CODES ("RBS Code") for some Transaction Types have been fixed in the system standard configuration (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Transactions - All).
      • I1511267446, I1608013738 [Product management] [CARDS-51157] Added ability to set ONLINE_CREDIT_PENDING for a financial institution.
      • I1610184582 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-51116] Added the "Response Details" field to the NMAS List IC.srd form.
      • CARDS-43541 [Notifications] Added the ability to define PaymTypeCode for invoice party variables (%PARTY_...%).
      • CARDS-50452 [Data preparation and card personalization] Categories supported for template tags in VPA Import chip scheme pipe.
      • CARDS-50494 [Core] "Latest items only" value in the "History Mode" field was removed. A new tag, "SAVE_LATEST" for the Balance Type is supported instead. It can be set automatically on Balance Type validation and it means that history will be saved for the last four items only.
      • CARDS-51049 [MasterCard interface] Fixed POS transaction display in the "MasterCard Statistics Acquiring Business" report.
      • CARDS-51067 [CB Gate] Corrected processing of timeout on core banking system when special rule in "OpenWay\CB Gate\Configuration\Routing Rules" for current mesage is not defined
      • CARDS-51085 [Consumer debt collections] When the collection case closed automatically all open promise-to-pay are canceled without current officer checking.
      • CARDS-51112 [Data preparation and card personalization] Default settings in the standard menu item for the RSA Emv Key Management pipe have changed. Keys and certificates are stored and read from @WORK_DIR@\data\keys directory.
      • CARDS-51130 [NSPK interface] Fixed the precision of total sums in the "NSPK Statistics Acquiring Business" report.
      • ICFEE-99 [Core] [CARDS-51096] Fee Base, Fee Min and Fee Max amounts for custom fees calculated with high accuracy and with currency conversion by Channel Rates, are rounded now with the same accuracy as defined in the PRECISION tag value in custom fee Service Details.
      • CARDS-45955 [JCB interface] JCB Stoplist Import: new format supported (PAN up to 21 digits). No manual action required.
      • CARDS-51082 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Outward: Supported Multi-Clearing transactions.
    • 03.44.29.16
      • CARDS-49256 [Core] Product Tariff Campaigns have been implemented.
      • CARDS-49589 [Tariff management] Template Tariff Domain is now shown in the Tariff Domains form.
      • CARDS-49591 [Tariff management] Added the ability to create and approve top level template domains. Added validation for domain category change if tariff data is not set.
      • CARDS-49953 [Acquiring authorisation] A new API for searching contracts has been developed to standardize contract retrieval in the P2P package.
      • CARDS-50561 [CB Gate] The STIP balance loading procedure has been improved by checking the fact of sending (and delivering) an operation to the CBS and matching it with information from the loading file. Added the ability to use last operation time instead of last operation reference number in STIP balance data files.
      • CARDS-50563 [Tariff management] A new button, "Tariff Books" has been added to the "Contract Support - M No Edit" form. For the button to be shown, the contract product must have the "ATTACH_BY_CODE_LIST" tag.
      • CARDS-50731 [Transaction management] Links to authorization documents from Doc - Grid.srd and Card Support - M ByID.srd have been enhanced to show all the authorizations for a financial document.
      • CARDS-50749 [Instalment management] Validation of temporary credit limits and instalment limits set for future dates has been added to check that the future effective periods of these limits don't overlap.
      • CARDS-50899 [Core] Support of maximum and minimum balance history has been added The SAVE_LIMITS balance type tag is now supported. If this tag is set, the history of current balance(trg_amount), max balance (trg_amount_2), max balance date(trg_date_2) min balance (trg_amount_3), min balance date(trg_date_3) is saved for each billing period into ACNT_LOG(msg_code=BAL_LIM, msg_group_code balance code).
      • CARDS-50986 [Notifications] The following new variables have been added for configuring message templates and client statements for multi-currency products: - %MULTI_CURRENCY_BALANCE:<Currency>% - the balance of a particular contract. - %MULTI_CURRENCY_CURR:<Currency>% - the currency of a particular contract. - %MULTI_CURRENCY_BALANCE_ALL% - list of all the client`s contract balances with currency. - %MULTI_CURRENCY_BALANCE_NONZERO% - list of the client`s contract balances that are not equal to zero.
      • CARDS-50990 [Product inspector] A new button, "Tariff Books" has been added to the "Test Contract Ext" form. For the button to be shown, the contract product must have the "ATTACH_BY_CODE_LIST" tag.
      • CARDS-50993 [Instalment management] A new brief form for configuration of instalment schemes has been added. This form is used by default. The old form with full scheme information is accessible using the "Full Info" link from the brief form.
      • CARDS-50994 [Application management] "Social Security #" for clients is supported now in Advanced Application R2 forms.
      • CARDS-51017 [Notifications] Added new variables: %PIN_ATTEMPTS%, %MAX_PIN_ATTEMPTS% for use in message templates.
      • CARDS-51045 [Core] Added the ability to skip special events posting for a secondary document (repost, reversal or adjustment). The SKIP_ON_SECONDARY_DOC tag should be set in an event type if it should not be created when the secondary document is posted.
      • CARDS-51076 [Product inspector] The abilities to duplicate test steps and initiate renumeration of steps have been added to Product Inspector.
      • CARDS-51084 [Customer profile] Marketing personal messages are now limited to 4000 characters.
      • I1610049471 [Tariff management] [CARDS-50875] Added synchronization between Template Tariffs and Personal Tariffs on tariff approve.
      • I205285470 [Core] [CARDS-31666] The ability to launch collection of CMS Statistics (OpenWay\Full\CMS Stat\Create Statistics) in parallel mode has been added. To launch the "DB statistics" process in parallel, the "PARALLEL" parameter and global additional parameter "PROCESS_WAIT_INTERVAL" should be configured with the required level of parallelism.
      • CARDS-50408 [POS management] POS Purchase with CashBack: fixed incorrect behaviour of partial reversal.
      • CARDS-50834 [Product management] Now a Balance Type with "regular" HISTORY_MODE (monthly, billing, yearly) is saved in the first billing period even if the contract balance changed on the last day of the billing period. To restore previous behaviour (to save history in the next billing period) use the special tag FIRST_ENTRY_MODE=TO_NEW_CYCLE; in the "Posting Details" field - OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\Balance Types.
      • CARDS-50885 [CB Gate] The SUPPRESS_NEGATIVE_ADVICE; tag should be added to the "Domain Data" field of the "OpenWay\CB Gate\Configuration\Domains" form to suppress IRouter sending negative advices to the core banking system.
      • CARDS-50908 [MasterCard interface] Counting of "New cards obtained during quarter" has been changed for the "MC Statistics Issuing Business" report - reissued cards are no longer counted.
      • CARDS-50912 [Core banking interface] IC Document Export: added a new pipe parameter "USE_TRANS_TYPE_IDT" = Y/N(default), which allows the "TransTypeIDT" element to be exported in the "Doc\TransType\TransCode" aggregate (for DETAILED_TRANS_CODE=Y mode).
      • CARDS-50931 [Issuing authorisation] View AUTH_RECORD has been redesigned. Blocked amounts displays in corrected conditions now.
      • CARDS-50970 [Data preparation and card personalization] Bug with usability of Issuer Script parameter "BF5B-PW Appl Internal Data Templ" fixed.
      • CARDS-50973 [Case management] If a Case Management domain contains the USE_CURRENT_USER='Y' parameter, but the current officer is not registered as a domain user, the case owner will be determined automatically.
      • CARDS-50974 [Issuing authorisation] VISA Interface: supported TCR5 pos 150 PAN Token field. It is stored/exported from "D_TKN" tag.
      • CARDS-50984 [Loyalty] Tariff action processing has been fixed. When applying a tariff action, two tariff data records are automatically created: one from the date the action starts and the second - from the date the action is finished.
      • CARDS-50999 [Fleet cards] Fixed filling the value of the "LAST_INV_DATE" tag in the acnt_contract.ext_data field for fuel invoices during execution of the WRITE_PERIOD_DATES procedure.
      • CARDS-51002 [Notifications] The language defined in the client record is used for SMS message creation if it is not specified in the message template.
      • CARDS-51005 [Instalment management] Fixed activation of an instalment plan with recalculation if custom fee parameters are used.
      • CARDS-51006 [Core] Fixed balance history creation for subcontracts when HistoryMode=Billing (After closing) is set.
      • CARDS-51007 [Reversal management] Service-based balances and liability tree balances are now recalculated during the correction process initiated by the Reversal Management module.
      • CARDS-51010 [VISA interface] VISA: added Total Authorized Amount (TCR5 pos 50) processing in the "CPS" tag.
      • CARDS-51035 [Transaction management] Conditions for the "Message" link in the Mess To Mbr Incoming.srd form and the "Errors" link in the Doc - Grid.srd form have been changed: filtering by the Object Type field has been added.
      • CARDS-51040 [Instalment management] INST_INF_RATE tag format has been fixed. The new format has two decimal digits and no decimal point.
      • CARDS-51057 [Automated routines] Fixed unstable execution plan for searching for a previous document in Accept Documents.
      • I1605234769 [Core] [CARDS-50337] The DICT message dictionary is obsolete and will be deleted in WAY4 Cards 03.46. All forms that were using DICT have been updated to use MESS_DICT. The menu item "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Transaction Dictionary" now uses the form "Message Dictionary - Transactions".
      • I1606172131 [Risk management] [CARDS-50886] Technical operations have been excluded from usage processing except operational usages. Technical operations are operations where transaction type and service class are not filled.
      • I1609195493 [Notifications] [CARDS-51042] The "Service Groups" and "Service Group - Edit" forms have been enhanced: any type of contract can now be specified in the "Service Contract" field.
      • I1609198831 [Case management] [CARDS-51029] The amnd-history record was not created when the document was released for housekeeping
      • I1610210315 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-51038] Processing of temporary credit limits with "credit limit posting" mode has been fixed: now if a new "Temporary credit limit" is set with an effective period that overlaps with the previous "Temporary credit limit", the previous "Temporary credit limit" will be closed and the appropriate documents will be posted.
      • I1611084649 [Product management] [CARDS-51053] Contract activity date processing has been fixed for Fin Requests.
      • I1611117514 [Fleet cards] [CARDS-51060] Fixed incorrect processing of the list of redefined fields when personalized usage limiters are modified.
      • CARDS-50576 [MasterCard interface] MC Release 16.Q04 requires corrections in Transaction Subtypes settings. See documentation for details.
      • CARDS-50860 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Supported additional customization points.
      • CARDS-50949 [Diners Club interface] DCI Inward Processing: For loading Acquirer Confirmation File - changed message code S1--I--- trans type "Interchange Total" to S1-AI--- trans type "Acq Interchange Total" and code S1--F--- trans type "Reimbursement Fee Total" to S1-AF--- trans type "Acq Reimbursement Fee Total". They must be changed manually or by loading Copy Configuration file. Supported loading Interchange Issuer Detail File.
      • CARDS-51019 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Inward Processing: Supported loading PDS0170, PDS0171, PDS0172, PDS0173, PDS0174 in the corresponding document tags by the pipe parameter LOAD_CA_DATA=Y.
    • 03.44.29.14
      • CARDS-50776 [Core] The trf.ACNT_DOMAIN_SET function has been removed from the TRF package specification.
      • CARDS-50896 [Core] Pending totals (amount and number of transactions) will be showed in the Acnt Balance.srd form
      • CARDS-50897 [Core] Balance history for declined authorisations is now saved (Life, Year, Billing total entry amounts and quantity).
      • CARDS-50946 [Issuing authorisation] PVV will be calculated in a change PIN request and sent to the payment system later when the value of the additional global parameter SEND_PVV_2_PS is "Y" and the tag SEND_PVV_2_PS=N; is absent in card subtype additional parameters independently from the PIN validation scheme.
      • CARDS-50959 [Notifications] The PARSE_TAG_PRM() procedure in the cards_msg package has been included in the public API.
      • CARDS-50969 [Product management] Uniqueness for a new field, "Social Security Number" is supported. Uniqueness is only checked if the "Social Security Number" field is filled in. The check is affected by the global parameter "UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_SOCIAL_NUMBER" or the same tag in the financial institution's "special parameters" field (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Financial Institutions - [Details]. Parameter values: "N" (No) - The system does not check for "Social Security Number" uniqueness "Y" (Yes) - The system checks social security number uniqueness as follows: if more than one record of clients with the same number is registered at the financial institution, during approval of contracts for these clients an error message will be generated and the contracts will have the "Not Ready" status. The default value is "Y" (Yes).
      • I1606218834 [Issuing] [CARDS-50952] Added ability to disable global parameter CLOSE_PREV_PLASTIC=Y by tag CLOSE_PREV_PLASTIC=N; in FinancialInstitution.special_parms or ContractSubtype.add_parms
      • CARDS-49912 [Core] Overdraft cards are counted as credit cards for calculations in the "Form 250, part 1" report.
      • CARDS-49980 [Datamart] In the "Account Roles - Customized" form "Product Category" values are taken from the "Product Category" dictionary. New forms have been added for Datamart: "Balance Types mapping - Customized" and "Last Head Process".
      • CARDS-50944 [AMEX interface] Fixed grouping by product name in the "AMEX Statistics Issuing Business" report.
      • I1610204501 [Transaction management] [CARDS-50960] Fixed redefinition of the DECLINE_NON_AUTHORIZED global parameter for a financial institution or for a particular document when the global parameter DECLINE_NON_AUTHORIZED=Y, but its value is overridden by "N".
      • CARDS-50866 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: Supported additional customization points.
    • 03.44.29.12
      • CARDS-50858 [Issuing] Chip scheme "UICS with C-Less v. 2013 Generic" made from "UICS v. 2013 Generic" with adding of specific tags for contactless part of application.
      • CARDS-44735 [Core] Custom fee interbranch routing is supported. A fee can only be routed to a financial institution used in the main transaction interbranch route.To turn on fee interbranch routing, set the FEE_INTERBRANCH tag in the fee Service. This setup allows FEE_CONTRACT=DOC_TARGET; to be used safely in custom fee Services when the device and card are in different institutions.
      • CARDS-47584 [Transaction management] Corrected limit type selection for source contract in off-line usage limiter processing
      • CARDS-49526 [Fleet cards] New validation rule has ben added in the processing of the clearing documents. Posting of Fleet Item clearing document can only be started by posting of the transaction main document.
      • CARDS-50231 [Accounting] A new option for adjustments with FX conversion posting has been added. In this new mode instead of posting the corrected amount, the difference between the original and corrected amount is posted. FX conversion is applied to the difference which allows big amount fluctuations to be avoided when FX rates change significantly. To implement this new mode, please contact OpenWay.
      • CARDS-50245 [Case management] 1. The "Dispute Assistant CM" menu has been renamed to "CM Dispute Assistant". 2. The "Financial Cases" sub menu has been added to the ROOT.OpenWay.CM Dispute Assistant menu item as a link to ROOT.OpenWay.CM Risk Management. 3. All operation items ("CM Dispute Assistant", "CM Card Blocking", "CM Consumer Collections", "CM Risk Management") have been moved to the end of the OpenWay menu.
      • CARDS-50536 [Money transfers] Funds disbursement transactions have been supported for Visa and MasterCard.
      • CARDS-50750 [Customer/account management] The P_SHOW_INSTALMENT_LIMITS parameter can be used to show instalment limits in a separate section of a cardholder statement.
      • CARDS-50812 [Money transfers] Ability to add debited and credited cards member_id to doc tags has been implemented.
      • CARDS-50813 [Accounting] For Fee Prediction tariffs to use FX conversion by channel rates from Fee Base, Fee Min, Fee Max to the account currency, a special CR-FX Type (FX Type=CR_<Buy>;<Sell>;<Middle>) should be used, and the tag CONV_CHANNEL should be defined in Service Details. The special CR-FX Type should be Internal (the field "Is Internal=Yes" in OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\FX Types), even if there are no banking FX Schemes for it.
      • CARDS-50872 [Core] A new field, "Social Security Number" has been added to the CLIENT table.
      • CARDS-50877 [Issuing authorisation] Financial document inherits MCC from authorisation on DirectP2P transactions now (feature revoked in 03.44.30.25 and above)
      • CARDS-50888 [Core] Value 'Skip' is added into the drop down list for "Correction action" field into Contract Parameters.srd form
      • CARDS-50898 [Core] The procedure for calculating the amount and number of transactions / amount and number of reversal transactions for a calendar year (YTD) for service-based balance types with History Mode="BIlling Date (After)"/ "BIlling Date (Before)" configuration has been changed. Previous system behaviour was to clear the history counters on the date of closing a contract's 12th billing cycle. The new behaviour is to clear them when the new calendar year begins.
      • CARDS-50925 [Fleet cards] Retail Line Item transaction type has been added.
      • CARDS-50926 [Core] Additional information about contract activity can now be shown in Financials -> Balance List ->[History] and [Totals] screen forms under OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service (and the same form is available in OpenWay\Issuing\Customer Support\OLD Contract Info): Counter of pending and declined authorizations for turnover balance types and maximum balance over contract life-to-date and year-to-date turnover balance types (requires special configuration in Balance Types screen form). Also for turnover balances with History Mode = Billing (After Close), history records after each billing will be saved in acnt_balance_history and will be available for viewing via the screen forms mentioned above.
      • CARDS-50940 [Core] Balance type validation error messages are changed
      • I1606292776 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-50780] If a successful authorization advice is received after a reversal, a new hold will be made on contract funds.
      • I1608222937 [VISA interface] [CARDS-50769] The logic has been changed for calculating total active cards and total cards in the following QMR Issuing reports: "AMEX Statistics Issuing", "MC Statistics Issuing", "Visa Statistics Issuing". A card that has been reissued (when the contract with old card number hasn't been closed) is taken into account only once for "number of total cards in circulation" and "number of active cards".
      • I1609227206 [Case management] [CARDS-50869] A new activity parameter INHERIT_REASON; allows the reason of a sub-case that has been moved to be changed to a new one corresponding to the new parent case.
      • I1610250251 [DB kernel] [CARDS-50863] Supported hash partitioning of pk_evnt_action.
      • CARDS-49892 [Product management] Additional validations of the tariff domain code used for attaching a tariff domain have been added for configurations when the corresponding contract parameter has location in Classifier or Mirror To = Classifier.
      • CARDS-50577 [Acquiring authorisation] Processing transactions of our cards without using owncards.xml on TS/NS has been developed. Non-existent card from our BIN range is considered to be ours.
      • CARDS-50765 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: fixed the rollback procedure for NSPK Collection Only files, so it is possible to export these transactions again.
      • CARDS-50773 [Core] Restored protection from deleting doc and m_transaction after they have been posted.
      • CARDS-50782 [NSPK interface] Fixed calculation of total cards and active cards for the "NSPK Statistics Issuing Business Prepared" report.
      • CARDS-50792 [Core] The "NSPK Statistics Acquiring Business" report has been enhanced: rounding for amount type fields and sorting data by the "Territory Code" field have been added.
      • CARDS-50794 [Core] Menu Item DB Administrator Utilities.Special Contract Utilities.Macrotransactions - Reverse has been updated - now macro-transactions generated by this menu item are marked with REPOST_MTR tag. This tag has local_date of reversed macro-transaciton as value and it allows Datamart to filter out such records during daily ETL process.
      • CARDS-50799 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward - fixed filling PDS 0025.2 for reversals of presentments. The correct date is taken from the settlement data for the original transaction.
      • CARDS-50800 [e-Commerce issuing] Fixed incorrect processing of usage limiters with special condition containing tags CHANGE_IP and CHANGE_COUNTRY.
      • CARDS-50806 [Money transfers] Updated warning message text.
      • CARDS-50835 [Application management] Advanced Applications R2 now fills contract product defined by codes in an XML application so the application is shown correctly in monitoring forms.
      • CARDS-50850 [Issuing authorisation] The VDEP_TYPE tag to define the identification type for VDEP has been supported for Financial Institutions, Services and Contract Subtypes.
      • CARDS-50857 [Fleet cards] Transit of another root bertlv containers together with Fleet bertlv container has been supported from terminal to issuer and back from issuer to terminal.
      • CARDS-50876 [Product management] New matching keys: SicGroup, Area, Tags (DOC_TAG/DOC_TAG_VALUE, SOURCE_CHANNEL, TARGET_CHANNEL, OWN_CURR, OWN_CURR_TYPE, TRANS_FX, MAX_SETTL_AMOUNT, MIN_SETTL_AMOUNT, SIC_LIST, EXC_SIC_LIST, AUTH_TYPE) has been added to Data Capture Conditions setup.
      • CARDS-50880 [MasterCard interface] Loading BIN Tables: Fixed BIN Table record update when the same record is updated several times.
      • CARDS-50906 [VISA interface] In QMR Issuing reports fixed calculation of "Number Of Cards" and "Number Of Active Cards" if a card had been replaced.
      • CARDS-50907 [Transaction management] Transaction Processing: fixed document status set to to Reject twice during reject item processing.
      • CARDS-50915 [SEPA interface] The AmdmntInd tag in a SEPA Direct Debit document is set only when changes in the mandate are of any concern for the Creditor Bank or for the Debtor Bank (when any of OrnglMndtId, OrgnlCdtrSchmeId, OrgnlDbtrAcct, OrgnlDbtrAgt tags are filled).
      • CARDS-50918 [Diners Club interface] DCI Inward Processing: Added checking file duplication by file name.
      • CARDS-50919 [Issuing authorisation] Suppressed duplication of the error message "Not sufficient funds available" for overdraft limiter checking when several contracts are related
      • CARDS-50921 [Tariff management] Tariff domain contract parameter initialisation error has been fixed for card creation application in check mode.
      • CARDS-50929 [MasterCard interface] Country Table: Afghanistan moved from MasterCard Asia/Pasific Region to Middle East/Africa Region.
      • CARDS-50939 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing: fixed filling PDS0025.1 for Fee Collection Reversals.
      • I1605090243 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-48914] Fixed incorrect suppression of sending credit authorization reversals to the core banking system.
      • I1606157128 [VISA interface] [CARDS-50754] RA configuration has been fixed for premium products.
      • I1609233293 [Notifications] [CARDS-50831] Restored functionality of "ADD_ADDR_TYPES" tag.
      • I1609271918 [Product management] [CARDS-50760] Regular fees are now calculated in OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Issuing Contracts - Balance Prediction.
      • I1610063157 [Risk management] [CARDS-50788] Fixed incorrect processing of predefined BIN values in merchant stop-list for risk monitiring
      • I1610127544 [Risk management] [CARDS-50701] Offline usage limiter amount calculation has been corrected to avoid errors when contract identifier is absent in document for example in "technical" documents
      • I1610145898 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-50819] Script for client_address.parent_address cleanup has been added into upgrade from version below 03.42.00.
      • I1610170004 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-50818] TagValue length up to 4000 chars supported in sy_convert.MERGE_TAGXX procedures.
      • I1610173078 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-50879] AMEX GNS Inward: FileID generation to prevent wrong file duplication error.
      • I1610184150 [Application management] [CARDS-50827] Advanced Applications R2 for ClientAddress or ClientAuthMethod now support client identification through <ObjectFor><ContractIDT> format as in R1 applications. But this format for client identification is not correct and a warning message will be saved in process_mess.
      • I1611018920 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-50902] NSPK Outward Processing: ARN date (DE31.3) is recalculated for credit transactions converted from adjustments.
      • CARDS-39148 [High availability] Exception Request List: Supported High Availability mode.
      • CARDS-50385 [UnionPay interface] UPI Outward: Supported filling the "Transmission Date and Time" and "System Trace Audit Number" fields from a document, not from an online message if the document fields are correctly filled on posting.
      • CARDS-50775 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard MPE processing. Now the "Product Type ID" field from MPE table IP0040T1 is transferred to the BIN Table Product Category field instead of the Service Indicator field.
      • CARDS-50801 [Fee Prediction] Fee Prediction configuration (payment products) has been modified in accordance with MasterCard interchange tariffs.
      • CARDS-50871 [VISA interface] RA configuration has been modified for United Kingdom and Gibraltar.
      • CARDS-50883 [VISA interface] VISA BIN Table Import: A new pipe parameter, COMMERCIAL_PRODUCT_ID=<product id1>,<product id2>,... has been added for splitting BIN ranges into consumer/commercial categories.
      • I1502060020 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-50943] Interchange Reimbursement qualification criteria have been added for Kazakhstan.
    • 03.44.20.07
      • CARDS-43148 [Customer/account management] Added a new parameter P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS for the "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details.rdf" report for using the report with Way4Web.
      • CARDS-49286 [Product management] New Billing Date functionality has been implemented for issuing products.
      • CARDS-51386 [Core] A new value, FEE_CURR, can now be used for the REDEF_FEE_ACC_CURR tag.
      • CARDS-51680 [Web services] New menu branches have been added: OpenWay\Web Services and OpenWay\Way4Web. The "WS Users & Grants" menu branch has been moved from OpenWay\System\DB Administrator Utilities to these new menu branches; the linked menu OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\WS Users & Grants has been removed. For more details, see the section "Client Upgrade Notes on Impact changes".
      • CARDS-51759 [Product management] The ability to customize contract state information gathered during contract balance prediction on future date has been added.
      • CARDS-51887 [Application management] Supported creation of COMBO_Cards by applications.
      • CARDS-51895 [Core] The ability to post Event chains in a user-defined order has been added. A new field, "Step N" should be filled in for the Events in the chain to specify their posting order. A new event posting mode, DEPENDENT_CHAIN has been introduced to provide proper condition checking for cases when an Event depends on the results of previous Events in the chain.
      • CARDS-51973 [Customer/account management] Added a new parameter P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS for the "Cardholder Contract Statement" and "Merchant Contract Statement" reports for using these reports with Way4Web.
      • CARDS-51990 [Product management] OpenWay\Full\CMS Stat\Create Statistics menu item has been enhanced. Now it will connect a new group "PRODUCT_GROUP" that contains key elements of product configuration scope.
      • CARDS-52014 [Customer/account management] Added a new procedure cust_cms_stat() for gathering custom statistical information in the gather CMS statistics process.
      • CARDS-52140 [Product management] Checking of some contract balances, classifiers and parameters has been supported for specific contract roles.
      • CARDS-51234 [Product inspector] A new "test_script_export" pipe parameter, SILENT, with Y/N values has been added for use from Scheduler. If the parameter value is "Y", no dialog message will be shown.
      • CARDS-51774 [Issuing authorisation] Error in formatting activation methods in TKN_VERIFICATION messages has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51859 [CB Gate] Fixed reversal message routing to core banking system for utility payments.
      • CARDS-51867 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Outward: Now PDS158 sf4 (IRD) for a second presentment is inherited from the presentment, not from the chargeback.
      • CARDS-51873 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import: Now we don't set the settlement amount for outgoing-like documents.
      • CARDS-51878 [Product management]
      • CARDS-51894 [Fee Prediction] MasterCard IRD configuration has been modified for Europe region: transaction condition "All Face To Face (Group)" has been replaced by "All Cardholder, Card (Group)" for IRD S2.
      • CARDS-51904 [Notifications] In the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report added calculation of values for %VAR% variables if they are set in the P_MESSAGECODE_P parameter.
      • CARDS-51926 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import: Fixed file name processing.
      • CARDS-51928 [VISA interface] Corrected PVV data format in 0302 message for VISA.
      • CARDS-51930 [Issuing authorisation] Error in TKN_VERIFICATION method has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51941 [Issuing authorisation] Error in BERTLV data format in retail MDES transactions has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51952 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: Fixed document processing without doc original id.
      • CARDS-51960 [Transaction management] Country Table: Revised record for Madagascar. Code (3 bytes) must be "MDG", Code (2 bytes) must be "MG", Code (Numeric) must be "450", Curr Name must be "MALAGASY ARIARY", Curr Code must be "MGA", N Curr Code must be "969". No impact on transaction processing.
      • CARDS-51965 [Instalment management] Instalment fee code is now taken from an Instalment Scheme even if the fee rate is passed in document tags. Previous system behaviour was to use "FEE" as a fee code value regardless of Instalment Scheme settings.
      • CARDS-51970 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: Fixed "Pair Sequence Number" field filling for PairData files.
      • CARDS-51981 [Core] Problem with setting version attribute and INT_TRF tag for an Accounting Scheme has been corrected in situations when there are no contracts and normalization orders for this scheme.
      • CARDS-52010 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export, DCI Outward Processing: Fixed AirLine Addendum Flight Number field processing.
      • CARDS-52022 [Risk management] Fixed incorrect processing of usage limiters with the SingleSliding period type when the limiter's period was not defined for a particular contract with an application or manually. Without this additional determination, the limiter is not analyzed.
      • CARDS-52023 [Acquiring] Typo in the "Device Configuration Item Type" form has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52074 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect inheritance of the return code from an original document when a repeat message is received.
      • CARDS-52093 [Authentication management] Fixed "Failed to calculate DP routing, use default routing" warning for Authentication Server Context operations.
      • CARDS-52133 [Instalment management] Instalment Event = "Plan Closed", according to which an Instalment Event Fee is charged is no longer generated when an instalment plan in preview or inactive status is closed.
      • CARDS-52142 [Issuing authorisation] Error using three delimiters ('|') instead of two when answering TAR messages during MDES transactions has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52164 [Core] Display of balance amounts after performing the balance prediction procedure has been corrected in WAY4 Web. Cache clearing has been added.
      • I1610314143 [Case management] [CARDS-52065] Optimized "Contract" tab performance in the Case Details screen.
      • I1611079238 [UnionPay interface] [CARDS-51706] Union Pay Inward Processing: Fixed Settlement S2 level amounts. Union Pay Audit Trailer Import: Added Settlement S2 level for Reimbursement Fees. Manual Action: adding message types for S2 level Reimbursement Fees.
      • I1611117990 [Transaction management] [CARDS-51595] Fixed fee collection processing if both source and target BINs have the CAN_BE_ONUS tag.
      • I1701112611 [VISA interface] [CARDS-51790] A new parameter has been added to the "Visa Statistics Acquiring Business" report, P_ATTR_VALUE_ISONUS - varchar(4000) with the default value "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)" for customising the "is_on_us" flag. Checks by group_channel have been replaced by card_brand analysis (... card_brand like 'V_%' ...) for supporting affiliated transactions.
      • I1701163750 [Money transfers] [CARDS-51967] BIN routing search has been changed for P2P transactions from cards to accounts.
      • I1701242974 [Transaction management] [CARDS-51980] Corrected contract status check - no reversals are allowed for a closed contract even if there is a valid contract status with code 14.
      • I1701271032 [Tariff management] [CARDS-51919] Changing Interest Tariff Apply Mode without changing interest rates has been enhanced.
      • I1702012564 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51961] MasterCard MPE Import: excluded the IP0036T1 table from checking for presence.
      • I1702139241 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-52045] The error "Incoming TransCondition does not correspond to TransAttributes" is interpreted as a warning in acquiring.
      • I1702196631 [Product management] [CARDS-52141] Fixed amount calculation for standing orders with the BY_BATCH tag; now zero amount orders are not recalculated based on account balance.
      • CARDS-51360 [Issuing] Pan reference identifier, Token reference identifier and Token requestor identifier have been added as document and authentication scheme tags.
      • CARDS-51757 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IRD Calculation: Base IRD Configuration now uses native DE22, PDS0023 and PDS0052 values to define IRD specification.
      • CARDS-51800 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Inward/Outward: Added PDS0047 (Trade Payment Option) to message layouts. No special processing.
      • CARDS-51831 [VISA interface] VISA Outward: export of TCR3 record for AFT transactions is supported.
      • CARDS-51852 [Acquiring authorisation] Aligned Merchant-Initiated Transactions (MIT) (see the standard manual "Configuring WAY4™ according to Visa Requirements (April 2017)", section "Configuring Merchant-Initiated Transactions").
      • CARDS-51869 [VISA interface] TKN_ACTIVATION and TKN_VERIFICATION requests are connected with Lifecycle identifier. TKN_VERIFICATION and TKN_ACTIVATION_CODE requests are connected with Token reference identifier.
      • CARDS-51896 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Supported separate transaction fees export by the FIN_TRANS_SPLIT pipe parameter.
      • CARDS-51915 [Diners Club interface] DCI Outward Processing: Supported Acquirer Clearing File Format changes for Release 17.1. No impact for current pipe behaviour.
      • CARDS-51916 [Diners Club interface] DCI Inward Processing. Supported Issuer Clearing File Format release 17.1 changes.
      • CARDS-51933 [Issuing authorisation] Product Configuration ID can also be configured as contract subtype MDES_ISS_ID tag.
      • CARDS-51982 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Inward: Added loading PDS0059 in document tag WSP_REQ_ID.
      • CARDS-52026 [UnionPay interface] Application Transaction Counter validation has been enhanced for deferred authorisations. When an unexpected value is received, a warning is written for the authorisation process.
      • CARDS-52046 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File Import pipe: added filling doc.settlement_amount and currency with Original Price Amount and Original Price Currency Code values from incoming file for DCC transactions.
      • CARDS-52048 [Dispute assistant] DA v2: Supported processing of a duplicate secondary document if is matched with an original document.
      • CARDS-52069 [Fee Prediction] IC tariffs have been modified for the Czech Republic in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Bulletin No. 1, 2017.
      • CARDS-52080 [Issuing authorisation] The TAR response code for VISA authorizations has been changed from 5 to the real response code of the transaction.
      • CARDS-52084 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Added the ability to customize the StatusCode field for the CorporateInformation_4000 and AccountInformation_4300 aggregates.
      • CARDS-52104 [Issuing authorisation] VDEP Active account management velocity checking result and Device identifier tags have been added to document.
      • CARDS-52123 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IRD Calculation: Base IRD Configuration now uses native DE22, PDS0023 and PDS0052 values to define IRD specification.
      • CARDS-52166 [Issuing authorisation] Tokenization correlation identifier and device type for MDES transactions have been added to doc.add_info.

      • CARDS-52169 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced TC33 Acquirer Capture import pipe: "Total Authorization Amount" field is stored in the document for further export.
