      • I1612120086 [VISA interface] [CARDS-51705] In the "Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report, added new parameter P_CEMEA for grouping "Acquirer Data" and "MOTO (Mail and Telephone Order) Data" sections by regional tiers.
      • I1702196591 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-52157] Interchange tariffs have been modified for Belgium in accordance with VISA requirements published on February 16, 2017.
    • 03.44.20.06
      • CARDS-51824 [MasterCard interface] IPS Products: Removed duplicated records for MasterCard.
      • CARDS-51836 [Tariff management] Optimized load of personal tariffs for large contract hierarchies.
    • 03.44.20.05
      • CARDS-51405 [Fleet cards] Usage limiter remainder values (units and money, units or money, units, money) returned for successful transactions are now regulated by the FLEET_RETURN_LIMITERS global parameter.
      • CARDS-51415 [Tariff management] Supported automatic inheritance of a tariff domain contract parameter value from a sub to a main contract according to linked classifier value priority.
      • CARDS-51416 [Product management] The ability to skip Tariff Plan inheritance has been implemented.
      • CARDS-51427 [Authentication management] Allow the "SINGLE" option for identification schemes.
      • CARDS-51610 [Loyalty] Added the ability to limit the bonus points amount accrued for a client contract within a loyalty campaign. The limit amount should be set in the "Action Total Limit" field of the tariff action, the ACTION_LIMIT_MODE=LOCAL tag indicates that the action limit should be calculated for each contract. A new strict mode has been added to check the action limit, it prevents total points from exceeding the specified limit with the last transaction; ACTION_LIMIT_MODE=STRICT should be set for the tariff action.
      • CARDS-51670 [Acquiring] Document tags CYCLE_CB (Credit Banknote), CYCLE_DC (Debit Coin), CYCLE_CC (Credit Coin), CYCLE_DB2 (for ATMs with 2 dispensers) have been supported to define the cycle code to group entries for batch repayment.
      • CARDS-48158 [Host2Host interface] If acquirer parameters are not found by member ID, a search is made for default acquirer parameters by the "default" member id.
      • CARDS-48740 [POS management] Final advice is supported for P2P transactions.
      • CARDS-50957 [AMEX interface] Transactions for foreign devices are now shown in the "AMEX Statistics Issuing Business" report.
      • CARDS-51199 [Issuing authorisation] Corrected behaviour. The original value of an internal key will sent to H2H when a secondary message contains the other value of the key.
      • CARDS-51235 [Issuing] Fixed incorrect ability to mark an additional card applet for production without the main one.
      • CARDS-51371 [Loyalty] Fixed action approval for loyalty actions with Action Total Limit specified.
      • CARDS-51380 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer File Import: Loading Fund Disbursement from FCP files.
      • CARDS-51392 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import: fixed "Acceptor Name Location" field processing.
      • CARDS-51394 [Core] Fixed recalculation of values in the ON_DATE, ON_DATE_BALANCE fields of the Account table during the Accounting GL renumeration process.
      • CARDS-51410 [NSPK interface] Fixed "No or incorrect tag NSPK_TA" error when exporting a transit adjustment transaction to NSPK.
      • CARDS-51413 [Diners Club interface] DCI Outward Processing: Supported exporting a transaction amount with a surcharge fee (from the document settlement amount).
      • CARDS-51419 [UnionPay interface] UnionPay Outward Processing: Supported filling the "System Trace Audit Number" and "Transmission Date and Time" fields from the authorization document if one of them isn't present in the financial document.
      • CARDS-51423 [Core] Threshold amount calculation for Inherited standing orders with BY_BATCH has been fixed for multicurrency contracts.
      • CARDS-51434 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward ONUS: fixed PDS-0025.2 filling for reversals. A reversal will be exported only after receiving the appropriate [1644-685] (Financial Position) message for the original transaction.
      • CARDS-51435 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect "PIN change" processing on TS IRouter when request to an external system is required.
      • CARDS-51444 [Customer/account management] Fixed performance trouble with procedure of calculation values current amount and current number fields on GUI forms.
      • CARDS-51449 [Product inspector] Added sorting by ID for application action logging in PI test results.
      • CARDS-51451 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: added Member ID to error message when getting Member parameters.
      • CARDS-51489 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export. Enhanced customization.
      • CARDS-51492 [AMEX interface] Transaction Processing: Added checking of Service Code 702 for AMEX.
      • CARDS-51530 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File: fixed doc.MERCHANT_ID filling. This field is filled only from the TCR1 record of the file being imported.
      • CARDS-51533 [NSPK interface] NSPK SIOM Outward: fixed Oracle grants for Clerk role.
      • CARDS-51572 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing: fixed ARN recalculation for Adjustments, when an Adjustment has the same date as original transaction.
      • CARDS-51579 [JCB interface] JCB Variable Outward: fixed ARN field 31 subfield 2 filling. Now it matches PDE3901.2. Removed DE14 filling for non ICC transactions.
      • CARDS-51586 [Host2Host interface] IRouter: Removed unnecessary incorrect PIN tries processing in routing contract.
      • CARDS-51629 [Core] The error message "History mode can not be empty" has been modified to the warning message "History mode may be required" when approving a Service Package.
      • CARDS-51646 [Transaction management] Non tariff-dependent conditions for usage limiters with tariffs are checked before tariff search to minimize database load.
      • CARDS-51647 [Invoice management] Overdue substate restore procedure has been fixed for invoice payment reject.
      • CARDS-51673 [Fee Prediction] MasterCard MPE Import. Supported loading amount restriction from MPE for a particular IRD by tag in the configuration. Now the configuration supports loading amount restriction for Spain IRD 75 and 85 for retail transactions.
      • CARDS-51676 [CB Gate] Utility Payment message routing to bank system rule selection algorithm has been corrected.
      • CARDS-51683 [Product management] Usage_Limiters_Css.current_status value now considers the state of Contract Classifiers, as before. When the condition is false, the value is "S" (Service Deactivated).
      • CARDS-51734 [VISA interface] VISA Outward Processing: fixed "POS Terminal Capability" field filling when terminal capabilities are unknown.
      • CARDS-51752 [MasterCard interface] IRD configuration has been modified for IRD PW in EU.
      • CARDS-51762 [MasterCard interface] Error in sending additional data for MDES TAR response has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51780 [Authentication management] Fixed incorrect processing of long values for parameters of the procedure used by Authentication Server when the High Availability solution is not used.
      • CARDS-51825 [AMEX interface] AMEX FSF Export: Supported empty Approval Code and empty batches won't be exported now.
      • CARDS-51827 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import: Fixed outgoing transaction processing and CHANGE_CURR pipe parameter processing.
      • I1407093543 [VISA interface] [CARDS-43531] VISA BASEII Inw History Processing: removed duplicate check for History Out files without header TC90.
      • I1408182397 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-51748] Dispute Assistant v1, v2: Changed MasterCard default type of rate for amount conversion from MDB to MDM.
      • I1509142952 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-51531] IC Documents Export, IC Documents Import. The "EXCLUDE_TAGS" parameter has been added to IC Documents Export, IC Documents Import pipes, making it possible to exclude export/import of the specified tags from/to doc.add_info.
      • I1512213945 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51668] MasterCard Inward Processing: fixed FILE_MASK parameter processing in silent mode.
      • I1607269017 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-50154] DA v2: Fixed the procedure to get the last document in a chain. Supported processing reversals that were not generated in the DA interface. The activity "Accepted Presentment Reversal (Iss)" (idt DSP_ACPT_PRS_REV_SYSACT) must be registered in the acquirer strategy.
      • I1609086162 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-51433] DA v.2: Fixed filling reimbursement amounts by default.
      • I1609088862 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-50497] MATCH_REVERSE_ONLINE parameter limits the period from sales completion to the reversal transaction excluding the preauthorisation transaction.
      • I1609226977 [Core banking interface] [CARDS-51687] RBS Document Import: fixed response file for import file after previous unsuccessful import.
      • I1610186701 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-50947] MasterCard SAFE: Suppported Fraud Negative Reporting Record Reject processing.
      • I1610275892 [UnionPay interface] [CARDS-51102] When a card channel is included in the global parameter CHANNEL_FOR_BU_WAIT and the WAIT_BATCH_UPLOAD parameter is set to "N" or "R", adjustment and reversal documents are posted simultaneously with the primary document.
      • I1611018583 [Issuing] [CARDS-51391] Fixed incorrect usage limiter redefinition processing which lead to Oracle exception when all previously made redefinitions was already terminated.
      • I1611104436 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-51596] Increased the precision of reading FX rates for macrotransactions to 12 digits for use in screen forms and reports.
      • I1611140592 [Transaction management] [CARDS-51760] Fixed saving of customized transaction details for misc documents.
      • I1611154209 [Notifications] [CARDS-51591] Notification generation for expired fund holds unblocking has been corrected. A new event code "CLOSED_AUTH_DOC" has been added.
      • I1611305517 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51501] Interchange tariffs have been modified for EU (Intra-Western) in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Manual.
      • I1611305656 [Product inspector] [CARDS-51348] Product Inspector test script import has been modified when in the file being imported there are test scripts with codes that already exist: a UI dialog is displayed to confirm the script update. If script update is chosen, all the existing test steps will be deleted and the new one rewritten. This dialog window appears only if the pipe's SILENT mode parameter is switched off.
      • I1612082795 [VISA interface] [CARDS-51432] RA configuration has been fixed for the United Kingdom and Gibraltar.
      • I1612151492 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-51420] Fixed "CHIP_TRANS ::ERROR: Wrong Data Detected" error when exporting chip NSPK transactions using the "Affiliated BII Outward Processing" pipe.
      • I1612200174 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51505] MasterCard IPM Outward: Now we don't send DE54 Cashback amount in chargebacks.
      • I1612227997 [Transaction management] [CARDS-51672] Fixed usage limiter counter calculation for partial reversals.
      • I1612293501 [High availability] [CARDS-51620] Incorrect PostingStatus values are no longer assigned to documents moved from a secondary HA node when deferred processing takes these records in a different order than the original one.
      • I1701111004 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-51791] Corrected processing of repeat messages for partial approved requests.
      • CARDS-50278 [NSPK interface] NSPK: supported SIOM (NSPK fraud reporting system) for Issuers.
      • CARDS-50996 [Transaction management] The "TOKEN" transaction attribute has been set for acquiring transactions according to bin_table settings.
      • CARDS-51140 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward: added support for incoming files without RDW. To import such files, the "NORDW"="Y" pipe parameter must be set.
      • CARDS-51438 [MasterCard interface] Interchange tariffs have been modified for Croatia in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Bulletin No. 18.
      • CARDS-51481 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Outward (variable): added the "EXT_CURR_EXP" parameter for changing the currency exponent on transaction export.
      • CARDS-51561 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q2 Global 594: Supported loading the Payment Account Reference field of an ADDR message to the document tag PAR.
      • CARDS-51576 [Fee Prediction] RA configuration has been modified for Great Britain and the Czech Republic.
      • CARDS-51581 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Supported merging documents for Financial Adjustment Records.
      • CARDS-51594 [NSPK interface] [NSPK REL] 17.1 B-02. NSPK Outward Processing will not export "1740-781" and "1740-782" messages if "NSPK_RELEASE"="17.1" global parameter is set.
      • CARDS-51636 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Apr17-340 2.1 Processing Requirements for Staged Digital Wallet Transactions. Supported a new value, "WT" for Business Application ID field in AI,AN,CA,FL,LG TCR3 records.
      • CARDS-51637 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Apr17-376 4.5: supported new "Payment Account Reference" field in BASE II Draft Data Transactions. If this field has a meaningful value in an incoming transaction it is stored in the "PAR" tag in the document.
      • CARDS-51639 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Apr17-364 3.9 : supported Enhanced TC33 Acquirer Capture file format changes.
      • CARDS-51658 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard NSPK Outward: From 28.02.2017, the pipe will fill PDS0765 for MoneySend Payment Transactions.
      • CARDS-51660 [VISA interface] VISA Interface: added support of Merchant Initiated Transactions.
      • CARDS-51662 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Apr17-341 2.2 : Added new Commercial Product ID 'X' to the default value of the 'COMMERCIAL_PRODUCT_ID' pipe parameter.
      • CARDS-51693 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File Import (pipe): the value of the "Purchase Identifier" field (TC33 CP01 TCR1 pos 45-69) is stored in the document's "PURCH_ID" tag instead of in the "CS_PURCH_ID" tag used earlier. VISA BASE II Outward pipe: supported export of the "Purchase Identifier" field (TC05 TCR1 pos 133-157) from the "PURCH_ID" tag.
      • CARDS-51784 [VISA interface] VISA BII ONUS Outward Processing: added new "PAN_FROM_TKN" parameter, if set to 'Y' and the "D_TKN" tag is not null, the "D_TKN" tag value will be exported in TCR0 pos 05-23 Account Number field instead of the "doc.TARGET_NUMBER" value.
      • CARDS-51808 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Apr17-390 2.14 : supported new "Token Requestor ID" field in "TCR4 - Supplemental Financial Data" in BASE II Draft Data Transactions. If this field has a meaningful value in the incoming transaction it is stored in the "WSP_REQ_ID" tag of the document.
      • CARDS-51823 [UnionPay interface] UPI Bin Table Import: Added the CDV_ALGORITHM pipe parameter. By default this parameter is null.
      • I1511020079 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-49191] AMEX: supported functionality to reverse outgoing AMEX GFSG files.

    • 03.44.20.04
      • CARDS-50685 [Core] For name generation by the menu item "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Generate Transaction Dictionary" added the CUST_TRANS_DICT() procedure to customise generation of names in MESS_DICT.
      • CARDS-50729 [Product management] Contract parameter code is allowed as value for the CYCLE tag on the balance type which triggers the classifier. Old behavior (the value of this tag is defined as a counter) is also supported.
      • CARDS-50784 [Core] Warning message that "Payment receiver is not found for client and payment type" during order document processing is created only for SEPA documents.
      • CARDS-50787 [Fleet cards] New inbound fleet bertlv tag E3.EA.FFXX.DA (PriceCurrency) has been supported.
      • CARDS-50813 [Accounting] For Fee Prediction tariffs to use FX conversion by channel rates from Fee Base, Fee Min, Fee Max to the account currency, a special CR-FX Type (FX Type=CR_<Buy>;<Sell>;<Middle>) should be used, and the tag CONV_CHANNEL should be defined in Service Details. The special CR-FX Type should be Internal (the field "Is Internal=Yes" in OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\FX Types), even if there are no banking FX Schemes for it.
      • CARDS-50816 [Issuing authorisation] The additional global parameter CHIP_ATC_DEFERRED=ENABLE may be used to enable chip deferred authorisation request processing.
      • CARDS-49892 [Product management] Additional validations of the tariff domain code used for attaching a tariff domain have been added for configurations when the corresponding contract parameter has location in Classifier or Mirror To = Classifier.
      • CARDS-49980 [Datamart] In the "Account Roles - Customized" form "Product Category" values are taken from the "Product Category" dictionary. New forms have been added for Datamart: "Balance Types mapping - Customized" and "Last Head Process".
      • CARDS-50354 [POS management] Value "A" to ACQ_ONLINE tag has been added. This value changes vice versa online status of operation in operation table.
      • CARDS-50668 [Authentication management] Fixed: System cannot find 'TERMINAL' authentication scheme.
      • CARDS-50681 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect checking of card expiration date for linked contract requests when plastic is locked
      • CARDS-50684 [Datamart] updating 'PR' tag in acnt_contract.ext_data has been excluded from golden gate synch
      • CARDS-50688 [Transaction management] Transaction Processing: Changed priorities for Transaction Conditions with Token.
      • CARDS-50692 [Core] Fixed balance-based classifier processing when CYCLE_N > 1.
      • CARDS-50738 [Instalment management] Interest for the first portion of an instalment plan is always calculated for the entire period, not on a daily basis if the USE_MONTH_WEIGHT global parameter or tag in the Accounting Scheme is set to "B". A new value, "W", is supported for the INST_ADV_FEE_OPEN global parameter. This value can be used to waive an "Advance Fee" for early repayment or other actions that cause plan recalculation.
      • CARDS-50765 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: fixed the rollback procedure for NSPK Collection Only files, so it is possible to export these transactions again.
      • CARDS-50794 [Core] Menu Item DB Administrator Utilities.Special Contract Utilities.Macrotransactions - Reverse has been updated - now macro-transactions generated by this menu item are marked with REPOST_MTR tag. This tag has local_date of reversed macro-transaciton as value and it allows Datamart to filter out such records during daily ETL process.
      • CARDS-50799 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward - fixed filling PDS 0025.2 for reversals of presentments. The correct date is taken from the settlement data for the original transaction.
      • CARDS-50800 [e-Commerce issuing] Fixed incorrect processing of usage limiters with special condition containing tags CHANGE_IP and CHANGE_COUNTRY.
      • CARDS-50806 [Money transfers] Updated warning message text.
      • CARDS-50857 [Fleet cards] Transit of another root bertlv containers together with Fleet bertlv container has been supported from terminal to issuer and back from issuer to terminal.
      • CARDS-50880 [MasterCard interface] Loading BIN Tables: Fixed BIN Table record update when the same record is updated several times.
      • CARDS-50907 [Transaction management] Transaction Processing: fixed document status set to to Reject twice during reject item processing.
      • CARDS-50912 [Core banking interface] IC Document Export: added a new pipe parameter "USE_TRANS_TYPE_IDT" = Y/N(default), which allows the "TransTypeIDT" element to be exported in the "Doc\TransType\TransCode" aggregate (for DETAILED_TRANS_CODE=Y mode).
      • CARDS-50915 [SEPA interface] The AmdmntInd tag in a SEPA Direct Debit document is set only when changes in the mandate are of any concern for the Creditor Bank or for the Debtor Bank (when any of OrnglMndtId, OrgnlCdtrSchmeId, OrgnlDbtrAcct, OrgnlDbtrAgt tags are filled).
      • CARDS-50918 [Diners Club interface] DCI Inward Processing: Added checking file duplication by file name.

      • CARDS-51257 [Application management] Advanced applications for contract update now call the contract approve process if the contract was changed even if the last sub-application in the tree is for contract status update and no changes were made to contract status.

      • CARDS-51287 [Core] FROM_TRANS_DATE behaviour has been restored for the explicit number of days defined in the tag value.
      • CARDS-51293 [AMEX interface] AMEX FSF Export: Fixed Approval Code field format checking.
      • CARDS-51314 [MasterCard interface] DE 124 in TAR messages will also be sent also for green channel.
      • I1607081471 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-51266] DA v2: Fixed amount processing if the global parameter USE_TRANS_AMOUNT=Y.
      • I1609214123 [Issuing] [CARDS-50964] The Move Contract procedure has been fixed when a new parent Account Scheme is the same as the old one (for example, when the same Account Scheme is used both for cards that have not yet been assigned and for assigned cards).
      • I1610143454 [Core] [CARDS-50702] Definition of routing idt for new contracts is regulated by the SKIP_ROUTING global parameter. When the value is "Y" (default), routing idt will not be filled in. If distributed processing is used and routing idt is a required attribute of real contracts, its definition can be additionally regulated by the client parameter SKIP_ROUTING, whose should be "Y" for cards that have been issued but not yet sold.
      • I1610184379 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-51319] DA v2: Restored the reopen case feature if a new document is added to a closed case.
      • I1610275964 [Application management] [CARDS-51126] Advanced Application R1 can be succesfully accepted even if it's blocked by the same officer who starts the accept process.
      • I1611018583 [Application management] [CARDS-51190] Exception handling has been added into usage limiter redefinition procedure
      • I1611072019 [Transaction management] [CARDS-51228] The USE_AUTH_FX parameter is now checked on the global and financial institution level.
      • I1611104436 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-51187] Precision of currency conversion rate stored for macrotransactions has been increased to 12 digits.
      • I1611184862 [Risk management] [CARDS-51289] Corrected calculation of the amount sign for a parent usage limiter when the transaction direction and FOR_WHOM property both are opposite to the corresponding properties of the child limiter.
      • I1611186375 [Tariff management] [CARDS-51136] Fixed tariff duplication when a personal tariff domain was copied from another card contract during card replacement.
      • I1611219274 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51276] MasterCard SAFE Inward: Added the pipe parameters FILE_TEMPL and FILE_ARCH_TEMPL to change the file mask for loading files. A mask must have a directory and a fixed format (without the "*" character).

    • 03.44.19.41
      • CARDS-50816 [Issuing authorisation] The additional global parameter CHIP_ATC_DEFERRED=ENABLE may be used to enable chip deferred authorisation request processing.
      • CARDS-50912 [Core banking interface] IC Document Export: added a new pipe parameter "USE_TRANS_TYPE_IDT" = Y/N(default), which allows the "TransTypeIDT" element to be exported in the "Doc\TransType\TransCode" aggregate (for DETAILED_TRANS_CODE=Y mode).
      • CARDS-50974 [Issuing authorisation] VISA Interface: supported TCR5 pos 150 PAN Token field. It is stored/exported from "D_TKN" tag.
      • CARDS-50984 [Loyalty] Tariff action processing has been fixed. When applying a tariff action, two tariff data records are automatically created: one from the date the action starts and the second - from the date the action is finished.
      • CARDS-50999 [Fleet cards] Fixed filling the value of the "LAST_INV_DATE" tag in the acnt_contract.ext_data field for fuel invoices during execution of the WRITE_PERIOD_DATES procedure.
      • CARDS-51005 [Instalment management] Fixed activation of an instalment plan with recalculation if custom fee parameters are used.
      • CARDS-51010 [VISA interface] VISA: added Total Authorized Amount (TCR5 pos 50) processing in the "CPS" tag.
      • CARDS-51035 [Transaction management] Conditions for the "Message" link in the Mess To Mbr Incoming.srd form and the "Errors" link in the Doc - Grid.srd form have been changed: filtering by the Object Type field has been added.
      • CARDS-51040 [Instalment management] INST_INF_RATE tag format has been fixed. The new format has two decimal digits and no decimal point.
      • I1605234769 [Core] [CARDS-50337] The DICT message dictionary is obsolete and will be deleted in WAY4 Cards 03.46. All forms that were using DICT have been updated to use MESS_DICT. The menu item "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Transaction Dictionary" now uses the form "Message Dictionary - Transactions".
      • I1606172131 [Risk management] [CARDS-50886] Technical operations have been excluded from usage processing except operational usages. Technical operations are operations where transaction type and service class are not filled.
      • I1609088862 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-50497] MATCH_REVERSE_ONLINE parameter limits the period from sales completion to the reversal transaction excluding the preauthorisation transaction.
      • I1611084649 [Product management] [CARDS-51053] Contract activity date processing has been fixed for Fin Requests.
      • I1611117514 [Fleet cards] [CARDS-51060] Fixed incorrect processing of the list of redefined fields when personalized usage limiters are modified.
      • CARDS-50576 [MasterCard interface] MC Release 16.Q04 requires corrections in Transaction Subtypes settings. See documentation for details.
      • CARDS-50949 [Diners Club interface] DCI Inward Processing: For loading Acquirer Confirmation File - changed message code S1--I--- trans type "Interchange Total" to S1-AI--- trans type "Acq Interchange Total" and code S1--F--- trans type "Reimbursement Fee Total" to S1-AF--- trans type "Acq Reimbursement Fee Total". They must be changed manually or by loading Copy Configuration file. Supported loading Interchange Issuer Detail File.
      • CARDS-51019 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Inward Processing: Supported loading PDS0170, PDS0171, PDS0172, PDS0173, PDS0174 in the corresponding document tags by the pipe parameter LOAD_CA_DATA=Y.
    • 03.44.19.39
      • CARDS-49256 [Core] Product Tariff Campaigns have been implemented.
      • CARDS-49980 [Datamart] In the "Account Roles - Customized" form "Product Category" values are taken from the "Product Category" dictionary. New forms have been added for Datamart: "Balance Types mapping - Customized" and "Last Head Process".
      • CARDS-50944 [AMEX interface] Fixed grouping by product name in the "AMEX Statistics Issuing Business" report.
      • I1610204501 [Transaction management] [CARDS-50960] Fixed redefinition of the DECLINE_NON_AUTHORIZED global parameter for a financial institution or for a particular document when the global parameter DECLINE_NON_AUTHORIZED=Y, but its value is overridden by "N".
    • 03.44.19.37
      • CARDS-50921 [Tariff management] Tariff domain contract parameter initialisation error has been fixed for card creation application in check mode.
      • CARDS-50929 [MasterCard interface] Country Table: Afghanistan moved from MasterCard Asia/Pasific Region to Middle East/Africa Region.
      • CARDS-50939 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing: fixed filling PDS0025.1 for Fee Collection Reversals.
      • I1611018920 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-50902] NSPK Outward Processing: ARN date (DE31.3) is recalculated for credit transactions converted from adjustments.
      • CARDS-39148 [High availability] Exception Request List: Supported High Availability mode.
      • CARDS-50866 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: Supported additional customization points.
      • I1502060020 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-50943] Interchange Reimbursement qualification criteria have been added for Kazakhstan.
    • 03.44.19.35
      • CARDS-50813 [Accounting] For Fee Prediction tariffs to use FX conversion by channel rates from Fee Base, Fee Min, Fee Max to the account currency, a special CR-FX Type (FX Type=CR_<Buy>;<Sell>;<Middle>) should be used, and the tag CONV_CHANNEL should be defined in Service Details. The special CR-FX Type should be Internal (the field "Is Internal=Yes" in OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\FX Types), even if there are no banking FX Schemes for it.
      • I1608222937 [VISA interface] [CARDS-50769] The logic has been changed for calculating total active cards and total cards in the following QMR Issuing reports: "AMEX Statistics Issuing", "MC Statistics Issuing", "Visa Statistics Issuing". A card that has been reissued (when the contract with old card number hasn't been closed) is taken into account only once for "number of total cards in circulation" and "number of active cards".
      • CARDS-49892 [Product management] Additional validations of the tariff domain code used for attaching a tariff domain have been added for configurations when the corresponding contract parameter has location in Classifier or Mirror To = Classifier.
      • CARDS-50577 [Acquiring authorisation] Processing transactions of our cards without using owncards.xml on TS/NS has been developed. Non-existent card from our BIN range is considered to be ours.
      • CARDS-50782 [NSPK interface] Fixed calculation of total cards and active cards for the "NSPK Statistics Issuing Business Prepared" report.
      • CARDS-50880 [MasterCard interface] Loading BIN Tables: Fixed BIN Table record update when the same record is updated several times.
      • CARDS-50907 [Transaction management] Transaction Processing: fixed document status set to to Reject twice during reject item processing.
      • CARDS-50915 [SEPA interface] The AmdmntInd tag in a SEPA Direct Debit document is set only when changes in the mandate are of any concern for the Creditor Bank or for the Debtor Bank (when any of OrnglMndtId, OrgnlCdtrSchmeId, OrgnlDbtrAcct, OrgnlDbtrAgt tags are filled).
      • CARDS-50918 [Diners Club interface] DCI Inward Processing: Added checking file duplication by file name.
      • I1609233293 [Notifications] [CARDS-50831] Restored functionality of "ADD_ADDR_TYPES" tag.
      • I1610173078 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-50879] AMEX GNS Inward: FileID generation to prevent wrong file duplication error.
      • CARDS-50385 [UnionPay interface] UPI Outward: Supported filling the "Transmission Date and Time" and "System Trace Audit Number" fields from a document, not from an online message if the document fields are correctly filled on posting.
      • CARDS-50883 [VISA interface] VISA BIN Table Import: A new pipe parameter, COMMERCIAL_PRODUCT_ID=<product id1>,<product id2>,... has been added for splitting BIN ranges into consumer/commercial categories.
    • 03.44.19.34
      • CARDS-50759 [Datamart] Creating DM consist point for End of Day based in ldate_log have been done.
      • CARDS-50765 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: fixed the rollback procedure for NSPK Collection Only files, so it is possible to export these transactions again.
      • CARDS-50799 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward - fixed filling PDS 0025.2 for reversals of presentments. The correct date is taken from the settlement data for the original transaction.
      • CARDS-50800 [e-Commerce issuing] Fixed incorrect processing of usage limiters with special condition containing tags CHANGE_IP and CHANGE_COUNTRY.
      • CARDS-50826 [Transaction management] IPS Inward Processing: Changed inward file rollback processing.
      • CARDS-50850 [Issuing authorisation] The VDEP_TYPE tag to define the identification type for VDEP has been supported for Financial Institutions, Services and Contract Subtypes.
      • CARDS-50857 [Fleet cards] Transit of another root bertlv containers together with Fleet bertlv container has been supported from terminal to issuer and back from issuer to terminal.
      • I1604192767 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-49093] DA v2. Supported changing Trusted Amount currency. The currency may be the First Presentment transaction or settlement currency.
      • I1606157128 [VISA interface] [CARDS-50754] RA configuration has been fixed for premium products.
      • I1609271918 [Product management] [CARDS-50760] Regular fees are now calculated in OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Issuing Contracts - Balance Prediction.

      • I1610184150 [Application management] [CARDS-50827] Advanced Applications R2 for ClientAddress or ClientAuthMethod now support client identification through <ObjectFor><ContractIDT> format as in R1 applications. But this format for client identification is not correct and a warning message will be saved in process_mess.

    • 03.44.19.31
      • CARDS-50524 [Application management] Advanced Applications R2 supports now applications to create instalments by transaction or contract balance. These applications can be loaded from files, Way4Gate, Web Services and are available in monitoring forms in the OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2 menu.
      • CARDS-46333 [VISA interface] BIN TABLE IMPORT: improved inheritance of manual tags for updated BIN records. No manual action required, they are inherited automatically.
      • CARDS-50703 [Application management] Advanced Applications R2 supports now applications to close or update instalment plans, to order early repayment or payment holidays for plans. These applications can be loaded from files, Way4Gate, Web Services and are available in monitoring forms in the OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2 menu.
      • CARDS-50354 [POS management] Value "A" to ACQ_ONLINE tag has been added. This value changes vice versa online status of operation in operation table.
      • CARDS-50624 [Core] FX conversion does not execute for counter balance types.
      • CARDS-50690 [Customer/account management] Fixed incorrect processing of PIN change in cases when a card is linked to multiple account contracts.
      • CARDS-50773 [Core] Restored protection from deleting doc and m_transaction after they have been posted.
      • CARDS-50779 [Dispute assistant] DA v2. Added the [Complete Image Activity] button to the CM.New Case Activity.dataform.xml dataform.
      • CARDS-50794 [Core] Menu Item DB Administrator Utilities.Special Contract Utilities.Macrotransactions - Reverse has been updated - now macro-transactions generated by this menu item are marked with REPOST_MTR tag. This tag has local_date of reversed macro-transaciton as value and it allows Datamart to filter out such records during daily ETL process.
      • CARDS-50806 [Money transfers] Updated warning message text.
      • I1605090243 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-48914] Fixed incorrect suppression of sending credit authorization reversals to the core banking system.
      • I1610063157 [Risk management] [CARDS-50788] Fixed incorrect processing of predefined BIN values in merchant stop-list for risk monitiring
      • CARDS-50661 [MasterCard interface] Fee Prediction configuration (payment products) has been modified in accordance with release 16Q4.
      • CARDS-50775 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard MPE processing. Now the "Product Type ID" field from MPE table IP0040T1 is transferred to the BIN Table Product Category field instead of the Service Indicator field.
      • CARDS-50801 [Fee Prediction] Fee Prediction configuration (payment products) has been modified in accordance with MasterCard interchange tariffs.
    • 03.44.19.28
      • CARDS-49795 [Issuing authorisation] Added ability to permit no more than the specified number of transactions with certain conditions. See documentation for details.
      • CARDS-50140 [Core] The additional global parameter APPROVE_IMMEDIATE is set to N (No) in the standard configuration for new installations. The default value is still Y (Yes), so there is no impact on current installations.
      • CARDS-50605 [Accounting] Implemented new procedures in the FX conversion module for calculating conversion rates.
      • CARDS-50748 [Product inspector] The Ability to generate PS Ref Number has been added to Product Inspector. The PS Ref Number template should be specified in the document template in the test step. The first characters of the generated number are taken from the template provided.
      • CARDS-50633 [Core] Authorisation check in an unknown currency has been optimised.
      • CARDS-50738 [Instalment management] Interest for the first portion of an instalment plan is always calculated for the entire period, not on a daily basis if the USE_MONTH_WEIGHT global parameter or tag in the Accounting Scheme is set to "B". A new value, "W", is supported for the INST_ADV_FEE_OPEN global parameter. This value can be used to waive an "Advance Fee" for early repayment or other actions that cause plan recalculation.
      • CARDS-50742 [Issuing authorisation] Multiple authorisations matching by PS Ref Number has been added.
      • CARDS-50755 [Automated routines] FX rates activation has been added for Set Time Zone Banking Date (2-phased).
      • I1609213579 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-50737] DA v2: Fixed Reject documents processing (adding to a case).
      • I1610103123 [Transaction management] [CARDS-50758] Transaction Processing: Set the additional global parameter TRANS_ATTR_CHECK=N to stop checking transaction attribute integrity when posting a document. Check transaction attribute integrity manually with OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\Interchange\All Docs Not Safe.
      • I1610191437 [Transaction management] [CARDS-50757] Improved slow performance of accept documents.
      • CARDS-50623 [UnionPay interface] UnionPay Audit Trailer Import: Supported creating original financial documents instead of acknowledgments.
    • 03.44.19.26
      • CARDS-42508 [Diners Club interface] DCI: Supported loading BIN table from DCI Network Configuration Information xml file (MPE file).
      • CARDS-40140 [Tariff management] Extra ITEMS for GL tariff renumeration has been fixed.
      • CARDS-50479 [SEPA interface] SEPA mandate activity periods are checked now for start and end date consistency and possible overlap with other active contract mandates.
      • CARDS-50538 [Tariff management] A new form that can be opened from Child Product.srd for Tariff Book and Tariff Plans view and edit has been added.
      • CARDS-50547 [Issuing authorisation] All tags specified for MDES/VDEP in BERTLV are set in document add_info.
      • CARDS-50639 [Core] For name generation by the menu item "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Generate Transaction Dictionary" added the CUST_TRANS_DICT() procedure to customise generation of names in MESS_DICT.
      • CARDS-50665 [Core] Additional input parameters have been added to the CUST_TRANS_CODE custom procedure. These parameters allow more precise customization of transaction codes. A transaction code generated by the custom function is not altered anymore with additions in standard code. The resulting transaction code is used in the macrotransaction and GL Trace. Entry record transaction codes can be synchronised with GL Trace records if the SYNC_ENTRY_GL_TRANS_CODE global parameter is set to "Y". For using standard transaction codes, the function should return null value. Different transaction codes can be generated for base amount, base fee, additional fee and markup using logic for the EntryRole input parameter. A transaction code with the BaseAmount role is saved in a macrotransaction, other roles are used in GL Trace and Entry only. The previous version cust_trans code was only called for the BaseAmount role. If only customization of macrotransaction trans_code is needed (that is inherited by certain rules into gl_trace and entry) then a condition on this EntryRole should be added.
      • CARDS-50678 [Fleet cards] New inbound fleet bertlv tag E3.EA.FFXX.DA (PriceCurrency) has been supported.
      • CARDS-50713 [Application management] A new button "Accept" has been added to "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Cardholder Input & Update by Applications", "OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Merchant Input & Update by Applications", "OpenWay\SEPA\Mandate Input & Update" to allow a single application to be accepted.
      • CARDS-50715 [Case management] The Case Management activity "Create sub case" stores an activity comment as a new case description.
      • CARDS-50733 [Issuing authorisation] Added the ability to fill doc.acq_ref_number in online processing of messages received from RTSI interface.
      • I1503163267 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-50700] The additional global parameter CHIP_ATC_DEFERRED=ENABLE may be used to enable chip deferred authorisation request processing.
      • I1607043388 [e-Commerce issuing] [CARDS-50717] Authentication scheme's parameters processing utilities has been refactored for better usability

      • CARDS-50681 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect checking of card expiration date for linked contract requests when plastic is locked

      • CARDS-50688 [Transaction management] Transaction Processing: Changed priorities for Transaction Conditions with Token.

    • 03.44.19.24
      • CARDS-49261 [Core] Automatic creation of classifier values has been implemented for new Tariff Plan approval in a Tariff Book (for contract parameters with location in Classifier or with Mirror To the classifier configuration).
      • CARDS-50619 [Product management] Added the ability to mark an account scheme to redefine the interest account currency from the parent pack local currency to child pack local currency.
      • CARDS-50580 [Issuing authorisation] When an attempt to create or change token information is made in Stand-In mode, the error "Tokenization is not available in stand-in mode" occurs.

      • CARDS-50626 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing: added a check for DE12 (must not be greater then PDS-0105.2 (file date)). Added the "FILE_REF_DATE" pipe parameter for file date (PDS-0105.2) filling, parameter values are "SYSTEM" (default value, system time is used) and "BANK" (bank date is used).
      • CARDS-50627 [Core] Object Task Scheduler task for client addresses links renewing after client or contract approval now is switched off by default and can be switched on by the global parameter RENEW_ADDRESS_LINK.
      • CARDS-50648 [DB kernel] DML tagging for acnt_contract.last_scan does not work if "Upgrade Stoplist" synch flow is present.

      • I1609159302 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-50584] DA v2: Now there is an oppotunity to configure on the activity level (for Retrieval Requests, Chargebacks, Representments, Final Chargebacks) a set of tags which should be added into doc.add_info field. For example, to provide Itemized Document Code for AMEX Representment a tag "ADD_TAG_X=REQ_IDC;" in Parm List field can be added on the activity "Create Representment (Acq)".

      • CARDS-50570 [Transaction management] New financial matching algorithm has been implemented.

      • CARDS-50341 [Core] Trace messages added to the fx conversion module (possibility to view which FX rate is used and what FX type)
      • CARDS-50349 [Instalment management] The ability to automatically close instalment limits by an event has been added. The CLOSE_INST_LIMITS tag should be specified in event type special parameters. This event will close personal instalment limits listed in the CLOSE_BY_LIM_CODE tag when it is posted.
      • CARDS-50350 [Application management] Advanced Applications R2 supports setting contract Instalment Limits with an activity period.
      • CARDS-50361 [Case management] Case Management activity reason selection in "New Activity" screen populates the whole activity reason tree. It's enough to configurate only main reason for the activity, all sub-reasons will be available for it during the activity processing.
      • CARDS-50525 [Case management] Case Management operation screens support "Capture Case" activity just from Supervisor Worklists.
      • CARDS-50535 [Core] Local Russian numeric format is now set before report execution for the "NSPK Statistics Acquiring Business", "NSPK Statistics Acquiring Devices", "NSPK Statistics Issuing Business Prepared" reports.
      • CARDS-50537 [Consumer debt collections] CM Consumer Collections menu in Way4Managet has been extended by new items: "Operations.Supervisor Worklist.Waiting Cases" and "Operations.All Issuing Contracts". Menu "Operations.My WorklistOpen Cases for User Group" has been removed to "Operations.Team Worklist.Team Open Cases".
      • CARDS-50579 [Invoice management] When creating an Invoice, the effective date can be taken from the document's "Transaction Date". To use this function, the tag INV_FROM_TRANS_DATE should be set on the service which creates the invoice.
      • CARDS-50175 [Product inspector] Added the ability to log a contract's own parameter values for parameters set directly in the contract (not inherited according to the hierarchy). CONTR_PARMS_OWN log mode should be used to enable logging a contract's own parameters.
      • CARDS-50491 [Acquiring] Sorting by the ENTRY_DESCRIPTION and ENTRY_DETAILS fields for the "Entry" block in "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details", "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details", "Merchant Standing Orders Details" reports has been added.
      • CARDS-50526 [Consumer debt collections] The action list on "New Activity" and "Promises" tabs for the closed case are synchronized.
      • CARDS-50533 [Host card emulation] Fixed problem with HCE token enrollment event generation.
      • CARDS-50539 [Product inspector] Product Inspector for application testing now allows several applications to be tested in the same test script. Applications created in a test script are saved when LOG_ALL_APPL=Y; in the test script is set. When this parameter is used, an application created in the script can be used in different steps according to the APPL_IDT definition.
      • CARDS-50544 [Application management] Advanced Application R2: the problem when XML applications with missing mandatory elements in sub-applications were successfully accepted has been fixed. The problem could be observed when using OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Application Processing\Issuing XML Application Import or OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Application Processing\Acquiring XML Application Import pipes or in WAY4Gate.
      • CARDS-50545 [Transaction management] VISA, Affiliated Base II pipes: Removed the difference between Acquirer and Issuer Fee Collections. Standard forms for Fee Collection document creation have been modified. The new forms should be used. Interchange routing settings are required for incoming Fee Collection processing targeted to an affiliated bank. See the "Upgrade Notes on Impact Changes" section for more details.
      • CARDS-50549 [Core] Fixed calculation of the "MIR_REG_NUMBER" field for the "Statistics Acquiring Business", "Statistics Acquiring Devices", and "Statistics Issuing Business Prepared" NSPK reports.
      • CARDS-50550 [Core] Fixed cell borders in the "NSPK Statistics Issuing Business" report.
      • CARDS-50553 [Application management] RBS number inheritance for liability contracts has been removed in Advanced Applications R2.
      • CARDS-50568 [Core] Name of the menu item "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\Balance Types - Customized" has been restored to "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\Balance Types".
      • CARDS-50569 [Dispute assistant] Accept Documents: Fixed Fee Collection performance impact by removing searching by PS Reference Number.
      • CARDS-50573 [Issuing authorisation] Multiple authorisations matching (with PS_REF_NUMBER) has been fixed.
      • CARDS-50582 [AMEX interface] AMEX GNS Inward: Fallback transaction processing is supported.
      • I1510277050 [VISA interface] [CARDS-50586] RA configuration has been fixed for CEMEA region.
      • I1608182549 [Product management] [CARDS-50069] Processing of product copy (Product template support and Copy branch) has been fixed. 1- Products which are not present in the template are not removed (Previous behaviour: removed with errors), 2- Product template integrity on product approval is now checked, 3- Warnings for product template references for whole tree are provided (Previous behavior - for top level only) 4- Product unlink procedure has been fixed
      • I1610046470 [Product management] [CARDS-50530] The method of applying changes for the account templates has been changed during the Apply Scheme Changes process. Now it is done according to payment priority.
      • I1610077363 [Transaction management] [CARDS-50572] Max transaction date for multiple authorisations has been fixed, allowing not only the authorisation date to be considered, but the time as well.
      • I1610102506, I1609305560 [VISA interface] [CARDS-50571] VISA Outward: fixed filling "Mail/Phone/Electronic Commerce and Payment Indicator" for transactions with special MCCs.
    • 03.44.19.19
      • CARDS-50504 [MasterCard interface] Filling of Issuer Product Configuration ID on TAR response is now supported. The Product Configuration ID can be configured as Transaction subtype MDES_ISS_ID tag or Card info MDES_ISS_ID tag.
      • CARDS-48229 [Product inspector] Supported use of several Advanced Applications in one test script. Applications should be identified by the "APPL_IDT" tag in the initial application creation test step.
      • CARDS-48625 [NSPK interface] Optimized performance for the "NSPK Statistics Issuing Business" report.
      • CARDS-49826 [Issuing authorisation] Unique and opaque identifier for VDEP verification method has been added
      • CARDS-50297 [Product inspector] Product Inspector for application testing now allows testing an application for related contracts.
      • CARDS-50352 [Issuing authorisation] The following tags have been added under TAR-request document: - SE10 Wallet Service Provider Device Score, - SE11 Wallet Service Provider Account Score, and - SE15 Mobile Number Last 4 Digits
      • CARDS-50394 [UnionPay interface] UnionPay Interface: Acronym "CUP" was replaced with acronym "UPI" in menu and menu items, BIN groups, channels, contracts, etc.
      • CARDS-50476 [Product management] Multi-currency product: automatic creation of "related contracts" has been added. The functionality is implemented by the special tag SIBLING_PRODUCT =<Product Code>; in "custom data" of the "Base" Product (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Product Definition\Products).
      • CARDS-50488 [Issuing authorisation] VISA token statuses processing have been added for TKT_EVENT request.
      • CARDS-50496 [Product inspector] Product Inspector for application testing allows now to check application error messages using ERR_MSG tag.
      • CARDS-50518 [Case management] In Case Management it is now possible to send a case to a supervisor and set the supervisor as the case owner in one activity. The same ability is available for returning the case from the supervisor to the previous owner after review.
      • CARDS-50486 [Acquiring] Fixed filtering of "empty" contracts in report "Merchant Standing Orders Details"
      • CARDS-50489 [Core] Fixed invalid error message generation during Balance Type validation in case when the parent balance type with the tag COUNTER_ONLY has subordinated balance types with 'TURNOVER%' usage. Added error message generation during Balance Type validation in case when parent balance type with the tag COUNTER_ONLY has subordinated balance types with 'BALANCE' usage.
      • CARDS-50507 [Core] The ability to set a classifier when there is more than one classifier with the same code but in different domains has been fixed.
      • CARDS-50508 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Standard Data Export: fixed State/Province field filling in Accounts File.
      • CARDS-50509 [Core] Text labels for report sections have been corrected in the "NSPK Statistics Acquiring Business" report.
      • CARDS-50513 [Instalment management] Fixed instalment plan creation when Monthly Interest = Next Working Day in the Instalment Scheme.
      • I1511033062 [Transaction management] [CARDS-49655] Routing procedure for Fee Collection and other Interbank transactions (Funds Disbursement and Settlement) received by a processing centre or bank has been fixed and unified. Manual actions are required.
      • I1608298862 [Product management] [CARDS-50521] For standing orders, skip reason has been added to the Process mess when the target account not found.
      • I1608316382 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-50493] Fixed error "Doc was not uploaded (ONUS) Mandatory field 31 is absent". Fixed Internet transaction detection for collection only export. Changed ARN date (DE31.3) filling - now selected from file date and not from transaction date. Added processing of "MIR_NSPK_AID" tag in addition to "NSPK_AID" tag when searching the Member Id for affiliated collection only export.
      • I1609146279 [Money transfers] [CARDS-50459] The field 'State" will not be filled in the BERTLV container prepared for the VISA channel if the State attribute is not applicable for the corresponding country.
      • I1609231920, I1609306875 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-50473] MasterCard IPM Outward: Error when uploading "No Card" Fee Collections has been fixed.
      • CARDS-50106 [MasterCard interface] IRD configuration has been modified in accordance with release 16Q4.
      • CARDS-50323 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Standard Data Export: Starting from Release 15.1, supported creating empty files and registering them in the control file.
      • CARDS-50457 [Issuing authorisation] Correct notice of refusal has been supported when maximum possible (i.e.five) TAR MDES requests with wrong CVC2 occur.
    • 03.44.19.18
      • CARDS-50239 [Dispute assistant] DA v2. Supported Fulfillment Image document processing for VROL through Transaction Switch and VROL RTSI.
      • CARDS-47707 [Fleet cards] Created a new "Fleet.Items" form that describes in details the Retail Line Item Documents related to a selected Main Retail Document.
      • CARDS-49028 [Core] Fixed issue with account representation for fields DR_ANALYTIC/CR_ANALYTIC in GL_MACRO view after the account number was updated in the Items table.
      • CARDS-49764 [Acquiring authorisation] To allow acquiring finansial institution to search P2P clients data in another finansial institutions add P2P_PARTNER tag to the Special_Parms field of the head finansial institution of acquirer. The value of this tag should be the comma separated list of Branch_Code values of the head finansial institutions where acquirer can search.
      • CARDS-49794 [Issuing] PIN change is now enabled when a card is marked for reissuing of plastic only.
      • CARDS-50002 [Authentication management] 3DS support package errors are now compliant with PA DSS rules.
      • CARDS-50189 [Core] Custom fee with SAVE_FEE tag creates tags into the Document even if the calculated amount equals zero. SAVE_TFEE tag does not generate tags only in case when the custom fee does not pass the service details check.
      • CARDS-50254 [Instalment management] New custom procedure CUST_INSTL_FEE_DOC added. It allows to add some tags into document using instalment parameters for correct search of instalment fee tariffs.
      • CARDS-50300 [Product inspector] Base relation contract field can be redefined when creating a contract in Product Inspector by using BASE_RELATION tag in the test step.
      • CARDS-50301 [Reversal management] Correction of the current billing cycle are hidden in the "Storno Correction" form (not required).
      • CARDS-50348 [Instalment management] The ability to set a temporary Instalment limit added. A limit may be set for a time period, after which it will be set to zero or to the current value used, depending on the limit's configuration.
      • CARDS-50359 [Product inspector] Ability to add custom logging of additional parameters during test script run is added. Procedure CUST_TEST_LOG_BLOCK is called for every object being logged, logged objects list depend on LOG_MODE of test script, test step and contract.
      • CARDS-50371 [Dispute assistant] DA v2. Supported Image document for Representment processing for VROL through Transaction Switch and VROL RTSI.
      • CARDS-50403 [Product management] The ability to mark service pack to redefine the currency for fee account from "Parent pack local currency" to "child pack local currency" is now supported.
      • CARDS-50420 [e-Commerce acquiring] Added merchant currency and terminal information support to EGW interface
      • CARDS-50451 [Core] Added "Quarterly" value option in "Charge Event" list box under Fee Types
      • CARDS-50471 [NSPK interface] NSPK MIR: A subitem for checking the Product in Contract SubTypes has been added to the menu item OpenWay\NSPK\NSPK. Daily Procedures\NSPK. Load MPE\NSPK MPE Import.
      • CARDS-50483 [Core] Warning message that "Payment receiver is not found for client and payment type" during order document processing is created only for SEPA documents.
      • CARDS-48495 [Core] Additional validation has been added to the "Statistics Issuing Business" report for parameters in "Configuration Groups", "Payment Scheme Identification", "Financial Institutions", "Statistic Attributes".
      • CARDS-49874 [Transaction management] Transit fee collection acceptance has been fixed
      • CARDS-49882 [NSPK interface] NSPK Proprietary Interface: fixed PDS2072 coding page.
      • CARDS-50097 [MasterCard interface] In report "MasterCard Statistics Issuing Business" the sum conversion by parameter P_FX_RATE in "Delinquent Outstanding" section was fixed (same as in transactions section).
      • CARDS-50119 [Fleet cards] Small fixes in Fleet CUST procedures standard templates comments.
      • CARDS-50128 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward: EMV Chip data error checks are skipped.
      • CARDS-50364 [Core] The menu item "Synchronize DWD_CARD_BRAND with IPS_PRODUCT" has been deleted from the file "opt\stat_reporting\client\dbm\menu\Card_Products_mapping_for_stat_reporting.UPG". The menu item "Synchronize DWD_CARD_BRAND with IPS_PRODUCT" has been added to these menu folders: OpenWay\VISA Statistics Reports OpenWay\MC Statistics Reports OpenWay\AMEX Statistics Reports OpenWay\RF Reporting OpenWay\NSPK Reporting. Fixed error in rep.SYNC_DWHCRDBRND_AND_IPSPROD() with deletion of sy_conf_group_val records not present in the ips_product table.
      • CARDS-50392 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Stop List import: Supported records without trailing spaces processing.
      • CARDS-50400 [JCB interface] Merchant Management: No data found error for next action after incomplete previous initial action.
      • CARDS-50424 [Core] Calculation of FEE_BASE=CR_TRANS; has been fixed for different fee directions (debit/credit).
      • CARDS-50430 [SEPA interface] Subitem Security Grants "SEPA Mandate" added to the menu items in SEPA\Issuing Mandate Input & Update menu. It allows access to clerks working with client and contract SEPA mandates
      • CARDS-50435 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward : fixed error during DE37 check (when is present) for collection only documents.

      • I1606160105 [UnionPay interface] [CARDS-49908] Fixed error in usage limiter validation procedure which lead to reject of authorisation message processing when the message does not contains transaction amount in cardholder billing currency.
      • I1609216346 [Product management] [CARDS-50447] Fixed incorrect processing of parent usage limiter activity depending on document tags.
      • I1609232372 [Transaction management] [CARDS-50421] Transaction processing: Removed "Transaction attributes or transaction condition are reset" warning messages. Message is now displayed during transaction processing as information
      • I1609245184 [Transaction management] [CARDS-50404] Acquiring usages processing on doc acceptance with external device controller has been fixed. (in previous version device auth usages were not applied).

      • CARDS-50330 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing: Added additional check for DE031.3 (ARN Date) DE031.3 in (ClearingDate-8;ClearingDate] and DE031.3 >= DE012.1

    • 03.44.19.14
      • CARDS-50224 [Fleet cards] Available amount restricted by the lowest triggered limiter can be included in the response BERTLV tags for Retail, PreAuth, and Sales Completion transactions: - MoneyLimit - F0.EA.FFXX.C7, - UnitsLimit - F0.EA.FFXX.C8, - LimitExpire - F0.EA.FFXX.C9 for each Bill Item.
      • CARDS-50322 [Core] GL traces with a date in the past are not written to the exception table that can be viewed in OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\GL\GL Trace Exceptions if the "Close GL" process has not been launched.
      • CARDS-50336 [Core] Additional validation for the Payment Priority field of an account has been introduced. If the account is used as the Upper / Lower limit template for normalization, the value in the Payment Priority field cannot be set to "0".
      • CARDS-50372 [Product management] Contract parameter code is allowed as value for the CYCLE tag on the balance type which triggers the classifier. Old behavior (the value of this tag is defined as a counter) is also supported.
      • I1608315205 [Acquiring] [CARDS-50370] New feature copy of ATM Retail Contracts from selected device to another one added to 'Device Contract' form.Press 'Action ...' button, select 'Copy ATM Retail' item then select target device and press 'Proceed' button.
      • CARDS-49539 [Core] Balance Type validation has been improved. "Latest items only" value of the "History Mode" field was removed.
      • CARDS-50269 [Case management] Changes in User Management for Case Management: only active users can be assigned to the case and perform any acitivity.
      • CARDS-50296 [Accounting] Fixed filling of account.on_date and on_date_balance fields for subcontracts during the MainSubRecovery process which runs on each contract billing if the global parameter MAIN_SUB_RECOVERY=Y (default behaviour).
      • CARDS-50304 [JCB interface] JCB BIN Table Import: fixed record processing for Maintenance file with OperationSign=01 (Add record).
      • CARDS-50315 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward Processing: Fixed doc.rec_member_id filling for Fee Collection.
      • CARDS-50326 [Application management] Fixed the context of the "CAppInfo" input parameter for CUST_ADV_CHECK_APPL_INFO.
      • CARDS-50387 [Core] Error message override during contract subtype validation was fixed (menu-item "OWS.IPS Products check")
      • I1607132625 [Product management] [CARDS-50318] In form "Standing Order Personal", the fields "Payment Type" and "Date Event" are now available for editing if the order type is not defined as "UNIQUE INHERITED".
      • I1607274086 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-50358] In report "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details", the parameter "P_SHOW_EMPTY_CONTRACTS" affects the XML results - it applies a filter on the empty contracts.
      • I1609202368 [VISA interface] [CARDS-50317] VISA Affiliated Outward: Fixed "VISA_TA is not found" error for H2H channels with the "Is On Us'" = "N" property. The global parameter AFF_CH_LIST must be filled with the codes of these channels.
      • CARDS-50289 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: changed DE43 filling for ATM transactions.
      • CARDS-50290 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: for offline transactions DE38 is not unloaded.
      • CARDS-50327 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Oct16-177 V3 TC33 Enhanced Acquirer File - made small format changes between 2nd and 3d versions of VISA Oct16 Releases.
      • CARDS-50331 [NSPK interface] If DE38(Auth Code) exists and DE37(RRN) is absent in a First Presentment, the document is not unloaded.
    • 03.44.19.12
      • CARDS-50023 [Core] Standard calculation of statistic attributes has been moved from cust_stat_attr_value() to the STAT.STAT_ATTR_VALUE() package. See the "Upgrade Notes on Impact Changes" section for more details.
      • CARDS-50087 [Product inspector] The ability to log Contract Dates has been added to Product Inspector.
      • CARDS-50194 [Core] If Counterparty for "Standing Order with Payment Type" is not found under the contract, the system will try to find it under the client.
      • CARDS-50256 [Tariff management] The ability to use a discount for a tariff value has been added. Tag DISCOUNT_CODE should be added to tariff "Apply Rules" with the contract parameter code that stores the discount value as a percentage.
      • CARDS-50291 [Host card emulation] Actions "Unblock App", "Block VAN", "Unblock VAN" are added to HCE Cards menu item
      • CARDS-49902 [Dispute assistant] DA v2. Form "Dispute Rule - Doc Parms.dataform.xml" restored field "Check Level".
      • CARDS-50286 [Dispute assistant] DA v2: The "Change Trusted Amount" activity must be configured with "Amount Type Group" = "Client Amounts".
      • I1609055348, I1609055989, I1609215995 [Transaction management] [CARDS-50306] Nonauthorised document processing has been fixed for configurations when the Fee Direction value of a card's main service is "None" but the service has custom fees with a Fee Direction value that is not "None".
      • I1609093350 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-50294] Fraud Management: Approving incoming safe documents.
      • I1609126520 [Money transfers] [CARDS-50263] One of transaction participatns Sender or Recipient data can be omited in P2P acquiring request (in any bertlv or tags format). Another participant data will be selected from the database.
      • CARDS-50052 [VISA interface] VISA: Added API to support Token Maintenance File and Primary Account Number Maintenance File Messages.
    • 03.44.19.11
      • CARDS-48754 [ATM management] New state REPAIR can be switched on for not operating devices in "ATM Device Management" form to calculate correct operability metrics in ATM Statistics Analyser tool.
      • CARDS-50126 [Acquiring] New procedures START_DEV_OPER_V11 and END_DEV_OPER_V10 in ATM package have been added to enhance acquiring and issuing fee calculation.
      • CARDS-50214 [Data preparation and card personalization] KM Keys LMK2LMK migration pipe now supports the ADK and ADK2 keys used in One-Time-Password MMA Authentication method
      • CARDS-49628 [Acquiring] MIR_PARTNER_ID can be set up in merchant or device contracts. A new form has been created: OpenWay/Authentication Module/Authentication for merchant.
      • CARDS-50029 [Instalment management] Installments behavior changed. Installments with extra fee are added into the principal amount . An Additional fee capitalization invoice will be created to reflect the fee amount calculated and create the proper funds transfers.
      • CARDS-50090 [NSPK interface] NSPK -> NSPK. Reports -> Contract Types Validation menu added
      • CARDS-50172 [Issuing authorisation] PM_parm option WEAK_PIN_CHECK added
      • CARDS-50240 [Loyalty] A new menu item, OpenWay\Loyalty Module\Configuration\Loyalty Identification Types to configure loyalty identification types has been added.

      • CARDS-50279 [Host card emulation] Added "BlockApp" action to "HCE Cards" form.
      • CARDS-49614 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard MCBS Import: Now the TARGET_CNTR_NUM pipe parameter is optional.
      • CARDS-50268 [Transaction management] Document processing in FROM_AUTH=SERVICE mode has been fixed (account selection for main and custom fee is fixed)
      • CARDS-50276 [Data preparation and card personalization] For MasterCard and JCB parameters issuer key serial number generation at key pair generation step fixed.
      • I1606205888 [Product management] [CARDS-50255] Additional condition by action_code = 'ORDER' for the link "Order Docs" at the forms All Usage Actions.srd, Storno.Events.srd, Usage Action.srd is added.
      • I1608299563 [SEPA interface] [CARDS-50275] SEPA Customer to Bank Import: Now the posting status is "Waiting" for all reject documents.
    • 03.44.19.10
      • CARDS-40111 [Core] The BASE_DATE tag can be used in balance types with the SERV_TURNOVER usage limiter and History Mode = Yearly.
      • CARDS-50085 [Customer/account management] "Past Due Days" field has been added to Customer Support screen.
      • CARDS-50101 [Distributed processing] Added ability to check that all contract groups are processed on the primary node in a Distributed Processing configuration.
      • CARDS-50122 [Core] Order by clause is added into the select for quering the contracts for the reserving functionality.
      • CARDS-50178 [Customer/account management] A new feature to change a card's Product during card replacement has been added. The functionality is supported for Products with a special tag REPLACE_TO=<Product Code> in the "custom data" field.
      • CARDS-50190 [Core] A new trace message "<CALC> fee is skipped" was added for <CALC> custom fees replacing the "Not allowed custom fee" message
      • CARDS-50196 [Product inspector] A new step, "Set Contract Status", has been added to Product Inspector.
      • CARDS-50203 [Data preparation and card personalization] "CA Issuer Identifier" Key Option is supported. Key Option can be used to specify Issuer Identifier and has a higher priority than the MIR_ISSUER_IDENTIFIER pipe parameter for NSPK cards and than Bank Production Details for MasterCard cards.
      • I1609060504 [VISA interface] [CARDS-50199] Removed Andorra and Faroe Islands from VISA: European Economic Area Sub-region.
      • CARDS-49766 [NSPK interface] Fixed DE0165.01 filling. NSPK Collection Only Export.
      • CARDS-49994 [Product inspector] Fixed error that occurred when opening the PI scripts form if the dbm.ini file included several identical keys in different sections.
      • CARDS-50217 [Product inspector] Warnings are now skipped when setting a classifier value in PI script.
      • CARDS-50222 [Product inspector] Fixed error when Product Inspector script continued execution when included script failed.
      • I1512226203 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-50206] MasterCard MPE Daily Import: Added daily IP0016T1 update processing.
      • I1603050966 [Accounting] [CARDS-48377] Fixed problem with GL Entry being generated but not included in the GL Entries export file. This problem is rare and caused by incorrect GL configuration (empty HD GL Number in Interbranch account templates). Now the posting process will stop with a fatal error instead of generating incorrect GL Entries with empty debit GL account or credit GL account fields. For more details, see the "Upgrade notes on Impact changes" section.
      • I1606276157 [Product management] [CARDS-50225] Doubling entries in EVNT_MSG_MEMO table for client and contractor messages fixed.
      • I1607143764 [Core banking interface] [CARDS-50193] IC.Documents Import: added additional check for DocRefSet elements.
      • I1609018777 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-50179] IRD configuration has been modified for several IRDs.
      • CARDS-49060 [Host2Host interface] H2H Affiliated BASE II: supported new tags required for NSPK.
      • CARDS-50174 [Accounting] Direct FX conversion rates are used first when converting by Channel Rates.
    • 03.44.10.02
      • CARDS-50117 [Product management] New options to define the frequency for regular operation (fee charging or standing orders generation) are added: semi-annual and fortnightly.
      • CARDS-50427 [Product inspector] Base relation contract field can be redefined when creating a contract in Product Inspector by using BASE_RELATION tag in the test step.
      • CARDS-50491 [Acquiring] Sorting by the ENTRY_DESCRIPTION and ENTRY_DETAILS fields for the "Entry" block in "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details", "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details", "Merchant Standing Orders Details" reports has been added.
      • CARDS-50498 [Core] Fixed calculation of the "MIR_REG_NUMBER" field for the "Statistics Acquiring Business", "Statistics Acquiring Devices", and "Statistics Issuing Business Prepared" NSPK reports.
      • CARDS-50507 [Core] The ability to set a classifier when there is more than one classifier with the same code but in different domains has been fixed.
      • CARDS-50508 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Standard Data Export: fixed State/Province field filling in Accounts File.
      • CARDS-50513 [Instalment management] Fixed instalment plan creation when Monthly Interest = Next Working Day in the Instalment Scheme.
      • CARDS-50533 [Host card emulation] Fixed problem with HCE token enrollment event generation.
      • CARDS-50544 [Application management] Advanced Application R2: the problem when XML applications with missing mandatory elements in sub-applications were successfully accepted has been fixed. The problem could be observed when using OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Application Processing\Issuing XML Application Import or OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Application Processing\Acquiring XML Application Import pipes or in WAY4Gate.
      • CARDS-50545 [Transaction management] VISA, Affiliated Base II pipes: Removed the difference between Acquirer and Issuer Fee Collections. Standard forms for Fee Collection document creation have been modified. The new forms should be used. Interchange routing settings are required for incoming Fee Collection processing targeted to an affiliated bank. See the "Upgrade Notes on Impact Changes" section for more details.
      • CARDS-50551 [Risk management] Negative Response Code (RC) usage call for not authorized presentment has been updated. it is no longer checked for processing of financial advice for which there was no authorization.
      • CARDS-50569 [Dispute assistant] Accept Documents: Fixed Fee Collection performance impact by removing searching by PS Reference Number.
      • CARDS-50573 [Issuing authorisation] Multiple authorisations matching (with PS_REF_NUMBER) has been fixed.
      • CARDS-50580 [Issuing authorisation] When an attempt to create or change token information is made in Stand-In mode, the error "Tokenization is not available in stand-in mode" occurs.
      • CARDS-50582 [AMEX interface] AMEX GNS Inward: Fallback transaction processing is supported.
      • CARDS-50590 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward Processing: fixed "Inward Invalid number format for PDS-0301" error for large numbers. Also, the "TRAILER_CHECKS" parameter for the NSPK Inward Processing pipe has been added to skip checking values from trailers.
      • CARDS-50592 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: fixed "getLangById no data found" error.
      • CARDS-50609 [Issuing] Fixed incorrect inheritance of PIN_SET tag's value when card reissuing with ERASE_SEC_VAL mode.
      • CARDS-50626 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing: added a check for DE12 (must not be greater then PDS-0105.2 (file date)). Added the "FILE_REF_DATE" pipe parameter for file date (PDS-0105.2) filling, parameter values are "SYSTEM" (default value, system time is used) and "BANK" (bank date is used).
      • CARDS-50627 [Core] Object Task Scheduler task for client addresses links renewing after client or contract approval now is switched off by default and can be switched on by the global parameter RENEW_ADDRESS_LINK.
      • CARDS-50648 [DB kernel] DML tagging for acnt_contract.last_scan does not work if "Upgrade Stoplist" synch flow is present.
      • I1510277050 [VISA interface] [CARDS-50586] RA configuration has been fixed for CEMEA region.
      • I1511033062 [Transaction management] [CARDS-49655] Routing procedure for Fee Collection and other Interbank transactions (Funds Disbursement and Settlement) received by a processing centre or bank has been fixed and unified. Manual actions are required.
      • I1607274086 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-50358] In report "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details", the parameter "P_SHOW_EMPTY_CONTRACTS" affects the XML results - it applies a filter on the empty contracts.
      • I1608182549 [Product management] [CARDS-50069] Processing of product copy (Product template support and Copy branch) has been fixed. 1- Products which are not present in the template are not removed (Previous behaviour: removed with errors), 2- Product template integrity on product approval is now checked, 3- Warnings for product template references for whole tree are provided (Previous behavior - for top level only) 4- Product unlink procedure has been fixed
      • I1609159302 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-50584] DA v2: Now there is an oppotunity to configure on the activity level (for Retrieval Requests, Chargebacks, Representments, Final Chargebacks) a set of tags which should be added into doc.add_info field. For example, to provide Itemized Document Code for AMEX Representment a tag "ADD_TAG_X=REQ_IDC;" in Parm List field can be added on the activity "Create Representment (Acq)".
      • I1609231920, I1609306875 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-50473] MasterCard IPM Outward: Error when uploading "No Card" Fee Collections has been fixed.
      • I1610052208 [VISA interface] [CARDS-50593] VISA BII Inward: fixed grants and exception processing for MBR package.
      • I1610075561 [Automated routines] [CARDS-50595] Fixed grants for 'OWS.Apply Buffered Balance' menu item
      • I1610102506, I1609305560 [VISA interface] [CARDS-50571] VISA Outward: fixed filling "Mail/Phone/Electronic Commerce and Payment Indicator" for transactions with special MCCs.
      • I1610112429 [Transaction management] [CARDS-50641] Now trans condition, card expire, and ps_ref_number are only inherited for FromOnUs documents.
      • I1610117081 [Core] [CARDS-50654] The ability to move a contract from a child to a parent institution has been added.
      • I1610123173 [Web banking] [CARDS-50603] Problem with recurring payments appearing in web banking multiple times has been resolved.
      • I1610123189 [VISA interface] [CARDS-50628] VISA SMS Inward Processing: fixed performance problems of "VISA SMS Inward Processing" pipe processing.
      • CARDS-50323 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Standard Data Export: Starting from Release 15.1, supported creating empty files and registering them in the control file.

      • CARDS-50190 [Core] A new trace message "<CALC> fee is skipped" was added for <CALC> custom fees replacing the "Not allowed custom fee" message
      • CARDS-50192 [Customer/account management] A new feature to change a card's Product during card replacement has been added. The functionality is supported for Products with a special tag REPLACE_TO=<Product Code> in the "custom data" field.
