      • CARDS-50119 [Fleet cards] Small fixes in Fleet CUST procedures standard templates comments.
      • CARDS-50128 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward: EMV Chip data error checks are skipped.
      • CARDS-50296 [Accounting] Fixed filling of account.on_date and on_date_balance fields for subcontracts during the MainSubRecovery process which runs on each contract billing if the global parameter MAIN_SUB_RECOVERY=Y (default behaviour).
      • CARDS-50304 [JCB interface] JCB BIN Table Import: fixed record processing for Maintenance file with OperationSign=01 (Add record).
      • CARDS-50315 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward Processing: Fixed doc.rec_member_id filling for Fee Collection.
      • CARDS-50326 [Application management] Fixed the context of the "CAppInfo" input parameter for CUST_ADV_CHECK_APPL_INFO.
      • CARDS-50364 [Core] The menu item "Synchronize DWD_CARD_BRAND with IPS_PRODUCT" has been deleted from the file "opt\stat_reporting\client\dbm\menu\Card_Products_mapping_for_stat_reporting.UPG". The menu item "Synchronize DWD_CARD_BRAND with IPS_PRODUCT" has been added to these menu folders: OpenWay\VISA Statistics Reports OpenWay\MC Statistics Reports OpenWay\AMEX Statistics Reports OpenWay\RF Reporting OpenWay\NSPK Reporting. Fixed error in rep.SYNC_DWHCRDBRND_AND_IPSPROD() with deletion of sy_conf_group_val records not present in the ips_product table.
      • CARDS-50387 [Core] Error message override during contract subtype validation was fixed (menu-item "OWS.IPS Products check")
      • CARDS-50392 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Stop List import: Supported records without trailing spaces processing.
      • CARDS-50400 [JCB interface] Merchant Management: No data found error for next action after incomplete previous initial action.
      • CARDS-50424 [Core] Calculation of FEE_BASE=CR_TRANS; has been fixed for different fee directions (debit/credit).
      • CARDS-50430 [SEPA interface] Subitem Security Grants "SEPA Mandate" added to the menu items in SEPA\Issuing Mandate Input & Update menu. It allows access to clerks working with client and contract SEPA mandates
      • CARDS-50435 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward : fixed error during DE37 check (when is present) for collection only documents.
      • I1502060020 [VISA interface] [CARDS-50393] VISA: Added the menu item OpenWay\VISA\VISA. RA Configuration\VISA RA Criteria.
      • I1606160105 [UnionPay interface] [CARDS-49908] Fixed error in usage limiter validation procedure which lead to reject of authorisation message processing when the message does not contains transaction amount in cardholder billing currency.
      • I1608316382 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-50493] Fixed error "Doc was not uploaded (ONUS) Mandatory field 31 is absent". Fixed Internet transaction detection for collection only export. Changed ARN date (DE31.3) filling - now selected from file date and not from transaction date. Added processing of "MIR_NSPK_AID" tag in addition to "NSPK_AID" tag when searching the Member Id for affiliated collection only export.
      • I1609146279 [Money transfers] [CARDS-50459] The field 'State" will not be filled in the BERTLV container prepared for the VISA channel if the State attribute is not applicable for the corresponding country.
      • I1609202368 [VISA interface] [CARDS-50317] VISA Affiliated Outward: Fixed "VISA_TA is not found" error for H2H channels with the "Is On Us'" = "N" property. The global parameter AFF_CH_LIST must be filled with the codes of these channels.
      • I1609216346 [Product management] [CARDS-50447] Fixed incorrect processing of parent usage limiter activity depending on document tags.
      • I1609232372 [Transaction management] [CARDS-50421] Transaction processing: Removed "Transaction attributes or transaction condition are reset" warning messages. Message is now displayed during transaction processing as information
      • I1609245184 [Transaction management] [CARDS-50404] Acquiring usages processing on doc acceptance with external device controller has been fixed. (in previous version device auth usages were not applied).
      • CARDS-45952 [JCB interface] JCB Inward: added settlement processing.
      • CARDS-50289 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: changed DE43 filling for ATM transactions.
      • CARDS-50290 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: for offline transactions DE38 is not unloaded.
      • CARDS-50327 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Oct16-177 V3 TC33 Enhanced Acquirer File - made small format changes between 2nd and 3d versions of VISA Oct16 Releases.
      • CARDS-50330 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing: Added additional check for DE031.3 (ARN Date) DE031.3 in (ClearingDate-8;ClearingDate] and DE031.3 >= DE012.1
      • CARDS-50331 [NSPK interface] If DE38(Auth Code) exists and DE37(RRN) is absent in a First Presentment, the document is not unloaded.
      • CARDS-50385 [UnionPay interface] UPI Outward: Supported filling the "Transmission Date and Time" and "System Trace Audit Number" fields from a document, not from an online message if the document fields are correctly filled on posting.
      • CARDS-50457 [Issuing authorisation] Correct notice of refusal has been supported when maximum possible (i.e.five) TAR MDES requests with wrong CVC2 occur.
      • I1606211754 [JCB interface] [CARDS-50027] JCB: Added menu item OpenWay\JCB\JCB. Daily Procedures\JCB. Load Bin Table and Handbooks\JCB BIN Table Import.
    • 03.44.09.17

      • CARDS-49614 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard MCBS Import: Now the TARGET_CNTR_NUM pipe parameter is optional.
      • CARDS-49902 [Dispute assistant] DA v2. Form "Dispute Rule - Doc Parms.dataform.xml" restored field "Check Level".

      • CARDS-49766 [NSPK interface] Fixed DE0165.01 filling. NSPK Collection Only Export.
      • CARDS-49892 [Product management] Additional validations of the tariff domain code used for attaching a tariff domain have been added for configurations when the corresponding contract parameter has location in Classifier or Mirror To = Classifier.
      • CARDS-49994 [Product inspector] Fixed error that occurred when opening the PI scripts form if the dbm.ini file included several identical keys in different sections.
      • CARDS-50217 [Product inspector] Warnings are now skipped when setting a classifier value in PI script.
      • CARDS-50222 [Product inspector] Fixed error when Product Inspector script continued execution when included script failed.
      • CARDS-50233 [Core] Incorrect interests waiving has been fixed in case of two Full Payment dates from two previous periods fall withing the one Billing period.
      • I1512226203 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-50206] MasterCard MPE Daily Import: Added daily IP0016T1 update processing.
      • I1607143764 [Core banking interface] [CARDS-50193] IC.Documents Import: added additional check for DocRefSet elements.
      • I1609018777 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-50179] IRD configuration has been modified for several IRDs.
      • CARDS-49060 [Host2Host interface] H2H Affiliated BASE II: supported new tags required for NSPK.
      • CARDS-49838 [MasterCard interface] Country Area: Added MasterCard SEPA sub-region with code 05-5 and MasterCard Non-SEPA sub-region with code 05-6.
      • CARDS-50174 [Accounting] Direct FX conversion rates are used first when converting by Channel Rates.
    • 03.44.09.14
      • CARDS-50102 [Dispute assistant] DA v2. Supported Final Write-Off for Fee Collections.
      • CARDS-49717 [VISA interface] VISA Inward Pipes: Now the pipe uses a DB procedure to insert documents.
      • CARDS-50030 [Case management] Case Management users which are not connected with any client record can be exported as system configuration from one scheme to another.
      • CARDS-50095 [Instalment management] An Instalment Option can be configured and chosen when creating an instalment plan. Depending on the selected option, a tariff value can be used for the plan.
      • CARDS-50144 [Tariff management] The ability to set Usage Role tariffs from the current date has been implemented.
      • CARDS-50148 [Product management] New contract date type PD_DATE can be configured in Date Types to check contract delinquency period.
      • CARDS-50163 [Money transfers] Support of replacement AFT with Quasi-cash has been removed as no more required by Visa. P2P_VISA2OTHER global parameter has no more actual.
      • CARDS-50177 [Accounting] For Fee Prediction tariffs to use FX conversion by channel rates from Fee Base, Fee Min, Fee Max to the account currency, a special CR-FX Type (FX Type=CR_<Buy>;<Sell>;<Middle>) should be used, and the tag CONV_CHANNEL should be defined in Service Details. The special CR-FX Type should be Internal (the field "Is Internal=Yes" in OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\FX Types), even if there are no banking FX Schemes for it.
      • CARDS-49704 [MasterCard interface] There are two ways for implementing additional identification when TAR occurs. The first is to set the global parameter AUTH_REQ_ADD_AUTH_METHOD='1'. When the parameter is set and the special tag FORCE_AUTH in the Service is set to "Y", error code 85 is returned. When Primary Account Number Source method of PAN capture is manually entered by the cardholder or if it is a "card on file" from the wallet provider, error code 85 is returned.
      • CARDS-49991 [Core] The "Appl. Balance - Full", "Balance - Full", "CSS.Balance - Full - Merchant" forms are now based on the CONTRACT_EXT view to show the actual LAST_SCAN date.
      • CARDS-50107 [Core] Balance-based event posting has been fixed when the macrotransaction that closes the balance is supplementary (cross-balance case).
      • CARDS-50134 [Money transfers] Fixed tags generation flow for P2P transfers from OffUs to OnUs cards.
      • CARDS-50151 [Core] PL/SQL: numeric or value error that occurred when a character string was too small for the FI "special parms" field has been fixed.
      • CARDS-50162 [Product inspector] Fixed Product Inspector document creation for contracts with several plastics.
      • CARDS-50167 [Case management] Case Management group activities keep the officer who performed the activity for failed case activities.
      • I1609075192 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-50165] Fixed Accept Fee Collection Documents issue: now an unnecessary search is not made for related documents if there is no ARN and PS Ref Number in the document as this search significantly affected performance.
    • 03.44.09.13
      • CARDS-49452 [Case management] Product Inspector test step "Case Management: Set User" is extended: now it allows to create Case Management User if it doesn't exists in the current domain.
      • CARDS-50035 [Acquiring] Additional links have been added to acquiring forms to browse contract hierarchy.
      • CARDS-50127 [Product management] When re-ageing is performed and previous due account is not found in the contract, it will be created automatically according to the account template rules.
      • CARDS-50141 [Application management] Supported an option to return a newly created PAN for a Card Update application in the XML Applications Response, XML Applications Overall Response and online UFX interfaces. Added a new global parameter APPL_NEW_CARD_IN_RESPONSE. When the parameter value is "Y", Application/DataRs/ContractRs for a Card Update application contains information about the newly created contract including the new PAN. The default value is "N" -- the old behaviour with the old PAN in the response.
      • I1409309010 [Core] [CARDS-50033] The ability to recalculate the balances for all contracts of a specific Account Scheme has been added.
      • CARDS-50010 [VISA interface] VISA Outward: fixed unloading CashBack amounts.
      • CARDS-50128 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward: EMV Chip data error checks are skipped.
      • CARDS-50129 [Data preparation and card personalization] Fixed Bug with CA RSA Key Mac translation from old to new LMK.

    • 03.44.09.12
      • CARDS-50067 [Product management] New approach to the "Multi-currency cards" Product has been developed. Special instructions are provided by OpenWay consultants under separate agreements. Please contact OpenWay for more details.
      • CARDS-47977 [Data preparation and card personalization] All HSM interaction logs are written in smifce sub-directory now. The whole path to smifce sub-directory is logged in Process Log.
      • CARDS-49646 [Data preparation and card personalization] The RSA EMV Key Management pipe no longer shows the Folder Selection dialog. Instead, the pipe shows a File Selection dialog with a list of all suitable files (if the SOURCE_DIR parameter is set) or selects the first suitable file from DEFAULT_PATH (if DEFAULT_PATH is set and SOURCE_DIR is not set).
      • CARDS-49886 [Product management] Client and Contract Parameters UFX application loading and setting the contract parameter from Product Inspector requires the registration of the contract parameters in the OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Common Handbooks\Contract Parameters menu item.
      • CARDS-50063 [Instalment management] Unpacking of E2.E1 BERTLV tag into INST_IRATE document tag added.
      • CARDS-50064 [Product management] The ability to calculate the number of days past due has been added. Account schemes should be configured accordingly.
      • CARDS-50074 [Money transfers] RPNA_NO_DATA P2P configuration parameter default value has been changed to Error.
      • CARDS-50096 [Instalment management]
      • CARDS-49430 [Transaction management] Now we mark a transaction with NE% transaction condition without STAN as authorised.
      • CARDS-49759 [Instalment management] Fee Capitalized into principal changes the Unpaid Principal amount limit upon the capitalization when corresponding invoice event changes it's status from "Written-off".
      • CARDS-49971 [Product management] Tariff Domain contract parameter validation has been fixed for "Billing Level Only" and "Top Level Only" parameters. Additional validation of the "Location of Current Value" field value has been added: the value for such contract parameters can be "Contract" or "Classifier" only.
      • CARDS-50062 [Product management] INTEREST_WARNING event generation has been fixed. This event is executed automatically when a financial reversal document is processed if limit normalisation was performed between the registration of the original document's posting and its reversal. This event is only generated with the PATCH_REVERSE_INTEREST=Y global parameter.
      • CARDS-50077 [Application management] A new Product tag, STOCK; has been introduced. This tag should be set in the Custom Data field of Products used to register large numbers of stock "Instant Issuing" cards within the same hierarchy. This tag disables refresh of data in a contract hierarchy during contract approval, so the tag may not be set in issuing or acquiring products used for ordinary customer contracts. Use of this tag makes it possible to avoid performance problems seen in Applications inward interfaces (batch or SOA) when an Instant Issuing card is sold to a customer as the contract approval process is always called during application processing.
      • CARDS-50089 [Core] View CONTRACT_DATA field USAGE_LIMIT_STR: if length of limiters data more than 4000 letters then the string will replaced to asterisks
      • CARDS-50109 [Product inspector] Fixed information logging related to classifier's values in Product Inspector in case when a unique classifier code was defined in CLASSIFIER_LIST=<Classifiers_Code_List>; tag.
      • I1606280305 [Risk management] [CARDS-50040] Form "Usage Recalculation Result" show only records for recalculation processes now.
      • I1608029106 [Product management] [CARDS-50076] Fix standing order processing in case when order's currency exponent differs from the account currency exponent.
      • I1608182549 [Product management] [CARDS-50069] Processing of product copy (Product template support and Copy branch) has been fixed. 1- Products which are not present in the template are not removed (Previous behaviour: removed with errors), 2- Product template integrity on product approval is now checked, 3- Warnings for product template references for whole tree are provided (Previous behavior - for top level only) 4- Product unlink procedure has been fixed
      • I1608300685 [Application management] [CARDS-50093] Advanced Application R1 supports special *#N symbols in the <PlasticInfoTitle> tag to clear this field in a client or contract record.
      • I1608314913 [Product management] [CARDS-50066] balance_type.amnd_date and balance_type.amnd_officer DB table columns now are updated for historical records during Balance Type validation process.
      • CARDS-50080 [VISA interface] Reimbursement Attributes Configuration: Modified CEMEA region.

      • CARDS-49989 [Distributed processing] CDU with LAST_SCAN_MODE=S skipped new contracts.
      • CARDS-50005 [Product management] Restored the ablity to set a standard classifier when a contract parameter with the same code and "Mirror To=Classifier" option is set.

      • CARDS-50049 [Core] Mirroring of contract parameter value to classifier is fixed in case when contract parameter was set or removed by event with ACNT_TAG configuration on Event Type.
      • CARDS-50053 [Core] Fixed setting and removing of contract parameter by event with ACNT_TAG configuration on Event Type.
      • I1608108465 [Product inspector] [CARDS-49855] Exporting product inspectors scripts is fixed. It now uploads all subscripts linked to the main script.
      • I1608151726 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-49964] The sequence to redefine the SIC value for calculating IRD has changed. When accepting a transaction, a device contract's SIC can be redefined in the following sequence: with the SIC=<sic code> tag setting in the transaction subtype, or if not found in the subtype, with FORCE_SIC_TO=<sic code> in the corresponding service.
      • I1608181057 [Product management] [CARDS-50001] Added additional conditions for selecting inherited orders to synchronise "Reason details" with the template order during the MIGRATE_INHERITED procedure on upgrade.
      • I1608234331 [Accounting] [CARDS-50038] Fixed automatical GL renumeration triggering in case the contract's product is changed to the new one with different Tariff Domain containing Tariff Role = GL Numeration tariffs with new values.
      • I1608246647 [Product management] [CARDS-50065] Fixed Fee Account search for child Service pack (case when Financial Institution numeration scheme was changed).
      • CARDS-49716 [JCB interface] JCB: Added functionality for loading JCB BIN Table.
      • CARDS-49905 [NSPK interface] Added a new column, "Territory Code", for the NSPK "Acquiring Business" statistics report. This column contains the code of the territory where a device is located. The first two numbers of the OKATO code are used as the code.
    • 03.44.09.10
      • CARDS-49197 [Data preparation and card personalization] D-PAS (Diners Club) supported in data preparation module.
      • CARDS-49702 [Instalment management] Differentiated payment schemes are supported for Instalments.
      • CARDS-49969 [Risk management] Added possibility to change status for all selected documents at once in forms for risk monitoring by documents: - OpenWay\Risk Management Acquiring\Monitoring\by Documents - OpenWay\Risk Management Issuing\Monitoring\by Documents - OpenWay\Risk Management\Monitoring\by Documents The "Status" button can be used in two modes now: - 'Change Current' to change status for current document, - 'Change All' to change status for all selected documents.
      • CARDS-49972 [Product management] Multicurrency normalization has been enhanced. Use MCN_MODE for account templates and normalization standing orders. For more information, see the appropriate documentation.
      • CARDS-49888 [Product management] Now if a contract parameter has the "Tariff Domain" role, only "Top Level Only", "Billing Level Only", and "Current Level Only" hierarchy levels can be used.

      • CARDS-49936 [Product management] The ability to redefine an entry due date from a custom document tag has been implemented. The tag DUE_DATE_TAG=<tag name> should be defined in the Service's "Service Details" field and the corresponding tag with value format 'YYMMDD' should pass in the document's "Add Info".

      • CARDS-49970 [Fleet cards] Fleet goods pipe filename prefix is no longer case-sensitive.
      • CARDS-49973 [Fleet cards] code refactoring only
      • I1601131604 [Automated routines] [CARDS-49775] Now the menu item "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\FX Rates Import\RBS FX Rates Copy To Internal" shows an error at the end of the process if some rates were not found and errors are saved to the process log.
      • CARDS-49805 [Case management] Problem with "Last Work" date for a case when a group activity wasn't successful for some cases has been resolved.
      • CARDS-49926 [Issuing authorisation] Eliminated clear PANs in process_mess in debug mode.
      • CARDS-49951 [Application management] Link "Classifier" on application form links to the form with filtered list of classifiers depending on the selected Object type=Contract Classifier/Client Classifier.
      • CARDS-49954 [Accounting] Re-ageing is stopped as soon as the most delinquent bucket's balance exceeds the variance amount.

      • CARDS-49311 [Instalment management] Early Repayment for instalment plans with Shift Fee Charge Mode=Capitalize Fees Every Month / Capitalize Fees on First Portion is supported.
      • CARDS-49328 [Application management] The "Insert more" button has been added to the Adv.Appl Instl Limit form.
      • CARDS-49668 [Acquiring authorisation] A new API for searching contracts has been developed to standardize contract retrieval in the P2P package.
      • CARDS-49829 [Product inspector] A new step type, "Set Contract Parameter", has been added to Product Inspector.
      • CARDS-49843 [Reversal management] Classifier history is no longer deleted during the correction process. Corrected classifier values are marked with a special status is_active=Z for correct synchronisation with Datamart.
      • CARDS-49845 [Core] A luhn digit is no longer generated for accounts and devices for the "random" numeration type. To restore the old behaviour, use the global parameter GENERATE_LUHN=Y.
      • CARDS-49857 [Product inspector] The "Application" link has been added for the "Create & Process - No WF" action in Product Inspector.
      • CARDS-49880 [e-Commerce acquiring] Added API to create TD_DOC in case of unsuccessful authentication.
      • I1511028927 [VISA interface] [CARDS-49842] Menu item "OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\Interchange\VISA SMS ATM Transactions" now gives acquirers the opportunity to create back-office Adjustments when a processing error has been identified during or after reconciliation of any SMS transactions.
      • CARDS-49563 [Core] In the "Acnt Balance History" form the "Entry N" and "Reversal Entry N" fields have been renamed to "Trx count" and "Reversal Trx count", respectively.
      • CARDS-49846 [Product inspector] Fixed attaching document addendums in the test script, now addendums will be attached with specified format.
      • I1606108037 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-49851] DA v2: Added "No Such Card" detection for not fully posted documents when contracts are found but no macro-transaction under the document.
      • I1607194746; I1608110367 [Reversal management] [CARDS-49881] Fixed restoring classifier values during the correction process.
      • I1607272853 [Core] [CARDS-49858] Full Payment and Late Payment date calculation has been fixed for different calendar types specified in an Account Scheme. For credit products without date schemes.
      • CARDS-49800 [Transaction management] Added basic E-Commerce Transaction Conditions TEV2,TEV,TEU2,TEU,TET,TES as analog of Transaction Conditions NEV2,NEV,NEU2,NEU,PET,PES for tokenized transactions.
      • CARDS-49825 [VISA interface] To implement the latest requirements for Visa Operating Certificates (QMR) Reports issued 9 June 2016: Issuing Report: In the Card Issuance portion of the operating certificates, Visa has removed metrics previously attributed to the "Number of Active Cards" and added a section called "Number of Issued Chip Cards." Acquiring Report: In the Merchant Data portion, Visa has removed / clarified metrics under "Number of Merchant Outlets" and added sections called "Number of Terminals Installed at Merchants" and "Number of mPOS Terminals Installed at Merchants."
      • CARDS-49831 [VISA interface] Added the menu item OpenWay\VISA\VISA. Daily Procedures\VISA. Inward Procedures\VISA Acquirer Capture Import
    • 03.43.99.18
      • CARDS-48127 [UnionPay interface] Added cardholder data for UPI MoneyExpress Service in reply messages. Add the global parameter UPI_MONEY_EXPRESS to activate this functionality. See documentation for details.
      • CARDS-49257 [Core] The tariff domain contract parameter is checked after the Product has been changed.
      • CARDS-49357 [Tariff management] Priority for attaching tariff sub-domains has been implemented for parent domains with the tag ATTACH_SUBS. The PRIOR tag should be used in sub-domain Apply Rules.
      • CARDS-43952 [JCB interface] Stop List: Moved area handbook from Standard to Custom. Removed checking an area by the handbook list.
      • CARDS-44427 [MasterCard interface] Changed length of fields in IRD_FEE_DESC, FEE_PROGRAM tables from 4000 to 3900.
      • CARDS-47199 [VISA interface] VISA Inward: removed BUSN_ADDENDUM tag processing.
      • CARDS-49184 [MasterCard interface] "BIN Table - All.srd" form: Added "Licensed Product Idt" field.
      • CARDS-49566 [Datamart] The OpenWay\WAY4 Data Warehouse Interface menu has been renamed to OpenWay\WAY4 Datamart Interface. See the "Upgrade Notes on Impact changes" section for more details.
      • CARDS-49757 [Data preparation and card personalization] Performance problem that appeared after PBID support has been fixed.
      • CARDS-48289 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Debit Switch is supported in the XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf report. The P_CHANNEL parameter added. The default value is 'D', 'E', 'e'. Changes have been made to the standard version of cust_stat_attr_value. Please see Upgrade Notes on Impact changes for details.
      • CARDS-48435 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Inward: Stopped logging non-fatal file format errors to Process Log.
      • CARDS-48547 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Inward Processing: Processing File Reject messages.
      • CARDS-48950 [MasterCard interface] Affiliated BII Outward: fixed error message when processing unmatched secondary documents.
      • CARDS-48999 [Reversal management] Supplementary account transfers are recalculated on correction processing.
      • CARDS-49088 [Core] XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf: P_CHANNEL parameter added. The default value is "W".
      • CARDS-49102 [MasterCard interface] SenderFirstName and SenderLastName fields of ISO messages are populated correctly when Card Track1 CardholderName data are used.
      • CARDS-49142 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing: fixed processing of DE41.
      • CARDS-49148 [Core] When an Additional Credit Limit is set, the value of the AUTH_LIM_DF tag in acnt_log.msg_details now changes.
      • CARDS-49151 [Case management] Repeated editing of documents created during a dispute cycle is now possible in Case Management dispute screens.
      • CARDS-49162 [Money transfers] State is optional if it is not used for corresponding country
      • CARDS-49187 [VISA interface] Visa BII Outward: added additional check for field Member Message Text TCR1pos 24.

      • CARDS-49204 [Money transfers] Fixed SenderName calculation algorithm
      • CARDS-49212 [Case management] Problem with case status when a group activity wasn't successful for some cases has been resolved.
      • CARDS-49221 [Application management] Deferred response file for unsuccessful application in Advanced Applications R2 always contains the original error message.
      • CARDS-49267 [Fleet cards] Fixed padding in bertlv number format
      • CARDS-49455 [JCB interface] Merchant Management: Fixed processing of operations that were not completed.
      • CARDS-49530 [Core] New indexes START_LOCAL_DATE and END_LOCAL_DATE have been added to the CS_DECISION_LOG and CS_DECISION_LOG tables.
      • CARDS-49710 [Core] Event chain posting has been enhanced: events in a chain are posted in fixed order by usage_action.id. This sorting applies to immediate posting as well as delayed posting (when Post Immediate = Post Later). The OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Event Types -> [Event Chain] form has been updated - the "Step N" field has been temporarily removed.
      • CARDS-49733 [Dispute assistant] DA v2: Retail Reversal processing if a case is being created for an incoming chargeback.
      • CARDS-49776 [Acquiring] Merchant Service Screen added to "CSS. CS Screen" security group.
      • CARDS-49780 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect processing of "non-zero" approval response codes on IRouter for transit authorisation request responses.
      • CARDS-49785 [Instalment management] Fixed instalment advance fee calculation in secondary actions when there are several fees for the instalment plan.
      • CARDS-49787 [Core] Now we notify both source and target issuing contract by standard posting events (MTR_DEBIT, FIN_REVERSE ...)
      • CARDS-49791 [Acquiring authorisation] The ACQ_ONLINE tag affects the entire document chain.
      • CARDS-49808 [DB kernel] export.bat with "filt" option was exporting inactive keys (PM_KEYS table) as active

In the menu "OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Dictionaries\Statistic Attributes (custom)" added the new attribute "PS_IS_COMBINED".

      • I1606168942 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-49685] Duplicate chargeback processing has been fixed. Now a duplicate chargeback is posted with response code RC=57, chained with the first presentment and added to the existing dispute case.

      • CARDS-49406 [Case management] A new restriction is supported for Case Management activities for many objects: the number of objects may not be more than 100.

      • CARDS-49597 [Core] Classifier validation has been enhanced: Standard classifier values are refilled on validation. An additional check is made that the Standard classifier has the corresponding Role configuration.
      • CARDS-49626 [DB manager] The menu item "OpenWay\Full\Process Log\Usage Actions - All" has been renamed to "Events Log". Names, buttons and columns containing "Usage Action" in forms have been renamed to "Events Log".

      • CARDS-49247 [Acquiring] Fixed line alignment in "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details" report header.

      • CARDS-49569 [Core] When an Additional Credit Limit is set, the value of the AUTH_LIM_DT, TMP_LIM_DF,TMP_LIM_DT tags in acnt_log.msg_details now also changes.

      • CARDS-49006 [Acquiring] MIR_PARTNER_ID can be set up in merchant or device contracts. A new form has been created: OpenWay/Authentication Module/Authentication for merchant.
      • CARDS-49405 [Core] Reports have been updated. Now each time a report is executed, the name will be logged in process log parameters in the REPORT tag, and the menu item name will be logged in the TITLE tag.
      • CARDS-49531 [Core] "BT_SIMPLE" mode processing has changed: Current Due Min Amount Threshold, configured as specified in the Statement Tariff or Account Scheme Min Repayment value, and Full Statement Balance Threshold, configured as a new Threshold tariff with the predefined code "MTP_FULL_BALANCE", have been introduced.

      • CARDS-49324 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 16.Q4 Global 328, Global 509, Global 513, Global 560, AP 313: Added Reject Error Message with codes 2801, 2802, 2806, 2808. Modified Error Messages with codes 2596, 2597, 2598, 2721, 2722.

      • I1607113056 [Money transfers] [CARDS-49574] Validation of Country, City, SenderName attributes added for Visa Domestic transactions. To activate this verification add P2P_VISA_VALIDATE_DOMESTIC=Y tag in special_parms field of Device Fin institution.
    • 03.43.99.12
      • CARDS-42503 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced TC33 Acquirer Capture File support has been added.
      • CARDS-49447 [Data preparation and card personalization] UPI Quickpass supported in Data Preparation module.
      • CARDS-49255 [Reversal management] The USE_AUTO_STORNO parameter may be redefined for a financial institution, Product, or Service Package. USE_AUTO_STORNO=N should be set to prohibit automatic corrections for a financial institution or Product / Service Package.
      • CARDS-49310 [Instalment management] Way4 now supports the ability to create an instalment plan after the adjustment of the original document is posted on the amount of the advice macrotransaction of the received adjustment. To enable this feature set the INST_CREATE_ON_ADJUSTMENT=Y global parameter or tag in the "Special Parms" field of the financial institution's details.
      • CARDS-49414 [Instalment management] New global parameter INST_PAYIN is introduced, to specify the Payment options supported by Issuer, who provide the MasterCard Instalements, in response to the authorizations, received from MasterCards Instalments capable terminal. This parameter can also be specified as tag in Special Parm field of the FI, in Custom Data of the Product or in Service Details field of Service for Instalment plan simulation.
      • CARDS-49416 [Product inspector] An XSD schema for validation of import and export file structure has been created for the "test_script_export" and "test_script_import" pipes.
      • CARDS-49440 [Acquiring] An optional solution for merchant payment statement preparation has been created. The solution involves asynchronous filling of two interface tables, OPT_ACQ_PAYMENT and OPT_ACQ_PAYMENT_DATA, triggered by the posting of a merchant reimbursement (or merchant direct debit) standing payment order. Statement data can be extracted from these tables into WAY4 Datamart or another external system via dblink. If you are interested in this solution, please contact OpenWay for more details.
      • CARDS-49456 [VISA interface] VISA SMS: Now Adjustment message codes contain the EN_CREDIT_ADJUSTMNT=Y; tag by default to allow credit adjustments.
      • CARDS-49504 [Core] Now "COUNTER_ONLY balances" are not shown in the "Balances for..." form. A new form, "Counters", has been added to show "COUNTER_ONLY balances". The "Entry N" field has been replaced by "Trx count" in the "Totals for..." form.
      • CARDS-49511 [Instalment management] Instalment Tariffs with the Instalment Fee and Instalment Scheme roles now can be configured to check document tags and additional properties. This makes it possible to specify "If Preference Type" for an Instalment Fee tariff, for example.
      • CARDS-48971 [Acquiring] XLS_CB_f250_2.rdf report: Default values have been corrected for the following report parameters: P_CAN_DISPENSE_CASH, P_CAN_RETAIL, P_CAN_ACCEPT_CASH, P_CAN_WORK_WO_CARD, P_IS_POS. The P_HAS_CARDREADER parameter has been deleted. New parameters P_IS_KIOSK and P_CAN_WORK_WITH_CARD have been added. Columns 4-9 and 11 have been corrected.
      • CARDS-49215 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing: fixed filling of DE-031 for ONUS transactions.
      • CARDS-49235 [Core] Doc.Trans_Country, Doc.Merchant_Id, Doc.Sic_Code, Doc.Add_Info.'POSTAL_CODE', Doc.Add_Info.'TRANS_LOCATION' are defined in the document before to start services search.

      • CARDS-49462 [Fleet cards] ITEM_AMOUNT, ITEM_CURR tags are calculated for the documents loaded from clearing files.
      • CARDS-49472 [Instalment management] New fee calculation parameters for Instalment Schemes are now used when performing the "Change Instalment Terms" operation.
      • I1411267508 [UnionPay interface] [CARDS-49470] CUP Inward: Now the pipe doesn't load Settlement Fee as Source Fee Amount in the document. CUP Audit Trailer Import: Now the pipe always loads Settlement Fee documents.
      • I1512106388 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-49388] DA v2: Supported Dispute Case creation for final chargeback matched with history representment. Supported activities for Acquirers to add history representment, history chargeback and history presentment for such cases.

To select transaction flow (green or yellow) Response Codes 85 an 00 following the analysis of DE124SF3 according to Master Card Issuer Implementation are set.

      • CARDS-49412 [Reversal management] The word "Storno" has been changed to "Correction" in Reversal Management module forms.
      • CARDS-49434 [Customer profile] Standard classifier CLIENT_ROLE and corresponding Consumer Role field on forms is removed from data_etalon. Please contact OW Global support in case this classifier was used for defining the Consumers hierarchy.

The logic for recording COUNTER_ONLY balances has also been changed, now they are "positive" for Advices and "negative" for Reversals. A new technical currency - "NUM" has been added for recording "COUNTER_ONLY" Balance Types. Please see "Client Upgrade Notes" for detailed information.

Please see "Client Upgrade Notes" for detailed information.

    DB Kernel

    • 03.44.30.48
      • I1705286645 [High availability] [DBK-2552] Password verify function is supported for "Recreate Links" in HA console.
    • 03.44.30.47
      • DBK-2855 [High availability] Services are not activated on primary after setting Partial Secondary unavailable.
    • 03.44.30.45
      • DBK-2839 [Housekeeping] Added deallocate unused extents of an archived table after failed "Single Sql/Custom Save" Housekeeping step.
      • DBK-2840 [Housekeeping] Support of parallel dml has been added for Custom Sql Step.
    • 03.44.30.41
      • DBK-2785 [Configuration inspector] Corrected merging of MP_ETL_PARM table records using Configuration Inspector.
    • 03.44.30.39
      • DBK-2756 [Distributed processing] The ability has been added to migrate HA services between nodes in force mode.
    • 03.44.30.37
      • DBK-2663 [Housekeeping] Added support of two new modes for the "Save" action: Single Sql which uses insert with append and nologging in the corresponding table and Custom mode which allows building custom Save procedures.
      • DBK-2722 [WAY4 Web] Checking W4Web components privileges has been changes. See manuals.
      • DBK-2729 [High availability] Eliminated large latency in WAY4R when 'unique constraint violated'.
    • 03.44.30.34
      • DBK-2719 Fixed: HA support for SAF in TS.
    • 03.44.30.30
      • DBK-2624 [High availability] "Upgrade the Online1 Node" procedure now requires using Forced switch, as described in section "Emergency Mode" for HA-Switch Solution.
    • 03.44.30.28
      • DBK-2672 [Distributed processing] Fixed high concurrency on synch_proc_instance_log while running High Availability deferred apply with a lot of parallel threads.
      • DBK-2676 [Distributed processing] Error when High Availability service was not always switched to active nodes after in-flight time has been fixed.
    • 03.44.30.25
      • DBK-2650 [Configuration inspector] Import of merged data has been optimized. A record is updated in a single expression, not by one field at a time. For unchanged parent records, "Is Ready" status update is done once when loading subordinate records.
    • 03.44.30.24
      • DBK-2604 [High availability] Fixed issue when a High-Availability service returned to an active state at the secondary node after the node became unavailable.
      • DBK-2605 [Distributed processing] Fixed issue when operations with services other than default failed before the in-flight time.
      • DBK-2629 [DB manager] Fixed error "No such field error: truncReportDir" in WAY4 Remote Access when launching Oracle report.
    • 03.44.30.20
      • DBK-2592 [High availability] Fixed incorrect HA services switching when WAY4R has a big latency.
    • 03.44.30.19
      • DBK-2584 [Health Monitoring] "Node availability" status supported.
    • 03.44.30.17
      • I1702039456 [Configuration inspector] [DBK-2558] Fixed error during export of FX Scheme configuration by Configuration Inspector.
    • 03.44.30.14
      • DBK-2550 [Health Monitoring] Only processes that can be activated in the current node are monitored.
    • 03.44.30.07
      • DBK-2429 [Configuration inspector] Fixed long value trimming on configuration export.
    • 03.44.29.50
      • DBK-2461 [Configuration inspector] Added the ability to transfer Sy. Configuration mapping for Datamart dimension tables.
    • 03.44.29.47
      • DBK-2433 [High availability] Copying officer privileges now processes only roles prefixed with OWS_Owner name (i.e. WAY4 roles) and ignores others (Oracle or custom roles, if any).
    • 03.44.29.45
      • DBK-2438 [Fast track upgrade] For LOCK/UNLOCK/KILL_SESSION actions, the optional procedure Sys.OWS_ADMINISTER_USER no longer checks that the user account being processed has system privileges. Otherwise, it would not be able to manage the HSK Owner user. These privileges continue to be checked for other actions with user accounts. Note that this is an insignificant reduction in security in the new version of the procedure.
    • 03.44.29.41
      • I1612278687 [DB kernel] [DBK-2428] Non-periodic parallel process now processes Suspend and Resume correctly.
    • 03.44.29.39
      • DBK-2424 [Configuration inspector] Fixed importing records with default column values. Buffered messages mode is used for the import process to preserve the import log in the case of a fatal exception.
    • 03.44.29.34
      • DBK-2404 [High availability] Fixed bug: Excluding some actions from outward replication did not work. Now updating last_scan during CDU is excluded from GG replication.
    • 03.44.29.31
      • I1601292690 [DB manager] [DBK-2032] DB Manager form selects a reference value from long reference tables (long DDDW) using a LIKE SQL operator. It causes searching without index if the DB column is encrypted. To prevent such a case, declare the list of encrypted columns directly. The form will use '=' in the SQL statement for these columns. Use the ENCRYPTED_COLUMNS DB.INI parameter to declare the column list. Format of the parameter: <table code 1>.<column code 1>,<table code 2>.<column code 2>,...
      • I1611102005 [DB manager] [DBK-2394] Fixed problem when DB Manager didn't reset the value of the IS_READY field in some cases (when a user changed a DB record through a DB Manager form twice and another process set the field value to "Y" between the changes).
    • 03.44.29.30
      • DBK-2373 [DB kernel] Changed error message when grants were not updated on upgrade.
      • DBK-2375 [DB kernel] Table local_constants and view v_local_constants has been enhanced with additional sets of fields of different types. This allows to use this structure in DB Manager and WAY4 Manager User Interfaces for capturing more input parameters than before.
      • DBK-2387 [DB manager] Oracle Reports Servlet needs a new parameter reports_directory ( the path to the directory where RDF - files places). Parameters report_server_home, report_server_work, home_directory, work_directory not used any more.
      • DBK-2379 [Distributed processing] Added the ability to set the primary node to unavailable with a console connected to a secondary node if another secondary node exists.
    • 03.44.29.25
      • DBK-2332 [DB kernel] Supported flexible interval qualifier for period processes start time.
    • 03.44.29.16
      • DBK-2339 [DB kernel] Changed call method of DB procedures called before link form. Now binding is used to pass IN parameter (Record ID) into the procedure.
      • DBK-2342 [High availability] Online services was not able to reject operations routed to not-critical services without waiting for time-out in situations when no suitable active services were found.
    • 03.44.29.14
      • DBK-2331 [DB kernel] Concurrence on updating process_log in Way4Replication has been fixed.
    • 03.44.29.12
      • DBK-2326 [High availability] Fixed latency of WAY4Replication copy process.

    • 03.44.19.28
      • I1608166252 [Fast track upgrade] [DBK-2288] "Checksum: the divergence of data in the constant tables" fixed.
    • 03.44.19.26
      • DBK-2235 [High availability]
      • DBK-2278 [DB kernel] Object Task Scheduler fails if the node is not available.
      • DBK-2280 [DB kernel] Fixed concurrency between object task and normal operations when the Object Task Scheduler is suspended.
      • DBK-2282 [DB kernel] A periodic process will no longer try to start working when it is suspended.
      • DBK-2283 [DB kernel] Fixed problem when process uniqueness control did not work if the process had the Suspended status.
      • DBK-2284 [DB kernel] The data value of the "Suspended" process status in Process Log has been changed from "P" to "S".
      • DBK-2291 [High availability] High Concurrency on sw_service_activity when switching services to another node has been fixed.
    • 03.44.19.19
      • DBK-2258 [High availability] Eliminated use of all available parallel query servers by the "Retry All" action in High Availability console.
    • 03.44.19.18
      • DBK-2241 [DB kernel] If a partitioned table is being encrypted, its existing partitions will be moved to the table tablespace (was: they resided in their current tablespace). This enables tablespace encryption for existing partitions.
      • DBK-2255 [High availability] Unable to switch easily between primary and secondary of the old version.
      • I1609232726 [DB manager] [DBK-2247] Report Engine R2 batch mode. The engine incorrectly substituted SELECT columns into parameters if the substitutions were marked by sequence numbers (%1%, %2%, ...).
    • 03.44.19.14
      • DBK-2238 [DB kernel] Now for any error, the SQL Exporter pipe saves error details to the process log and displays a message to the user.
      • DBK-2239 [Housekeeping] 'ORA-06502: PL/SQL: : character string buffer too small' while restoring data from a table with large number of columns (like appl_acnt) was fixed for form "OpenWay\Housekeeping\Runtime\Save Table Log"
      • DBK-2240 [Housekeeping] 'ORA-00936: Missing expression' while restoring data to a custom table was fixed for form "OpenWay\Housekeeping\Runtime\Save Table Log"
    • 03.44.19.10
      • DBK-2209 [DB kernel] Application version registration has become a HA safe operation and can be done in secondary systems.
    • 03.44.10.01
      • DBK-2255 [High availability] Unable to switch easily between primary and secondary of the old version.
      • DBK-2258 [High availability] Eliminated use of all available parallel query servers by the "Retry All" action in High Availability console.
    • 03.44.09.14
      • DBK-2134 [Offline obfuscator] ORA-16612 during parallel execution of Obfuscating All Tables has been fixed.
    • 03.44.09.12
      • I210244216 [DB kernel] [DBK-2210] Date format in the status bar of DBM/W4M can be changed.
      • DBK-2208 [Scheduler] Reports Engine R2 (batch mode) didn't fill P_CONNID parameter if it was launched from Scheduler.
      • I1607059217 [Housekeeping] [DBK-2199] Fixed capability of clearing the House Keeping collections from OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Housekeeping\Runtime\Collections
    • 03.44.09.11
      • DBK-2201 [WAY4 Web] Now audit log is active by default. To exclude, set AUDIT_MODE='N' To include for a particular group, set AUDIT_MODE for this group.
    • 03.44.09.10
      • DBK-2176 [Distributed processing] To avoid a large number of queries to gv$instance from multithread periodic jobs, set the process parameter EXIT_ON_MAX_DELAY = 'N'.
      • DBK-2180 [High availability] Fixed service migration (switching Main and Reserve nodes). After migration, a service becomes Inactive on the old Main node and Active on the new Main node.
      • DBK-2186 [High availability] Now cdu process is ready to receive incrrect ContractID
    • 03.43.99.20
      • DBK-2109 [DB kernel] The CopyOfficers script now locks a user account if Officer.is_active is not "Yes".
      • DBK-2180 [High availability] Fixed service migration (switching Main and Reserve nodes). After migration, a service becomes Inactive on the old Main node and Active on the new Main node.
    • 03.43.99.19
      • DBK-2176 [Distributed processing] To avoid a large number of queries to gv$instance from multithread periodic jobs, set the process parameter EXIT_ON_MAX_DELAY = 'N'.
    • 03.43.99.18
      • DBK-2154 [DB kernel] The default value for line separator has been changed from LF to CRLF. The LINE_SEPARATOR parameter has been added and it configures the Java SQL Exporter Pipe.
      • DBK-2162 [DB manager] Reports Engine R2 processed double symbols '%' in parameter value incorrectly. Replace %% with %%%%.
    • 03.43.99.17
      • DBK-2139 [DB manager] Reports Engine R2. New parameters for Batch report utility: errorStatusXml (to switch off corresponding Report Server parameter), errorDir (directory for error reports).
      • DBK-2143 [DB manager] Report Engine R2 generated an exception if it was requested to save result file on server.
    • 03.43.99.16
      • DBK-2147 [DB kernel] Telescope was unable to run reports with report server version 11+ if a parameter contained a single quote character.
    • 03.43.99.12
      • DBK-2107 [DB manager] Report Engine R2. Parameters P_USER, P_TITLE can be set in menu item parameter list.
    • 03.43.99.11
      • I1606063687 [DB manager] [DBK-2100] Reports Engine R2 no longer ignores the report_server_http_timeout parameter.

    UFX Core

    • 2.2.13-0026
      • I1704247540 [Application management] [UFX-401] Fixed processing of special *#N value for clearing the client base address fields in UFX Applications.
    • 2.2.13-0025
      • UFX-370 [Tariff management] Corrected UFX schema for tariffs to allow simultaneous presence of TariffTypeExt with TariffCode or TariffCodeExt elements.
    • 2.2.13-0024
      • UFX-364 [Tariff management] The Tariff Import pipe now supports importing a subdomain without its parent domain.
    • 2.2.13-0023
      • UFX-359 [Application management] XML Applications Overall Response pipe behavior has been aligned with the manual: extension is padded with zeros to be exactly three digits long.
    • 2.2.13-0021
      • UFX-312 [Application management] Now RegNumber field for applications is limited to 64 characters. Message format error occures instead of General error in case of invalid value.
    • 2.2.13-0018
      • UFX-353 [SOA] UFX Additional Statement now returns Transaction Type Extension for a single bonus operation.
    • 2.2.13-0016
      • I1612128483 [SOA] [UFX-350] Fixed UFX additional statement ordering problem occurring on Oracle 12.
    • 2.2.13-0015
      • UFX-349 [SOA] UsageRs/Info/CurrentAmount in UFX usage limiter inquiry response is now returned even in cases when CurrentAmount is zero.
      • UFX-338 [Application management] The length of Application/Data/Address/PhoneList/Phone/PhoneNumber now is 32 chars.
      • UFX-348 [SOA] An incompatible change in UFX additional statement response format has been reverted: transaction amount for reversals is positive again.
    • 2.2.13-0009
      • UFX-341 [Tariff management] Tariff Domains Export pipe now uses the correct xsd element length for validation of GL_NUMBER.
    • 2.2.13-0008
      • UFX-344 [SOA] Performance of UFX AuthMethod request has been improved.
      • I1609290484 [Application management] [UFX-343] UFX XML Application Response pipe now writes response file correctly after rename file exception.
    • 2.2.13-0007
      • UFX-340 [SOA] Amounts for reversal and adjustment operations in UFX Additional Statement response have now been changed: amounts of these operations are similar to the amounts of Cardholder Contract Statement report (except signs).
    • 2.2.13-0006
      • I1611170980 [Changes export] [UFX-339] Changes Export pipe now correctly creates output files when CREATE_EMPTY_FILES parameters is set to "N".
    • 2.2.12-0022
      • UFX-359 [Application management] XML Applications Overall Response pipe behavior has been aligned with the manual: extension is padded with zeros to be exactly three digits long.
    • 2.2.12-0021
      • UFX-341 [Tariff management] Tariff Domains Export pipe now uses the correct xsd element length for validation of GL_NUMBER.
      • I1609290484 [Application management] [UFX-343] UFX XML Application Response pipe now writes response file correctly after rename file exception.
    • 2.2.12-0020
      • I1611170980 [Changes export] [UFX-339] Changes Export pipe now correctly creates output files when CREATE_EMPTY_FILES parameters is set to "N".
    • 2.2.12-0016
      • UFX-330 [SOA] Chip addendums for P2P operations are now saved based on chip data from a request.
    • 2.2.12-0015
      • UFX-293 [Application management] XML Applications Import R2 pipe now supports applications for instalment management.
    • 2.2.12-0010
      • UFX-319 [Customer profile] Transaction downgrades have been supported for P2P operations
      • UFX-320 [Customer profile] Transaction downgrades have been supported for bill payment operations
      • UFX-317 [Changes export] AmndInfo/AmndDate UFX element now contains date with time. Old behavior can be restored if needed, contact support for details.
    • 2.2.12-0007
      • UFX-311 [SOA] Add new type of additional statement which provides information about instalments for contract.
      • UFX-322 [SOA] EMVData is now removed from acquiring operation response when it is not present in the issuer response.
    • 2.2.12-0005
      • UFX-306 [Application management] XML Application Response and XML Application Overall Response pipes now support card applet export.
    • 2.2.11-0008
      • UFX-341 [Tariff management] Tariff Domains Export pipe now uses the correct xsd element length for validation of GL_NUMBER.
      • I1609290484 [Application management] [UFX-343] UFX XML Application Response pipe now writes response file correctly after rename file exception.
    • 2.2.11-0007
      • I1611170980 [Changes export] [UFX-339] Changes Export pipe now correctly creates output files when CREATE_EMPTY_FILES parameters is set to "N".
    • 2.2.11-0006
      • UFX-317 [Changes export] AmndInfo/AmndDate UFX element now contains date with time. Old behavior can be restored if needed, contact support for details.
    • 2.2.11-0003
      • UFX-299 [SOA] UFX Additional Statement now supports send-to-friend transfer data.
    • 2.2.11-0002
      • UFX-313 [Tariff management] Tariff Import and Tariff Domains Import pipes have been changed to accept only tariffs with dates in the future by default.
    • 2.2.10-0022
      • UFX-341 [Tariff management] Tariff Domains Export pipe now uses the correct xsd element length for validation of GL_NUMBER.
      • I1609290484 [Application management] [UFX-343] UFX XML Application Response pipe now writes response file correctly after rename file exception.
    • 2.2.10-0021
      • I1611170980 [Changes export] [UFX-339] Changes Export pipe now correctly creates output files when CREATE_EMPTY_FILES parameters is set to "N".
    • 2.2.10-0020
      • UFX-317 [Changes export] AmndInfo/AmndDate UFX element now contains date with time. Old behavior can be restored if needed, contact support for details.
    • 2.2.10-0016
      • I1604051762 [SOA] [UFX-305] UFX backward compatibility transformation has been corrected: StmtItem/DocData/BankingDt element (added in format version 2.3.64) is no longer returned when UFX version specified in request is less than 2.3.64.
    • 2.2.10-0012
      • UFX-225 [Application management] Added Application/ApplicationSource that sets the code of the component/system from which the application originated. Application/ApplicationSource will be present in a UFX response only when UFXMsg/@version is greater than or equal to 2.3.71. XML Application Response, XML Application Overall Response and XML Adv Application Export pipes now have the UFX_VERSION parameter that can be used to put Application/ApplicationSource into a UFX export/response file.
    • 2.2.10-0011
      • UFX-289 [Tariff management] The UFX schema for tariffs has been changed: some ApplyMode element values have been renamed. On tariff import we still support old and new values. On tariff export we produce new values by default. There is a backward compatibility parameter to enable the old values.
    • 2.2.10-0006
      • UFX-296 [Application management] Advanced Applications R2 now supports loading of the "Used As MK" field, which indicates whether the key is the master key.
      • UFX-301 [SOA] Transaction details for P2P authorisation documents is no longer filled with the hardcoded value "WAY4U REQUEST".
    • 2.2.10-0004
      • UFX-300 [Tariff management] Tariffs with the Technical role are now supported in tariff import/export pipes.
      • UFX-298 [Application management] XML Applications R2 pipes can now import and export Threshold tariffs.

    WAY4 Manager

    • 1.6.243
      • I1703314633 [WAY4 manager] [WM-3049] MessageBox menu item step has been switched to OPW message formatting protocol.
    • 1.6.220
      • I1704055962, I1704055907 [WAY4 manager] [WM-3035] Menu Item editor has been fixed: <parameter> inclusions can be used in Parameters and Name fields.
    • 1.6.214
      • WM-3037 [Remote access] Fixed error "Neither 'reports_directory' nor 'reports_home_directory' has been declared" in Remote Access client.
    • 1.6.182
      • WM-2990 [WAY4 manager] History tables display active record first.
    • 1.6.181
      • WM-2986 [WAY4 manager] User notification is improved for errors in password changing.
    • 1.6.175
      • I1611172704 [WAY4 manager] [WM-2981] SQL executor manages query history safely.
    • 1.6.166
      • I1611303231 [WAY4 manager] [WM-2980] Functioning of form editor/column editor has been improved.
    • 1.6.140
      • WM-2928 [WAY4 manager] Password encryption feature has been fixed: both plain and encrypted passwords are verified through Oracle password policies.
    • 1.6.134
      • WM-2939 [WAY4 manager] Closing modal form without data has been fixed
      • WM-2944 [WAY4 manager]
      • WM-2949 [WAY4 manager] Edit mask value from a domain can be used.
    • 1.6.112
      • WM-2871 [WAY4 manager] Button "Cancel" has been added into forms synchronization window
      • WM-2909 [WAY4 manager] Way4 Manager - Main menu item's context action "Copy path to clipboard" uses '\' as path separator.
      • WM-2898 [WAY4 manager] WAY4 Manager password processing has been changed to fire an error when forbidden characters are used.
      • WM-2908 [WAY4 manager] Actions in forms with "no_save" now save data after additions.
      • I1604259041 [WAY4 manager] [WM-2897] Enabling Condition script generation has been fixed in dataforms.
      • I1606081236 [WAY4 manager] [WM-2921] Bug has been fixed: records are deleted successfully.
    • 1.6.108
      • WM-2926 [WAY4 manager] It is prohibited to edit Way4Web and other special user groups in WAY4 Manager.
    • 1.6.59
      • WM-2859 [WAY4 manager] Flag 'Escape Parameters' is now available for editing in MenuItem's editor - for subitems of ExeFile type.
      • WM-2866 [WAY4 manager] Redundant line with grants for the "Sql cycle" menu item has been deleted.
      • I1604142526 [WAY4 manager] [WM-2882] Fixed problem creating history records for forms without "can save".
    • 1.6.42
      • WM-2862 [WAY4 manager] If there are any changes in the data area that have not been applied, the user management dialog (OpenWay.Full.DB Administrator Utilities.Users & Grants.User Groups and Users - Edit) will warn the user when OK is pressed.
    • 1.6.7
      • I1603071865 [WAY4 manager] [WM-2857] Fixed bug with incorrect form refresh after subitem Up/Down operations in menu item editor.
